# <span data-ttu-id="62b65-103">Microsoft Edge - 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-103">Microsoft Edge - Policies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-104">최신 버전의 Microsoft Edge에는 다음과 같은 정책이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-104">The latest version of Microsoft Edge includes the following policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-105">이러한 정책을 사용하여 조직에서 Microsoft Edge의 실행 방식을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-105">You can use these policies to configure how Microsoft Edge runs in your organization.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-106">Microsoft Edge의 업데이트 방법 및 시기를 제어하는 데 사용되는 추가 정책 집합에 대한 자세한 내용은 [Microsoft Edge 업데이트 정책 참조](microsoft-edge-update-policies.md)를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-106">For information about an additional set of policies used to control how and when Microsoft Edge is updated, check out [Microsoft Edge update policy reference](microsoft-edge-update-policies.md).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-107">Microsoft Edge에 대한 권장 보안 구성 기준 설정에 대해 [Microsoft 보안 규정 준수 툴킷](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319)을 다운로드할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-107">You can download the [Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit](https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=55319) for the recommended security configuration baseline settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-108">자세한 내용은 [Microsoft 보안 기준 블로그](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines)를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-108">For more information see the [Microsoft Security Baselines Blog](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-security-baselines/bg-p/Microsoft-Security-Baselines).</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-109">이 문서는 Microsoft Edge 버전 77 이상에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-109">This article applies to Microsoft Edge version 77 or later.</span></span>

|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-810">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-810">UserDataDir</span></span>](#userdatadir)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-811">사용자 데이터 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-811">Set the user data directory</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-812">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-812">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>](#userdatasnapshotretentionlimit)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-813">긴급 롤백이 있을 경우 사용하기 위해 보관된 사용자 데이터 스냅샷 수를 제한합니다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-813">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-814">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-814">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>](#userfeedbackallowed)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-815">사용자 피드백 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-815">Allow user feedback</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-816">VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-816">VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>](#verticaltabsallowed)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-817">브라우저 측면의 탭에 대한 수직 레이아웃의 가용성 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-817">Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-818">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-818">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>](#videocaptureallowed)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-819">비디오 캡처 허용 또는 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-819">Allow or block video capture</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-820">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-820">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>](#videocaptureallowedurls)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-821">권한 요청 없이 비디오 캡처 장치에 액세스할 수 있는 사이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-821">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-822">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-822">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>](#wpadquickcheckenabled)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-823">WPAD 최적화 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-823">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-824">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-824">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>](#webappinstallforcelist)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-825">강제 설치된 웹 앱 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-825">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-826">WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-826">WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>](#webcaptureenabled)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-827">Microsoft Edge에서 웹 캡처 기능을 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-827">Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-828">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-828">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>](#webcomponentsv0enabled)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-829">M84까지 웹 구성 요소 v0 API 다시 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-829">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-830">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-830">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>](#webdriveroverridesincompatiblepolicies)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-831">WebDriver가 호환되지 않는 정책을 재정의하도록 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-831">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-832">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-832">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>](#webrtcallowlegacytlsprotocols)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-833">WebRTC에서 레거시 TLS/DTLS 다운그레이드 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-833">Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-834">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-834">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>](#webrtclocalipsallowedurls)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-835">WebRTC로 로컬 IP 주소 노출 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-835">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-836">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-836">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>](#webrtclocalhostiphandling)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-837">WebRTC로 로컬 IP 주소 노출 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-837">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-838">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-838">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>](#webrtcudpportrange)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-839">WebRTC로 로컬 UDP 포트 범위 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-839">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-840">WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-840">WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>](#webwidgetallowed)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-841">웹 위젯 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-841">Enable the Web widget</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-842">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-842">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-843">Windows 시작 시 웹 위젯 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-843">Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>|
|[<span data-ttu-id="62b65-844">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-844">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>](#winhttpproxyresolverenabled)|<span data-ttu-id="62b65-845">Windows 프록시 해결 프로그램 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-845">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>|




  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-846">Application Guard 설정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-846">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-847">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-847">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-848">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-848">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-849">Application Guard 컨테이너 프록시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-849">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-850">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-850">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-851">Windows 84 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-851">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-852">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-852">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-853">Microsoft Edge Application Guard에 대한 프록시 설정을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-853">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-854">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge Application Guard에서 프록시 구성의 다른 원본을 무시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-854">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-855">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge Application Guard는 호스트의 프록시 구성을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-855">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-856">이 정책은 Application Guard(호스트) 외부의 Microsoft Edge 프록시 구성에는 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-856">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-857">ProxyMode 필드를 사용하면 Microsoft Edge Application Guard에서 사용되는 프록시 서버를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-857">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-858">ProxyPacUrl 필드는 프록시 .pac 파일의 URL입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-858">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-859">ProxyServer 필드는 프록시 서버의 URL입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-859">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-860">'direct' 값을 'ProxyMode'로 선택하면 다른 모든 필드는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-860">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-861">'auto_detect' 값을 'ProxyMode'로 선택하면 다른 모든 필드는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-861">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-862">'fixed_servers' 값을 'ProxyMode'로 선택하면 'ProxyServer' 필드가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-862">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-863">'pac_script' 값을 'ProxyMode'로 선택하면 'ProxyPacUrl' 필드가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-863">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-864">이중 프록시를 통한 Application Guard 트래픽을 식별하는 방법에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653)을 방문하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-864">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-865">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-865">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-866">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-866">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-867">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-867">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-868">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-868">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-869">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-869">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-870">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-870">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-871">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-871">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-872">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-872">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-873">GP 고유 이름: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-873">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-874">GP 이름: Application Guard 컨테이너 프록시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-874">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-875">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-875">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-876">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-876">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-877">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-877">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-878">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-878">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-879">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-879">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-880">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-880">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-881">값 이름: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-881">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-882">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-882">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-883">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-883">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-884">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-884">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {"ProxyMode": "direct", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-885">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-885">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-886">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-886">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-887">응용 프로그램 보호 즐겨찾기 동기화 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-887">Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-888">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-888">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-889">Windows 90 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-889">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-890">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-890">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-891">이 정책을 사용하면 응용 프로그램 보호가 사용하도록 설정된 Microsoft Edge 컴퓨터/장치에서 호스트에서 컨테이너로 즐겨찾기 동기화를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-891">This policy allows Microsoft Edge computers/devices that have application guard enabled to sync favorites from the host to the container so the favorites match.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-892">[ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites)가 구성된 경우 해당 즐겨찾기도 컨테이너에 동기화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-892">If [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) are configured, those favorites will also be synced to the container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-893">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우 컨테이너에서 즐겨찾기 편집을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-893">If you enable this policy, editing favorites in the container is disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-894">따라서 컨테이너 브라우저의 UI에서 즐겨찾기 추가 및 즐겨찾기 폴더 추가 단추가 흐리게 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-894">So, the add favorites and add favorites folder buttons will be blurred out in the UI of the container browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-895">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우 호스트의 즐겨찾기들이 컨테이너에 공유되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-895">If you disable or don't configure this policy, favorites on the host will not be shared to the container.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-896">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-896">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-897">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-897">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-898">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-898">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-899">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-899">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-900">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-900">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-901">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-901">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-902">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-902">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-903">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-903">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-904">GP 고유 이름: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-904">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-905">GP 이름: Application Guard 즐겨찾기 동기화 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-905">GP name: Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-906">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-906">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-907">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-907">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-908">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-908">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-909">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-909">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-910">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-910">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-911">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-911">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-912">값 이름: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-912">Value Name: ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-913">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-913">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-914">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-914">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-915">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-915">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-916">캐스트 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-916">Cast policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-917">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-917">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-918">EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-918">EnableMediaRouter</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-919">Google Cast 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-919">Enable Google Cast</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-920">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-920">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-921">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-921">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-922">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-922">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-923">Google Cast를 사용하려면 해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-923">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-924">사용자는 앱 메뉴, 페이지 상황에 맞는 메뉴, 캐스팅이 가능한 웹 사이트의 미디어 제어 및 캐스트 도구 모음 아이콘(표시된 경우)에서 해당 정책을 시작할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-924">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-925">Google Cast를 사용 해제려면 해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-925">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-926">기본적으로 Google Cast는 사용하도록 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-926">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-927">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-927">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-928">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-928">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-929">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-929">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-930">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-930">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-931">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-931">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-932">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-932">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-933">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-933">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-934">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-934">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-935">GP 고유 이름: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-935">GP unique name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-936">GP 이름: Google Cast 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-936">GP name: Enable Google Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-937">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/캐스트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-937">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-938">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-938">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-939">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-939">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-940">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-940">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-941">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-941">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-942">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-942">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-943">값 이름: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-943">Value Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-944">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-944">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-945">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-945">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-946">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-946">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-947">기본 설정 키 이름: EnableMediaRouter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-947">Preference Key Name: EnableMediaRouter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-948">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-948">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-949">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-949">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-950">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-950">ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-951">도구 모음에 캐스트 아이콘 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-951">Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-952">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-952">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-953">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-953">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-954">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-954">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-955">도구 모음이나 오버플로 메뉴에서 캐스트 도구 모음 아이콘을 표시하려면 해당 정책을 True로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-955">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-956">사용자는 해당 정책을 제거할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-956">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-957">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 상황에 맞는 메뉴를 사용하여 아이콘을 고정하거나 제거할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-957">If you don't configure this policy or if you disable it, users can pin or remove the icon by using its contextual menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-958">[EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 정책을 False로 설정한 경우에는 해당 정책이 무시되고 도구 모음 아이콘이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-958">If you've also set the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy to false, then this policy is ignored, and the toolbar icon isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-959">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-959">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-960">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-960">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-961">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-961">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-962">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-962">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-963">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-963">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-964">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-964">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-965">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-965">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-966">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-966">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-967">GP 고유 이름: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-967">GP unique name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-968">GP 이름: 도구 모음에 캐스트 아이콘 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-968">GP name: Show the cast icon in the toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-969">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/캐스트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-969">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Cast</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-970">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-970">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-971">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-971">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-972">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-972">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-973">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-973">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-974">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-974">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-975">값 이름: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-975">Value Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-976">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-976">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-977">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-977">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-978">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-978">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-979">기본 설정 키 이름: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-979">Preference Key Name: ShowCastIconInToolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-980">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-980">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-981">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-981">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-982">콘텐츠 설정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-982">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-983">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-983">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-984">Autoselectcertificateurl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-984">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-985">해당 사이트의 클라이언트 인증서를 자동으로 선택</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-985">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-986">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-986">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-987">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-987">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-988">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-988">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-989">정책을 설정하면 Microsoft Edge가 클라이언트 인증서를 자동으로 선택할 수 있는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴 목록을 만들 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-989">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-990">그 값은 문자열화된 JSON 사전의 배열로서 각각 {"패턴": "$URL _PATTERN", "필터": $FILTER} 형식을 가지고 있으며 여기서 $URL _PATTERN은 콘텐츠 설정 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-990">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-991">$FILTER는 브라우저에서 자동으로 선택하는 클라이언트 인증서를 제한합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-991">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-992">필터와 무관하게 서버의 인증서 요청과 일치하는 인증서만 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-992">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-993">$FILTER 구역 사용법에 대한 예시입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-993">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-994">$FILTER가 { "발급자": {"CN": "$ISSUER _CN"} }으로 설정된 경우, CommonName $ISSUER _CN을 통해 인증서로 발급된 클라이언트 인증서만이 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-994">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-995">$FILTER에 "발급자"와 "제목" 섹션이 모두 있는 경우 두 조건을 모두 만족하는 클라이언트 인증서만 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-995">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-996">$FILTER에 "O" 값이 포함된 "제목" 섹션이 포함된 경우 인증서가 선택되려면 지정된 값과 일치하는 최소 한 개의 조직이 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-996">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-997">$FILTER에 "OU" 값이 있는 "제목" 섹션이 포함된 경우 인증서가 선택되려면 지정된 값과 일치하는 최소 한 개의 조직의 단위가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-997">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-998">$FILTER가 {}로 설정된 경우 클라이언트 인증서의 선택은 추가적으로 제한되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-998">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-999">웹 서버에서 제공하는 필터는 계속 적용됨에 유의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-999">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1000">정책을 설정하지 않은 상태로 두면 모든 사이트에 대한 autoselection이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1000">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1001">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1001">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1002">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1002">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1003">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1003">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1004">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1004">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1005">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1005">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1006">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1006">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1007">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1007">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1008">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1008">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1009">GP 고유 이름: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1009">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1010">GP 이름: 해당 사이트의 클라이언트 인증서를 자동으로 선택</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1010">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1011">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1011">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1012">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1012">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1013">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1013">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1014">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1014">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1015">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1015">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1016">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1016">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1017">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1017">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1018">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1018">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1019">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1019">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1020">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1020">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1021">기본 설정 키 이름: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1021">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1022">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1022">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1023">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1023">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1024">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1024">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1025">특정 사이트에서 쿠키 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1025">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1026">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1026">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1027">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1027">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1028">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1028">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1029">쿠키를 설정하기 위해 허용되는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1029">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1030">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1030">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1031">자세한 내용은 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 및 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 정책을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1031">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1032">다음 세 가지 정책 사이에 URL 패턴 설정이 충돌할 수 없다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1032">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1033">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1033">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1034">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1034">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1035">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1035">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1036">유효한 url 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1036">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1037">별표\*는 해당 정책에 허용되는 값이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1037">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1038">쿠키가 작업 종료 시 삭제되지 않도록 하려면 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 정책을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1038">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1039">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1039">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1040">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1040">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1041">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1041">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1042">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1042">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1043">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1043">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1044">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1044">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1045">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1045">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1046">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1046">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1047">GP 고유 이름: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1047">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1048">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 쿠키 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1048">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1049">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1049">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1050">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1050">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1051">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1051">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1052">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1052">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1053">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1053">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1054">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1054">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1055">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1055">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1056">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1056">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1057">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1057">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1058">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1058">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1059">기본 설정 키 이름: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1059">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1060">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1060">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1061">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1061">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1062">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1062">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1063">특정 사이트에서 쿠키 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1063">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1064">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1064">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1065">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1065">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1066">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1066">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1067">쿠키를 설정할 수 없는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1067">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1068">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1068">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1069">자세한 내용은 [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 및 [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) 정책을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1069">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1070">다음 세 가지 정책 사이에 URL 패턴 설정이 충돌할 수 없다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1070">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1071">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1071">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1072">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1072">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1073">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1073">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1074">유효한 URL 패턴에 관한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1074">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1075">별표\*는 해당 정책에 허용되는 값이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1075">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1076">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1076">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1077">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1077">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1078">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1078">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1079">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1079">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1080">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1080">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1081">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1081">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1082">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1082">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1083">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1083">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1084">GP 고유 이름: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1084">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1085">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 쿠키 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1085">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1086">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1086">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1087">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1087">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1088">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1088">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1089">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1089">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1090">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1090">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1091">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1091">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1092">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1092">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1093">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1093">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1094">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1094">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1095">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1095">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1096">기본 설정 키 이름: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1096">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1097">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1097">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1098">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1098">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1099">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1099">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1100">특정 웹 사이트의 쿠키를 현재 세션으로 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1100">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1101">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1101">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1102">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1102">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1103">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1103">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1104">사용자가 정의한 URL 패턴과 일치하는 웹 사이트로 인해 생성된 쿠키는 세션이 종료되면 (창이 닫히는 경우) 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1104">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1105">패턴과 일치하지 않는 웹 사이트에서 생성된 쿠키는 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 정책 (설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성에 의해 제어됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1105">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1106">해당 정책을 구성하지 않는 경우에도 기본 동작이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1106">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1107">Microsoft Edge가 배경 모드에서 실행되고 있는 경우 마지막 창이 닫힐 때 세션이 종료되지 않을 수 있습니다. 즉, 창을 닫을 때 쿠키가 지워지지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1107">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1108">Microsoft Edge를 배경 모드로 실행하는 경우 수행되는 작업을 구성하는 방법에 대한 자세한 내용은 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 정책을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1108">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1109">[CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) 및 [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) 정책을 사용하여 쿠키를 만들 수 있는 웹 사이트를 제어할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1109">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1110">다음 세 가지 정책 사이에 URL 패턴 설정이 충돌할 수 없다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1110">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1111">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1111">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1112">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1112">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1113">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1113">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1114">유효한 URL 패턴에 관한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1114">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1115">별표\*는 해당 정책에 허용되는 값이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1115">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1116">[RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 정책을 설정하여 이전 세션에서 URL을 복원하는 경우 해당 정책은 무시되고 쿠키는 해당 사이트에 대해 영구적으로 저장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1116">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1117">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1117">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1118">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1118">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1119">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1119">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1120">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1120">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1121">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1121">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1122">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1122">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1123">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1123">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1124">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1124">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1125">GP 고유 이름: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1125">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1126">GP 이름: 특정 웹 사이트의 쿠키를 현재 세션으로 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1126">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1127">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1127">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1128">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1128">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1129">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1129">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1130">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1130">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1131">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1131">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1132">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1132">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1133">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1133">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1134">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1134">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1135">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1135">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1136">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1136">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1137">기본 설정 키 이름: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1137">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1138">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1138">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1139">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1139">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1140">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1140">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1141">쿠키 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1141">Configure cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1142">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1142">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1143">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1143">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1144">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1144">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1145">웹 사이트에서 사용자의 장치에 쿠키를 생성할 수 있는지 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1145">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1146">해당 정책 모두 또는 없음 - 모든 웹 사이트에서 쿠키를 생성하거나 생성하지 않도록 허용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1146">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1147">해당 정책을 사용하여 특정 웹 사이트의 쿠키를 사용하도록 설정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1147">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1148">세션 종료 시 쿠키를 삭제하려면 해당 정책을 'SessionOnly'로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1148">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1149">Microsoft Edge가 배경 모드에서 실행되고 있는 경우 마지막 창이 닫힐 때 세션이 종료되지 않을 수 있습니다. 즉, 창을 닫을 때 쿠키가 지워지지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1149">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1150">Microsoft Edge를 배경 모드로 실행하는 경우 수행되는 작업을 구성하는 방법에 대한 자세한 내용은 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 정책을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1150">See [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1151">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본적으로 'AllowCookies'이 사용되고 사용자는 Microsoft Edge 설정에서 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1151">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1152">(사용자가 해당 설정을 변경할 수 없게 하려면 정책을 설정합니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1152">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1153">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1153">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1154">AllowCookies (1) = 모든 사이트에서 쿠키 생성 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1154">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1155">BlockCookies (2) = 모든 사이트에서 쿠키 생성 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1155">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1156">SessionOnly (4) = [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)에 나열된 항목을 제외하고 세션 기간 동안 쿠키를 유지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1156">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1157">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1157">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1158">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1158">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1159">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1159">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1160">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1160">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1161">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1161">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1162">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1162">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1163">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1163">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1164">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1164">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1165">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1165">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1166">GP 고유 이름: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1166">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1167">GP 이름: 쿠키 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1167">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1168">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1168">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1169">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1169">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1170">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1170">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1171">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1171">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1172">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1172">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1173">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1173">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1174">값 이름: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1174">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1175">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1175">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1176">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1176">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1177">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1177">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1178">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1178">Preference Key Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1179">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1179">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1180">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1180">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1181">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1181">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1182">읽기를 위해 파일 시스템 API 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1182">Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1183">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1183">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1184">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1184">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1185">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1185">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1186">이 정책을 3으로 설정하면 웹 사이트에서 파일 시스템 API를 사용하여 호스트 운영 체제의 파일 시스템에 대한 읽기 액세스를 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1186">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for read access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1187">이 정책을 2로 설정하면 액세스가 거부됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1187">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1188">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 웹 사이트에서 액세스를 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1188">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1189">사용자는 이 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1189">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1190">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1190">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1191">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = 어떤 사이트도 파일 시스템 API를 통해 파일 및 디렉토리에 대한 읽기 액세스를 요청하도록 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1191">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = Don't allow any site to request read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1192">AskFileSystemRead (3) = 사이트에서 파일 시스템 API를 통해 파일 및 디렉토리에 대한 읽기 액세스 권한을 사용자에게 요청하도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1192">AskFileSystemRead (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1193">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1193">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1194">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1194">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1195">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1195">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1196">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1196">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1197">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1197">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1198">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1198">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1199">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1199">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1200">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1200">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1201">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1201">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1202">GP 고유 이름: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1202">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1203">GP 이름: 읽기를 위해 파일 시스템 API 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1203">GP name: Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1204">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1204">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1205">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1205">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1206">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1206">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1207">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1207">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1208">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1208">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1209">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1209">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1210">값 이름: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1210">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1211">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1211">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1212">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1212">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1213">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1213">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1214">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1214">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>
