  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1215">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1215">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1216">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1216">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1217">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1217">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1218">쓰기를 위해 파일 시스템 API 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1218">Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1219">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1219">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1220">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1220">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1221">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1221">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1222">이 정책을 3으로 설정하면 웹 사이트에서 파일 시스템 API를 사용하여 호스트 운영 체제의 파일 시스템에 대한 쓰기 액세스를 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1222">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for write access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1223">이 정책을 2로 설정하면 액세스가 거부됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1223">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1224">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 웹 사이트에서 액세스를 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1224">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1225">사용자는 이 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1225">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1226">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1226">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1227">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = 어떤 사이트도 파일 및 디렉토리에 대한 쓰기 권한을 요청하도록 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1227">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = Don't allow any site to request write access to files and directories</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1228">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = 사이트에서 사용자에게 파일 및 디렉터리에 대한 쓰기 액세스 권한을 요청하도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1228">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant write access to files and directories</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1229">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1229">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1230">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1230">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1231">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1231">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1232">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1232">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1233">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1233">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1234">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1234">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1235">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1235">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1236">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1236">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1237">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1237">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1238">GP 고유 이름: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1238">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1239">GP 이름: 쓰기를 위해 파일 시스템 API 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1239">GP name: Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1240">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1240">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1241">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1241">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1242">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1242">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1243">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1243">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1244">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1244">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1245">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1245">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1246">값 이름: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1246">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1247">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1247">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1248">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1248">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1249">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1249">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1250">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1250">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1251">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1251">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1252">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1252">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1253">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1253">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1254">기본 지리적 위치 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1254">Default geolocation setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1255">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1255">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1256">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1256">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1257">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1257">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1258">웹 사이트에서 사용자의 실제 위치를 추적할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1258">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1259">기본적으로 추적을 허용('AllowGeolocation')하거나 기본적으로 추적을 거부('BlockGeolocation')하거나 웹 사이트에서 위치를 요청할 때마다 사용자에게 추적을 요청('AskGeolocation')하도록 할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1259">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1260">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 'AskGeolocation'이 사용되고 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1260">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1261">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1261">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1262">AllowGeolocation (1) = 사이트에서 사용자의 실제 위치를 추적하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1262">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1263">BlockGeolocation (2) = 모든 사이트에서 사용자의 실제 위치를 추적하도록 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1263">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1264">AskGeolocation (3) = 사이트에서 사용자의 실제 위치를 추적하려고 할 때마다 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1264">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1265">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1265">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1266">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1266">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1267">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1267">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1268">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1268">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1269">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1269">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1270">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1270">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1271">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1271">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1272">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1272">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1273">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1273">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1274">GP 고유 이름: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1274">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1275">GP 이름: 기본 지리적 위치 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1275">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1276">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1276">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1277">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1277">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1278">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1278">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1279">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1279">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1280">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1280">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1281">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1281">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1282">값 이름: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1282">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1283">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1283">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1284">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1284">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1285">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1285">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1286">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1286">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1287">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1287">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1288">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1288">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1289">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1289">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1290">기본 이미지 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1290">Default images setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1291">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1291">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1292">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1292">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1293">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1293">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1294">웹 사이트에서 이미지를 표시할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1294">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1295">모든 사이트에서 이미지를 허용('AllowImages')하거나 모든 사이트에서 이미지를 차단('BlockImages')할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1295">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1296">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본적으로 이미지가 표시되도록 허용되며 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1296">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1297">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1297">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1298">AllowImages (1) = 모든 사이트에서 모든 이미지를 표시하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1298">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1299">BlockImages (2) = 모든 사이트에서 이미지를 표시하도록 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1299">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1300">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1300">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1301">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1301">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1302">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1302">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1303">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1303">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1304">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1304">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1305">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1305">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1306">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1306">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1307">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1307">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1308">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1308">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1309">GP 고유 이름: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1309">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1310">GP 이름: 기본 이미지 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1310">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1311">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1311">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1312">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1312">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1313">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1313">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1314">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1314">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1315">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1315">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1316">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1316">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1317">값 이름: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1317">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1318">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1318">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1319">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1319">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1320">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1320">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1321">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1321">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1322">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1322">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1323">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1323">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1324">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1324">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1325">비보안 콘텐츠 예외를 사용하여 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1325">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1326">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1326">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1327">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1327">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1328">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1328">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1329">사용자가 예외를 추가하여 특정 사이트에 대해 혼합 콘텐츠를 허용할 수 있는지 여부를 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1329">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1330">해당 정책은 [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) 및 [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) 정책을 사용하여 특정 URL 패턴에 대해 재정의될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1330">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1331">해당 정책을 설정하지 않은 경우 사용자는 예외를 추가하여 차단할 수 있는 혼합 콘텐츠를 허용할 수 있고 선택적으로 차단할 수 있는 혼합 콘텐츠에 대해 자동 업그레이드를 해제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1331">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1332">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1332">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1333">BlockInsecureContent (2) = 모든 사이트에서 혼합 콘텐츠를 불러오도록 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1333">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1334">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = 사용자가 혼합 콘텐츠를 허용하는 예외를 추가하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1334">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1335">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1335">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1336">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1336">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1337">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1337">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1338">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1338">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1339">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1339">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1340">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1340">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1341">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1341">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1342">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1342">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1343">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1343">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1344">GP 고유 이름: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1344">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1345">GP 이름: 비보안 콘텐츠 예외를 사용하여 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1345">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1346">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1346">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1347">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1347">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1348">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1348">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1349">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1349">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1350">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1350">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1351">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1351">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1352">값 이름: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1352">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1353">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1353">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1354">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1354">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1355">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1355">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1356">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1356">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1357">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1357">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1358">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1358">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1359">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1359">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1360">기본 JavaScript 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1360">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1361">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1361">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1362">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1362">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1363">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1363">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1364">웹 사이트에서 JavaScript를 실행할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1364">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1365">모든 사이트에 대해 허용(’AllowJavaScript')하거나 모든 사이트에 대해 차단('BlockJavaScript')할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1365">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1366">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본적으로 모든 사이트에서 JavaScript를 실행할 수 있고 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1366">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1367">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1367">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1368">AllowJavaScript (1) = 모든 사이트에서 JavaScript 실행 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1368">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1369">BlockJavaScript (2) = 모든 사이트에서 JavaScript 실행 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1369">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1370">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1370">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1371">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1371">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1372">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1372">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1373">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1373">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1374">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1374">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1375">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1375">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1376">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1376">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1377">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1377">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1378">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1378">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1379">GP 고유 이름: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1379">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1380">GP 이름: 기본 JavaScript 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1380">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1381">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1381">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1382">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1382">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1383">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1383">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1384">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1384">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1385">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1385">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1386">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1386">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1387">값 이름: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1387">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1388">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1388">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1389">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1389">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1390">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1390">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1391">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1391">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1392">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1392">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1393">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1393">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1394">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1394">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1395">기본 알림 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1395">Default notification setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1396">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1396">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1397">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1397">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1398">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1398">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1399">웹 사이트에서 바탕 화면 알림을 표시할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1399">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1400">기본적으로 알림 표시를 허용('AllowNotifications')하거나 기본적으로 알림 표시를 거부('BlockNotifications')하거나 웹 사이트에서 알림을 표시하려고 할 때마다 사용자에게 요청('AskNotifications')하도록 할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1400">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1401">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본적으로 알림이 표시되도록 허용되며 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1401">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1402">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1402">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1403">AllowNotifications (1) = 사이트에서 바탕 화면 알림을 표시하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1403">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1404">BlockNotifications (2) = 모든 사이트에서 바탕 화면 알림을 표시하도록 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1404">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1405">AskNotifications (3) = 사이트에서 바탕 화면 알림을 표시하려고 할 때마다 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1405">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1406">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1406">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1407">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1407">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1408">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1408">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1409">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1409">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1410">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1410">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1411">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1411">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1412">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1412">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1413">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1413">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1414">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1414">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1415">GP 고유 이름: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1415">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1416">GP 이름: 기본 알림 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1416">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1417">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1417">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1418">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1418">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1419">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1419">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1420">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1420">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1421">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1421">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1422">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1422">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1423">값 이름: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1423">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1424">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1424">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1425">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1425">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1426">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1426">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1427">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1427">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1428">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1428">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1429">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1429">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1430">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1430">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1431">기본 Adobe Flash 설정(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1431">Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-1432">OBSOLETE: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 87 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1432">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1433">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1433">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1434">Windows 및 macOS(77부터 87까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1434">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1435">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1435">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1436">Flash가 Microsoft Edge에서 더 이상 지원되지 않으므로 이 정책이 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1436">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1437">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 및 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls)를 먼저 확인한 다음 이 정책을 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1437">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) are checked first, then this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1438">옵션은 'ClickToPlay' 및 'BlockPlugins' 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1438">The options are 'ClickToPlay' and 'BlockPlugins'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1439">이 정책을 ' BlockPlugins '로 설정하면 이 플러그 인은 모든 웹 사이트에서 거부됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1439">If you set this policy to 'BlockPlugins', this plugin is denied for all websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1440">'ClickToPlay'를 사용하면 Flash 플러그 인이 실행되지만 사용자는 자리 표시자를 클릭하여 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1440">'ClickToPlay' lets the Flash plugin run, but users click the placeholder to start it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1441">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 해당 설정을 수동으로 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1441">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1442">참고: 자동 재생은 [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 정책에 명시적으로 나열된 도메인에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1442">Note: Automatic playback is only for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1443">모든 사이트에 대해 자동 재생을 켜려면 허용된 URL 목록에 http://\* 및 https://\*를 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1443">To turn automatic playback on for all sites, add http://\* and https://\* to the allowed list of URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1444">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1444">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1445">BlockPlugins (2) = Adobe Flash 플러그인 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1445">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1446">ClickToPlay (3) = 재생하려면 클릭</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1446">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1447">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1447">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1448">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1448">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1449">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1449">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1450">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1450">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1451">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1451">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1452">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1452">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1453">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1453">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1454">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1454">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1455">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1455">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1456">GP 고유 이름: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1456">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1457">GP 이름: 기본 Adobe Flash 설정(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1457">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1458">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1458">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1459">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1459">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1460">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1460">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1461">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1461">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1462">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1462">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1463">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1463">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1464">값 이름: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1464">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1465">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1465">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1466">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1466">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1467">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1467">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1468">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1468">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1469">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1469">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1470">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1470">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1471">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1471">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1472">기본 팝업 창 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1472">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1473">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1473">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1474">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1474">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1475">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1475">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1476">웹 사이트에서 팝업 창을 표시할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1476">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1477">모든 웹 사이트에서 팝업 창을 허용('AllowPopups')하거나 모든 사이트에서 팝업 창을 차단('BlockPopups')할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1477">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1478">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본적으로 팝업 창이 차단되며 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1478">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1479">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1479">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1480">AllowPopups (1) = 모든 사이트에서 팝업 창을 표시하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1480">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1481">BlockPopups (2) = 모든 사이트에서 팝업을 표시하도록 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1481">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1482">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1482">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1483">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1483">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1484">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1484">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1485">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1485">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1486">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1486">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1487">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1487">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1488">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1488">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1489">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1489">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1490">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1490">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1491">GP 고유 이름: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1491">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1492">GP 이름: 기본 팝업 창 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1492">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1493">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1493">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1494">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1494">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1495">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1495">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1496">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1496">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1497">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1497">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1498">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1498">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1499">값 이름: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1499">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1500">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1500">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1501">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1501">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1502">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1502">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1503">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1503">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1504">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1504">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1505">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1505">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1506">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1506">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1507">웹 블루투스 API의 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1507">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1508">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1508">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1509">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1509">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1510">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1510">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1511">웹 사이트에서 가까운 블루투스 장치에 액세스할 수 있는지 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1511">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1512">액세스를 완벽하게 차단하거나 사이트에서 블루투스 장치에 액세스하려고 할 때마다 사용자에게 요청하도록 할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1512">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1513">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본값('AskWebBluetooth', 매번 사용자에게 요청함을 의미)이 사용되고 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1513">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1514">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1514">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1515">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = 모든 사이트에서 웹 블루투스 API를 통해 Bluetooth 장치에 대한 액세스를 요청하도록 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1515">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1516">AskWebBluetooth (3) = 사이트에서 가까운 Bluetooth 장치에 대한 액세스 권한 부여를 사용자에게 요청하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1516">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1517">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1517">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1518">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1518">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1519">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1519">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1520">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1520">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1521">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1521">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1522">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1522">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1523">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1523">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1524">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1524">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1525">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1525">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1526">GP 고유 이름: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1526">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1527">GP 이름: 웹 블루투스 API의 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1527">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1528">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1528">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1529">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1529">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1530">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1530">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1531">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1531">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1532">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1532">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1533">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1533">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1534">값 이름: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1534">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1535">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1535">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1536">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1536">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1537">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1537">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1538">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1538">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1539">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1539">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1540">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1540">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1541">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1541">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1542">WebUSB API의 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1542">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1543">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1543">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1544">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1544">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1545">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1545">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1546">웹 사이트에서 연결된 USB 장치에 액세스할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1546">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1547">액세스를 완벽하게 차단하거나 웹 사이트에서 연결된 USB 장치에 액세스하려고 할 때마다 사용자에게 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1547">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1548">[WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 및 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 정책을 사용하여 특정 URL 패턴에 대해 해당 정책을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1548">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1549">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사이트에서 사용자에게 연결된 USB 장치에 기본적으로 액세스할 수 있는지('AskWebUsb') 여부를 요청할 수 있으며 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1549">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1550">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1550">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1551">BlockWebUsb (2) = 모든 사이트에서 WebUSB API를 통해 USB 장치에 대한 액세스를 요청하도록 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1551">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1552">AskWebUsb (3) = 사이트에서 연결된 USB 장치에 대한 액세스 권한 부여를 사용자에게 요청하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1552">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1553">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1553">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1554">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1554">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1555">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1555">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1556">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1556">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1557">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1557">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1558">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1558">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1559">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1559">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1560">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1560">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1561">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1561">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1562">GP 고유 이름: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1562">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1563">GP 이름: WebUSB API의 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1563">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1564">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1564">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1565">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1565">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1566">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1566">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1567">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1567">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1568">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1568">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1569">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1569">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1570">값 이름: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1570">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1571">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1571">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1572">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1572">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1573">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1573">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1574">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1574">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1575">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1575">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1576">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1576">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1577">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1577">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1578">해당 사이트에서 파일 시스템 API를 통해 읽기 권한 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1578">Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1579">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1579">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1580">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1580">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1581">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1581">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1582">정책을 설정하면 파일 시스템 API를 통해 호스트 운영 체제의 파일 시스템에 있는 파일 또는 디렉토리에 대한 읽기 액세스 권한을 사용자에게 부여하도록 요청할 수 있는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴을 나열할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1582">Setting the policy lets you list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1583">정책을 설정하지 않으면 [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting)가 설정된 경우 모든 사이트에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1583">Leaving the policy unset means [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1584">그렇지 않은 경우에는 사용자의 개인 설정이 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1584">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1585">URL 패턴은 [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls)과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1585">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1586">URL이 두 가지 모두 일치하는 경우에는 두 가지 정책 모두 우선권이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1586">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1587">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1587">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1588">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1588">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1589">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1589">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1590">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1590">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1591">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1591">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1592">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1592">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1593">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1593">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1594">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1594">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1595">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1595">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1596">GP 고유 이름: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1596">GP unique name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1597">GP 이름: 해당 사이트에서 파일 시스템 API를 통해 읽기 권한 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1597">GP name: Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1598">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1598">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1599">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1599">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1600">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1600">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1601">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1601">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1602">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1602">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1603">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1603">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1604">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1604">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1605">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1605">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1606">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1606">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1607">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1607">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1608">기본 설정 키 이름: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1608">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1609">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1609">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1610">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1610">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1611">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1611">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1612">해당 사이트에서 파일 시스템 API를 통해 읽기 권한 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1612">Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1613">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1613">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1614">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1614">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1615">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1615">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1616">정책을 설정하면 파일 시스템 API를 통해 호스트 운영 체제의 파일 시스템에 있는 파일 또는 디렉토리에 대한 읽기 액세스 권한을 사용자에게 부여하도록 요청할 수 있는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴을 나열할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1616">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1617">정책을 설정하지 않으면 [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting)가 설정된 경우 모든 사이트에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1617">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1618">그렇지 않은 경우에는 사용자의 개인 설정이 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1618">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1619">URL 패턴은 [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls)과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1619">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1620">URL이 두 가지 모두 일치하는 경우에는 두 가지 정책 모두 우선권이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1620">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1621">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1621">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1622">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1622">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1623">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1623">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1624">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1624">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1625">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1625">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1626">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1626">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1627">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1627">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1628">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1628">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1629">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1629">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1630">GP 고유 이름: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1630">GP unique name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1631">GP 이름: 해당 사이트에서 파일 시스템 API를 통해 읽기 권한 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1631">GP name: Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1632">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1632">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1633">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1633">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1634">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1634">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1635">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1635">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1636">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1636">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1637">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1637">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1638">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1638">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1639">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1639">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1640">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1640">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1641">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1641">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1642">기본 설정 키 이름: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1642">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1643">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1643">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1644">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1644">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1645">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1645">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1646">이 사이트에서 파일 및 디렉터리에 대한 쓰기 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1646">Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1647">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1647">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1648">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1648">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1649">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1649">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1650">정책을 설정하면 호스트 운영 체제의 파일 시스템에 있는 파일 또는 디렉토리에 대한 읽기 액세스 권한을 사용자에게 부여하도록 요청할 수 있는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴을 나열할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1650">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>
