<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1651">정책을 설정하지 않으면 [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting)가 설정된 경우 모든 사이트에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1651">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1652">그렇지 않은 경우에는 사용자의 개인 설정이 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1652">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1653">URL 패턴은 [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls)과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1653">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1654">URL이 두 가지 모두 일치하는 경우에는 두 가지 정책 모두 우선권이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1654">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1655">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1655">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1656">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1656">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1657">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1657">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1658">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1658">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1659">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1659">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1660">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1660">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1661">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1661">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1662">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1662">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1663">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1663">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1664">GP 고유 이름: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1664">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1665">GP 이름: 이 사이트에서 파일 및 디렉터리에 대한 쓰기 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1665">GP name: Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1666">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1666">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1667">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1667">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1668">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1668">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1669">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1669">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1670">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1670">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1671">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1671">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1672">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1672">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1673">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1673">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1674">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1674">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1675">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1675">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1676">기본 설정 키 이름: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1676">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1677">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1677">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1678">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1678">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1679">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1679">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1680">이 사이트에서 파일 및 디렉터리에 대한 쓰기 액세스 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1680">Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1681">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1681">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1682">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1682">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1683">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1683">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1684">정책을 설정하면 호스트 운영 체제의 파일 시스템에 있는 파일 또는 디렉토리에 대한 읽기 액세스 권한을 사용자에게 부여하도록 요청할 수 있는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴을 나열할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1684">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1685">정책을 설정하지 않으면 [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting)가 설정된 경우 모든 사이트에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1685">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1686">그렇지 않은 경우에는 사용자의 개인 설정이 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1686">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1687">URL 패턴은 [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls)과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1687">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1688">URL이 두 가지 모두 일치하는 경우에는 두 가지 정책 모두 우선권이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1688">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1689">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1689">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1690">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1690">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1691">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1691">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1692">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1692">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1693">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1693">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1694">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1694">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1695">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1695">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1696">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1696">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1697">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1697">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1698">GP 고유 이름: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1698">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1699">GP 이름: 이 사이트에서 파일 및 디렉터리에 대한 쓰기 액세스 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1699">GP name: Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1700">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1700">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1701">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1701">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1702">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1702">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1703">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1703">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1704">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1704">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1705">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1705">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1706">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1706">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1707">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1707">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1708">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1708">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1709">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1709">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1710">기본 설정 키 이름: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1710">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1711">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1711">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1712">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1712">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1713">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1713">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1714">해당 사이트에서 이미지 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1714">Allow images on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1715">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1715">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1716">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1716">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1717">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1717">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1718">이미지를 표시할 수 있는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1718">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1719">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성에서 모든 사이트에 대해 전역 기본 값이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1719">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1720">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1720">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1721">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1721">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1722">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1722">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1723">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1723">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1724">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1724">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1725">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1725">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1726">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1726">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1727">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1727">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1728">GP 고유 이름: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1728">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1729">GP 이름: 해당 사이트에서 이미지 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1729">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1730">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1730">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1731">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1731">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1732">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1732">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1733">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1733">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1734">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1734">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1735">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1735">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1736">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1736">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1737">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1737">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1738">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1738">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1739">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1739">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1740">기본 설정 키 이름: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1740">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1741">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1741">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1742">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1742">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1743">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1743">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1744">특정 사이트에서 이미지 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1744">Block images on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1745">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1745">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1746">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1746">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1747">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1747">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1748">이미지 표시를 허용하지 않는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1748">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1749">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1749">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1750">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1750">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1751">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1751">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1752">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1752">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1753">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1753">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1754">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1754">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1755">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1755">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1756">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1756">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1757">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1757">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1758">GP 고유 이름: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1758">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1759">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 이미지 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1759">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1760">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1760">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1761">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1761">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1762">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1762">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1763">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1763">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1764">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1764">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1765">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1765">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1766">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1766">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1767">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1767">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1768">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1768">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1769">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1769">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1770">기본 설정 키 이름: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1770">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1771">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1771">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1772">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1772">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1773">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1773">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1774">지정된 사이트에서 비보안 콘텐츠 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1774">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1775">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1775">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1776">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1776">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1777">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1777">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1778">비보안 혼합 콘텐츠(HTTPS 사이트의 HTTP 콘텐츠)를 표시할 수 있는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴 목록을 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1778">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1779">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 차단할 수 있는 혼합 콘텐츠가 차단되고 선택적 차단할 수 있는 혼합 콘텐츠가 업그레이드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1779">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1780">그러나 사용자가 예외를 설정하여 특정 사이트에 대해 비보안 혼합 콘텐츠를 허용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1780">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1781">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1781">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1782">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1782">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1783">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1783">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1784">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1785">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1785">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1786">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1786">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1787">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1787">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1788">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1789">GP 고유 이름: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1789">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1790">GP 이름: 지정된 사이트에서 비보안 콘텐츠 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1790">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1791">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1791">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1792">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1792">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1793">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1794">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1795">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1795">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1796">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1796">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1797">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1797">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1798">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1798">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1799">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1799">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1800">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1800">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1801">기본 설정 키 이름: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1801">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1802">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1802">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1803">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1803">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1804">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1804">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1805">지정된 사이트에서 비보안 콘텐츠 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1805">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1806">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1806">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1807">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1807">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1808">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1808">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1809">차단할 수 있는(예: 능동) 혼합 콘텐츠(즉, HTTPS 사이트의 HTTP 콘텐츠)의 표시를 허용하지 않으며 선택적 차단할 수 있는 혼합 콘텐츠의 업그레이드를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴 목록을 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1809">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1810">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 차단할 수 있는 혼합 콘텐츠가 차단되고 선택적 차단할 수 있는 혼합 콘텐츠가 업그레이드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1810">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1811">그러나 사용자가 예외를 설정하여 특정 사이트에 대해 비보안 혼합 콘텐츠를 허용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1811">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1812">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1812">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1813">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1813">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1814">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1814">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1815">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1815">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1816">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1816">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1817">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1817">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1818">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1818">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1819">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1819">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1820">GP 고유 이름: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1820">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1821">GP 이름: 지정된 사이트에서 비보안 콘텐츠 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1821">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1822">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1822">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1823">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1823">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1824">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1824">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1825">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1825">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1826">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1826">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1827">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1827">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1828">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1828">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1829">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1829">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1830">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1830">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1831">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1831">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1832">기본 설정 키 이름: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1832">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1833">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1833">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1834">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1834">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1835">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1835">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1836">특정 사이트에서 JavaScript 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1836">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1837">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1837">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1838">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1838">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1839">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1839">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1840">JavaScript를 실행하기 위해 허용되는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1840">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1841">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1841">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1842">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1842">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1843">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1843">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1844">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1844">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1845">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1845">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1846">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1846">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1847">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1847">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1848">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1848">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1849">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1849">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1850">GP 고유 이름: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1850">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1851">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 JavaScript 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1851">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1852">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1852">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1853">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1853">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1854">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1854">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1855">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1855">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1856">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1856">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1857">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1857">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1858">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1858">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1859">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1859">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1860">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1860">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1861">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1861">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1862">기본 설정 키 이름: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1862">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1863">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1863">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1864">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1864">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1865">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1865">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1866">특정 사이트에서 JavaScript 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1866">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1867">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1867">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1868">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1868">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1869">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1869">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1870">JavaScript의 실행이 허용되지 않는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1870">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1871">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1871">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1872">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1872">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1873">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1873">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1874">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1874">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1875">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1875">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1876">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1876">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1877">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1877">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1878">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1878">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1879">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1879">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1880">GP 고유 이름: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1880">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1881">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 JavaScript 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1881">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1882">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1882">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1883">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1883">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1884">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1884">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1885">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1885">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1886">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1886">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1887">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1887">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1888">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1888">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1889">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1889">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1890">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1890">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1891">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1891">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1892">기본 설정 키 이름: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1892">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1893">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1893">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1894">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1894">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1895">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1895">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1896">기본 레거시 SameSite 쿠키 동작 설정 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1896">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1897">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1897">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1898">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1898">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1899">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1899">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1900">모든 쿠키를 레거시 SameSite 동작으로 되돌립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1900">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1901">레거시 동작으로 되돌리면 SameSite 특성을 지정하지 않은 쿠키가 "SameSite=없음"으로 간주되고, "SameSite=없음" 쿠키에 대한 요구 사항을 제거하여 "Secure" 특성을 전달하고 두 개의 사이트가 동일한지 평가 시 구성표 비교를 생략합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1901">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1902">이 정책을 설정하지 않은 경우, 쿠키에 대한 기본 SameSite 동작은 SameSite-by-default 기능, Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure 기능 그리고 Schemeful Same-Site에 대한 기타 구성 원본에 따라 달라집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1902">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1903">이러한 기능은 또한 필드 트라이얼이나 edge://flags에 있는 same-site-by-default-cookies 플래그, cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure 플래그 혹은 schemeful-same-site 플래그에 의해 구성될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1903">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1904">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1904">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1905">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = 모든 사이트의 쿠키에 대해 레거시 SameSite 동작으로 되돌림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1905">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1906">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = 모든 사이트의 쿠키에 대해 SameSite-by-default 동작 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1906">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1907">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1907">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1908">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1908">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1909">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1909">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1910">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1910">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1911">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1911">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1912">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1912">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1913">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1913">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1914">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1914">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1915">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1915">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1916">GP 고유 이름: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1916">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1917">GP 이름: 기본 레거시 SameSite 쿠키 동작 설정 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1917">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1918">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1918">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1919">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1919">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1920">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1920">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1921">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1921">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1922">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1922">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1923">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1923">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1924">값 이름: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1924">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1925">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1925">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1926">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1926">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1927">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1927">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1928">기본 설정 키 이름: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1928">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1929">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1929">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1930">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1930">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1931">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1931">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1932">지정된 사이트에서 쿠키에 대한 레거시 SameSite 동작으로 되돌리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1932">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1933">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1933">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1934">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1934">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1935">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1935">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1936">지정된 패턴과 일치하는 도메인에 대해 설정된 쿠키는 레거시 SameSite 동작으로 돌아갑니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1936">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1937">레거시 동작으로 되돌리면 SameSite 특성을 지정하지 않은 쿠키가 "SameSite=없음"으로 간주되고, "SameSite=없음" 쿠키에 대한 요구 사항을 제거하여 "Secure" 특성을 전달하고 두 개의 사이트가 동일한지 평가 시 구성표 비교를 생략합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1937">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1938">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 전역 기본값이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1938">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1939">전역 기본값은 사용자가 지정하는 패턴으로 다루지 않는 도메인의 쿠키에도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1939">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1940">전역 기본값은 [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) 정책을 사용하여 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1940">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1941">[LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled)를 설정하지 않은 경우 전역 기본값은 다른 구성 소스로 돌아갑니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1941">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1942">해당 정책에서 사용자가 나열하는 패턴은 URL이 아니라 도메인으로 취급되므로 구성표 또는 포트를 지정할 수 없다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1942">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1943">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1943">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1944">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1944">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1945">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1945">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1946">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1946">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1947">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1947">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1948">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1948">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1949">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1949">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1950">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1950">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1951">GP 고유 이름: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1951">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1952">GP 이름: 지정된 사이트에서 쿠키에 대한 레거시 SameSite 동작으로 되돌리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1952">GP name: Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1953">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1953">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1954">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1954">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1955">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1955">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1956">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1956">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1957">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1957">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1958">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1958">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1959">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1959">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1960">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1960">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1961">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1961">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\1 = "www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1962">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1962">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1963">기본 설정 키 이름: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1963">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1964">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1964">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1965">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1965">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1966">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1966">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1967">특정 사이트에서 알림 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1967">Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1968">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1968">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1969">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1969">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1970">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1970">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1971">알림을 표시할 수 있는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴 목록을 만들 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1971">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1972">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 전역 기본값이 모든 사이트에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1972">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1973">이 기본값은 설정한 경우 [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 정책에서 가져오고, 설정하지 않으면 사용자의 개인 구성에서 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1973">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1974">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1974">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1975">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1975">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1976">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1976">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1977">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1977">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1978">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1978">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1979">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1979">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1980">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1980">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1981">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1981">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1982">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1982">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1983">GP 고유 이름: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1983">GP unique name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1984">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 알림 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1984">GP name: Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1985">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1985">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1986">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1986">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1987">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1987">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1988">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1988">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1989">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1989">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1990">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1990">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1991">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1991">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1992">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1992">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1993">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1993">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1994">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1994">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1995">기본 설정 키 이름: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1995">Preference Key Name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1996">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1996">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-1997">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1997">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1998">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1998">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-1999">특정 사이트에서 알림 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-1999">Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2000">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2000">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2001">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2001">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2002">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2002">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2003">알림을 표시할 수 없는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 패턴 목록을 만들 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2003">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are not allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2004">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 전역 기본값이 모든 사이트에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2004">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2005">이 기본값은 설정한 경우 [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) 정책에서 가져오고, 설정하지 않으면 사용자의 개인 구성에서 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2005">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2006">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2006">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2007">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2007">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2008">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2008">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2009">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2009">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2010">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2010">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2011">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2011">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2012">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2012">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2013">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2013">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2014">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2014">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2015">GP 고유 이름: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2015">GP unique name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2016">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 알림 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2016">GP name: Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2017">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2017">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2018">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2018">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2019">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2019">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2020">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2020">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2021">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2021">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2022">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2022">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2023">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2023">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2024">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2024">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2025">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2025">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2026">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2026">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2027">기본 설정 키 이름: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2027">Preference Key Name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2028">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2028">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2029">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2029">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2030">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2030">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2031">특정 사이트에서 Adobe Flash 플러그인 허용(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2031">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-2032">OBSOLETE: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 87 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2032">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2033">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2033">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2034">Windows 및 macOS(77부터 87까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2034">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2035">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2035">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2036">Flash가 Microsoft Edge에서 더 이상 지원되지 않으므로 이 정책이 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2036">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2037">Adobe Flash 플러그인을 실행할 수 있는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2037">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2038">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2038">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2039">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2039">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2040">그러나, M85로 시작하는 호스트 내의 '\*' 및 '[\*.]' 와일드카드 패턴은 이 정책에서 더 이상 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2040">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2041">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2041">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2042">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2042">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2043">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2043">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2044">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2044">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2045">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2045">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2046">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2046">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2047">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2047">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2048">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2048">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2049">GP 고유 이름: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2049">GP unique name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2050">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 Adobe Flash 플러그인 허용(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2050">GP name: Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2051">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2051">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2052">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2052">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2053">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2053">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2054">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2054">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2055">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2055">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2056">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2056">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2057">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2057">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2058">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2058">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2059">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2059">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2060">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2060">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2061">기본 설정 키 이름: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2061">Preference Key Name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2062">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2062">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2063">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2063">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2064">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2064">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2065">특정 사이트에서 Adobe Flash 플러그인 차단(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2065">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
