  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-2066">OBSOLETE: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 87 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2066">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2067">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2067">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2068">Windows 및 macOS(77부터 87까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2068">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2069">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2069">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2070">Flash가 Microsoft Edge에서 더 이상 지원되지 않으므로 이 정책이 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2070">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2071">Adobe Flash의 실행을 차단하는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2071">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2072">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2072">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2073">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2073">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2074">그러나, M85로 시작하는 호스트 내의 '\*' 및 '[\*.]' 와일드카드 패턴은 이 정책에서 더 이상 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2074">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2075">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2075">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2076">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2076">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2077">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2077">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2078">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2078">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2079">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2079">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2080">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2080">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2081">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2081">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2082">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2082">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2083">GP 고유 이름: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2083">GP unique name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2084">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 Adobe Flash 플러그인 차단(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2084">GP name: Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2085">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2085">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2086">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2086">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2087">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2087">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2088">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2088">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2089">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2089">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2090">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2090">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2091">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2091">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2092">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2092">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2093">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2093">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2094">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2094">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2095">기본 설정 키 이름: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2095">Preference Key Name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2096">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2096">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2097">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2097">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2098">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2098">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2099">특정 사이트에서 팝업 창 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2099">Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2100">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2100">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2101">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2101">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2102">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2102">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2103">팝업 창을 열 수 있는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2103">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can open pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2104">별표\*는 해당 정책에 허용되는 값이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2104">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2105">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2105">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2106">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2106">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2107">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2107">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2108">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2108">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2109">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2109">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2110">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2110">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2111">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2111">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2112">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2112">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2113">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2113">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2114">GP 고유 이름: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2114">GP unique name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2115">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 팝업 창 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2115">GP name: Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2116">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2116">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2117">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2117">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2118">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2118">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2119">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2119">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2120">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2120">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2121">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2121">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2122">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2122">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2123">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2123">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2124">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2124">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2125">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2125">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2126">기본 설정 키 이름: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2126">Preference Key Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2127">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2127">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2128">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2128">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2129">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2129">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2130">특정 사이트에서 팝업 창 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2130">Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2131">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2131">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2132">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2132">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2133">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2133">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2134">팝업 창 열기를 차단하는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2134">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from opening pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2135">별표\*는 해당 정책에 허용되는 값이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2135">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2136">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2136">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2137">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2137">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2138">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2138">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2139">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2139">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2140">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2140">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2141">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2141">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2142">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2142">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2143">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2143">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2144">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2144">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2145">GP 고유 이름: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2145">GP unique name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2146">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 팝업 창 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2146">GP name: Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2147">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2147">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2148">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2148">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2149">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2149">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2150">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2150">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2151">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2151">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2152">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2152">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2153">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2153">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2154">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2154">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2155">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2155">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2156">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2156">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2157">기본 설정 키 이름: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2157">Preference Key Name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2158">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2158">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2159">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2159">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2160">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2160">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2161">프로토콜 처리기 등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2161">Register protocol handlers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2162">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2162">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2163">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2163">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2164">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2164">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2165">이 정책을 설정(권장 전용)하여 프로토콜 처리기 목록을 등록합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2165">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2166">이 목록은 사용자가 등록한 프로토콜 처리기와 병합되며, 두 경우 모두 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2166">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2167">프로토콜 처리기 등록 방법:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2167">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2168">프로토콜 속성을 구성표로 설정(예: ‘mailto’)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2168">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2169">URL 속성을 ‘protocol’ 필드에 지정된 구성표를 처리하는 응용 프로그램의 URL 속성으로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2169">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2170">패턴에는 처리된 URL로 대체되는 '%s' 자리 표시자가 포함될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2170">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2171">사용자는 이 정책에서 등록한 프로토콜 처리기를 제거할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2171">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2172">그러나 사용자는 새 기본 프로토콜 처리기를 설치하여 기존 프로토콜 처리기를 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2172">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2173">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2173">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2174">필수 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2174">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2175">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2175">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2176">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2176">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2177">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2177">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2178">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2178">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2179">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2179">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2180">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2180">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2181">GP 고유 이름: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2181">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2182">GP 이름: 프로토콜 처리기 등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2182">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2183">GP 경로 (필수): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2183">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2184">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2184">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2185">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2185">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2186">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2186">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2187">경로 (필수): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2187">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2188">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2188">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2189">값 이름: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2189">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2190">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2190">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2191">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2191">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2192">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2192">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [{"default": true, "protocol": "mailto", "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2193">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2193">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2194">기본 설정 키 이름: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2194">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2195">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2195">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2196">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2196">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2197">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2197">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2198">사용자가 Microsoft 서비스에 대한 사용자 지정 배경 이미지와 텍스트, 제안, 알림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2198">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications,</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2199">및 팁을 받을 수 있는지 여부를 선택합니다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2199">and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2200">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2200">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2201">Windows 86 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2201">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2202">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2202">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2203">사용자가 Microsoft 서비스에 대한 사용자 지정 배경 이미지와 텍스트, 제안, 알림 및 팁을 받을 수 있는지 여부를 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2203">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2204">이 설정을 사용하거나 구성하지 않으면 스포트라이트 환경과 권장 사항이 켜집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2204">If you enable or don't configure this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2205">이 설정을 사용하지 않으면 스포트라이트 환경과 권장 사항이 꺼집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2205">If you disable this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned off.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2206">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2206">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2207">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2207">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2208">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2208">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2209">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2209">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2210">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2210">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2211">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2211">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2212">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2212">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2213">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2213">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2214">GP 고유 이름: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2214">GP unique name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2215">GP 이름: 사용자가 Microsoft 서비스에 대한 사용자 지정 배경 이미지와 텍스트, 제안, 알림 및 팁을 받을 수 있는지 여부를 선택합니다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2215">GP name: Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2216">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2216">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2217">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2217">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2218">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2218">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2219">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2219">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2220">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2220">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2221">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2221">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2222">값 이름: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2222">Value Name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2223">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2223">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2224">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2224">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2225">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2225">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2226">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2226">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2227">특정 USB 장치에 연결할 특정 사이트에 대한 액세스 권한 부여</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2227">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2228">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2228">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2229">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2229">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2230">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2230">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2231">지정 공급 업체 및 제품 ID로 USB 장치에 대한 액세스 권한을 자동으로 부여하는 사이트를 지정하는 URL 목록을 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2231">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2232">목록에 있는 각 항목에는 정책이 유효하도록 하려면 장치 및 URL이 모두 포함되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2232">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2233">장치의 각 항목에는 공급 업체 ID 및 제품 ID 필드가 포함될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2233">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2234">생략되는 모든 ID는 한 가지 예외가 포함된 와일드 카드로 취급되며 해당 예외란 공급 업체 ID가 지정되지 않고는 제품 ID를 지정할 수 없다는 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2234">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2235">그렇지 않은 경우에는 정책이 유효하지 않으며 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2235">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2236">USB 사용 권한 모델은 요청 사이트의 URL("URL 요청")과 최상위 프레임 사이트의 URL(“URL 포함”)을 사용하여 요청 URL에 USB 장치 액세스 권한을 부여합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2236">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2237">요청 사이트가 IFrame에 로드된 경우 요청 URL은 포함 URL과 다를 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2237">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2238">따라서 "urls" 필드에 쉼표로 구분된 최대 2개의 URL 문자열을 포함하여 각각 요청 및 포함 URL을 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2238">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2239">URL이 하나만 지정된 경우 해당 USB 장치에 대한 액세스 권한은 요청 사이트의 URL이 포함 상태에 관계없이 해당 URL과 일치하는 경우에 부여됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2239">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2240">"urls"의 URL은 유효한 URL이어야 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 해당 정책이 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2240">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2241">해당 정책을 설정하지 않은 상태로 남겨두면 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성에서 모든 사이트에 대해 전역 기본 값이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2241">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2242">해당 정책의 URL 패턴은 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls)를 통해 구성한 패턴과 충돌하지 않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2242">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2243">충돌이 발생하는 경우 해당 정책은 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 및 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls)를 통해 우선됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2243">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2244">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2244">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2245">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2245">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2246">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2246">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2247">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2247">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2248">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2248">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2249">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2249">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2250">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2250">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2251">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2251">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2252">GP 고유 이름: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2252">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2253">GP 이름: 특정 USB 장치에 연결할 특정 사이트에 대한 액세스 권한 부여</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2253">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2254">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2254">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2255">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2255">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2256">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2256">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2257">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2257">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2258">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2258">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2259">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2259">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2260">값 이름: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2260">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2261">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2261">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2262">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2262">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2263">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2263">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [{"devices": [{"product_id": 5678, "vendor_id": 1234}], "urls": ["https://contoso.com", "https://fabrikam.com"]}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2264">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2264">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2265">기본 설정 키 이름: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2265">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2266">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2266">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2267">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2267">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2268">WebUsbAskForUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2268">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2269">특정 사이트에서 WebUSB 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2269">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2270">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2270">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2271">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2271">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2272">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2272">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2273">사용자에게 USB 장치에 대한 액세스를 요청할 수 있는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2273">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2274">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2274">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2275">해당 정책에 정의된 URL 패턴과 [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) 정책에서 구성한 패턴과 충돌할 수 없습니다. URL을 허용하거나 차단할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2275">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2276">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2276">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2277">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2277">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2278">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2278">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2279">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2279">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2280">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2280">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2281">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2281">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2282">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2282">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2283">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2283">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2284">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2284">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2285">GP 고유 이름: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2285">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2286">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 WebUSB 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2286">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2287">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2287">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2288">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2288">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2289">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2289">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2290">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2290">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2291">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2291">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2292">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2292">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2293">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2293">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2294">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2294">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2295">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2295">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2296">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2296">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2297">기본 설정 키 이름: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2297">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2298">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2298">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2299">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2299">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2300">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2300">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2301">특정 사이트에서 WebUSB 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2301">Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2302">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2302">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2303">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2303">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2304">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2304">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2305">사용자에게 USB 장치에 대한 액세스를 요청할 수 없는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2305">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2306">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2306">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2307">해당 정책의 URL 패턴은 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) 정책에서 구성한 패턴과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2307">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2308">URL을 허용하거나 차단할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2308">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2309">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2309">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2310">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2310">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2311">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2311">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2312">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2312">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2313">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2313">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2314">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2314">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2315">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2315">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2316">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2316">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2317">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2317">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2318">GP 고유 이름: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2318">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2319">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 WebUSB 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2319">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2320">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/콘텐츠 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2320">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2321">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2321">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2322">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2322">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2323">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2323">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2324">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2324">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2325">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2325">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2326">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2326">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2327">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2327">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2328">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2328">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2329">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2329">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2330">기본 설정 키 이름: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2330">Preference Key Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2331">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2331">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2332">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2332">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2333">기본 검색 공급자 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2333">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2334">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2334">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2335">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2335">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2336">기본 검색 공급자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2336">Enable the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2337">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2337">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2338">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2338">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2339">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2339">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2340">기본 검색 공급자를 사용할 수 있는 기능을 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2340">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2341">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 주소 표시줄에 입력하여 검색어를 검색할 수 있습니다. (입력한 내용이 URL이 아닌 경우)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2341">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2342">나머지 기본 검색 정책을 사용하도록 설정하여 사용할 기본 검색 공급자를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2342">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2343">해당 내용이 비어 있거나(구성 되지 않음) 잘못 구성된 경우 사용자는 기본 공급자를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2343">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2344">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 주소 표시줄에서 검색할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2344">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2345">해당 정책을 사용하거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 해당 정책을 변경하거나 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2345">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2346">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본 검색 공급자가 사용되고 사용자는 기본 검색 공급자를 선택하고 검색 공급자 목록을 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2346">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2347">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2347">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2348">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2348">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2349">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2349">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2350">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2350">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2351">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2351">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2352">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2352">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2353">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2353">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2354">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2354">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2355">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2355">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2356">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2356">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2357">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2357">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2358">GP 이름: 기본 검색 공급자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2358">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2359">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2359">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2360">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2360">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2361">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2361">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2362">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2362">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2363">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2363">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2364">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2364">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2365">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2365">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2366">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2366">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2367">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2367">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2368">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2368">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2369">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2369">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2370">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2370">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2371">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2371">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2372">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2372">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2373">기본 검색 공급자 인코딩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2373">Default search provider encodings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2374">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2374">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2375">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2375">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2376">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2376">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2377">검색 공급자가 지원하는 문자 인코딩을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2377">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2378">인코딩은 UTF-8, GB2312, ISO-8859-1과 같은 코드 페이지 이름입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2378">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2379">인코딩은 제공된 순서대로 시도됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2379">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2380">해당 정책은 선택 사항입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2380">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2381">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본값 UTF-8이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2381">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2382">해당 정책은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 및 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2382">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2383">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2383">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2384">사용자가 이미 기본 검색 공급자를 설정한 경우 이 권장 정책에 의해 구성된 기본 검색 공급자는 사용자가 선택할 수 있는 검색 공급자 목록에 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2384">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2385">원하는 동작인 경우 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2385">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2386">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2386">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2387">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2387">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2388">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2388">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2389">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2389">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2390">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2390">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2391">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2391">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2392">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2392">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2393">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2393">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2394">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2394">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2395">GP 이름: 기본 검색 공급자 인코딩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2395">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2396">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2396">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2397">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2397">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2398">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2398">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2399">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2399">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2400">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2400">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2401">경로(권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2401">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2402">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2402">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2403">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2403">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2404">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2404">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2405">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2405">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2406">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2406">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2407">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2407">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2408">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2408">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2409">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2409">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2410">기본 검색 공급자에 대한 이미지 검색 기능 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2410">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2411">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2411">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2412">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2412">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2413">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2413">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2414">이미지 검색에 사용되는 검색 엔진에 대한 URL을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2414">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2415">검색 요청은 GET 메서드를 사용하여 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2415">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2416">해당 정책은 선택 사항입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2416">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2417">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 이미지 검색을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2417">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2418">Bing 이미지 검색 URL을 다음과 같이 지정: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2418">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2419">Google 이미지 검색 URL을 다음과 같이 지정:
'{google: baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2419">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2420">이미지 검색 구성을 완료하려면 [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) 정책을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2420">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2421">해당 정책은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 및 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2421">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2422">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2422">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2423">사용자가 이미 기본 검색 공급자를 설정한 경우 이 권장 정책에 의해 구성된 기본 검색 공급자는 사용자가 선택할 수 있는 검색 공급자 목록에 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2423">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2424">원하는 동작인 경우 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2424">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2425">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2425">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2426">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2426">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2427">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2427">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2428">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2428">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2429">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2429">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2430">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2430">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2431">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2431">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2432">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2432">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2433">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2433">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2434">GP 이름: 기본 검색 공급자에 대한 이미지 검색 기능 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2434">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2435">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2435">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2436">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2436">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2437">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2437">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2438">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2438">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2439">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2439">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2440">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2440">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2441">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2441">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2442">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2442">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2443">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2443">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2444">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2444">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2445">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2445">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2446">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2446">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2447">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2447">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2448">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2448">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2449">POST를 사용하는 이미지 URL에 대한 매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2449">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2450">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2450">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2451">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2451">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2452">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2452">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2453">해당 정책을 사용하면 POST를 사용하는 이미지 검색이 수행될 때 사용되는 매개 변수가 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2453">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2454">해당 정책은 쉼표로 구분된 이름/값 쌍으로 구성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2454">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2455">이전 예제에서 값이 {imageThumbnail}과 같은 템플릿 매개 변수인 경우 이는 실제 이미지 축소판 그림 데이터로 바뀝니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2455">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2456">해당 정책은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 및 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2456">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2457">Bing 이미지 검색 URL 게시 매개 변수를 다음과 같이 지정: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2457">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2458">Google 이미지 검색 URL 게시 매개 변수를 다음과 같이 지정: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2458">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2459">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 GET 메서드를 사용하여 이미지 검색 요청이 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2459">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>
