<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2460">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2460">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2461">사용자가 이미 기본 검색 공급자를 설정한 경우 이 권장 정책에 의해 구성된 기본 검색 공급자는 사용자가 선택할 수 있는 검색 공급자 목록에 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2461">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2462">원하는 동작인 경우 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2462">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2463">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2463">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2464">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2464">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2465">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2465">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2466">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2466">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2467">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2467">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2468">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2468">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2469">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2469">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2470">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2470">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2471">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2471">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2472">GP 이름: POST를 사용하는 이미지 URL에 대한 매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2472">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2473">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2473">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2474">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2474">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2475">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2475">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2476">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2476">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2477">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2477">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2478">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2478">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2479">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2479">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2480">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2480">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2481">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2481">Example value:</span></span>

```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2482">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2482">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2483">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2483">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2484">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2484">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2485">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2485">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2486">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2486">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2487">기본 검색 공급자 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2487">Default search provider keyword</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2488">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2488">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2489">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2489">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2490">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2490">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2491">해당 공급자에 대한 검색을 트리거하기 위해 주소 표시줄에서 사용하는 바로 가기인 키워드를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2491">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2492">해당 정책은 선택 사항입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2492">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2493">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 키워드는 검색 공급자를 활성화하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2493">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2494">해당 정책은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 및 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2494">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2495">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2495">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2496">사용자가 이미 기본 검색 공급자를 설정한 경우 이 권장 정책에 의해 구성된 기본 검색 공급자는 사용자가 선택할 수 있는 검색 공급자 목록에 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2496">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2497">원하는 동작인 경우 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2497">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2498">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2498">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2499">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2499">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2500">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2500">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2501">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2501">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2502">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2502">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2503">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2503">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2504">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2504">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2505">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2505">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2506">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2506">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2507">GP 이름: 기본 검색 공급자 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2507">GP name: Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2508">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2508">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2509">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2509">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2510">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2510">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2511">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2511">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2512">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2512">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2513">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2513">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2514">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2514">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2515">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2515">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2516">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2516">Example value:</span></span>

```
"mis"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2517">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2517">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2518">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2518">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2519">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2519">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>mis</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2520">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2520">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2521">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2521">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2522">기본 검색 공급자 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2522">Default search provider name</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2523">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2523">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2524">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2524">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2525">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2525">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2526">기본 검색 공급자의 이름을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2526">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2527">해당 정책을 사용하면 기본 검색 공급자의 이름을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2527">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2528">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 비어있는 채로 남겨둔 경우 검색 URL에서 지정한 호스트 이름이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2528">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2529">'DefaultSearchProviderName'은 DTBC-0008에 설정된 암호화된 검색 공급자에 해당하는 조직에서 승인한 암호화된 검색 공급자에 설정되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2529">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2530">해당 정책은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 및 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2530">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2531">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2531">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2532">사용자가 이미 기본 검색 공급자를 설정한 경우 이 권장 정책에 의해 구성된 기본 검색 공급자는 사용자가 선택할 수 있는 검색 공급자 목록에 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2532">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2533">원하는 동작인 경우 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2533">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2534">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2534">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2535">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2535">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2536">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2536">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2537">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2537">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2538">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2538">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2539">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2539">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2540">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2540">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2541">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2541">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2542">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2542">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2543">GP 이름: 기본 검색 공급자 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2543">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2544">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2544">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2545">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2545">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2546">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2546">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2547">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2547">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2548">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2548">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2549">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2549">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2550">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2550">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2551">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2551">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2552">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2552">Example value:</span></span>

```
"My Intranet Search"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2553">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2553">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2554">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2554">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2555">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2555">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2556">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2556">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2557">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2557">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2558">기본 검색 공급자 검색 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2558">Default search provider search URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2559">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2559">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2560">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2560">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2561">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2561">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2562">기본 검색에 사용되는 검색 엔진에 대한 URL을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2562">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2563">URL에는 쿼리 시간에서 사용자를 검색하는 용어로 대체되는 '{searchTerms}' 문자열이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2563">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2564">Bing 검색 URL을 다음과 같이 지정:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2564">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2565">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2565">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2566">Google 검색 URL을 다음과 같이 지정: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}’</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2566">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2567">해당 정책은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 정책을 설정하는 경우에 필요합니다. 이후 정책을 사용하지 않는 경우 해당 정책은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2567">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2568">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2568">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2569">사용자가 이미 기본 검색 공급자를 설정한 경우 이 권장 정책에 의해 구성된 기본 검색 공급자는 사용자가 선택할 수 있는 검색 공급자 목록에 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2569">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2570">원하는 동작인 경우 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2570">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2571">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2571">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2572">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2572">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2573">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2573">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2574">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2574">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2575">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2575">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2576">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2576">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2577">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2577">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2578">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2578">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2579">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2579">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2580">GP 이름: 기본 검색 공급자 검색 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2580">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2581">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2581">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2582">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2582">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2583">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2583">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2584">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2584">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2585">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2585">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2586">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2586">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2587">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2587">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2588">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2588">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2589">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2589">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2590">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2590">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2591">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2591">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2592">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2592">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2593">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2593">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2594">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2594">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2595">제안에 대한 기본 검색 공급자 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2595">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2596">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2596">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2597">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2597">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2598">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2598">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2599">검색 제안을 제공하는 데 사용되는 검색 엔진에 대한 URL을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2599">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2600">URL에는 쿼리 시간에서 사용자가 지금까지 검색한 텍스트로 대체되는 '{searchTerms}' 문자열이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2600">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2601">해당 정책은 선택 사항입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2601">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2602">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 검색 제안을 볼 수 없습니다. 해당 검색 기록 및 즐겨찾기에서 제안이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2602">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2603">Bing의 제안 URL은 다음과 같이 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2603">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2604">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2604">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2605">Google의 제안 URL은 다음과 같이 지정할 수 있습니다. '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2605">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2606">해당 정책은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 및 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2606">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2607">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2607">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2608">사용자가 이미 기본 검색 공급자를 설정한 경우 이 권장 정책에 의해 구성된 기본 검색 공급자는 사용자가 선택할 수 있는 검색 공급자 목록에 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2608">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2609">원하는 동작인 경우 [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2609">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2610">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2610">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2611">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2611">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2612">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2612">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2613">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2613">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2614">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2614">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2615">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2615">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2616">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2616">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2617">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2617">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2618">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2618">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2619">GP 이름: 제안에 대한 기본 검색 공급자 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2619">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2620">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2620">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2621">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2621">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2622">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2622">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2623">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2623">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2624">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2624">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2625">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2625">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2626">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2626">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2627">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2627">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2628">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2628">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2629">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2629">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2630">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2630">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2631">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2631">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2632">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2632">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2633">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2633">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2634">새 탭 페이지 검색창 환경 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2634">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2635">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2635">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2636">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2636">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2637">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2637">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2638">새 탭 페이지 검색 상자에서 "검색 상자(권장)" 또는 "주소 표시줄"을 사용하여 새 탭에서 검색하도록 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2638">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2639">이 정책은 다음 두 정책을 설정하여 검색 엔진을 Bing 이외의 값으로 설정한 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다. [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 및 [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2639">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2640">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않고 다음과 같은 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2640">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2641">주소 표시줄 기본 검색 엔진이 Bing인 경우 새 탭 페이지에서 검색창을 사용하여 새 탭을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2641">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2642">주소 표시줄 기본 검색 엔진이 Bing이 아닌 경우 새 탭을 검색할 때 사용자에게 추가 선택 사항("주소 표시줄 사용")이 나타납니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2642">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2643">이 정책을 활성화하고 다음과 같이 설정한 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2643">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2644">"검색창(권장)"('bing'), 새 탭 페이지는 검색창을 사용하여 새 탭을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2644">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2645">"주소 표시줄"('리디렉션'), 새 탭 페이지 검색창은 주소 표시줄을 사용하여 새 탭을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2645">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2646">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2646">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2647">bing (bing) = 검색창(권장)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2647">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2648">리디렉션(redirect) = 주소 표시줄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2648">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2649">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2649">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2650">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2650">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2651">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2651">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2652">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2652">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2653">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2653">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2654">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2654">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2655">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2655">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2656">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2656">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2657">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2657">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2658">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2658">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2659">GP 이름: 새 탭 페이지 검색창 환경 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2659">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2660">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2660">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2661">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/기본 검색 공급자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2661">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2662">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2662">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2663">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2663">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2664">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2664">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2665">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2665">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2666">값 이름: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2666">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2667">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2667">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2668">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2668">Example value:</span></span>

```
"bing"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2669">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2669">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2670">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2670">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2671">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2671">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2672">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2672">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2673">확장 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2673">Extensions policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2674">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2674">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2675">BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2675">BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2676">외부 확장이 설치되지 않도록 차단압니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2676">Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2677">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2677">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2678">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2678">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2679">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2679">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2680">외부 확장 설치를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2680">Control the installation of external extensions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2681">이 설정을 사용하도록 설정하면 외부 확장 설치가 차단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2681">If you enable this setting, external extensions are blocked from being installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2682">이 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 설정하지 않으면 외부 확장을 설치할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2682">If you disable this setting or leave it unset, external extensions are allowed to be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2683">외부 확장 및 설치는 https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options에서 설명합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2683">External extensions and their installation are documented at https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2684">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2684">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2685">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2685">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2686">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2686">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2687">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2687">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2688">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2688">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2689">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2689">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2690">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2690">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2691">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2691">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2692">GP 고유 이름: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2692">GP unique name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2693">GP 이름: 외부 확장 설치를 차단합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2693">GP name: Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2694">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/확장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2694">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2695">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2695">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2696">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2696">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2697">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2697">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2698">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2698">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2699">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2699">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2700">값 이름: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2700">Value Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2701">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2701">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2702">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2702">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2703">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2703">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2704">기본 설정 키 이름: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2704">Preference Key Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2705">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2705">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2706">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2706">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2707">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2707">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2708">허용된 확장 유형 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2708">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2709">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2709">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2710">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2710">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2711">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2711">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2712">정책을 설정하면 Microsoft Edge에 설치될 수 있는 앱과 확장명, 이들이 상호 작용할 수 있는 호스트를 제어하고 런타임 액세스를 제한할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2712">Setting the policy controls which apps and extensions may be installed in Microsoft Edge, which hosts they can interact with, and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2713">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 허용되는 확장명 및 앱 형식에 제한이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2713">If you don't set this policy, there aren't any restrictions on acceptable extension and app types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2714">목록에 없는 형식의 확장명과 앱은 설치되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2714">Extensions and apps which have a type that's not on the list won't be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2715">각 값은 다음 문자열 중 하나이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2715">Each value should be one of these strings:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2716">"확장"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2716">"extension"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2717">"테마"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2717">"theme"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2718">"user_script"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2718">"user_script"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2719">"hosted_app"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2719">"hosted_app"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2720">이러한 형식에 대한 자세한 내용은 Microsoft Edge 확장 설명서를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2720">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information about these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2721">참고: 이 정책은 또한 [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist)를 사용하여 강제로 설치되는 확장명 및 앱에도 영향을 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2721">Note: This policy also affects extensions and apps to be force-installed using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2722">지원되는 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2722">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2723">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2723">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2724">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2724">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2725">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2725">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2726">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2726">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2727">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2727">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2728">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2728">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2729">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2729">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2730">GP 고유 이름: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2730">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2731">GP 이름: 허용된 확장 형식 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2731">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2732">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/확장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2732">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2733">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2733">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2734">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2734">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2735">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2735">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2736">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2736">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2737">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2737">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2738">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2738">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2739">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2739">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2740">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2740">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2741">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2741">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2742">기본 설정 키 이름: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2742">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2743">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2743">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2744">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2744">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2745">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2745">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2746">특정 확장 설치 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2746">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2747">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2747">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2748">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2748">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2749">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2749">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2750">이 정책을 설정하면 차단 목록이 적용되지 않는 확장이 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2750">Setting this policy specifies which extensions are not subject to the blocklist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2751">차단 목록 값이 \*이면 모든 확장이 차단되어 사용자는 허용 목록에 나열된 확장만 설치할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2751">A blocklist value of \* means all extensions are blocked and users can only install extensions listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2752">기본적으로 모든 확장이 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2752">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2753">그러나 정책에 따라 확장을 금지한 경우 허용되는 확장 목록을 사용하여 해당 정책을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2753">However, if you prohibited extensions by policy, you can use the list of allowed extensions to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2754">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2754">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2755">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2755">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2756">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2756">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2757">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2757">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2758">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2758">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2759">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2759">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2760">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2760">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2761">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2761">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2762">GP 고유 이름: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2762">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2763">GP 이름: 특정 확장 설치 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2763">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2764">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/확장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2764">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2765">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2765">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2766">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2766">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2767">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2767">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2768">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2768">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2769">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2769">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2770">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2770">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2771">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2771">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2772">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2772">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2773">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2773">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2774">기본 설정 키 이름: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2774">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2775">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2775">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2776">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2776">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2777">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2777">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2778">설치할 수 없는 확장 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2778">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2779">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2779">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2780">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2780">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2781">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2781">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2782">사용자가 설치할 수 없는 확장을 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2782">Lets you specify which extensions the users CANNOT install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2783">이미 설치된 확장이 차단된 경우 사용자의 사용 설정 방법 없이 비활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2783">Extensions already installed will be disabled if blocked, without a way for the user to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2784">차단 목록에서 비활성화된 확장이 제거되면 자동으로 다시 활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2784">After a disabled extension is removed from the blocklist it will automatically get re-enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2785">차단 목록 값 '\*'은 허용 목록에 명시적으로 나열되지 않는 한 모든 확장이 차단됨을 의미합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2785">A blocklist value of '\*' means all extensions are blocked unless they are explicitly listed in the allowlist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2786">해당 정책을 설정하지 않은 경우 사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 모든 확장을 설치할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2786">If this policy isn't set, the user can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2787">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2787">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2788">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2788">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2789">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2789">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2790">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2790">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2791">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2791">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2792">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2792">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2793">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2793">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2794">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2794">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2795">GP 고유 이름: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2795">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2796">GP 이름: 설치할 수 없는 확장 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2796">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2797">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/확장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2797">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2798">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2798">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2799">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2799">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2800">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2800">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2801">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2801">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2802">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2802">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2803">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2803">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2804">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2804">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2805">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2805">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2806">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2806">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2807">기본 설정 키 이름: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2807">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2808">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2808">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2809">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2809">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2810">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2810">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2811">자동으로 설치되는 확장 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2811">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2812">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2812">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2813">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2813">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2814">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2814">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2815">이 정책을 설정하여 사용자의 개입 없이 자동으로 설치되는 앱 및 확장 목록을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2815">Set this policy to specify a list of apps and extensions that install silently, without user interaction.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2816">사용자는 이 설정을 제거하거나 해제할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2816">Users can't uninstall or turn off this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2817">사용 권한은 enterprise.deviceAttributes 및 enterprise.platformKeys 확장 API를 포함하여 암시적으로 부여됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2817">Permissions are granted implicitly, including the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2818">참고: 이 2개의 API는 강제 설치되지 않은 앱 및 확장에 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2818">Note: These 2 APIs aren't available to apps and extensions that aren't force-installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2819">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 자동으로 설치되는 앱 또는 확장이 없으며 사용자가 Microsoft Edge에서 앱을 제거할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2819">If you don't set this policy, no apps or extensions are autoinstalled and users can uninstall any app in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2820">이 정책은 [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 정책을 대체합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2820">This policy supercedes [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2821">이전에 강제 설치된 앱 또는 확장이 이 목록에서 제거되는 경우, Microsoft Edge에서 자동으로 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2821">If a previously force-installed app or extension is removed from this list, Microsoft Edge automatically uninstalls it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2822">Microsoft Windows 인스턴스에서 Microsoft Edge 추가 기능 웹 사이트 외부의 앱과 확장 기능은 해당 인스턴스가 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입되고 Windows 10 Pro를 실행하는 경우에만 강제 설치될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2822">On Microsoft Windows instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be forced installed if the instance is joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, and running Windows 10 Pro.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2823">MacOS 인스턴스에서, Microsoft Edge 추가 기능 웹 사이트 외부의 앱 및 확장 기능은 해당 인스턴스가 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입되는 경우에만 강제 설치될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2823">On macOS instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be force installed if the instance is managed via MDM, or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2824">모든 확장의 소스 코드는 사용자가 개발자 도구를 사용하여 변경하고 잠재적으로 확장을 기능하지 못하도록 렌더링할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2824">The source code of any extension can be altered by users with developer tools, potentially rendering the extension unfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2825">이 문제가 우려되는 경우, DeveloperToolsDisabled 정책을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2825">If this is a concern, configure the DeveloperToolsDisabled policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2826">정책의 각 목록 항목은 확장 ID를 포함하는 문자열이며 선택적으로 세미콜론(;)으로 구분되는 "업데이트" URL입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2826">Each list item of the policy is a string that contains an extension ID and, optionally, an "update" URL separated by a semicolon (;).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2827">확장 ID는 개발자 모드에서(예: edge://extensions 등) 찾을 수 있는 32자의 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2827">The extension ID is the 32-letter string found, for example, on edge://extensions when in Developer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2828">"업데이트" URL은 지정된 경우, 업데이트 매니페스트 XML 문서( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) )를 가리켜야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2828">If specified, the "update" URL should point to an Update Manifest XML document ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2829">기본적으로 Microsoft Edge 추가 기능 웹 사이트의 업데이트 URL이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2829">By default, the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website's update URL is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2830">이 정책에 설정된 "업데이트" URL은 초기 설치에만 사용됩니다. 확장의 후속 업데이트는 확장의 매니페스트에 있는 업데이트 URL을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2830">The "update" URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL in the extension's manifest.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2831">참고: 이 정책은 InPrivate 모드에 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2831">Note: This policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2832">호스팅 확장에 대해 자세히 읽어보세요(https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2832">Read about hosting extensions (https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2833">지원되는 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2833">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2834">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2834">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2835">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2835">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2836">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2836">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2837">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2837">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2838">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2838">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2839">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2839">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2840">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2840">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2841">GP 고유 이름: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2841">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2842">GP 이름: 자동으로 설치되는 확장 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2842">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2843">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/확장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2843">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2844">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2844">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2845">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2845">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2846">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2846">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2847">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2847">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2848">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2848">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2849">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2849">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2850">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2850">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2851">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2851">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2852">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2852">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2853">기본 설정 키 이름: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2853">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2854">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2854">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2855">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2855">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2856">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2856">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2857">확장 및 사용자 스크립트 설치 원본 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2857">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2858">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2858">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2859">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2859">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2860">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2860">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2861">확장 및 테마를 설치할 수 있는 URL을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2861">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2862">패키지를 edge://extensions page로 끌어서 놓을 필요 없이 직접 확장 및 테마를 설치할 수 있는 URL을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2862">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2863">해당 목록에 있는 각 항목은 확장 스타일 일치 패턴입니다. ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)참조)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2863">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2864">사용자는 해당 목록에 있는 항목과 일치하는 모든 URL에서 간편하게 항목을 설치할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2864">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2865">\*.crx 파일의 위치 및 다운로드를 시작하는 페이지(즉, 참조 페이지) 모두 해당 패턴에서 허용되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2865">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2866">인증이 필요한 위치에서 파일을 호스팅하지 마세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2866">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>
