<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2867">[ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) 정책이 해당 정책보다 우선됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2867">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2868">차단 목록에 있는 모든 확장은 해당 목록의 사이트에서 가져온 경우에도 설치할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2868">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2869">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2869">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2870">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2870">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2871">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2871">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2872">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2872">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2873">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2873">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2874">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2874">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2875">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2875">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2876">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2876">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2877">GP 고유 이름: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2877">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2878">GP 이름: 확장 및 사용자 스크립트 설치 원본 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2878">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2879">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/확장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2879">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2880">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2880">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2881">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2881">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2882">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2882">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2883">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2883">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2884">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2884">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2885">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2885">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2886">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2886">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2887">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2887">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2888">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2888">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2889">기본 설정 키 이름: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2889">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2890">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2890">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2891">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2891">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2892">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2892">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2893">확장 관리 설정 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2893">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2894">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2894">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2895">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2895">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2896">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2896">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2897">이 정책을 설정하면 기존 확장 관련 정책에 의해 제어되는 설정을 포함하여 Microsoft Edge의 확장 관리 설정이 제어됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2897">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2898">이 정책은 설정될 수 있는 모든 레거시 정책을 대체합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2898">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2899">해당 정책은 확장 ID 또는 업데이트 URL을 해당 특정 설정에만 매핑합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2899">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2900">이 정책에서 사용자 지정 구성이 없는 모든 확장에 적용되는 특수 ID "\*"에 대해 기본 구성을 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2900">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2901">업데이트 URL을 사용할 경우 확장 매니페스트([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043))에 설명된 정확한 업데이트 URL이 있는 확장에 구성이 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2901">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2902">특정 타사 스토어의 확장을 차단하려면 해당 스토어에 대한 update_url만 차단하면 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2902">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2903">예를 들어 Chrome 웹 스토어의 확장을 차단하려는 경우 다음 JSON을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2903">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2904">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2904">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2905">이전 예제의 JSON을 사용하여 스토어가 차단된 경우에도 [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) 및 [ExtensionInstallAllowlist를](#extensioninstallallowlist) 사용하여 특정 확장을 허용/강제로 설치할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2905">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2906">참고: Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입되지 않은 Windows 인스턴스의 경우, 강제 설치가 Microsoft Edge 추가 기능 웹 사이트에 나열된 앱 및 확장으로 제한됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2906">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2907">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2907">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2908">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2908">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2909">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2909">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2910">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2910">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2911">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2911">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2912">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2912">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2913">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2913">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2914">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2914">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2915">GP 고유 이름: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2915">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2916">GP 이름: 확장 관리 설정 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2916">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2917">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/확장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2917">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2918">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2918">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2919">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2919">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2920">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2920">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2921">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2921">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2922">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2922">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2923">값 이름: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2923">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2924">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2924">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2925">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2925">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2926">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2926">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2927">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2927">Mac information and settings</span></span>

    </array>
  </dict>

    </array>

  </dict>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2930">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2930">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2931">HTTP 인증 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2931">HTTP authentication policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2932">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2932">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2933">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2933">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2934">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2934">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2935">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2935">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2936">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2936">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2937">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2937">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2938">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2938">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2939">일반적으로 피싱 방어로는 해당 기능을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2939">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2940">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용하지 않도록 설정되고 타사 이미지는 인증 프롬프트를 표시할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2940">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2941">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2941">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2942">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2942">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2943">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2943">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2944">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2944">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2945">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2945">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2946">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2946">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2947">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2947">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2948">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2948">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2949">GP 고유 이름: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2949">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2950">GP 이름: 교차 원본 HTTP 인증 프롬프트 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2950">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2951">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2951">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2952">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2952">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2953">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2953">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2954">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2954">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2955">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2955">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2956">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2956">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2957">값 이름: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2957">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2958">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2958">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2959">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2959">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2960">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2960">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2961">기본 설정 키 이름: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2961">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2962">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2962">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2963">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2963">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2964">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2964">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2965">Microsoft Edge에서 사용자 자격 증명을 위임할 수 있는 서버 목록 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2965">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2966">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2966">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2967">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2967">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2968">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2968">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2969">Microsoft Edge에서 위임할 수 있는 서버 목록을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2969">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2970">여러 서버 이름을 쉼표로 구분합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2970">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2971">와일드카드(\*)를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2971">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2972">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 서버가 인트라넷으로 검색되더라도 사용자 자격 증명을 위임하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2972">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2973">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2973">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2974">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2974">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2975">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2975">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2976">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2976">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2977">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2977">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2978">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2978">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2979">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2979">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2980">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2980">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2981">GP 고유 이름: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2981">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2982">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 사용자 자격 증명을 위임할 수 있는 서버 목록 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2982">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2983">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2983">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2984">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2984">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2985">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2985">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2986">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2986">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2987">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2987">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2988">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2988">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2989">값 이름: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2989">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2990">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2990">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2991">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2991">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2992">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2992">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2993">기본 설정 키 이름: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2993">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2994">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2994">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-2995">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2995">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2996">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2996">AuthSchemes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2997">지원되는 인증 구성표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2997">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2998">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2998">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-2999">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-2999">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3000">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3000">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3001">지원되는 HTTP 인증 구성표를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3001">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3002">'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', 'negotiate'의 값을 사용하여 정책을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3002">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3003">쉼표로 여러 값을 구분합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3003">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3004">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 네 가지 구성표가 모두 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3004">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3005">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3005">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3006">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3006">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3007">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3007">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3008">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3008">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3009">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3009">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3010">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3010">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3011">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3011">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3012">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3012">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3013">GP 고유 이름: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3013">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3014">GP 이름: 지원되는 인증 구성표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3014">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3015">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3015">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3016">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3016">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3017">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3017">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3018">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3018">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3019">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3019">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3020">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3020">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3021">값 이름: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3021">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3022">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3022">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3023">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3023">Example value:</span></span>

```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3024">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3024">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3025">기본 설정 키 이름: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3025">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3026">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3026">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3027">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3027">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3028">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3028">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3029">허용되는 인증 서버 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3029">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3030">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3030">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3031">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3031">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3032">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3032">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3033">통합 인증을 사용하도록 설정할 서버를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3033">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3034">통합 인증은 Microsoft Edge에서 프록시 또는 해당 목록의 서버에서 인증 챌린지를 받은 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3034">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3035">여러 서버 이름을 쉼표로 구분합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3035">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3036">와일드카드(\*)를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3036">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3037">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 서버가 인트라넷에 있는지 여부를 감지하려고 시도하여 IWA 요청에만 응답하게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3037">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3038">서버가 인터넷에 있으면 Microsoft Edge에서 해당 서버로부터의 IWA 요청을 무시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3038">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3039">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3039">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3040">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3040">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3041">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3041">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3042">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3042">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3043">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3043">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3044">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3044">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3045">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3045">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3046">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3046">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3047">GP 고유 이름: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3047">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3048">GP 이름: 허용된 인증 서버 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3048">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3049">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3049">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3050">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3050">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3051">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3051">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3052">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3052">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3053">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3053">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3054">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3054">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3055">값 이름: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3055">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3056">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3056">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3057">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3057">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3058">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3058">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3059">기본 설정 키 이름: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3059">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3060">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3060">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3061">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3061">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3062">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3062">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3063">HTTP에 대한 기본 인증 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3063">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3064">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3064">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3065">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3065">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3066">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3066">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3067">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 설정하지 않은 경우 비보안 HTTP를 통해 받은 기본 인증 문제가 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3067">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3068">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 기본 인증 체계의 비보안 HTTP 요청이 차단되고 보안 HTTPS만 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3068">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3069">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3069">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3070">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3070">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3071">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3071">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3072">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3072">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3073">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3073">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3074">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3074">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3075">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3075">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3076">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3076">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3077">GP 고유 이름: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3077">GP unique name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3078">GP 이름: HTTP에 대해 기본 인증 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3078">GP name: Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3079">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3079">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3080">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3080">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3081">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3081">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3082">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3082">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3083">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3083">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3084">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3084">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3085">값 이름: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3085">Value Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3086">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3086">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3087">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3087">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3088">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3088">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3089">기본 설정 키 이름: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3089">Preference Key Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3090">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3090">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3091">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3091">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3092">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3092">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3093">Kerberos 인증 협상 시 CNAME 조회 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3093">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3094">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3094">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3095">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3095">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3096">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3096">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3097">생성된 Kerberos SPN이 정식 DNS 이름(CNAME) 또는 입력한 원본 이름을 기반으로 하는지 여부를 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3097">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3098">해당 정책을 사용하면 CNAME 조회가 생략되고 서버 이름(입력한 대로)이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3098">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3099">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 서버의 정식 이름이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3099">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3100">정식 이름은 CNAME 조회를 통해 결정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3100">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3101">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3101">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3102">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3102">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3103">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3103">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3104">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3104">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3105">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3105">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3106">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3106">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3107">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3107">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3108">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3108">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3109">GP 고유 이름: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3109">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3110">GP 이름: Kerberos 인증 협상 시 CNAME 조회 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3110">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3111">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3111">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3112">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3112">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3113">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3113">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3114">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3114">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3115">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3115">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3116">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3116">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3117">값 이름: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3117">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3118">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3118">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3119">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3119">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3120">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3120">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3121">기본 설정 키 이름: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3121">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3122">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3122">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3123">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3123">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3124">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3124">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3125">Kerberos SPN에 표준이 아닌 포트 포함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3125">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3126">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3126">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3127">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3127">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3128">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3128">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3129">생성된 Kerberos SPN에 표준이 아닌 포트가 포함되어야 하는지 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3129">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3130">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하고 사용자에게 URL에 표준이 아닌 포트(80 또는 443이 아닌 포트)가 포함된 경우 해당 포트는 생성된 Kerberos SPN에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3130">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3131">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 발생된 Kerberos SPN에는 어떤 경우에도 포트가 포함되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3131">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3132">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3132">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3133">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3133">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3134">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3134">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3135">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3135">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3136">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3136">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3137">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3137">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3138">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3138">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3139">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3139">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3140">GP 고유 이름: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3140">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3141">GP 이름: Kerberos SPN에 표준이 아닌 포트 포함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3141">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3142">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3142">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3143">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3143">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3144">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3144">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3145">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3145">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3146">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3146">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3147">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3147">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3148">값 이름: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3148">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3149">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3149">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3150">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3150">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3151">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3151">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3152">기본 설정 키 이름: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3152">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3153">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3153">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3154">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3154">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3155">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3155">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3156">NTLMv2 인증 사용 여부 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3156">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3157">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3157">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3158">MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3158">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3159">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3159">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3160">NTLMv2를 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3160">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3161">모든 최신 버전의 Samba 및 Windows 서버는 NTLMv2를 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3161">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3162">인증 보안이 약화되므로 이전 버전과의 호환성 문제를 해결하기 위해 NTLMv2를 사용하지 않도록 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3162">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3163">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본적으로 NTLMv2가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3163">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3164">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3164">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3165">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3165">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3166">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3166">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3167">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3167">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3168">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3168">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3169">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3169">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3170">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3170">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3171">기본 설정 키 이름: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3171">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3172">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3172">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3173">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3173">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3174">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3174">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3175">HTTP용 Windows Hello 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3175">Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3176">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3176">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3177">Windows 90 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3177">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3178">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3178">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3179">Windows 자격 증명 UI가 NTLM에 응답하고 인증 챌린지를 협상하는 데 사용되어야 하는지 여부를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3179">Indicates if Windows Credential UI should be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate authentication challenges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3180">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면, 기본 사용자 이름과 암호 프롬프트가 NTLM에 응답하고 챌린지를 협상하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3180">If you disable this policy, a basic username and password prompt will be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate challenges.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3181">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Windows 자격 증명 UI가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3181">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Windows Credential UI will be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3182">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3182">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3183">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3183">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3184">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3184">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3185">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3185">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3186">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3186">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3187">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3187">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3188">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3188">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3189">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3189">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3190">GP 고유 이름: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3190">GP unique name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3191">GP 이름: HTTP용 Windows Hello 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3191">GP name: Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3192">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3192">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3193">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자가 재정의할 수 있습니다)/HTTP 인증</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3193">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3194">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3194">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3195">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3195">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3196">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3196">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3197">경로(권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\권장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3197">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3198">값 이름: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3198">Value Name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3199">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3199">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3200">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3200">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3201">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3201">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3202">키오스크 모드 설정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3202">Kiosk Mode settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3203">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3203">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3204">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3204">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3205">키오스크 모드 공개 검색 환경에 대해 주소 표시줄 편집을 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3205">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3206">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3206">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3207">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3207">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3208">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3208">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3209">이 정책은 공개 검색 환경을 사용하는 동안 Microsoft Edge 키오스크 모드에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3209">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3210">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우 사용자가 주소 표시줄의 URL을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3210">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3211">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자가 주소 표시줄에서 URL을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3211">If you disable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3212">키오스크 모드를 구성하는 방법에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3212">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3213">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3213">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3214">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3214">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3215">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3215">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3216">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3216">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3217">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3217">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3218">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3218">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3219">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3219">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3220">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3220">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3221">GP 고유 이름: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3221">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3222">GP 이름: 키오스크 모드 공개 검색 환경에 대해 주소 표시줄 편집 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3222">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3223">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/키오스크 모드 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3223">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3224">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3224">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3225">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3225">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3226">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3226">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3227">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3227">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3228">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3228">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3229">값 이름: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3229">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3230">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3230">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3231">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3231">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3232">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3232">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3233">기본 설정 키 이름: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3233">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3234">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3234">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3235">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3235">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3236">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3236">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3237">Microsoft Edge가 닫히는 경우 키오스크 세션의 일부로 다운로드한 파일을 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3237">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3238">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3238">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3239">Windows (87 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3239">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3240">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3240">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3241">이 정책은 Microsoft Edge 키오스크 모드에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3241">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3242">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 키오스크 세션의 일부로 다운로드한 파일이 Microsoft Edge를 닫을 때마다 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3242">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3243">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않는 경우, Microsoft Edge가 닫힐 때 키오스크 세션의 일부로 다운로드된 파일이 삭제되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3243">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3244">키오스크 모드를 구성하는 방법에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3244">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3245">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3245">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3246">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3246">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3247">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3247">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3248">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3248">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3249">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3249">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3250">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3250">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3251">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3251">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3252">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3252">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3253">GP 고유 이름: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3253">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3254">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge가 닫히는 경우 키오스크 세션의 일부로 다운로드된 파일 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3254">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3255">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/키오스크 모드 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3255">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3256">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3256">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3257">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3257">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3258">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3258">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3259">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3259">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3260">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3260">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3261">값 이름: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3261">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3262">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3262">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3263">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3263">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3264">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3264">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3265">관리 가능성 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3265">Manageability policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3266">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3266">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3267">MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3267">MAMEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3268">모바일 앱 관리 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3268">Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3269">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3269">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3270">Windows 및 macOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3270">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3271">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3271">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3272">Microsoft Edge 브라우저가 Intune 응용 프로그램 관리 서비스에서 정책을 검색하고 사용자 프로필에 적용할 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3272">Allows the Microsoft Edge browser to retrieve policies from the Intune application management services and apply them to users' profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3273">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우 MAM(모바일 앱 관리) 정책을 적용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3273">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Mobile App Management (MAM) Policies can be applied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3274">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정할 경우, Microsoft Edge가 Intune과 통신하여 MAM 정책을 요청하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3274">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not communicate with Intune to request MAM Policies.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3275">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3275">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3276">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3276">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3277">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3277">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3278">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3278">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3279">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3279">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3280">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3280">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3281">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3281">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3282">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3282">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3283">GP 고유 이름: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3283">GP unique name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3284">GP 이름: 모바일 앱 관리 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3284">GP name: Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3285">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/관리 가능성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3285">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3286">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3286">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3287">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3287">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3288">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3288">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3289">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3289">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3290">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3290">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3291">값 이름: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3291">Value Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3292">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3292">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3293">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3293">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3294">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3294">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3295">기본 설정 키 이름: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3295">Preference Key Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3296">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3296">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3297">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3297">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3298">기본 메시지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3298">Native Messaging policies</span></span>
