  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3299">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3299">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3300">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3300">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3301">사용자가 사용할 수 있는 기본 메시지 호스트 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3301">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3302">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3302">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3303">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3303">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3304">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3304">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3305">정책을 설정하면 거부 목록이 적용되지 않는 기본 메시징 호스트를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3305">Setting the policy specifies which native messaging hosts aren't subject to the deny list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3306">거부 목록 값 \*는 명시적으로 허용되지 않는 한 모든 기본 메시징 호스트가 거부된다는 것을 의미합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3306">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3307">모든 기본 메시징 호스트는 기본적으로 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3307">All native messaging hosts are allowed by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3308">그러나 정책에 의해 기본 메시징 호스트가 거부된 경우 관리자는 허용 목록을 사용하여 해당 정책을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3308">However, if a native messaging host is denied by policy, the admin can use the allow list to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3309">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3309">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3310">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3310">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3311">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3311">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3312">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3312">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3313">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3313">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3314">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3314">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3315">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3315">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3316">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3316">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3317">GP 고유 이름: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3317">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3318">GP 이름: 사용자가 사용할 수 있는 기본 메시지 호스트 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3318">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3319">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 메시지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3319">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3320">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3320">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3321">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3321">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3322">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3322">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3323">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3323">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3324">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3324">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3325">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3325">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3326">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3326">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3327">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3327">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3328">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3328">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3329">기본 설정 키 이름: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3329">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3330">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3330">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3331">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3331">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3332">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3332">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3333">기본 메시지 차단 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3333">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3334">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3334">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3335">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3335">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3336">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3336">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3337">이 정책을 설정하면 로드되지 않아야 하는 기본 메시징 호스트가 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3337">Setting this policy specifies which native messaging hosts shouldn't be loaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3338">거부 목록 값 \*는 명시적으로 허용되지 않는 한 모든 기본 메시징 호스트가 거부된다는 것을 의미합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3338">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3339">해당 정책을 설정하지 않은 경우 Microsoft Edge는 설치된 모든 기본 메시징 호스트를 로드합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3339">If you leave this policy unset , Microsoft Edge loads all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3340">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3340">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3341">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3341">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3342">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3342">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3343">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3343">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3344">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3344">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3345">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3345">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3346">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3346">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3347">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3347">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3348">GP 고유 이름: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3348">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3349">GP 이름: 기본 메시지 차단 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3349">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3350">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 메시지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3350">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3351">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3351">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3352">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3352">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3353">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3353">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3354">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3354">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3355">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3355">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3356">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3356">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3357">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3357">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3358">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3358">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3359">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3359">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3360">기본 설정 키 이름: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3360">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3361">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3361">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3362">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3362">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3363">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3363">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3364">사용자 수준 기본 메시지 호스트 허용(관리자 권한없이 설치됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3364">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3365">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3365">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3366">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3366">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3367">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3367">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3368">해당 정책을 사용함으로 설정하거나 설정하지 않은 경우 Microsoft Edge는 사용자 수준에서 설치된 기본 메시징 호스트를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3368">If you set this policy to Enabled or leave it unset, Microsoft Edge can use native messaging hosts installed at the user level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3369">해당 정책을 사용 안함으로 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 이같은 호스트가 시스템 수준으로 설치된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3369">If you set this policy to Disabled, Microsoft Edge can only use these hosts if they're installed at the system level.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3370">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3370">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3371">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3371">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3372">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3372">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3373">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3373">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3374">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3374">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3375">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3375">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3376">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3376">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3377">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3377">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3378">GP 고유 이름: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3378">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3379">GP 이름: 사용자 수준 기본 메시지 호스트 허용(관리자 권한없이 설치됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3379">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3380">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/기본 메시지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3380">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3381">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3381">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3382">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3382">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3383">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3383">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3384">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3384">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3385">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3385">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3386">값 이름: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3386">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3387">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3387">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3388">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3388">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3389">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3389">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3390">기본 설정 키 이름: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3390">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3391">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3391">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3392">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3392">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3393">암호 관리자 및 보호 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3393">Password manager and protection policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3394">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3394">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3395">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3395">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3396">암호 관리자에 암호 저장 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3396">Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3397">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3397">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3398">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3398">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3399">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3399">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3400">Microsoft Edge에서 사용자 암호를 저장하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3400">Enable Microsoft Edge to save user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3401">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 Microsoft Edge에서 암호를 저장할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3401">If you enable this policy, users can save their passwords in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3402">다음에 사이트 방문 시 Microsoft Edge에서 암호를 자동으로 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3402">The next time they visit the site, Microsoft Edge will enter the password automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3403">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 새 암호를 저장할 수 없지만 이전에 저장한 암호를 계속 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3403">If you disable this policy, users can't save new passwords, but they can still use previously saved passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3404">해당 정책을 사용하거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 해당 정책을 변경하거나 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3404">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3405">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 암호를 저장할 수 있고 해당 기능을 해제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3405">If you don't configure it, users can save passwords, as well as turn this feature off.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3406">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3406">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3407">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3407">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3408">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3408">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3409">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3409">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3410">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3410">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3411">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3411">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3412">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3412">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3413">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3413">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3414">GP 고유 이름: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3414">GP unique name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3415">GP 이름: 암호 관리자에 암호 저장 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3415">GP name: Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3416">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3416">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3417">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3417">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3418">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3418">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3419">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3419">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3420">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3420">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3421">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3421">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3422">값 이름: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3422">Value Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3423">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3423">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3424">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3424">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3425">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3425">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3426">기본 설정 키 이름: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3426">Preference Key Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3427">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3427">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3428">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3428">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3429">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3429">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3430">암호가 안전하지 않은 것으로 확인되면 사용자에게 알림 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3430">Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3431">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3431">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3432">Windows 85 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3432">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3433">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3433">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3434">Microsoft Edge가 사용자 암호를 모니터하도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3434">Allow Microsoft Edge to monitor user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3435">이 정책을 활성화하고 사용자가 정책 사용에 동의하면 Microsoft Edge에 저장된 암호 중 하나라도 안전하지 않은 것으로 발견되면 사용자에게 경고합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3435">If you enable this policy and a user consents to enabling the policy, the user will get alerted if any of their passwords stored in Microsoft Edge are found to be unsafe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3436">Microsoft Edge에 경고가 표시되며 이 정보는 설정 > 암호 > 암호 모니터에서도 확인할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3436">Microsoft Edge will show an alert and this information will also be available in Settings > Passwords > Password Monitor.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3437">이 정책을 비활성화하면 사용자에게 이 기능을 사용할 수 있는 권한을 요청하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3437">If you disable this policy, users will not be asked for permission to enable this feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3438">해당 암호는 검색되지 않으며 경고도 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3438">Their passwords will not be scanned and they will not be alerted either.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3439">정책을 활성화하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자가 이 기능을 켜거나 끌 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3439">If you enable or don't configure the policy, users can turn this feature on or off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3440">Microsoft Edge에서 안전하지 않은 암호를 찾는 방법에 대해 자세히 알아보려면 다음을 참조하세요. [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3440">To learn more about how Microsoft Edge finds unsafe passwords see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3441">추가 지침:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3441">Additional guidance:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3442">이 정책은 중요한 문구와 함께 권장 및 필수로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3442">This policy can be set as both Recommended as well as Mandatory, however with an important callout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3443">필수 활성화: 개별 사용자 동의가 특정 사용자에 대해 이 기능을 사용하기 위한 전제 조건이므로 이 정책에는 필수 활성화 설정이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3443">Mandatory enabled: Given that individual user consent is a pre-condition to enabling this feature for a given user, this policy does not have a Mandatory enabled setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3444">정책을 필수로 설정한 경우 설정의 UI가 변경되지 않으며, edge://policy에 다음 오류 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3444">If the policy is set to Mandatory enabled, the UI in Settings will not change and the following error message will be displayed in edge://policy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3445">오류 상태 메시지의 예: "암호 모니터는 개별 사용자의 동의를 얻어야하기 때문에 이 정책 값은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3445">Example Error state message: "This policy value is ignored because Password Monitor requires the consent of the individual user for it to be turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3446">조직의 사용자에게 설정 > 프로필 > 암호로 이동하여 해당 기능을 켜도록 요청할 수 있습니다. "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3446">You can ask users in your Organization to go to Settings > Profile > Password and turn on the feature."</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3447">권장 활성화: 정책을 권장 활성화로 설정하면 설정의 UI는 '꺼짐' 상태로 유지되지만, 마우스로 가리킬 시 "조직에서 이 설정에 대한 특정 값을 권장했지만 다른 값을 선택하셨습니다" 라는 설명이 표시되는 서류 가방 아이콘이 옆에 표시됩니다. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3447">Recommended enabled: If the policy is set to Recommended enabled, the UI in Settings will remain in 'Off' state, but a briefcase icon will be made visible next to it with this description displayed on hover - "Your organization recommends a specific value for this setting and you have chosen a different value"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3448">필수 및 권장 비활성화: 이 두 가지 상태 모두 정상적인 방식으로 작동하며, 일반적인 캡션이 사용자에게 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3448">Mandatory and Recommended disabled: Both these states will work the normal way, with the usual captions being shown to users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3449">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3449">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3450">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3450">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3451">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3451">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3452">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3452">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3453">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3453">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3454">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3454">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3455">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3455">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3456">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3456">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3457">GP 고유 이름: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3457">GP unique name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3458">GP 이름: 암호가 안전하지 않은 것으로 확인되면 사용자에게 알림 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3458">GP name: Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3459">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3459">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3460">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3460">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3461">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3461">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3462">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3462">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3463">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3463">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3464">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3464">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3465">값 이름: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3465">Value Name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3466">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3466">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3467">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3467">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3468">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3468">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3469">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3469">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3470">암호 변경 URL 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3470">Configure the change password URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3471">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3471">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3472">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3472">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3473">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3473">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3474">변경 암호 URL(HTTP 및 HTTPS 구성표에만 해당)을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3474">Configures the change password URL (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3475">암호 보호 서비스에서 브라우저에 경고를 표시한 후 사용자를 해당 URL로 보내 암호를 변경하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3475">Password protection service will send users to this URL to change their password after seeing a warning in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3476">해당 정책을 사용하면 암호 보호 서비스에서 사용자를 해당 URL로 보내 암호를 변경하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3476">If you enable this policy, then password protection service sends users to this URL to change their password.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3477">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 암호 보호 서비스에서 사용자를 암호 변경 URL로 리디렉션하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3477">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, then password protection service will not redirect users to a change password URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3478">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3478">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3479">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3479">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3480">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3480">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3481">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3481">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3482">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3482">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3483">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3483">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3484">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3484">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3485">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3485">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3486">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3486">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3487">GP 고유 이름: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3487">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3488">GP 이름: 암호 변경 URL 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3488">GP name: Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3489">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3489">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3490">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3490">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3491">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3491">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3492">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3492">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3493">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3493">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3494">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3494">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3495">값 이름: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3495">Value Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3496">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3496">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3497">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3497">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/change_password.html"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3498">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3498">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3499">기본 설정 키 이름: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3499">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3500">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3500">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3501">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3501">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3502">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3502">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3503">암호 보호 서비스에서 암호 보호 서비스가 솔트 암호 캐시를 캡처해야 하는 엔터프라이즈 로그인 URL 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3503">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3504">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3504">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3505">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3505">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3506">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3506">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3507">Microsoft Edge에서 솔트 암호 해시를 캡처하고 암호 재사용 감지에 사용하는 엔터프라이즈 로그인 URL 목록(HTTP 및 HTTPS 구성표만 해당)을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3507">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only) where Microsoft Edge should capture the salted hashes of passwords and use it for password reuse detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3508">해당 정책을 사용하면 암호 보호 서비스에서 정의된 URL에서 암호 지문을 캡처합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3508">If you enable this policy, the password protection service captures fingerprints of passwords on the defined URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3509">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 암호 지문을 캡처하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3509">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, no password fingerprints are captured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3510">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3510">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3511">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3511">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3512">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3512">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3513">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3513">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3514">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3514">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3515">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3515">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3516">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3516">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3517">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3517">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3518">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3518">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3519">GP 고유 이름: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3519">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3520">GP 이름: 암호 보호 서비스에서 암호 보호 서비스가 솔트 암호 캐시를 캡처해야 하는 엔터프라이즈 로그인 URL 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3520">GP name: Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3521">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3521">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3522">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3522">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3523">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3523">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3524">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3524">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3525">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3525">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3526">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3526">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3527">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3527">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3528">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3528">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3529">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3529">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com/login.html"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = "https://login.contoso.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3530">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3530">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3531">기본 설정 키 이름: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3531">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3532">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3532">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3533">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3533">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3534">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3534">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3535">암호 보호 경고 트리거 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3535">Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3536">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3536">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3537">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3537">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3538">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3538">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3539">암호 보호 경고를 트리거할 시기를 제어할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3539">Allows you to control when to trigger password protection warning.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3540">암호 보호는 사용자가 잠재적으로 의심된 사이트에서 보호된 암호를 재사용하는 경우 경고를 알립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3540">Password protection alerts users when they reuse their protected password on potentially suspicious sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3541">[PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 및 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) 정책을 사용하여 보호할 암호를 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3541">You can use the [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) policies to configure which passwords to protect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3542">예외: [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) 및 [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl)에 나열된 사이트에 대한 암호를 비롯하여 [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains)에 나열된 사이트에 대한 암호만 암호 보호 경고를 트리거하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3542">Exemptions: Passwords for the sites listed in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), as well as for the sites listed in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), will not trigger a password-protection warning.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3543">암호 보호 경고를 표시하지 않으려면 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff'로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3543">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff' to not show password protection warningss.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3544">사용자가 non-allowlisted 사이트에서 보호된 암호를 재사용하는 경우 암호 보호 경고를 표시하려면 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse'로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3544">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse' to show password protection warnings when the user reuses their protected password on a non-allowlisted site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3545">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 경고 트리거가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3545">If you disable or don't configure this policy, then the warning trigger is not shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3546">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3546">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3547">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = 암호 보호 경고 꺼짐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3547">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Password protection warning is off</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3548">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = 암호를 재사용하면 암호 보호 경고가 트리거됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3548">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Password protection warning is triggered by password reuse</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3549">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3549">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3550">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3550">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3551">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3551">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3552">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3552">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3553">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3553">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3554">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3554">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3555">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3555">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3556">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3556">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3557">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3557">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3558">GP 고유 이름: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3558">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3559">GP 이름: 암호 보호 경고 트리거 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3559">GP name: Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3560">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3560">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3561">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3561">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3562">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3562">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3563">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3563">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3564">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3564">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3565">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3565">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3566">값 이름: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3566">Value Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3567">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3567">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3568">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3568">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3569">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3569">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3570">기본 설정 키 이름: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3570">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3571">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3571">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3572">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3572">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3573">PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3573">PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3574">암호 노출 사용 단추</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3574">Enable Password reveal button</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3575">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3575">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3576">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3576">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3577">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3577">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3578">웹 사이트 암호 입력 필드의 브라우저 암호 노출 단추의 기본 표시를 구성할 수 있도록 합니다. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3578">Lets you configure the default display of the browser password reveal button for password input fields on websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3579">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 브라우저의 사용자 설정은 기본적으로 암호 노출 단추를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3579">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the browser user setting defaults to displaying the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3580">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 브라우저의 사용자 설정은 암호 노출 단추를 표시하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3580">If you disable this policy, the browser user setting won't display the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3581">접근성을 위해 사용자는 기본 정책에서 브라우저 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3581">For accessibility, users can change the browser setting from the default policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3582">이 정책은 브라우저 암호 노출 단추에만 영향을 주며 웹 사이트의 사용자 지정 노출 단추에는 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3582">This policy only affects the browser password reveal button, it doesn't affect websites' custom reveal buttons.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3583">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3583">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3584">필수 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3584">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3585">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3585">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3586">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3586">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3587">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3587">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3588">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3588">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3589">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3589">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3590">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3590">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3591">GP 고유 이름: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3591">GP unique name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3592">GP 이름: 암호 노출 사용 단추</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3592">GP name: Enable Password reveal button</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3593">GP 경로 (필수): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3593">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3594">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/암호 관리자 및 보호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3594">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3595">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3595">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3596">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3596">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3597">경로 (필수): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3597">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3598">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3598">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3599">값 이름: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3599">Value Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3600">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3600">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3601">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3601">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3602">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3602">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3603">기본 설정 키 이름: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3603">Preference Key Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3604">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3604">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3605">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3605">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3606">성능 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3606">Performance policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3607">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3607">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3608">StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3608">StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3609">시작 부스트 활성화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3609">Enable startup boost</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3610">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3610">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3611">Windows (88 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3611">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3612">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3612">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3613">Microsoft Edge 프로세스를 OS 로그인에서 시작하고 마지막 브라우저 창이 닫힌 후 백그라운드에서 다시 시작하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3613">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and restart in background after the last browser window is closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3614">Microsoft Edge가 배경 모드에서 실행되고 있는 경우 마지막 창이 닫힐 때 브라우저가 종료되지 않을 수 있으며 창이 닫힐 때 백그라운드에서 브라우저가 다시 시작되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3614">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the browser might not close when the last window is closed and the browser won't be restarted in background when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3615">Microsoft Edge 배경 모드 동작을 구성한 이후 수행되는 작업에 대한 자세한 내용은 [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) 정책을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3615">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about what happens after configuring Microsoft Edge background mode behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3616">해당 정책을 사용하면 시작 부스트가 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3616">If you enable this policy, startup boost is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3617">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 시작 부스트가 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3617">If you disable this policy, startup boost is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3618">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 시작 부스트가 처음에 해제되어 있거나 설정되어 있을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3618">If you don't configure this policy, startup boost may initially be off or on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3619">사용자는 edge://settings/system에서 해당 동작을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3619">The user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3620">시작 부스트에 대해 자세히 알아보기: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3620">Learn more about startup boost: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3621">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3621">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3622">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3622">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3623">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3623">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3624">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3624">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3625">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3625">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3626">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3626">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3627">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3627">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3628">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3628">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3629">GP 고유 이름: StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3629">GP unique name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3630">GP 이름: 시작 부스트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3630">GP name: Enable startup boost</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3631">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/성능</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3631">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3632">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/성능</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3632">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3633">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3633">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3634">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3634">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3635">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3635">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3636">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3636">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3637">값 이름: StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3637">Value Name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3638">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3638">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3639">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3639">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3640">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3640">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3641">인쇄 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3641">Printing policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3642">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3642">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3643">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3643">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3644">기본 프린터 선택 규칙</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3644">Default printer selection rules</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3645">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3645">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3646">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3646">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3647">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3647">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3648">Microsoft Edge 기본 프린터 선택 규칙을 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3648">Overrides Microsoft Edge default printer selection rules.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3649">해당 정책은 사용자가 페이지를 처음 인쇄하려고 할 때 Microsoft Edge에서 기본 프린터를 선택하는 규칙을 결정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3649">This policy determines the rules for selecting the default printer in Microsoft Edge, which happens the first time a user tries to print a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3650">해당 정책을 설정하면 Microsoft Edge에서 지정된 모든 특성과 일치하는 프린터를 찾고 해당 프린터를 기본 프린터로 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3650">When this policy is set, Microsoft Edge tries to find a printer that matches all of the specified attributes and uses it as default printer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3651">조건을 충족하는 프린터가 여러 개 있는 경우 일치하는 첫 번째 프린터가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3651">If there are multiple printers that meet the criteria, the first printer that matches is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3652">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 시간 제한 내에 일치하는 프린터를 찾지 못한 경우 기본 제공된 PDF 프린터를 기본 프린터로 선택하고 PDF 프린터가 없으면 기본 프린터를 선택하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3652">If you don't configure this policy or no matching printers are found within the timeout, the printer defaults to the built-in PDF printer or no printer, if the PDF printer isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3653">해당 값은 다음 구성표를 따르는 JSON 개체로 구문 분석됩니다. { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3653">The value is parsed as a JSON object, conforming to the following schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3654">필드를 생략하면 모든 값이 일치함을 의미합니다. 예를 들어 연결을 지정하지 않으면 인쇄 미리 보기에서 모든 유형의 로컬 프린터를 검색하기 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3654">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3655">정규식 패턴은 JavaScript RegExp 구문을 따라야 하고 대/소문자를 구분해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3655">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3656">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3656">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3657">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3657">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3658">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3658">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3659">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3659">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3660">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3660">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3661">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3661">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3662">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3662">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3663">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3663">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3664">GP 고유 이름: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3664">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3665">GP 이름: 기본 프린터 선택 규칙</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3665">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3666">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3666">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3667">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3667">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3668">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3668">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3669">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3669">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3670">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3670">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3671">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3671">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3672">값 이름: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3672">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3673">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3673">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3674">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3674">Example value:</span></span>

```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3675">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3675">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3676">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3676">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3677">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3677">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3678">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3678">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3679">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3679">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3680">머리글 및 바닥글 인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3680">Print headers and footers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3681">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3681">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3682">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3682">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3683">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3683">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3684">인쇄 대화 상자에서 ‘머리글 및 바닥글'을 강제로 설정하거나 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3684">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3685">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 머리글 및 바닥글 인쇄 여부를 결정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3685">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3686">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 머리글 및 바닥글을 인쇄할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3686">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3687">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 사용자는 항상 머리글 및 바닥글을 인쇄합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3687">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3688">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3688">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3689">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3689">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3690">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3690">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3691">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3691">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3692">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3692">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3693">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3693">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3694">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3694">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3695">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3695">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3696">GP 고유 이름: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3696">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3697">GP 이름: 머리글 및 바닥글 인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3697">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3698">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3698">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3699">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3699">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3700">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3700">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3701">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3701">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3702">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3702">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3703">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3703">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3704">값 이름: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3704">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3705">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3705">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3706">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3706">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3707">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3707">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3708">기본 설정 키 이름: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3708">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3709">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3709">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3710">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3710">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3711">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3711">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3712">시스템 기본 프린터를 기본 프린터로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3712">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3713">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3713">Supported versions:</span></span>
