  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3714">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3714">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3715">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3715">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3716">Microsoft Edge에서 최근 사용한 프린터 대신 인쇄 미리 보기에서 기본 선택 항목으로 시스템 기본 프린터를 사용하도록 지시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3716">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3717">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 인쇄 미리 보기에서 최근에 사용한 프린터를 기본 대상 선택으로 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3717">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3718">해당 정책을 사용하면 인쇄 미리 보기에서 OS 시스템 기본 프린터를 기본 대상 선택으로 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3718">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3719">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3719">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3720">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3720">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3721">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3721">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3722">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3722">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3723">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3723">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3724">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3724">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3725">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3725">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3726">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3726">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3727">GP 고유 이름: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3727">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3728">GP 이름: 시스템 기본 프린터를 기본 프린터로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3728">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3729">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3729">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3730">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3730">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3731">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3731">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3732">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3732">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3733">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3733">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3734">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3734">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3735">값 이름: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3735">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3736">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3736">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3737">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3737">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3738">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3738">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3739">기본 설정 키 이름: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3739">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3740">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3740">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3741">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3741">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3742">PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3742">PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3743">거부 목록에서 프린터 유형을 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3743">Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3744">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3744">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3745">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3745">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3746">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3746">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3747">거부 목록에 있는 프린터 유형을 검색하거나 해당 기능을 가져오지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3747">The printer types on the deny list won't be discovered or have their capabilities fetched.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3748">모든 프린터 유형을 거부 목록에 배치하면 문서의 인쇄 대상이 없으므로 인쇄가 효과적으로 비활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3748">Placing all printer types on the deny list effectively disables printing, because there's no print destination for documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3749">이 정책을 구성하지 않거나 프린터 목록이 비어 있으면 모든 프린터 유형을 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3749">If you don't configure this policy, or the printer list is empty, all printer types are discoverable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3750">프린터 대상에는 확장 프린터와 로컬 프린터가 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3750">Printer destinations include extension printers and local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3751">확장 프린터는 인쇄 공급자 대상이라고도 하며 Microsoft Edge 확장에 속하는 대상을 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3751">Extension printers are also known as print provider destinations, and include any destination that belongs to a Microsoft Edge extension.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3752">로컬 프린터는 기본 인쇄 대상이라고도 하며 로컬 컴퓨터 및 공유 네트워크 프린터에서 사용할 수 있는 대상을 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3752">Local printers are also known as native printing destinations, and include destinations available to the local machine and shared network printers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3753">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3753">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3754">privet (privet) = Zeroconf 기반 (mDNS + DNS-SD) 프로토콜 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3754">privet (privet) = Zeroconf-based (mDNS + DNS-SD) protocol destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3755">extension (extension) = 확장 기반 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3755">extension (extension) = Extension-based destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3756">pdf (pdf) = ‘PDF로 저장’ 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3756">pdf (pdf) = The 'Save as PDF' destination</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3757">local (local) = 로컬 프린터 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3757">local (local) = Local printer destinations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3758">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3758">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3759">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3759">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3760">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3760">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3761">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3761">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3762">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3762">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3763">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3763">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3764">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3764">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3765">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3765">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3766">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3766">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3767">GP 고유 이름: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3767">GP unique name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3768">GP 이름: 거부 목록에서 프린터 유형을 사용하지 않도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3768">GP name: Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3769">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3769">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3770">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3770">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3771">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3771">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3772">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3772">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3773">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3773">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3774">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3774">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3775">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3775">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3776">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3776">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3777">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3777">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\1 = "local"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\2 = "privet"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3778">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3778">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3779">기본 설정 키 이름: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3779">Preference Key Name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3780">예제 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3780">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>local</string>
  <string>privet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3781">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3781">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3782">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3782">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3783">배경 그래픽 인쇄 모드 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3783">Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3784">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3784">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3785">Windows 및 macOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3785">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3786">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3786">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3787">배경 그래픽 인쇄 모드를 제한합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3787">Restricts background graphics printing mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3788">해당 정책을 설정하지 않은 경우 배경 그래픽 인쇄에는 제한이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3788">If this policy isn't set there's no restriction on printing background graphics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3789">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3789">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3790">모든 경우(모든 경우) = 배경 그래픽을 사용 그리고 사용하지 않고 인쇄할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3790">any (any) = Allow printing with and without background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3791">사용(사용) = 배경 그래픽을 사용해야 인쇄 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3791">enabled (enabled) = Allow printing only with background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3792">사용 안함(사용 안함) = 배경 그래픽을 사용하지 않아야 인쇄 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3792">disabled (disabled) = Allow printing only without background graphics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3793">이 정책을 구성할 때 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3793">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3794">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3794">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3795">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3795">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3796">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3796">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3797">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3797">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3798">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3798">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3799">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3799">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3800">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3800">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3801">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3801">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3802">GP 고유 이름: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3802">GP unique name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3803">GP 이름: 배경 그래픽 인쇄 모드 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3803">GP name: Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3804">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3804">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3805">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3805">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3806">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3806">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3807">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3807">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3808">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3808">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3809">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3809">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3810">값 이름: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3810">Value Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3811">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3811">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3812">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3812">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3813">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3813">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3814">기본 설정 키 이름: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3814">Preference Key Name: PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3815">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3815">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3816">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3816">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3817">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3817">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3818">기본 배경 그래픽 인쇄 모드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3818">Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3819">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3819">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3820">Windows 및 macOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3820">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3821">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3821">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3822">배경 그래픽 인쇄에 마지막으로 사용된 설정을 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3822">Overrides the last used setting for printing background graphics.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3823">이 설정을 사용하면 배경 그래픽 인쇄가 사용하도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3823">If you enable this setting, background graphics printing is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3824">이 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 배경 그래픽 인쇄를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3824">If you disable this setting, background graphics printing is disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3825">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3825">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3826">사용(사용) = 기본적으로 배경 그래픽 인쇄 모드 사용 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3826">enabled (enabled) = Enable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3827">사용 안함(사용 안함) = 기본적으로 배경 그래픽 인쇄 모드를 사용 안함으로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3827">disabled (disabled) = Disable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3828">이 정책을 구성할 때 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3828">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3829">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3829">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3830">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3830">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3831">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3831">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3832">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3832">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3833">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3833">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3834">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3834">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3835">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3835">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3836">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3836">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3837">GP 고유 이름: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3837">GP unique name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3838">GP 이름: 기본 배경 그래픽 인쇄 모드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3838">GP name: Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3839">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3839">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3840">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3840">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3841">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3841">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3842">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3842">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3843">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3843">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3844">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3844">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3845">값 이름: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3845">Value Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3846">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3846">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3847">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3847">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3848">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3848">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3849">기본 설정 키 이름: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3849">Preference Key Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3850">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3850">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>enabled</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3851">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3851">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3852">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3852">PrintingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3853">인쇄 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3853">Enable printing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3854">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3854">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3855">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3855">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3856">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3856">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3857">Microsoft Edge에서 인쇄할 수 있으며 해당 설정을 사용자가 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3857">Enables printing in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3858">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자가 인쇄할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3858">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3859">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 인쇄할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3859">If you disable this policy, users can't print from Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3860">렌치 메뉴, 확장, JavaScript 응용 프로그램 등에서 인쇄를 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3860">Printing is disabled in the wrench menu, extensions, JavaScript applications, and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3861">사용자는 인쇄하는 동안 Microsoft Edge를 우회하는 플러그인에서 계속 인쇄할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3861">Users can still print from plug-ins that bypass Microsoft Edge while printing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3862">예를 들어 특정 Adobe Flash 응용 프로그램의 상황에 맞는 메뉴에서 인쇄 옵션을 사용할 수 있는데 이는 해당 정책에서 다루지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3862">For example, certain Adobe Flash applications have the print option in their context menu, which isn't covered by this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3863">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3863">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3864">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3864">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3865">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3865">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3866">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3866">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3867">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3867">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3868">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3868">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3869">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3869">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3870">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3870">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3871">GP 고유 이름: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3871">GP unique name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3872">GP 이름: 인쇄 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3872">GP name: Enable printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3873">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3873">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3874">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3874">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3875">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3875">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3876">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3876">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3877">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3877">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3878">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3878">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3879">값 이름: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3879">Value Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3880">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3880">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3881">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3881">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3882">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3882">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3883">기본 설정 키 이름: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3883">Preference Key Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3884">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3884">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3885">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3885">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3886">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3886">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3887">기본 인쇄 페이지 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3887">Default printing page size</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3888">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3888">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3889">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3889">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3890">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3890">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3891">기본 인쇄 페이지 크기를 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3891">Overrides default printing page size.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3892">목록에 필요한 용지 크기가 없는 경우 이름에 나열된 형식 중 하나 또는 '사용자 지정'을 포함해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3892">name should contain one of the listed formats or 'custom' if required paper size is not in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3893">'사용자 지정' 값이 제공되면 custom_size 속성을 지정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3893">If 'custom' value is provided custom_size property should be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3894">이는 원하는 높이와 너비를 마이크로 미터 단위로 설명합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3894">It describes the desired height and width in micrometers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3895">그렇지 않은 경우에는 custom_size 속성을 지정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3895">Otherwise custom_size property shouldn't be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3896">이러한 규칙을 위반하는 정책은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3896">Policy that violates these rules is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3897">사용자가 선택한 프린터에서 페이지 크기를 사용할 수 없는 경우 이 정책은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3897">If the page size is unavailable on the printer chosen by the user this policy is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3898">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3898">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3899">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3899">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3900">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3900">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3901">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3901">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3902">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3902">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3903">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3903">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3904">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3904">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3905">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3905">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3906">GP 고유 이름: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3906">GP unique name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3907">GP 이름: 기본 인쇄 페이지 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3907">GP name: Default printing page size</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3908">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3908">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3909">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3909">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3910">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3910">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3911">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3911">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3912">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3912">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3913">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3913">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3914">값 이름: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3914">Value Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3915">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3915">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3916">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3916">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {
  "custom_size": {
    "height": 297000, 
    "width": 210000
  }, 
  "name": "custom"
}
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3917">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3917">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrintingPaperSizeDefault = {"custom_size": {"height": 297000, "width": 210000}, "name": "custom"}
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3918">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3918">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3919">기본 설정 키 이름: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3919">Preference Key Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3920">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3920">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>PrintingPaperSizeDefault</key>
<dict>
  <key>custom_size</key>
  <dict>
    <key>height</key>
    <integer>297000</integer>
    <key>width</key>
    <integer>210000</integer>
  </dict>
  <key>name</key>
  <string>custom</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3921">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3921">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3922">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3922">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3923">시스템 인쇄 대화 상자를 사용하여 인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3923">Print using system print dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3924">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3924">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3925">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3925">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3926">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3926">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3927">인쇄 미리 보기 대신 시스템 인쇄 대화 상자를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3927">Shows the system print dialog instead of print preview.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3928">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 페이지를 인쇄할 때 Microsoft Edge에서 기본 제공된 인쇄 미리 보기 대신 시스템 인쇄 대화 상자를 엽니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3928">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge opens the system print dialog instead of the built-in print preview when a user prints a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3929">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 인쇄 명령에서 Microsoft Edge 인쇄 미리 보기 화면을 트리거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3929">If you don't configure or disable this policy, print commands trigger the Microsoft Edge print preview screen.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3930">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3930">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3931">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3931">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3932">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3932">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3933">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3933">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3934">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3934">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3935">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3935">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3936">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3936">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3937">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3937">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3938">GP 고유 이름: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3938">GP unique name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3939">GP 이름: 시스템 인쇄 대화 상자를 사용하여 인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3939">GP name: Print using system print dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3940">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/인쇄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3940">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3941">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3941">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3942">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3942">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3943">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3943">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3944">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3944">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3945">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3945">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3946">값 이름: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3946">Value Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3947">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3947">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3948">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3948">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3949">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3949">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3950">기본 설정 키 이름: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3950">Preference Key Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3951">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3951">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3952">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3952">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3953">프록시 서버 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3953">Proxy server policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3954">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3954">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3955">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3955">ProxyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3956">프록시 무시 규칙 구성(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3956">Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-3957">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3957">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3958">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3958">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3959">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3959">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3960">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3960">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3961">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3961">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3962">해당 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다. 대신 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings)를 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3962">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3963">Microsoft Edge 버전 91에서 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3963">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3964">Microsoft Edge가 모든 프록시를 우회하는 호스트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3964">Defines a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge bypasses any proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3965">해당 정책은 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 정책이 지정되지 않고 사용자가 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 정책에서 fixed_servers를 선택한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3965">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3966">프록시 정책을 구성하기 위해 다른 모드를 선택한 경우 해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3966">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3967">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge가 프록시를 사용하지 않는 호스트 목록을 만들 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3967">If you enable this policy, you can create a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge doesn't use a proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3968">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge가 프록시를 우회하는 호스트 목록이 생성되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3968">If you don't configure this policy, no list of hosts is created for which Microsoft Edge bypasses a proxy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3969">프록시 정책을 설정하는 다른 방법을 지정한 경우 해당 정책을 구성하지 않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3969">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3970">자세한 예제를 보려면 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)으로 이동하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3970">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3971">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3971">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3972">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3972">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3973">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3973">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3974">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3974">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3975">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3975">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3976">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3976">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3977">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3977">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3978">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3978">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3979">GP 고유 이름: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3979">GP unique name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3980">GP 이름: 프록시 무시 규칙 구성(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3980">GP name: Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3981">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/프록시 서버</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3981">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3982">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3982">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3983">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3983">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3984">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3984">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3985">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3985">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3986">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3986">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3987">값 이름: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3987">Value Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3988">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3988">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3989">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3989">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3990">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3990">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3991">기본 설정 키 이름: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3991">Preference Key Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3992">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3992">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com, https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-3993">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3993">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3994">ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3994">ProxyMode</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3995">프록시 서버 설정 구성(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3995">Configure proxy server settings (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-3996">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3996">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3997">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3997">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3998">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3998">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-3999">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-3999">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4000">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4000">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4001">해당 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다. 대신 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings)를 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4001">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4002">Microsoft Edge 버전 91에서 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4002">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4003">해당 정책을 사용 설정하면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용하는 프록시 서버를 지정할 수 있으며 사용자가 프록시 설정을 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4003">If you set this policy to Enabled you can specify the proxy server Microsoft Edge uses and prevents users from changing proxy settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4004">Microsoft Edge는 명령줄에서 지정한 모든 프록시 관련 옵션을 무시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4004">Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4005">해당 정책은 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 정책이 지정되지 않은 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4005">The policy is only applied if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4006">다음 옵션 중 하나를 선택하면 다른 옵션은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4006">Other options are ignored if you choose one of the following options:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4007">direct = 프록시 서버를 사용하지 않고 항상 직접 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4007">direct = Never use a proxy server and always connect directly</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4008">system = 시스템 프록시 설정 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4008">system = Use system proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4009">auto_detect = 프록시 설정 자동 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4009">auto_detect = Auto detect the proxy server</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4010">다음 옵션을 사용하도록 선택하는 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4010">If you choose to use:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4011">fixed_servers = 고정 프록시 서버</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4011">fixed_servers = Fixed proxy servers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4012">[ProxyServer](#proxyserver) 및 [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)를 사용하여 추가 옵션을 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4012">You can specify further options with [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) and [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist).</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4013">pac_script = .pac 프록시 스크립트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4013">pac_script =  A .pac proxy script.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4014">[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)을 사용하여 프록시 .pac 파일에 대한 URL을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4014">Use [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) to set the URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4015">자세한 예제를 보려면 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)으로 이동하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4015">For detailed examples, go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4016">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 자신의 프록시 설정을 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4016">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4017">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4017">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4018">ProxyDisabled (direct) = 프록시 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4018">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Never use a proxy</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4019">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = 프록시 설정 자동 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4019">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Auto detect proxy settings</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4020">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = .pac 프록시 스크립트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4020">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Use a .pac proxy script</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4021">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = 고정 프록시 서버 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4021">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Use fixed proxy servers</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4022">ProxyUseSystem (system) = 시스템 프록시 설정 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4022">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Use system proxy settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4023">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4023">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4024">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4024">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4025">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4025">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4026">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4026">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4027">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4027">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4028">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4028">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4029">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4029">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4030">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4030">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4031">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4031">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4032">GP 고유 이름: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4032">GP unique name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4033">GP 이름: 프록시 서버 설정 구성(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4033">GP name: Configure proxy server settings (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4034">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/프록시 서버</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4034">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4035">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4035">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4036">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4036">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4037">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4037">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4038">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4038">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4039">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4039">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4040">값 이름: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4040">Value Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4041">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4041">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4042">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4042">Example value:</span></span>

```
"direct"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4043">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4043">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4044">기본 설정 키 이름: ProxyMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4044">Preference Key Name: ProxyMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4045">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4045">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>direct</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4046">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4046">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4047">ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4047">ProxyPacUrl</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4048">프록시 .pac 파일 URL 설정(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4048">Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-4049">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4049">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4050">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4050">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4051">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4051">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4052">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4052">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4053">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4053">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4054">해당 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다. 대신 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings)를 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4054">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4055">Microsoft Edge 버전 91에서 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4055">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4056">프록시 자동 구성(PAC) 파일의 URL을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4056">Specifies the URL for a proxy auto-config (PAC) file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4057">해당 정책은 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 정책이 지정되지 않고 사용자가 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 정책에서 pac_script를 선택한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4057">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected pac_script in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4058">프록시 정책을 구성하기 위해 다른 모드를 선택한 경우 해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4058">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4059">해당 정책을 사용하면 PAC 파일의 URL을 지정하여 브라우저가 특정 웹 사이트를 가져오는 데 적합한 프록시 서버를 자동으로 선택하는 방법을 정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4059">If you enable this policy, you can specify the URL for a PAC file, which defines how the browser automatically chooses the appropriate proxy server for fetching a particular website.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4060">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 PAC 파일을 지정하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4060">If you disable or don't configure this policy, no PAC file is specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4061">프록시 정책을 설정하는 다른 방법을 지정한 경우 해당 정책을 구성하지 않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4061">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4062">자세한 예제를 보려면 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4062">For detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4063">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4063">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4064">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4064">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4065">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4065">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4066">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4066">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4067">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4067">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4068">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4068">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4069">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4069">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4070">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4070">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4071">GP 고유 이름: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4071">GP unique name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4072">GP 이름: 프록시 .pac 파일 URL 설정(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4072">GP name: Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4073">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/프록시 서버</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4073">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4074">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4074">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4075">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4075">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4076">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4076">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4077">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4077">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4078">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4078">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4079">값 이름: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4079">Value Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4080">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4080">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4081">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4081">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4082">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4082">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4083">기본 설정 키 이름: ProxyPacUrl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4083">Preference Key Name: ProxyPacUrl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4084">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4084">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://internal.contoso.com/example.pac</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4085">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4085">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4086">ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4086">ProxyServer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4087">프록시 서버 주소 또는 URL 구성(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4087">Configure address or URL of proxy server (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-4088">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4088">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4089">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4089">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4090">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4090">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4091">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4091">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4092">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4092">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4093">해당 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다. 대신 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings)를 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4093">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4094">Microsoft Edge 버전 91에서 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4094">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4095">프록시 서버의 URL을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4095">Specifies the URL of the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4096">해당 정책은 [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 정책이 지정되지 않고 사용자가 [ProxyMode](#proxymode) 정책에서 fixed_servers를 선택한 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4096">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4097">프록시 정책을 구성하기 위해 다른 모드를 선택한 경우 해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4097">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4098">해당 정책을 사용하면 해당 정책이 구성한 프록시 서버가 모든 URL에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4098">If you enable this policy, the proxy server configured by this policy will be used for all URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4099">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 해당 프록시 모드에서 사용자는 자신의 프록시 설정을 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4099">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings while in this proxy mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4100">프록시 정책을 설정하는 다른 방법을 지정한 경우 해당 정책을 구성하지 않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4100">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4101">추가 옵션 및 자세한 예제는 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4101">For more options and detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4102">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4102">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4103">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4103">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4104">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4104">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4105">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4105">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4106">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4106">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4107">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4107">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4108">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4108">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4109">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4109">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4110">GP 고유 이름: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4110">GP unique name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4111">GP 이름: 프록시 서버 주소 또는 URL 구성(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4111">GP name: Configure address or URL of proxy server (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4112">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/프록시 서버</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4112">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4113">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4113">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4114">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4114">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4115">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4115">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4116">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4116">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4117">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4117">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4118">값 이름: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4118">Value Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4119">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4119">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4120">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4120">Example value:</span></span>

```
"123.123.123.123:8080"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4121">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4121">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4122">기본 설정 키 이름: ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4122">Preference Key Name: ProxyServer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4123">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4123">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4124">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4124">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4125">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4125">ProxySettings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4126">프록시 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4126">Proxy settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4127">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4127">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4128">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4128">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4129">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4129">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4130">Microsoft Edge에 대한 프록시 설정을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4130">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4131">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge에서 명령줄에서 지정한 모든 프록시 관련 옵션을 무시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4131">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4132">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 자신의 프록시 설정을 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4132">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4133">해당 정책은 다음 개별 정책을 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4133">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4134">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4134">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4135">[ProxySettings](#proxysettings) 정책 설정에서 다음 필드를 수락합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4135">Setting the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy accepts the following fields:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4136">ProxyMode, Microsoft Edge에서 사용되는 프록시 서버를 지정할 수 있으며 사용자가 프록시 설정을 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4136">ProxyMode, which lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4137">ProxyPacUrl, 프록시 .pac 파일의 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4137">ProxyPacUrl, a URL to a proxy .pac file</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4138">ProxyServer, 프록시 서버의 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4138">ProxyServer, a URL for the proxy server</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4139">ProxyBypassList, Microsoft Edge에서 우회하는 프록시 호스트 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4139">ProxyBypassList, a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4140">ProxyMode에서 다음의 값을 선택하는 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4140">For ProxyMode, if you choose the value:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4141">direct, 프록시가 사용되지 않으며 다른 모든 필드는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4141">direct, a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4142">system, 시스템의 프록시가 사용되며 다른 모든 필드는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4142">system, the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4143">auto_detect, 다른 모든 필드는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4143">auto_detect, all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4144">fixed_servers, the ProxyServer and ProxyBypassList 필드가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4144">fixed_servers, the ProxyServer and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4145">pac_script, ProxyPacUrl 및 ProxyBypassList 필드가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4145">pac_script, the ProxyPacUrl and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4146">자세한 예제를 보려면 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936)으로 이동하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4146">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>
