  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4147">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4147">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4148">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4148">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4149">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4149">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4150">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4150">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4151">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4151">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4152">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4152">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4153">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4153">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4154">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4154">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4155">GP 고유 이름: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4155">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4156">GP 이름: 프록시 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4156">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4157">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/프록시 서버</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4157">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4158">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4158">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4159">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4159">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4160">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4160">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4161">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4161">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4162">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4162">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4163">값 이름: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4163">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4164">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4164">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4165">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4165">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", 
  "ProxyMode": "pac_script", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4166">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4166">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {"ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", "ProxyMode": "pac_script", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4167">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4167">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4168">기본 설정 키 이름: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4168">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4169">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4169">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>pac_script</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4170">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4170">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4171">절전 탭 설정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4171">Sleeping tabs settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4172">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4172">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4173">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4173">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4174">특정 사이트에서 절전 탭 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4174">Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4175">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4175">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4176">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4176">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4177">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4177">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4178">절전 탭을 사용하여 절전 모드로 전환할 수 없는 URL 패턴을 기반 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4178">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are not allowed to be put to sleep by sleeping tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4179">정책 [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled)를 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우 이 목록은 사용되지 않으며 어떤 사이트도 절전 모드로 자동 전환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4179">If the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is disabled, this list is not used and no sites will be put to sleep automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4180">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면, 사용자의 개인 구성이 차단하지 않는 경우를 제외하고 모든 사이트를 대기 모드로 전환할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4180">If you don't configure this policy, all sites will be eligible to be put to sleep unless the user's personal configuration blocks them.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4181">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4181">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4182">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4182">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4183">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4183">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4184">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4184">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4185">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4185">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4186">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4186">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4187">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4187">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4188">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4188">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4189">GP 고유 이름: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4189">GP unique name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4190">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 절전 탭 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4190">GP name: Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4191">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/절전 탭 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4191">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4192">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자가 재정의할 수 있음)/절전 모드 탭 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4192">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4193">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4193">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4194">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4194">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4195">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4195">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4196">경로(권장): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4196">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4197">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4197">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4198">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4198">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4199">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4199">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4200">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4200">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4201">기본 설정 키 이름: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4201">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4202">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4202">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4203">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4203">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4204">SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4204">SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4205">절전 모드 탭 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4205">Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4206">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4206">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4207">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4207">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4208">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4208">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4209">이 정책 설정을 통해 절전 모드 탭을 설정할지 여부를 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4209">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on sleeping tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4210">절전 탭은 유휴 배경 탭을 절전 모드로 전환하여 CPU, 배터리 및 메모리 사용량을 줄입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4210">Sleeping tabs reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage by putting idle background tabs to sleep.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4211">Microsoft Edge는 경험적 접근을 사용하여 디스플레이 알림, 사운드 재생 및 비디오 스트림과 같이 백그라운드에서 유용한 작업을 수행하는 탭을 절전 모드로 전환하는 것을 방지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4211">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid putting tabs to sleep that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4212">기본적으로 절전 모드 탭은 켜져 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4212">By default, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4213">개별 사이트가 [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls) 정책을 구성하여 절전되는 것을 차단할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4213">Individual sites may be blocked from being put to sleep by configuring the policy [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4214">이 설정을 사용하면 절전 탭이 켜집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4214">If you enable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4215">이 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 절전 탭이 꺼집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4215">If you disable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4216">이 설정을 구성하지 않는 경우 사용자는 절전 모드 탭을 사용할지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4216">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use sleeping tabs.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4217">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4217">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4218">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4218">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4219">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4219">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4220">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4220">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4221">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4221">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4222">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4222">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4223">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4223">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4224">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4224">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4225">GP 고유 이름: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4225">GP unique name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4226">GP 이름: 절전 모드 탭 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4226">GP name: Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4227">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/절전 탭 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4227">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4228">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자가 재정의할 수 있음)/절전 모드 탭 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4228">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4229">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4229">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4230">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4230">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4231">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4231">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4232">경로(권장): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4232">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4233">값 이름: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4233">Value Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4234">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4234">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4235">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4235">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4236">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4236">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4237">기본 설정 키 이름: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4237">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4238">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4238">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4239">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4239">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4240">SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4240">SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4241">절전 탭에 대한 백그라운드 탭 비활성 시간 제한 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4241">Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4242">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4242">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4243">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4243">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4244">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4244">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4245">절전 모드 탭을 사용하도록 설정한 경우 비활성 백그라운드 탭이 자동으로 절전 모드로 전환되고 이 후 이 정책 설정으로 시간 제한(초)을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4245">This policy setting lets you configure the timeout, in seconds, after which inactive background tabs will be automatically put to sleep if sleeping tabs is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4246">기본적으로 이 제한 시간은 7,200초(2시간)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4246">By default, this timeout is 7,200 seconds (2 hours).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4247">탭은 [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우 또는 구성되지 않은 경우, 그리고 사용자가 절전 탭 설정을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에만 절전 모드로 자동 전환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4247">Tabs are only put to sleep automatically when the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is enabled or is not configured and the user has enabled the sleeping tabs setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4248">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자가 시간 제한 값을 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4248">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose the timeout value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4249">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4249">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4250">5분(300) = 5분 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4250">5Minutes (300) = 5 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4251">15분(900) = 15분 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4251">15Minutes (900) = 15 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4252">30분(1800) = 30분 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4252">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4253">1시간(3600) = 1시간 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4253">1Hour (3600) = 1 hour of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4254">2시간(7200) = 2시간 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4254">2Hours (7200) = 2 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4255">3시간(10800) = 3시간 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4255">3Hours (10800) = 3 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4256">6시간(21600) = 6시간 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4256">6Hours (21600) = 6 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4257">12시간(43200) = 12시간 비활성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4257">12Hours (43200) = 12 hours of inactivity</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4258">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4258">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4259">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4259">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4260">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4260">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4261">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4261">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4262">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4262">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4263">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4263">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4264">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4264">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4265">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4265">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4266">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4266">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4267">GP 고유 이름: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4267">GP unique name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4268">GP 이름: 절전 탭에 대한 백그라운드 탭 비활성 시간 제한 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4268">GP name: Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4269">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/절전 탭 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4269">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4270">GP 경로(권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자가 재정의할 수 있음)/절전 모드 탭 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4270">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4271">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4271">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4272">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4272">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4273">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4273">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4274">경로(권장): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4274">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4275">값 이름: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4275">Value Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4276">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4276">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4277">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4277">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000384
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4278">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4278">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4279">기본 설정 키 이름: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4279">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4280">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4280">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>900</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4281">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4281">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4282">SmartScreen 설정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4282">SmartScreen settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4283">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4283">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4284">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4284">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4285">사이트에 대한 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 프롬프트 무시 방지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4285">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4286">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4286">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4287">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4287">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4288">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4288">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4289">해당 정책 설정을 통해 사용자가 잠재적인 악성 웹 사이트에 대한 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 재정의할 수 있는지 여부를 결정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4289">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4290">해당 설정을 사용하면 사용자는 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 무시할 수 없으며 해당 사이트로 이동할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4290">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4291">해당 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 무시하고 해당 사이트로 이동할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4291">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4292">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4292">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4293">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4293">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4294">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4294">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4295">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4295">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4296">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4296">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4297">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4297">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4298">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4298">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4299">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4299">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4300">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4300">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4301">GP 고유 이름: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4301">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4302">GP 이름: 사이트에 대한 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 프롬프트 무시 방지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4302">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4303">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4303">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4304">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4304">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4305">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4305">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4306">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4306">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4307">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4307">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4308">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4308">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4309">값 이름: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4309">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4310">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4310">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4311">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4311">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4312">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4312">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4313">기본 설정 키 이름: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4313">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4314">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4314">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4315">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4315">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4316">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4316">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4317">다운로드에 대한 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고 무시 방지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4317">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4318">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4318">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4319">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4319">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4320">MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4320">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4321">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4321">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4322">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 확인되지 않은 다운로드에 대한 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 재정의할 수 있는지 여부를 결정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4322">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4323">해당 정책을 사용하면 조직의 사용자는 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 무시할 수 없고 확인되지 않은 다운로드를 완료할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4323">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4324">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 무시하고 확인되지 않은 다운로드를 완료할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4324">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4325">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4325">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4326">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4326">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4327">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4327">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4328">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4328">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4329">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4329">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4330">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4330">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4331">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4331">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4332">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4332">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4333">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4333">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4334">GP 고유 이름: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4334">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4335">GP 이름: 다운로드에 대한 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고 무시 방지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4335">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4336">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4336">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4337">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4337">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4338">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4338">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4339">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4339">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4340">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4340">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4341">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4341">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4342">값 이름: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4342">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4343">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4343">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4344">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4344">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4345">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4345">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4346">기본 설정 키 이름: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4346">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4347">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4347">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4348">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4348">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4349">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4349">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4350">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen이 경고를 트리거하지 않는 도메인 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4350">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4351">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4351">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4352">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4352">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4353">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4353">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4354">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 신뢰할 수 있는 도메인 목록을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4354">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4355">즉, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen은 원본 URL이 해당 도메인에 일치할 경우 피싱 소프트웨어 및 기타 맬웨어 등과 같은 잠재적 악성 리소스를 확인하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4355">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4356">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 다운로드 보호 서비스는 해당 도메인에서 호스트되는 다운로드를 확인하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4356">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4357">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen이 해당 도메인을 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4357">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4358">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 설정하지 않으면 기본 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 보호가 모든 리소스에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4358">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4359">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4359">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4360">또한 해당 정책은 조직에서 Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에는 적용되지 않는다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4360">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4361">대신 Microsoft Defender 보안 센터에서 허용 및 차단 목록을 구성해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4361">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4362">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4362">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4363">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4363">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4364">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4364">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4365">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4365">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4366">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4366">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4367">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4367">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4368">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4368">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4369">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4369">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4370">GP 고유 이름: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4370">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4371">GP 이름: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen이 경고를 트리거하지 않는 도메인 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4371">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4372">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4372">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4373">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4373">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4374">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4374">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4375">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4375">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4376">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4376">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4377">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4377">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4378">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4378">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4379">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4379">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4380">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4380">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4381">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4381">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4382">기본 설정 키 이름: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4382">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4383">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4383">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4384">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4384">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4385">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4385">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4386">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4386">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4387">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4387">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4388">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4388">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4389">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4389">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4390">해당 정책 설정을 통해 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen의 설정 여부를 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4390">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4391">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen은 경고 메시지를 제공하여 잠재적인 피싱 메일 및 악성 소프트웨어로부터 사용자를 보호합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4391">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4392">기본적으로 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen은 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4392">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4393">해당 설정을 사용하면 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen은 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4393">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4394">해당 설정을 사용하지 않으면 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen은 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4394">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4395">해당 설정을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Windows Defender SmartScreen의 사용 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4395">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4396">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4396">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4397">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4397">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4398">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4398">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4399">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4399">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4400">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4400">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4401">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4401">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4402">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4402">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4403">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4403">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4404">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4404">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4405">GP 고유 이름: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4405">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4406">GP 이름: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4406">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4407">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4407">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4408">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4408">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4409">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4409">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4410">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4410">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4411">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4411">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4412">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4412">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4413">값 이름: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4413">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4414">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4414">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4415">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4415">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4416">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4416">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4417">기본 설정 키 이름: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4417">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4418">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4418">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4419">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4419">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4420">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4420">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4421">신뢰할 수 있는 출처에서 다운로드 시 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 강제 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4421">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4422">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4422">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4423">Windows (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4423">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4424">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4424">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4425">해당 정책 설정을 사용하여 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen이 신뢰할 수 있는 소스에서 다운로드 평판을 확인할지 여부를 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4425">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4426">해당 설정을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen이 소스와 상관없이 다운로드 평판을 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4426">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4427">해당 설정을 사용하지 않으면 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen이 신뢰할 수 있는 소스에서 다운로드하는 경우 다운로드 평판을 확인하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4427">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4428">해당 정책은 장치 관리에 등록된 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인, Windows 10 Pro나 엔터프라이즈 인스턴스에 가입한 Windows 인스턴스에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4428">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4429">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4429">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4430">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4430">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4431">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4431">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4432">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4432">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4433">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4433">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4434">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4434">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4435">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4435">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4436">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4436">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4437">GP 고유 이름: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4437">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4438">GP 이름: 신뢰할 수 있는 소스에서 다운로드 시 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 강제 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4438">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4439">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4439">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4440">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4440">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4441">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4441">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4442">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4442">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4443">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4443">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4444">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4444">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4445">값 이름: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4445">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4446">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4446">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4447">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4447">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4448">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4448">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4449">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4449">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4450">잠재적으로 원치 않는 앱을 차단하도록 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4450">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4451">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4451">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4452">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4452">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4453">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4453">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4454">해당 정책 설정을 통해 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen을 사용하여 잠재적으로 필요하지 않은 앱의 차단 설정 여부를 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4454">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on blocking for potentially unwanted apps with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4455">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen을 사용하여 잠재적으로 필요하지 않은 앱 차단 기능은 웹 사이트에서 호스트하는 애드웨어, 코인 마이너, 번들웨어 및 기타 낮은 평판 앱으로부터 사용자를 보호하는 데 도움이 되는 경고 메시지를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4455">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect users from adware, coin miners, bundleware, and other low-reputation apps that are hosted by websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4456">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen을 사용하여 잠재적으로 필요하지 않은 앱 차단 기능은 기본적으로 해제되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4456">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4457">해당 설정을 사용하면 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen을 사용하여 잠재적으로 필요하지 않은 앱 차단 기능이 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4457">If you enable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4458">해당 설정을 사용하지 않으면 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen을 사용하여 잠재적으로 필요하지 않은 앱 차단 기능이 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4458">If you disable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4459">해당 설정을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen을 사용하여 잠재적으로 필요하지 않은 앱 차단 기능의 사용 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4459">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4460">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4460">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4461">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4461">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4462">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4462">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4463">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4463">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4464">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4464">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4465">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4465">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4466">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4466">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4467">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4467">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4468">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4468">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4469">GP 고유 이름: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4469">GP unique name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4470">GP 이름: 잠재적으로 필요하지 않은 앱을 차단하도록 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4470">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4471">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4471">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4472">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/SmartScreen 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4472">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4473">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4473">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4474">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4474">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4475">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4475">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4476">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4476">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4477">값 이름: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4477">Value Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4478">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4478">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4479">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4479">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4480">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4480">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4481">기본 설정 키 이름: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4481">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4482">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4482">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4483">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4483">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4484">시작&comma; 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4484">Startup&comma; home page and new tab page policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4485">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4485">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4486">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4486">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4487">새 탭 페이지를 홈 페이지로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4487">Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4488">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4488">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4489">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4489">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4490">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4490">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4491">Microsoft Edge에서 기본 홈 페이지를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4491">Configures the default home page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4492">홈 페이지를 지정하는 URL 또는 새 탭 페이지로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4492">You can set the home page to a URL you specify or to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4493">해당 정책을 사용하면 항상 홈 페이지에서 새 탭 페이지를 사용하며 홈 페이지 URL 위치는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4493">If you enable this policy, the new tab page is always used for the home page, and the home page URL location is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4494">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 URL이 'edge://newtab'으로 설정되어 있지 않으면 사용자의 홈 페이지는 새 탭 페이지가 될 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4494">If you disable this policy, the user's home page can't be the new tab page, unless the URL is set to 'edge://newtab'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4495">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 새 탭 페이지가 홈 페이지인지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4495">If not configured users can choose whether the new tab page is their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4496">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4496">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4497">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4497">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4498">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4498">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4499">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4499">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4500">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4500">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4501">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4501">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4502">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4502">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4503">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4503">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4504">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4504">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4505">GP 고유 이름: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4505">GP unique name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4506">GP 이름: 새 탭 페이지를 홈 페이지로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4506">GP name: Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4507">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4507">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4508">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4508">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4509">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4509">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4510">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4510">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4511">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4511">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4512">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4512">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4513">값 이름: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4513">Value Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4514">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4514">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4515">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4515">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4516">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4516">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4517">기본 설정 키 이름: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4517">Preference Key Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4518">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4518">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4519">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4519">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4520">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4520">HomepageLocation</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4521">홈 페이지 URL 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4521">Configure the home page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4522">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4522">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4523">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4523">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4524">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4524">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4525">Microsoft Edge에서 기본 홈 페이지 URL을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4525">Configures the default home page URL in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4526">홈 페이지는 홈 단추로 열리는 페이지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4526">The home page is the page opened by the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4527">시작할 때 열리는 페이지는 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 정책으로 제어됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4527">The pages that open on startup are controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4528">여기에서 URL을 설정하거나 홈 페이지를 설정하여 새 탭 페이지를 열 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4528">You can either set a URL here or set the home page to open the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4529">새 탭 페이지를 열도록 선택하는 경우 해당 정책이 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4529">If you select to open the new tab page, then this policy doesn't take effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4530">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 홈 페이지 URL을 변경할 수 없지만 홈 페이지에서 새 탭 페이지를 사용하도록 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4530">If you enable this policy, users can't change their home page URL, but they can choose to use the new tab page as their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4531">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) 정책을 사용하도록 설정하지 않는 한 사용자는 자신의 홈 페이지를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4531">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own home page, as long as the [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) policy isn't enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4532">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4532">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4533">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4533">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4534">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4534">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4535">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4535">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4536">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4536">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4537">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4537">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4538">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4538">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4539">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4539">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4540">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4540">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4541">GP 고유 이름: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4541">GP unique name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4542">GP 이름: 홈 페이지 URL 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4542">GP name: Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4543">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4543">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4544">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4544">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4545">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4545">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4546">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4546">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4547">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4547">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4548">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4548">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4549">값 이름: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4549">Value Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4550">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4550">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4551">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4551">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.contoso.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4552">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4552">Mac information and settings</span></span>
