  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4553">기본 설정 키 이름: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4553">Preference Key Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4554">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4554">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4555">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4555">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4556">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4556">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4557">새 탭 페이지 레이아웃에 허용되는 배경 유형 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4557">Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4558">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4558">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4559">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4559">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4560">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4560">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4561">Microsoft Edge에서 새 탭 페이지 레이아웃에 허용되는 배경 이미지 유형을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4561">You can configure which types of background image that are allowed on the new tab page layout in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4562">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 새 탭 페이지의 모든 배경 이미지 유형을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4562">If you don't configure this policy, all background image types on the new tab page are enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4563">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4563">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4564">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = 일일 배경 이미지 유형 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4564">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disable daily background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4565">DisableCustomImage (2) = 사용자 지정 배경 이미지 유형 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4565">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disable custom background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4566">DisableAll (3) = 모든 배경 이미지 유형 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4566">DisableAll (3) = Disable all background image types</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4567">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4567">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4568">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4568">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4569">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4569">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4570">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4570">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4571">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4571">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4572">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4572">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4573">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4573">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4574">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4574">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4575">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4575">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4576">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4576">GP unique name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4577">GP 이름: 새 탭 페이지 레이아웃에 허용되는 배경 유형 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4577">GP name: Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4578">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4578">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4579">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4579">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4580">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4580">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4581">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4581">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4582">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4582">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4583">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4583">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4584">값 이름: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4584">Value Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4585">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4585">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4586">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4586">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4587">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4587">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4588">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4588">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4589">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4589">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4590">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4590">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4591">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4591">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4592">새 탭 페이지 회사 로고 설정(구식)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4592">Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-4593">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 85 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4593">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4594">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4594">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4595">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상, 85까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4595">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4596">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4596">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4597">이 정책은 운영 요구 사항의 변경 때문에 예상대로 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4597">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4598">따라서 이 정책은 오래되어 사용하지 않는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4598">Therefore it's obsolete and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4599">Microsoft Edge의 새 탭 페이지에서 사용하는 회사 로고를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4599">Specifies the company logo to use on the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4600">해당 정책은 JSON 형식으로 로고를 나타내는 문자열로 구성되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4600">The policy should be configured as a string that expresses the logo(s) in JSON format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4601">예: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4601">For example: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4602">Microsoft Edge에서는 다운로드 무결성을 확인하는 데 사용되는 로고 및 해당 암호 해시(SHA-256)를 다운로드할 수 있는 URL을 지정하여 해당 정책을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4602">You configure this policy by specifying the URL from which Microsoft Edge can download the logo and its cryptographic hash (SHA-256), which is used to verify the integrity of the download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4603">로고는 PNG 또는 SVG 형식이어야 하며 파일 크기는 16MB를 넘지않아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4603">The logo must be in PNG or SVG format, and its file size must not exceed 16 MB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4604">로고는 다운로드되고 캐시되며 URL 또는 해시가 변경될 때마다 다시 다운로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4604">The logo is downloaded and cached, and it will be redownloaded whenever the URL or the hash changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4605">URL은 인증 없이 액세스할 수 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4605">The URL must be accessible without any authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4606">'default_logo'는 필수 요소이며 배경 이미지가 없는 경우에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4606">The 'default_logo' is required and will be used when there's no background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4607">'light_logo'가 제공되면 사용자의 새 탭 페이지에 배경 이미지가 있는 경우에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4607">If 'light_logo' is provided, it will be used when the user's new tab page has a background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4608">왼쪽 맞춤 및 세로로 가운데 맞춤이 되는 투명한 배경이 포함된 가로 로고를 사용하는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4608">We recommend a horizontal logo with a transparent background that is left-aligned and vertically centered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4609">로고의 최소 높이는 32픽셀이어야 하고 가로 세로 비율은 1:1에서 4:1 사이여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4609">The logo should have a minimum height of 32 pixels and an aspect ratio from 1:1 to 4:1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4610">'default_logo'에는 흰색/검은색 배경에 대한 적절한 대비가 이루어져 있어야 합니다. 반면 'light_logo'는 배경 이미지에 대한 적절한 대비가 이루어져 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4610">The 'default_logo' should have proper contrast against a white/black background while the 'light_logo' should have proper contrast against a background image.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4611">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge에서 새 탭 페이지에 지정된 로고를 다운로드하고 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4611">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge downloads and shows the specified logo(s) on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4612">사용자는 로고를 재정의하거나 숨길 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4612">Users can't override or hide the logo(s).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4613">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 새 탭 페이지에 회사 로고 또는 Microsoft 로고를 표시하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4613">If you disable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show no company logo or a Microsoft logo on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4614">SHA-256 해시를 확인하는 데 도움이 필요한 경우 https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4614">For help with determining the SHA-256 hash, see https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4615">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4615">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4616">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4616">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4617">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4617">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4618">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4618">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4619">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4619">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4620">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4620">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4621">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4621">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4622">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4622">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4623">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4623">GP unique name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4624">GP 이름: 새 탭 페이지 회사 로고 설정(구식)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4624">GP name: Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4625">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4625">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4626">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4626">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4627">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4627">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4628">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4628">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4629">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4629">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4630">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4630">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4631">값 이름: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4631">Value Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4632">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4632">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4633">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4633">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  }, 
  "light_logo": {
    "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4634">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4634">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {"default_logo": {"hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"}, "light_logo": {"hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"}}
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4635">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4635">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4636">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4636">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4637">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4637">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageCompanyLogo</key>
<dict>
  <key>default_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/logo.png</string>
  </dict>
  <key>light_logo</key>
  <dict>
    <key>hash</key>
    <string>517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png</string>
  </dict>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4638">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4638">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4639">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4639">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4640">새 탭 페이지에서 기본 상위 사이트 숨기기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4640">Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4641">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4641">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4642">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4642">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4643">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4643">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4644">Microsoft Edge의 새 탭 페이지에서 기본 상위 사이트를 숨깁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4644">Hides the default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4645">해당 정책을 True로 설정하면 기본 상위 사이트 타일이 숨겨집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4645">If you set this policy to true, the default top site tiles are hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4646">해당 정책을 False로 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 기본 상위 사이트 타일이 계속 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4646">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the default top site tiles remain visible.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4647">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4647">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4648">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4648">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4649">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4649">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4650">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4650">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4651">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4651">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4652">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4652">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4653">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4653">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4654">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4654">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4655">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4655">GP unique name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4656">GP 이름: 새 탭 페이지에서 기본 상위 사이트 숨기기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4656">GP name: Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4657">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4657">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4658">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4658">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4659">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4659">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4660">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4660">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4661">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4661">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4662">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4662">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4663">값 이름: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4663">Value Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4664">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4664">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4665">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4665">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4666">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4666">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4667">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4667">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4668">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4668">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4669">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4669">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4670">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4670">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4671">새 탭 페이지 URL 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4671">Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4672">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4672">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4673">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4673">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4674">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4674">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4675">새 탭 페이지에 대해 기본 URL을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4675">Configures the default URL for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4676">이 정책의 권장 버전은 현재 작동하지 않으며 필수 버전과 동일하게 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4676">The recommended version of this policy does not currently work and functions exactly like the mandatory version.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4677">해당 정책은 새 탭이 생성될 때(새 창이 열려 있는 경우 포함) 열리는 페이지를 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4677">This policy determines the page that's opened when new tabs are created (including when new windows are opened).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4678">새 탭 페이지로 열리도록 설정한 경우 시작 페이지에도 영향을 미칩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4678">It also affects the startup page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4679">해당 정책은 시작 시 열리는 페이지를 확인하지 않으며 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 정책에 의해 제어됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4679">This policy doesn't determine which page opens on startup; that's controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4680">새 탭 페이지로 열리도록 설정한 경우 홈 페이지에 영향을 미치지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4680">It also doesn't affect the home page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4681">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본 새 탭 페이지가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4681">If you don't configure this policy, the default new tab page is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4682">해당 정책 및 [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) 정책을 *구성하면* 해당 정책이 우선됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4682">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) policy, this policy has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4683">빈 탭을 선호하는 경우 사용해야 할 올바른 URL은 "about://blank"이 아니라 "about:blank”입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4683">If a blank tab is preferred, "about:blank" is the correct URL to use, not "about://blank".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4684">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4684">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4685">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4685">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4686">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4686">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4687">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4687">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4688">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4688">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4689">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4689">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4690">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4690">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4691">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4691">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4692">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4692">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4693">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4693">GP unique name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4694">GP 이름: 새 탭 페이지 URL 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4694">GP name: Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4695">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4695">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4696">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4696">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4697">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4697">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4698">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4698">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4699">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4699">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4700">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4700">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4701">값 이름: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4701">Value Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4702">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4702">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4703">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4703">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.fabrikam.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4704">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4704">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4705">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4705">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4706">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4706">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4707">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4707">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4708">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4708">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4709">새 탭 페이지 빠른 링크 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4709">Set new tab page quick links</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4710">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4710">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4711">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4711">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4712">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4712">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4713">기본적으로 Microsoft Edge는 사용자가 추가한 바로 가기 키와 검색 기록을 기반으로 하는 상위 사이트에서 새 탭 페이지에 빠른 링크를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4713">By default, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page from user-added shortcuts and top sites based on browsing history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4714">해당 정책을 사용하면 새 탭 페이지에서 JSON 개체로 표시되는 최대 3개의 빠른 링크 타일을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4714">With this policy, you can configure up to three quick link tiles on the new tab page, expressed as a JSON object:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4715">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4715">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4716">'url' 필드는 필수입니다. 'title' 및 'pinned'는 선택 사항입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4716">The 'url' field is required; 'title' and 'pinned' are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4717">'title'이 제공되지 않으면 URL이 기본 제목으로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4717">If 'title' is not provided, the URL is used as the default title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4718">'pinned'가 제공되지 않는 경우 기본값은 False입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4718">If 'pinned' is not provided, the default value is false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4719">Microsoft Edge는 이를 나열된 순서 대로 왼쪽에서 오른쪽으로 표시하며 고정된 모든 타일이 고정되지 않은 타일보다 먼저 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4719">Microsoft Edge presents these in the order listed, from left to right, with all pinned tiles displayed ahead of non-pinned tiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4720">해당 정책이 필수로 설정된 경우 'pinned' 필드가 무시되고 모든 타일이 고정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4720">If the policy is set as mandatory, the 'pinned' field will be ignored and all tiles will be pinned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4721">해당 타일은 사용자가 삭제할 수 없으며 항상 빠른 링크 목록 맨 앞에 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4721">The tiles can't be deleted by the user and will always appear at the front of the quick links list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4722">해당 정책이 권장 대로 설정되면 고정된 타일은 목록에 유지되지만 사용자는 해당 타일을 편집하고 삭제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4722">If the policy is set as recommended, pinned tiles will remain in the list but the user has the ability to edit and delete them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4723">고정되지 않은 빠른 링크 타일은 기본 상위 사이트처럼 작동하며 다른 웹 사이트를 더 자주 방문하는 경우 목록에서 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4723">Quick link tiles that aren't pinned behave like default top sites and are pushed off the list if other websites are visited more frequently.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4724">해당 정책을 통해 고정되지 않은 링크를 기존 브라우저 프로필에 적용하는 경우 해당 링크는 사용자의 검색 기록과 비교되는 방식에 따라 전혀 표시되지 않을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4724">When applying non-pinned links via this policy to an existing browser profile, the links may not appear at all, depending on how they rank compared to the user's browsing history.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4725">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4725">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4726">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4726">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4727">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4727">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4728">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4728">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4729">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4729">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4730">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4730">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4731">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4731">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4732">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4732">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4733">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4733">GP unique name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4734">GP 이름: 새 탭 페이지 빠른 링크 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4734">GP name: Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4735">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4735">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4736">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4736">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4737">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4737">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4738">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4738">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4739">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4739">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4740">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4740">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4741">값 이름: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4741">Value Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4742">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4742">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4743">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4743">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true, 
    "title": "Contoso Portal", 
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam", 
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4744">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4744">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [{"pinned": true, "title": "Contoso Portal", "url": "https://contoso.com"}, {"title": "Fabrikam", "url": "https://fabrikam.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4745">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4745">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4746">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4746">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4747">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4747">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4748">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4748">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4749">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4749">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4750">더 빠른 렌더링을 위해 새 탭 페이지의 미리 로드 활성화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4750">Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4751">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4751">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4752">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4752">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4753">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4753">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4754">이 정책을 구성하면 새 탭 페이지 미리 로드가 활성화되고 사용자는 이 설정을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4754">If you configure this policy, preloading the New tab page is enabled, and users can't change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4755">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 미리 로드가 활성화되고 사용자가 이 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4755">If you don't configure this policy, preloading is enabled and a user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4756">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4756">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4757">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4757">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4758">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4758">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4759">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4759">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4760">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4760">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4761">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4761">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4762">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4762">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4763">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4763">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4764">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4764">GP unique name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4765">GP 이름: 더 빠른 렌더링을 위해 새 탭 페이지의 미리 로드 활성화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4765">GP name: Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4766">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4766">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4767">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4767">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4768">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4768">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4769">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4769">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4770">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4770">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4771">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4771">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4772">값 이름: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4772">Value Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4773">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4773">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4774">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4774">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4775">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4775">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4776">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4776">Preference Key Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4777">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4777">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4778">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4778">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4779">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4779">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4780">Microsoft Edge 새 탭 페이지 환경 구성(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4780">Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-4781">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4781">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4782">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4782">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4783">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4783">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4784">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4784">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4785">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4785">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4786">새 버전의 엔터프라이즈 새 탭 페이지에서 다양한 콘텐츠 형식들 사이에 더 이상 선택하지 않아도 되기 때문에 이 정책을 더 이상 사용하지 않고 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4786">We are deprecating this policy because the new version of the enterprise new tab page no longer requires choosing between different content types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4787">대신에 Microsoft 365 관리 센터를 통해 사용자에게 제공되는 콘텐츠를 제어할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4787">Instead, the content that is presented to the user can be controlled via the Microsoft 365 admin center.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4788">Microsoft 365 관리 센터로 이동하려면 관리자 계정으로 https://admin.microsoft.com에 로그인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4788">To get to the Microsoft 365 admin center, sign in at https://admin.microsoft.com with your admin account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4789">이 정책은 Microsoft Edge 버전 90 이후 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4789">The policy will be made obsolete after Microsoft Edge version 90.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4790">새 탭 페이지에서 Microsoft 뉴스 또는 Office 365 피드 환경을 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4790">Lets you choose either the Microsoft News or Office 365 feed experience for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4791">해당 정책을 ‘News’로 설정하면 사용자에게 새 탭 페이지에서 Microsoft 뉴스 피드 환경이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4791">When you set this policy to 'News', users will see the Microsoft News feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4792">해당 정책을 ‘Office’로 설정하면 Azure Active Directory 브라우저 로그인 사용자에게 새 탭 페이지에서 Office 365 피드 환경이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4792">When you set this policy to 'Office', users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the Office 365 feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4793">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4793">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4794">Azure Active Directory 브라우저 로그인을 사용하는 사용자에게 Office 365 새 탭 페이지 피드 환경을 비롯하여 표준 새 탭 페이지 피드 환경을 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4794">Users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in are offered the Office 365 new tab page feed experience, as well as the standard new tab page feed experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4795">Azure Active Directory 브라우저 로그인이 없는 사용자에게는 표준 새 탭 페이지 환경이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4795">Users without an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the standard new tab page experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4796">해당 정책 및 [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 정책을 *구성하면* [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) 정책이 우선됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4796">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) policy, [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4797">기본 설정: 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4797">Default setting:  Disabled or not configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4798">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4798">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4799">News (0) = Microsoft 뉴스 피드 환경</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4799">News (0) = Microsoft News feed experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4800">Office (1) = Office 365 피드 환경</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4800">Office (1) = Office 365 feed experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4801">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4801">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4802">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4802">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4803">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4803">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4804">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4804">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4805">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4805">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4806">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4806">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4807">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4807">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4808">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4808">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4809">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4809">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4810">GP 고유 이름: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4810">GP unique name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4811">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge 새 탭 페이지 환경 구성(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4811">GP name: Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4812">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4812">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4813">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4813">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4814">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4814">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4815">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4815">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4816">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4816">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4817">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4817">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4818">값 이름: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4818">Value Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4819">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4819">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4820">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4820">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4821">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4821">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4822">기본 설정 키 이름: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4822">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4823">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4823">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4824">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4824">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4825">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4825">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4826">시작 시 수행하는 작업</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4826">Action to take on startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4827">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4827">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4828">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4828">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4829">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4829">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4830">Microsoft Edge가 시작할 때 작동하는 방식을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4830">Specify how Microsoft Edge behaves when it starts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4831">시작할 때 새 탭이 항상 열리도록 하려면 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'를 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4831">If you want a new tab to always open on startup, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4832">Microsoft Edge가 마지막으로 종료 시 열리는 URL을 다시 열려면 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'을 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4832">If you want to reopen URLs that were open the last time Microsoft Edge closed, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4833">검색 세션이 원래 대로 복원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4833">The browsing session will be restored as it was.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4834">해당 옵션은 세션에 의존하는 일부 설정이나 종료 시 작업을 수행하는 일부 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다. (예: 종료 또는 세션 전용 쿠키에서 검색 데이터 지우기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4834">Note that this option disables some settings that rely on sessions or that perform actions on exit (such as Clear browsing data on exit or session-only cookies).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4835">특정 URL 집합을 열려면 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'를 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4835">If you want to open a specific set of URLs, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4836">해당 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 구성되지 않은 상태로 두는 것과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4836">Disabling this setting is equivalent to leaving it not configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4837">사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4837">Users will be able to change it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4838">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4838">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4839">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4839">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4840">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = 새 탭 열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4840">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Open a new tab</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4841">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = 마지막 세션 복원</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4841">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restore the last session</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4842">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = URL 목록 열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4842">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Open a list of URLs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4843">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4843">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4844">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4844">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4845">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4845">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4846">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4846">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4847">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4847">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4848">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4848">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4849">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4849">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4850">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4850">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4851">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4851">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4852">GP 고유 이름: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4852">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4853">GP 이름: 시작 시 수행하는 작업</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4853">GP name: Action to take on startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4854">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4854">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4855">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4855">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4856">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4856">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4857">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4857">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4858">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4858">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4859">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4859">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4860">값 이름: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4860">Value Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4861">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4861">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4862">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4862">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000004
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4863">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4863">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4864">기본 설정 키 이름: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4864">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4865">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4865">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>4</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4866">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4866">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4867">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4867">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4868">브라우저 시작 시 열리는 사이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4868">Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4869">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4869">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4870">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4870">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4871">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4871">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4872">브라우저 시작 시 자동으로 열리는 웹 사이트 목록을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4872">Specify a list of websites to open automatically when the browser starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4873">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 시작 시 사이트를 열지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4873">If you don't configure this policy, no site is opened on startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4874">해당 정책은 [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) 정책을 'URL 목록 열기' (4)로 설정하는 경우에만 작동할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4874">This policy only works if you also set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to 'Open a list of URLs' (4).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4875">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4875">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4876">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4876">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4877">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4877">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4878">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4878">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4879">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4879">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4880">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4880">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4881">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4881">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4882">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4882">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4883">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4883">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4884">GP 고유 이름: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4884">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4885">GP 이름: 브라우저 시작 시 열리는 사이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4885">GP name: Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4886">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4886">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4887">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4887">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4888">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4888">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4889">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4889">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4890">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4890">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4891">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4891">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4892">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4892">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4893">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4893">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4894">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4894">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = "https://www.fabrikam.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4895">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4895">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4896">기본 설정 키 이름: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4896">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4897">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4897">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4898">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4899">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4899">ShowHomeButton</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4900">도구 모음에서 홈 단추 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4900">Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4901">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4901">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4902">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4902">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4903">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4903">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4904">Microsoft Edge 도구 모음에서 홈 단추를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4904">Shows the Home button on Microsoft Edge's toolbar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4905">해당 정책을 사용하면 항상 홈 단추가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4905">Enable this policy to always show the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4906">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 단추가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4906">Disable it to never show the button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4907">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 홈 단추를 표시할지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4907">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to show the home button.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4908">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4908">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4909">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4909">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4910">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4910">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4911">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4911">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4912">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4912">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4913">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4913">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4914">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4914">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4915">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4915">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4916">GP 고유 이름: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4916">GP unique name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4917">GP 이름: 도구 모음에서 홈 단추 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4917">GP name: Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4918">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4918">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4919">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/시작, 홈 페이지 및 새 탭 페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4919">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4920">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4920">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4921">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4921">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4922">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4922">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4923">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4923">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4924">값 이름: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4924">Value Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4925">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4925">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4926">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4926">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4927">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4927">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4928">기본 설정 키 이름: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4928">Preference Key Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4929">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4929">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4930">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4930">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4931">추가 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4931">Additional policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4932">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4932">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4933">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4933">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4934">주소 표시줄의 Bing 제안에서 Microsoft Search 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4934">Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4935">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4935">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4936">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4936">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4937">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4937">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4938">사용자가 주소 표시줄에 검색 문자열을 입력하는 경우 주소 표시줄의 제안 목록의 Bing에서 관련 Microsoft 검색 제안을 표시할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4938">Enables the display of relevant Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list when the user types a search string in the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4939">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge 주소 표시줄 제안 목록에서 Bing의 Microsoft 검색에서 제공하는 내부 결과를 확인할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4939">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can see internal results powered by Microsoft Search in Bing in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4940">Bing 결과에서 Microsoft 검색을 보려면 사용자는 해당 조직의 Azure AD 계정을 사용하여 Microsoft Edge에 로그인해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4940">To see the Microsoft Search in Bing results, the user must be signed into Microsoft Edge with their Azure AD account for that organization.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4941">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge 주소 표시줄 제안 목록에서 내부 결과를 확인할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4941">If you disable this policy, users can't see internal results in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4942">Microsoft Edge 버전 89부터 Bing이 사용자의 기본 검색 제공자가 아닌 경우에도 Bing의 Microsoft Search 추천 사항을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4942">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 89, Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions will be available even if Bing isn't the user's default search provider.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4943">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4943">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4944">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4944">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4945">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4945">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4946">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4946">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4947">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4947">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4948">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4948">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4949">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4949">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4950">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4950">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4951">GP 고유 이름: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4951">GP unique name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4952">GP 이름: 주소 표시줄의 Bing 제안에서 Microsoft 검색 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4952">GP name: Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4953">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4953">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
