  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4954">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4954">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4955">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4955">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4956">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4956">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4957">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4957">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4958">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4958">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4959">값 이름: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4959">Value Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4960">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4960">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4961">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4961">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4962">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4962">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4963">기본 설정 키 이름: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4963">Preference Key Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4964">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4964">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4965">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4965">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4966">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4966">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4967">간섭 광고가 포함된 사이트에 대한 광고 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4967">Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4968">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4968">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4969">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4969">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4970">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4970">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4971">간섭 광고가 포함된 사이트에서 광고 차단 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4971">Controls whether ads are blocked on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4972">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4972">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4973">AllowAds (1) = 모든 사이트에서 광고 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4973">AllowAds (1) = Allow ads on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4974">BlockAds (2) = 간섭 광고가 포함된 사이트에서 광고 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4974">BlockAds (2) = Block ads on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4975">(기본값)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4975">(Default value)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4976">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4976">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4977">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4977">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4978">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4978">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4979">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4979">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4980">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4980">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4981">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4981">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4982">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4982">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4983">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4983">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4984">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4984">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4985">GP 고유 이름: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4985">GP unique name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4986">GP 이름: 간섭 광고가 포함된 사이트에 대한 광고 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4986">GP name: Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4987">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4987">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4988">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4988">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4989">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4989">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4990">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4990">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4991">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4991">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4992">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4992">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4993">값 이름: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4993">Value Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4994">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4994">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4995">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4995">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4996">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4996">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4997">기본 설정 키 이름: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4997">Preference Key Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-4998">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4998">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-4999">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-4999">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5000">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5000">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5001">브라우저 및 다운로드 기록 삭제 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5001">Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5002">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5002">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5003">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5003">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5004">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5004">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5005">브라우저 기록 및 다운로드 기록을 삭제하고 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5005">Enables deleting browser history and download history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5006">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우에도 검색 및 다운로드 기록이 보존되도록 보장하지 않습니다. 사용자는 기록 데이터베이스 파일을 직접 편집하거나 삭제할 수 있고 브라우저 자체에서 만료 기간에 따라 제거되거나 일부 기록 항목을 언제든지 보관할 수도 있다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5006">Note that even with this policy is disabled, the browsing and download history aren't guaranteed to be retained: users can edit or delete the history database files directly, and the browser itself may remove (based on expiration period) or archive any or all history items at any time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5007">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 탐색 및 다운로드 기록을 삭제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5007">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can delete the browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5008">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 탐색과 다운로드 기록을 삭제할 수 없으며 기록 동기화가 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5008">If you disable this policy, users can't delete browsing and download history, and history sync will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5009">해당 정책을 사용하는 경우 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 정책을 사용하지 않아야 합니다. 두 정책 모두 데이터 삭제를 처리하기 때문입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5009">If you enable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5010">두 정책을 모두 사용하는 경우 해당 정책을 구성하는 방법에 관계 없이 Microsoft Edge 종료 시 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 정책이 우선되어 모든 데이터가 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5010">If you enable both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5011">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5011">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5012">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5012">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5013">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5013">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5014">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5014">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5015">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5015">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5016">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5016">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5017">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5017">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5018">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5018">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5019">GP 고유 이름: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5019">GP unique name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5020">GP 이름: 브라우저 및 다운로드 기록 삭제 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5020">GP name: Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5021">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5021">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5022">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5022">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5023">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5023">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5024">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5024">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5025">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5025">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5026">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5026">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5027">값 이름: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5027">Value Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5028">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5028">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5029">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5029">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5030">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5030">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5031">기본 설정 키 이름: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5031">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5032">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5032">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5033">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5033">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5034">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5034">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5035">파일 선택 대화 상자 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5035">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5036">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5036">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5037">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5037">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5038">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5038">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5039">Microsoft Edge에 파일 선택 대화 상자를 표시하여 로컬 파일에 대한 액세스를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5039">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5040">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 파일 선택 대화 상자를 평소 대로 열 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5040">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5041">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자가 파일 선택 대화 상자(예: 즐겨찾기 가져오기, 파일 업로드 또는 링크 저장)를 트리거하는 작업을 수행할 때마다 메시지가 대신 표시되고 사용자는 파일 선택 대화 상자에서 취소를 클릭한 것으로 간주됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5041">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5042">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5042">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5043">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5043">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5044">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5044">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5045">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5045">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5046">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5046">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5047">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5047">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5048">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5048">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5049">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5049">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5050">GP 고유 이름: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5050">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5051">GP 이름: 파일 선택 대화 상자 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5051">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5052">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5052">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5053">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5053">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5054">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5054">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5055">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5055">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5056">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5056">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5057">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5057">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5058">값 이름: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5058">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5059">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5059">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5060">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5060">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5061">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5061">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5062">기본 설정 키 이름: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5062">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5063">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5063">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5064">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5064">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5065">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5065">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5066">페이지를 언로딩하는 동안 팝업 표시 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5066">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-5067">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 87 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5067">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5068">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5068">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5069">Windows 및 macOS(78부터 87까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5069">On Windows and macOS since 78, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5070">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5070">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5071">해당 정책을 사용하면 관리자는 언로드가 진행되는 동안 페이지에 팝업을 표시할 수 있음을 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5071">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5072">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 페이지는 언로드될 때 팝업을 표시할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5072">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5073">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 설정하지 않으면 페이지는 언로드될 때 팝업을 표시할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5073">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5074">이는 사양(https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name))에 따라 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5074">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5075">이 정책은 Microsoft Edge 88에서 제거되었고 설정된 경우 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5075">This policy was removed in Microsoft Edge 88 and is ignored if set.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5076">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5076">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5077">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5077">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5078">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5078">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5079">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5079">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5080">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5080">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5081">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5081">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5082">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5082">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5083">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5083">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5084">GP 고유 이름: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5084">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5085">GP 이름: 페이지를 언로딩하는 동안 팝업 표시(사용되지 않음)를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5085">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5086">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5086">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5087">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5087">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5088">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5088">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5089">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5089">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5090">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5090">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5091">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5091">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5092">값 이름: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5092">Value Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5093">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5093">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5094">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5094">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5095">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5095">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5096">기본 설정 키 이름: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5096">Preference Key Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5097">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5097">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5098">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5098">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5099">AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5099">AllowSurfGame</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5100">서핑 게임 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5100">Allow surf game</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5101">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5101">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5102">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5102">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5103">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5103">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5104">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 장치가 오프라인이거나 사용자가 edge://surf로 이동하는 경우 서핑 게임을 플레이할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5104">If you disable this policy, users won't be able to play the surf game when the device is offline or if the user navigates to edge://surf.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5105">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 서핑 게임을 플레이할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5105">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can play the surf game.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5106">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5106">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5107">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5107">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5108">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5108">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5109">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5109">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5110">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5110">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5111">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5111">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5112">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5112">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5113">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5113">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5114">GP 고유 이름: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5114">GP unique name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5115">GP 이름: 서핑 게임 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5115">GP name: Allow surf game</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5116">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5116">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5117">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5117">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5118">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5118">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5119">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5119">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5120">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5120">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5121">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5121">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5122">값 이름: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5122">Value Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5123">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5123">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5124">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5124">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5125">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5125">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5126">기본 설정 키 이름: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5126">Preference Key Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5127">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5127">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5128">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5128">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5129">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5129">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5130">페이지를 해제하는 동안 페이지에서 동기 XHR 요청 전송 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5130">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-5131">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5131">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5132">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5132">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5133">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5133">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5134">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5134">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5135">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5135">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5136">이 정책은 페이지가 해제되는 동안 동기 XHR 요청을 불허하도록 하는 변경과 호환되지 않는 것으로 확인되는 경우 엔터프라이즈에서 웹 콘텐츠를 업데이트하는 데 더 많은 시간을 주기 위한 목적으로만 만들어진 단기 메커니즘이므로 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5136">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5137">Microsoft Edge 버전 88에서는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5137">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 88.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5138">해당 정책을 사용하면 페이지가 해제되는 동안 페이지에서 동기 XHR 요청을 보내도록 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5138">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5139">해당 정책을 사용하면 페이지가 해제되는 동안 페이지에서 동기 XHR 요청을 보낼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5139">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5140">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 페이지가 해제되는 동안 페이지에서 동기 XHR 요청을 보낼 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5140">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5141">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5141">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5142">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5142">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5143">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5143">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5144">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5144">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5145">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5145">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5146">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5146">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5147">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5147">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5148">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5148">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5149">GP 고유 이름: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5149">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5150">GP 이름: 페이지를 해제하는 동안 페이지에서 동기 XHR 요청 전송 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5150">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5151">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5151">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5152">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5152">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5153">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5153">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5154">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5154">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5155">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5155">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5156">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5156">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5157">값 이름: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5157">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5158">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5158">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5159">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5159">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5160">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5160">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5161">기본 설정 키 이름: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5161">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5162">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5162">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5163">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5163">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5164">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5164">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5165">Microsoft Edge에서 토큰 바인딩을 설정하려는 사이트 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5165">Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5166">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5166">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5167">Windows (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5167">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5168">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5168">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5169">브라우저에서 토큰 바인딩 프로토콜을 수행하려는 사이트에 대해 URL 패턴 목록을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5169">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5170">해당 목록에 있는 도메인의 경우 브라우저에서 토큰 바인딩 ClientHello를 TLS 핸드셰이크에 전송합니다. (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472) 참조)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5170">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5171">서버가 유효한 ServerHello 응답을 사용하여 응답하는 경우 브라우저는 다음 https 요청에서 토큰 바인딩 메시지를 생성하고 전송합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5171">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5172">자세한 내용은 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5172">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5173">해당 목록이 비어 있으면 토큰 바인딩을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5173">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5174">해당 정책은 Windows 10 장치에서 가상 보안 모드 기능을 사용하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5174">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5175">Microsoft Edge 86부터는 이 정책이 더 이상 동적 새로 고침을 지원하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5175">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5176">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5176">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5177">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5177">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5178">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5178">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5179">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5179">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5180">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5180">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5181">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5181">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5182">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5182">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5183">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5183">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5184">GP 고유 이름: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5184">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5185">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 토큰 바인딩을 설정하려는 사이트 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5185">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5186">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5186">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5187">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5187">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5188">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5188">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5189">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5189">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5190">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5190">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5191">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5191">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5192">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5192">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5193">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5193">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5194">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5194">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5195">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5195">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5196">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5196">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5197">특정 사이트에 대한 추적 방지 예외 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5197">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5198">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5198">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5199">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5199">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5200">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5200">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5201">추적 방지에서 제외되는 URL 패턴 목록을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5201">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5202">해당 정책을 구성하면 구성된 URL 패턴 목록이 추적 방지에서 제외됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5202">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5203">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 ‘사용자의 웹 검색 활동 추적 차단” 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5203">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5204">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5204">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5205">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5205">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5206">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5206">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5207">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5207">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5208">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5208">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5209">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5209">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5210">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5210">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5211">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5211">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5212">GP 고유 이름: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5212">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5213">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에 대한 추적 방지 예외 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5213">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5214">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5214">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5215">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5215">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5216">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5216">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5217">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5217">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5218">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5218">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5219">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5219">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5220">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5220">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5221">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5221">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5222">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5222">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5223">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5223">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5224">기본 설정 키 이름: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5224">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5225">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5225">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5226">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5226">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5227">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5227">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5228">웹 페이지를 찾을 수 없는 경우 비슷한 페이지 제안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5228">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5229">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5229">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5230">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5230">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5231">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5231">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5232">Microsoft Edge에서 웹 서비스에 대한 연결을 발급하여 URL을 생성하고 DNS 오류와 같은 연결 문제에 대한 제안을 검색할 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5232">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5233">해당 정책을 사용하면 웹 서비스를 사용하여 URL을 생성하고 네트워크 오류에 대한 제안을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5233">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5234">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 웹 서비스에 대한 호출은 없으며 표준 오류 페이지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5234">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5235">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서는 edge://settings/privacy의 서비스에 설정된 사용자 선호도를 고려합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5235">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5236">특히 사용자가 설정하거나 해제할 수 있는 **웹 페이지를 찾을 수 없는 경우 유사한 페이지 제안** 토글이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5236">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5237">해당 정책(AlternateErrorPagesEnabled)을 사용하도록 설정한 경우 웹 페이지를 찾을 수 없을 때 유사한 페이지를 제안하도록 설정되지만 사용자가 토글을 사용하여 설정을 변경할 수 없다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5237">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5238">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우 웹 페이지를 찾을 수 없을 때 유사한 페이지를 제안하도록 설정하지 않으며 사용자가 토글을 사용하여 설정을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5238">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5239">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5239">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5240">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5240">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5241">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5241">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5242">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5242">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5243">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5243">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5244">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5244">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5245">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5245">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5246">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5246">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5247">GP 고유 이름: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5247">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5248">GP 이름: 웹 페이지를 찾을 수 없는 경우 유사한 페이지 제안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5248">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5249">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5249">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5250">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5250">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5251">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5251">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5252">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5252">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5253">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5253">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5254">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5254">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5255">값 이름: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5255">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5256">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5256">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5257">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5257">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5258">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5258">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5259">개인 설정 키 이름: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5259">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5260">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5260">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5261">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5261">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5262">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5262">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5263">외부에서 항상 PDF 파일 열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5263">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5264">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5264">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5265">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5265">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5266">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5266">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5267">Microsoft Edge에서 내부 PDF 뷰어를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5267">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5268">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge에서 PDF 파일을 다운로드로 처리하고 사용자가 기본 응용 프로그램을 사용하여 해당 파일을 열 수 있도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5268">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5269">Microsoft Edge가 기본 PDF 판독기인 경우 PDF 파일은 다운로드되지 않습니다. Microsoft Edge에서 계속 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5269">If Microsoft Edge is the default PDF reader, PDF files aren't downloaded and will continue to open in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5270">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge에서 PDF 파일을 엽니다. (사용자가 사용하지 않도록 설정하지 않은 경우)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5270">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5271">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5271">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5272">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5272">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5273">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5273">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5274">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5274">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5275">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5275">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5276">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5276">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5277">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5277">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5278">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5278">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5279">GP 고유 이름: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5279">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5280">GP 이름: 외부에서 항상 PDF 파일 열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5280">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5281">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5281">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5282">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5282">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5283">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5283">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5284">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5284">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5285">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5285">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5286">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5286">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5287">값 이름: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5287">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5288">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5288">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5289">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5289">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5290">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5290">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5291">기본 설정 키 이름: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5291">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5292">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5292">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5293">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5293">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5294">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5294">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5295">InPrivate 및 게스트 프로필에 대한 앰비언트 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5295">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5296">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5296">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5297">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5297">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5298">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5298">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5299">Microsoft Edge에서 InPrivate 및 게스트 프로필에 대해 앰비언트 인증을 허용하거나 허용하지 않도록 해당 정책을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5299">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5300">앰비언트 인증이란 NTLM/Kerberos/협상 챌린지/반응 구성표를 통해 명시적 자격 증명을 제공하지 않을 경우 기본 자격 증명을 사용하는 http 인증입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5300">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5301">'RegularOnly'로 정책을 설정한 경우 정규 세션에 대해서만 앰비언트 인증을 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5301">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5302">InPrivate 및 게스트 세션은 앰비언트 인증을 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5302">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5303">'InPrivateAndRegular'로 정책을 설정한 경우 InPrivate 및 정규 세션에 대해서만 앰비언트 인증을 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5303">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5304">게스트 세션은 앰비언트 인증을 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5304">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5305">'GuestAndRegular'로 정책을 설정한 경우 게스트 및 정규 세션에 대해서만 앰비언트 인증을 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5305">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5306">InPrivate 세션은 앰비언트 인증을 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5306">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5307">‘모두’로 정책을 설정한 경우 모든 세션에 대해서 앰비언트 인증을 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5307">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5308">일반 프로필에는 항상 앰비언트 인증이 허용된다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5308">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5309">Microsoft Edge 81버전 이상에서 해당 정책이 설정되지 않으면 앰비언트 인증은 정규 세션에 대해서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5309">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5310">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5310">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5311">RegularOnly (0) = 정규 세션에서만 앰비언트 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5311">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5312">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = InPrivate 및 정규 세션에서 앰비언트 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5312">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5313">GuestAndRegular (2) = 게스트 및 정규 세션에서 앰비언트 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5313">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5314">모두 (3) = 정규, InPrivate 및 게스트 세션에서 앰비언트 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5314">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5315">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5315">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5316">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5316">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5317">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5317">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5318">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5318">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5319">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5319">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5320">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5320">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5321">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5321">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5322">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5322">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5323">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5323">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5324">GP 이름: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5324">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5325">GP 이름: InPrivate 및 게스트 프로필에 대한 앰비언트 인증 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5325">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5326">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5326">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5327">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5327">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5328">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5328">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5329">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5329">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5330">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5330">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5331">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5331">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5332">값 이름: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5332">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5333">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5333">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5334">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5334">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5335">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5335">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5336">기본 설정 키 이름: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5336">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5337">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5337">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5338">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5338">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5339">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5339">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5340">AppCache 기능이 기본적으로 해제되어 있더라도 다시 사용할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5340">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5341">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5341">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5342">Windows 및 MacOS(84 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5342">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5343">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5343">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5344">이 정책을 true로 설정하면 기본적으로 Microsoft Edge의 AppCache를 사용할 수 없는 경우에도 AppCache가 활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5344">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5345">이 정책을 false로 설정하거나 아무것도 설정하지 않으면 AppCache가 Microsoft Edge의 기본값을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5345">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5346">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5346">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5347">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5347">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5348">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5348">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5349">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5349">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5350">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5350">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5351">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5351">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5352">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5352">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5353">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5353">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5354">GP 고유 이름: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5354">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5355">GP 이름: AppCache 기능이 기본적으로 해제되어 있더라도 다시 사용할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5355">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5356">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5356">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5357">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5357">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5358">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5358">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5359">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5359">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5360">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5360">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5361">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5361">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5362">값 이름: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5362">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5363">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5363">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5364">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5364">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5365">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5365">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5366">기본 설정 키 이름: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5366">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5367">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5367">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5368">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5368">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5369">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5369">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5370">응용 프로그램 로캘 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5370">Set application locale</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5371">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5371">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5372">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5372">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5373">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5373">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5374">Microsoft Edge에서 응용 프로그램 로캘을 구성하고 사용자가 로캘을 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5374">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5375">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge에서 지정된 로캘을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5375">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5376">구성된 로캘이 지원되지 않는 경우 대신 'en-US'가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5376">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5377">해당 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용자가 지정한 기본 설정 로캘 (구성된 경우) 또는 대체 로캘 'en-US' 중 하나를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5377">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5378">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5378">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5379">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5379">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5380">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5380">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5381">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5381">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5382">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5382">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5383">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5383">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5384">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5384">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5385">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5385">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>
