  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5386">GP 고유 이름: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5386">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5387">GP 이름: 응용 프로그램 로캘 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5387">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5388">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5388">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5389">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5389">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5390">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5390">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5391">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5391">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5392">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5392">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5393">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5393">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5394">값 이름: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5394">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5395">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5395">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5396">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5396">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5397">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5397">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5398">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5398">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5399">오디오 캡처 허용 또는 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5399">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5400">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5400">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5401">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5401">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5402">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5402">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5403">사용자에게 오디오 캡처 장치에 대한 웹 사이트 액세스 권한을 부여할지 여부를 설정하도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5403">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5404">해당 정책은 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 목록에 구성된 URL을 제외한 모든 URL에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5404">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5405">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 (기본 설정) 사용자에게 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 목록의 URL 외에 오디오 캡처 액세스를 선택하라는 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5405">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5406">목록에 나열된 URL에는 메시지가 표시되지 않고 액세스 권한이 부여됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5406">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5407">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 사용자에게 메시지가 표시되지 않고 [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls)에서 구성된 URL로만 오디오 캡처에 액세스할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5407">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5408">해당 정책은 내장형 마이크 뿐만 아니라 모든 유형의 오디오 입력에 영향을 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5408">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5409">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5409">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5410">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5410">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5411">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5411">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5412">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5412">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5413">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5413">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5414">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5414">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5415">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5415">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5416">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5416">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5417">GP 고유 이름: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5417">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5418">GP 이름: 오디오 캡처 허용 또는 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5418">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5419">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5419">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5420">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5420">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5421">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5421">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5422">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5422">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5423">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5423">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5424">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5424">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5425">값 이름: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5425">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5426">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5426">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5427">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5427">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5428">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5428">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5429">기본 설정 키 이름: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5429">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5430">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5430">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5431">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5431">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5432">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5432">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5433">권한 요청 없이 오디오 캡처 장치에 액세스할 수 있는 사이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5433">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5434">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5434">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5435">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5435">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5436">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5436">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5437">사용자에게 사용 권한을 묻지 않고 오디오 캡처 장치를 사용할 수 있는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 웹 사이트를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5437">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5438">해당 목록의 패턴은 요청 URL의 보안 원본과 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5438">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5439">일치하는 경우 자동으로 오디오 캡처 장치에 대한 액세스 권한이 부여됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5439">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5440">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5440">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5441">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5441">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5442">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5442">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5443">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5443">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5444">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5444">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5445">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5445">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5446">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5446">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5447">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5447">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5448">GP 고유 이름: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5448">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5449">GP 이름: 권한 요청 없이 오디오 캡처 장치에 액세스할 수 있는 사이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5449">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5450">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5450">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5451">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5451">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5452">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5452">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5453">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5453">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5454">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5454">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5455">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5455">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5456">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5456">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5457">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5457">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5458">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5458">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5459">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5459">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5460">기본 설정 키 이름: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5460">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5461">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5461">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5462">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5462">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5463">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5463">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5464">오디오 샌드박스 실행 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5464">Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5465">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5465">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5466">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5466">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5467">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5467">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5468">해당 정책은 오디오 프로세스 샌드박스를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5468">This policy controls the audio process sandbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5469">해당 정책을 사용하면 오디오 프로세스는 샌드 박싱된 상태에서 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5469">If you enable this policy, the audio process will run sandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5470">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 오디오 프로세스가 샌드박싱되지 않은 상태에서 실행되고 WebRTC 오디오 처리 모듈은 렌더러 프로세스에서 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5470">If you disable this policy, the audio process will run unsandboxed and the WebRTC audio-processing module will run in the renderer process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5471">이 경우 사용자가 오디오 하위 시스템을 샌드박싱되지 않은 상태에서 실행하는 것과 관련된 보안 위험에 노출된 채로 있게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5471">This leaves users open to security risks related to running the audio subsystem unsandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5472">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 플랫폼에 따라 다를 수 있는 오디오 샌드박스의 기본 구성이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5472">If you don't configure this policy, the default configuration for the audio sandbox will be used, which might differ based on the platform.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5473">해당 정책은 사용자가 샌드박스를 방해하는 보안 소프트웨어 설정을 사용하는 경우 엔터프라이즈에 해당 오디오 샌드박스를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 유연성을 제공하는 데 그 목적이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5473">This policy is intended to give enterprises flexibility to disable the audio sandbox if they use security software setups that interfere with the sandbox.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5474">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5474">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5475">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5475">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5476">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5476">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5477">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5477">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5478">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5478">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5479">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5479">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5480">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5480">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5481">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5481">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5482">GP 고유 이름: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5482">GP unique name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5483">GP 이름: 오디오 샌드박스 실행 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5483">GP name: Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5484">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5484">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5485">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5485">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5486">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5486">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5487">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5487">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5488">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5488">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5489">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5489">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5490">값 이름: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5490">Value Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5491">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5491">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5492">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5492">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5493">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5493">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5494">기본 설정 키 이름: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5494">Preference Key Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5495">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5495">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5496">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5496">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5497">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5497">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5498">처음 실행 시 다른 브라우저의 데이터 및 설정 자동으로 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5498">Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5499">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5499">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5500">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5500">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5501">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5501">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5502">해당 정책을 사용하면 지정된 브라우저에서 지원되는 모든 데이터 형식 및 설정을 처음 실행 시 자동으로 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5502">If you enable this policy, all supported datatypes and settings from the specified browser will be silently and automatically imported at first run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5503">처음 실행 환경에서는 가져오기 섹션도 건너뜁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5503">During the First Run Experience, the import section will also be skipped.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5504">Microsoft Edge 레거시의 브라우저 데이터는 항상 해당 정책 값에 상관 없이 처음 실행 시 자동으로 마이그레이션됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5504">The browser data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will always be silently migrated at the first run, irrespective of the value of this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5505">해당 정책을 'FromDefaultBrowser'로 설정하면 관리 장치의 기본 브라우저에 해당하는 데이터 형식을 가져오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5505">If this policy is set to 'FromDefaultBrowser', then the datatypes corresponding to the default browser on the managed device will be imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5506">해당 정책의 값으로 지정된 브라우저가 관리된 장치에 없으면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용자에게 알림 없이 간단히 가져오기를 건너뜁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5506">If the browser specified as the value of this policy is not present in the managed device, Microsoft Edge will simply skip the import without any notification to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5507">해당 정책을 'DisabledAutoImport'로 설정하면 처음 실행 환경의 가져오기 섹션을 완전히 건너뛰고 Microsoft Edge에서 브라우저 데이터 및 설정을 자동으로 가져오지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5507">If you set this policy to 'DisabledAutoImport', the import section of the first-run experience is skipped entirely and Microsoft Edge doesn't import browser data and settings automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5508">해당 정책을 'FromInternetExplorer' 값으로 설정하면 Internet Explorer에서 다음 데이터 형식을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5508">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromInternetExplorer', the following datatypes will be imported from Internet Explorer:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5509">즐겨찾기 또는 책갈피</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5509">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5510">저장된 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5510">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5511">검색 엔진</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5511">Search engines</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5512">검색 기록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5512">Browsing history</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5513">홈페이지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5513">Home page</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5514">해당 정책을 'FromGoogleChrome' 값으로 설정하면 Google Chrome에서 다음 데이터 형식을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5514">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromGoogleChrome', the following datatypes will be imported from Google Chrome:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5515">즐겨찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5515">Favorites</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5516">저장된 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5516">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5517">주소 및 기타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5517">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5518">결제 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5518">Payment info</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5519">검색 기록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5519">Browsing history</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5520">설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5520">Settings</span></span>
7. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5521">탭 고정 및 열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5521">Pinned and Open tabs</span></span>
8. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5522">Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5522">Extensions</span></span>
9. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5523">쿠키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5523">Cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5524">참고: Google Chrome에서 가져오는 데이터 형식에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5524">Note: For more details on what is imported from Google Chrome, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5525">이 정책을 'FromSafari' 값으로 설정하면 사용자 데이터를 더 이상 Microsoft Edge로 가져오지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5525">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromSafari', user data is no longer imported into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5526">이것은 전체 디스크 액세스가 Mac에서 작동하는 방식 때문입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5526">This is due to the way Full Disk Access works on Mac.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5527">MacOS Mojave 이상에서는 더 이상 Safari 데이터를 Microsoft Edge에 자동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5527">On macOS Mojave and above, it's no longer possible to have automated and unattended import of Safari data into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5528">Microsoft Edge 버전 83에서 시작하는 경우 해당 정책을 'FromMozillaFirefox' 값으로 설정하면 Mozilla Firefox에서 다음 데이터 형식을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5528">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 83, if this policy is set to the value of 'FromMozillaFirefox', the following datatypes will be imported from Mozilla Firefox:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5529">즐겨찾기 또는 책갈피</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5529">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5530">저장된 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5530">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5531">주소 및 기타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5531">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5532">검색 기록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5532">Browsing History</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5533">관리된 장치에서 특정 데이터 형식을 가져오지 못하도록 제한하려면 [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites) 등의 다른 정책과 함께 해당 정책을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5533">If you want to restrict specific datatypes from getting imported on the managed devices, you can use this policy with other policies such as [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), and etc.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5534">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5534">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5535">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = 기본 브라우저에서 지원되는 모든 데이터 형식 및 설정을 자동으로 가져옴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5535">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from the default browser</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5536">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Internet Explorer에서 지원되는 모든 데이터 형식 및 설정을 자동으로 가져옴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5536">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Internet Explorer</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5537">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Google Chrome에서 지원되는 모든 데이터 형식 및 설정을 자동으로 가져옴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5537">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Google Chrome</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5538">FromSafari (3) = Safari에서 지원되는 모든 데이터 형식 및 설정을 자동으로 가져옴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5538">FromSafari (3) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Safari</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5539">DisabledAutoImport (4) = 자동 가져오기 기능을 사용하지 않으며 처음 실행 환경의 가져오기 섹션을 건너뜀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5539">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disables automatic import, and the import section of the first-run experience is skipped</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5540">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Mozilla Firefox에서 지원되는 모든 데이터 형식 및 설정을 자동으로 가져옴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5540">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Mozilla Firefox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5541">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5541">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5542">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5542">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5543">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5543">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5544">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5544">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5545">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5545">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5546">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5546">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5547">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5547">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5548">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5548">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5549">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5549">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5550">GP 고유 이름: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5550">GP unique name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5551">GP 이름: 처음 실행 시 다른 브라우저의 데이터 및 설정 자동으로 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5551">GP name: Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5552">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5552">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5553">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5553">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5554">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5554">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5555">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5555">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5556">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5556">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5557">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5557">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5558">값 이름: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5558">Value Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5559">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5559">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5560">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5560">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5561">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5561">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5562">기본 설정 키 이름: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5562">Preference Key Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5563">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5563">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5564">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5564">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5565">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5565">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5566">사용자에게 묻지 않고 목록에 있는 원본에서 외부 응용 프로그램을 실행할 수 있는 프로토콜 목록 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5566">Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5567">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5567">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5568">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5568">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5569">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5569">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5570">사용자에게 묻지 않고 외부 응용 프로그램을 시작할 수 있는 프로토콜 목록과 각 프로토콜에 대해 허용된 원본 패턴의 관련 목록을 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5570">Allows you to set a list of protocols, and for each protocol an associated list of allowed origin patterns, that can launch an external application without prompting the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5571">프로토콜을 나열하는 경우 후행 구분 기호를 포함하면 안 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5571">The trailing separator should not be included when listing the protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5572">예를 들어 "skype:" 또는 "skype://" 대신 "skype"를 나열합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5572">For example, list "skype" instead of "skype:" or "skype://".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5573">이 정책을 구성하는 경우 프로토콜은 다음과 같은 경우에만 정책에서 프롬프트 없이 외부 응용 프로그램을 실행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5573">If you configure this policy, a protocol will only be permitted to launch an external application without prompting by policy if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5574">프로토콜이 나열된 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5574">the protocol is listed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5575">프로토콜을 시작하려는 사이트의 출처가 해당 프로토콜의 allow_origins 목록의 출처 패턴 중 하나와 일치하는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5575">the origin of the site trying to launch the protocol matches one of the origin patterns in that protocol's allowed_origins list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5576">두 조건 중 하나가 해당되지 않는 경우, 정책에 따라 외부 프로토콜 실행 프롬프트가 생략되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5576">If either condition is false, the external protocol launch prompt will not be omitted by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5577">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 프롬프트 없이 어떤 프로토콜도 실행할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5577">If you don't configure this policy, no protocols can launch without a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5578">사용자는 [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) 정책이 비활성화로 설정되지 않는 한 프로토콜별/사이트별로 프롬프트를 선택 해제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5578">Users can opt out of prompts on a per-protocol/per-site basis unless the [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) policy is set to Disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5579">이 정책은 사용자가 설정한 프로토콜별/사이트별 프롬프트 예외에 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5579">This policy has no impact on per-protocol/per-site prompt exemptions set by users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5580">원본 일치 패턴은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)에서 설명하는 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 정책과 유사한 형식을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5580">The origin matching patterns use a similar format to those for the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy, which are documented at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5581">그러나 이 정책에 대한 원본 일치 패턴에는 "/path" 또는 "@query" 요소가 포함될 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5581">However, origin matching patterns for this policy cannot contain "/path" or "@query" elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5582">"/Path" 또는 "@query" 요소가 포함된 모든 패턴은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5582">Any pattern that does contain a "/path" or "@query" element will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5583">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5583">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5584">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5584">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5585">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5585">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5586">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5586">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5587">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5587">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5588">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5588">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5589">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5589">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5590">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5590">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5591">GP 고유 이름: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5591">GP unique name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5592">GP 이름: 사용자에게 묻지 않고 목록에 있는 원본에서 외부 응용 프로그램을 실행할 수 있는 프로토콜 목록 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5592">GP name: Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5593">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5593">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5594">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5594">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5595">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5595">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5596">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5596">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5597">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5597">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5598">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5598">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5599">값 이름: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5599">Value Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5600">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5600">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5601">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5601">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com", 
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ], 
    "protocol": "spotify"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com", 
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "teams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "outlook"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5602">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5602">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [{"allowed_origins": ["example.com", "http://www.example.com:8080"], "protocol": "spotify"}, {"allowed_origins": ["https://example.com", "https://.mail.example.com"], "protocol": "teams"}, {"allowed_origins": ["*"], "protocol": "outlook"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5603">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5603">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5604">기본 설정 키 이름: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5604">Preference Key Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5605">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5605">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5606">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5606">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5607">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5607">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5608">AutoOpenFileTypes를 적용할 수 있는 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5608">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5609">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5609">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5610">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5610">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5611">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5611">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5612">[AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes)가 적용될 URL 목록입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5612">A list of URLs to which [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will apply to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5613">이 정책은 다운로드 선반 ... > "항상 이 유형의 파일을 엽니다" 메뉴 항목을 통해 사용자가 설정한 자동으로 열리는 값에 영향을 미치지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5613">This policy has no impact on automatically open values set by users via the download shelf ... > "Always open files of this type" menu entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5614">이 정책에서 URL을 설정하면 URL이 이 집합의 일부이며 파일 형식이 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes)에 나열된 경우에만 정책에 따라 파일이 자동으로 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5614">If you set URLs in this policy, files will only automatically open by policy if the URL is part of this set and the file type is listed in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5615">두 조건 중 하나가 해당되지 않으면 정책에 따라 다운로드가 자동으로 열리지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5615">If either condition is false, the download won't automatically open by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5616">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 파일 형식이 [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes)인 모든 다운로드가 자동으로 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5616">If you don't set this policy, all downloads where the file type is in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will automatically open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5617">[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)에 따라 URL 패턴의 형식을 지정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5617">A URL pattern has to be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5618">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5618">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5619">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5619">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5620">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5620">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5621">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5621">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5622">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5622">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5623">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5623">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5624">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5624">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5625">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5625">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5626">GP 고유 이름: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5626">GP unique name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5627">GP 이름: AutoOpenFileTypes를 적용할 수 있는 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5627">GP name: URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5628">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5628">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5629">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5629">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5630">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5630">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5631">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5631">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5632">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5632">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5633">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5633">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5634">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5634">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5635">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5635">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5636">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5636">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = "example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5637">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5637">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5638">기본 설정 키 이름: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5638">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5639">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5639">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5640">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5640">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5641">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5641">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5642">다운로드 시 자동으로 열려야 하는 파일 형식 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5642">List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5643">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5643">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5644">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5644">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5645">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5645">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5646">이 정책은 다운로드 시 자동으로 열려야 하는 파일 형식 목록을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5646">This policy sets a list of file types that should be automatically opened on download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5647">참고: 파일 형식을 나열할 때 줄 간격 구분 기호를 포함해서는 안 되므로 ".txt" 대신 "txt" 를 나열해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5647">Note: The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type, so list "txt" instead of ".txt".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5648">기본적으로 이 파일 형식은 모든 URL에서 자동으로 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5648">By default, these file types will be automatically opened on all URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5649">[AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) 정책을 사용하여 이러한 파일 형식이 자동으로 열리는 URL을 제한할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5649">You can use the [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) policy to restrict the URLs for which these file types will be automatically opened on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5650">자동으로 열려야 하는 유형의 파일은 여전히 활성화된 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 검사의 대상이 되며 이러한 검사에 실패하면 열리지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5650">Files with types that should be automatically opened will still be subject to the enabled Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks and won't be opened if they fail those checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5651">사용자가 자동으로 열도록 이미 지정한 파일 형식은 다운로드할 때 계속 수행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5651">File types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will continue to do so when downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5652">사용자가 계속해서 다른 파일 형식을 자동으로 열리도록 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5652">The user will continue to be able to specify other file types to be automatically opened.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5653">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 사용자가 이미 지정한 파일 형식만 다운로드할 때 자동으로 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5653">If you don't set this policy, only file types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will do so when downloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5654">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5654">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5655">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5655">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5656">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5656">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5657">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5657">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5658">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5658">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5659">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5659">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5660">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5660">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5661">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5661">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5662">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5662">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5663">GP 고유 이름: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5663">GP unique name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5664">GP 이름: 다운로드 시 자동으로 열려야 하는 파일 형식 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5664">GP name: List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5665">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5665">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5666">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5666">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5667">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5667">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5668">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5668">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5669">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5669">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5670">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5670">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5671">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5671">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5672">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5672">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5673">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5673">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = "exe"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = "txt"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5674">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5674">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5675">기본 설정 키 이름: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5675">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5676">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5676">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5677">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5677">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5678">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5678">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5679">주소에 자동 채우기 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5679">Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5680">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5680">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5681">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5681">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5682">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5682">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5683">자동 채우기 기능을 사용하도록 설정하면 사용자는 이전에 저장한 정보를 사용하여 웹 양식에서 주소 정보를 자동으로 완성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5683">Enables the AutoFill feature and allows users to auto-complete address information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5684">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 자동 채우기는 주소 정보를 제안하거나 입력하지 않으며 웹을 검색하는 동안 사용자가 제출하는 추가 주소 정보를 저장하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5684">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills in address information, nor does it save additional address information that the user might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5685">해당 정책을 사용하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 사용자 인터페이스에서 주소에 대해 자동 채우기를 제어할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5685">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for addresses in the user interface.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5686">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 결제 및 암호 양식을 제외한 모든 웹 양식에 대한 모든 활동도 중지된다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5686">Note that if you disable this policy you also stop all activity for all web forms, except payment and password forms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5687">추가 항목이 저장되는 것이 아니므로 Microsoft Edge에서 이전 항목을 제안하거나 자동으로 채우지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5687">No further entries are saved, and Microsoft Edge won't suggest or AutoFill any previous entries.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5688">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5688">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5689">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5689">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5690">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5690">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5691">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5691">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5692">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5692">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5693">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5693">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5694">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5694">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5695">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5695">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5696">GP 고유 이름: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5696">GP unique name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5697">GP 이름: 주소에 자동 채우기 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5697">GP name: Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5698">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5698">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5699">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5699">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5700">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5700">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5701">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5701">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5702">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5702">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5703">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5703">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5704">값 이름: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5704">Value Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5705">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5705">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5706">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5706">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5707">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5707">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5708">기본 설정 키 이름: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5708">Preference Key Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5709">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5709">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5710">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5710">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5711">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5711">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5712">신용 카드에 자동 채우기 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5712">Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5713">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5713">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5714">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5714">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5715">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5715">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5716">Microsoft Edge의 자동 채우기 기능을 사용하도록 설정하면 사용자는 이전에 저장한 정보를 사용하여 웹 양식에서 신용 카드 정보를 자동으로 완성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5716">Enables Microsoft Edge's AutoFill feature and lets users auto complete credit card information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5717">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 자동 채우기는 신용 카드 정보를 제안하거나 입력하지 않으며 웹을 검색하는 동안 사용자가 제출하는 추가 신용 카드 정보를 저장하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5717">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills credit card information, nor will it save additional credit card information that users might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5718">해당 정책을 사용하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 신용 카드에 대해 자동 채우기를 제어할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5718">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for credit cards.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5719">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5719">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5720">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5720">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5721">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5721">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5722">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5722">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5723">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5723">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5724">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5724">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5725">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5725">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5726">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5726">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5727">GP 고유 이름: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5727">GP unique name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5728">GP 이름: 신용 카드에 자동 채우기 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5728">GP name: Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5729">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5729">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5730">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5730">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5731">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5731">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5732">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5732">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5733">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5733">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5734">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5734">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5735">값 이름: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5735">Value Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5736">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5736">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5737">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5737">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5738">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5738">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5739">기본 설정 키 이름: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5739">Preference Key Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5740">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5740">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5741">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5741">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5742">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5742">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5743">웹 사이트에 미디어 자동 실행 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5743">Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5744">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5744">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5745">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5745">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5746">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5746">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5747">해당 정책은 웹 사이트에 대한 미디어 자동 실행 정책을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5747">This policy sets the media autoplay policy for websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5748">기본 설정인 "구성되지 않음"은 현재 미디어 자동 실행 설정을 고려하며 사용자가 자동 실행 설정을 구성할 수 있도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5748">The default setting, "Not configured" respects the current media autoplay settings and lets users configure their autoplay settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5749">"사용"으로 설정하면 미디어 자동 실행이 "허용"으로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5749">Setting to "Enabled" sets media autoplay to "Allow".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5750">모든 웹 사이트에서 미디어 자동 실행이 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5750">All websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5751">사용자가 해당 정책을 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5751">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5752">"사용 안 함"으로 설정하면 미디어 자동 실행이 "차단"으로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5752">Setting to "Disabled" sets media autoplay to "Block".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5753">웹 사이트에서 미디어 자동 실행이 차단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5753">No websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5754">사용자가 해당 정책을 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5754">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5755">해당 정책을 적용하려면 탭을 닫았다가 다시 열어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5755">A tab will need to be closed and re-opened for this policy to take effect.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5756">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5756">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5757">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5757">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5758">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5758">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5759">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5759">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5760">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5760">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5761">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5761">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5762">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5762">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5763">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5763">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5764">GP 고유 이름: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5764">GP unique name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5765">GP 이름: 웹 사이트에 미디어 자동 실행 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5765">GP name: Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5766">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5766">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5767">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5767">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5768">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5768">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5769">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5769">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5770">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5770">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5771">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5771">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5772">값 이름: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5772">Value Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5773">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5773">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5774">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5774">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5775">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5775">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5776">기본 설정 키 이름: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5776">Preference Key Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5777">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5777">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5778">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5778">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5779">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5779">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5780">Microsoft Edge 종료 후 백그라운드 앱 계속 실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5780">Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5781">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5781">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5782">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5782">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5783">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5783">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5784">Microsoft Edge 프로세스를 OS 로그인에서 시작하고 마지막 브라우저 창이 닫힌 후 계속 실행할 수 있도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5784">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and keep running after the last browser window is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5785">해당 시나리오에서는 백그라운드 앱과 현재 검색 세션이 세션 쿠키를 포함하여 계속 활성 상태로 유지됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5785">In this scenario, background apps and the current browsing session remain active, including any session cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5786">열려 있는 백그라운드 프로세스는 시스템 트레이에 아이콘을 표시하고 언제 어디서나 종료할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5786">An open background process displays an icon in the system tray and can always be closed from there.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5787">해당 정책을 사용하면 백그라운드 모드가 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5787">If you enable this policy, background mode is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5788">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 백그라운드 모드가 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5788">If you disable this policy, background mode is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5789">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음에 배경 모드가 해제되고 사용자는 edge://settings/system에서 해당 동작을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5789">If you don't configure this policy, background mode is initially turned off, and the user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5790">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5790">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5791">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5791">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5792">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5792">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
