  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5793">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5793">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5794">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5794">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5795">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5795">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5796">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5796">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5797">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5797">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5798">GP 고유 이름: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5798">GP unique name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5799">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge 종료 후 백그라운드 앱 계속 실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5799">GP name: Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5800">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5800">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5801">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5801">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5802">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5802">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5803">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5803">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5804">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5804">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5805">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5805">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5806">값 이름: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5806">Value Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5807">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5807">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5808">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5808">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5809">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5809">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5810">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5810">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5811">서식 파일을 사용하는 컬렉션 및 기타 기능에 대해 사용 가능한 서식 파일 목록의 백그라운드 업데이트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5811">Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5812">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5812">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5813">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5813">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5814">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5814">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5815">서식 파일을 사용하는 컬렉션 및 기타 기능에 대해 사용 가능한 서식 파일 목록의 백그라운드 업데이트를 사용하거나 사용하지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5815">Lets you enable or disable background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5816">서식 파일은 페이지가 컬렉션에 저장될 때 웹 페이지에서 서식 메타 데이터를 추출하기 위해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5816">Templates are used to extract rich metadata from a webpage when the page is saved to a collection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5817">해당 설정을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용 가능한 서식 파일 목록이 Microsoft 서비스의 백그라운드에서 24시간 마다 다운로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5817">If you enable this setting or the setting is unconfigured, the list of available templates will be downloaded in the background from a Microsoft service every 24 hours.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5818">해당 설정을 사용하지 않으면 사용 가능한 서식 파일 목록은 요청 시 다운로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5818">If you disable this setting the list of available templates will be downloaded on demand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5819">해당 유형의 다운로드는 컬렉션 및 기타 기능에 대한 성능을 저하시킬 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5819">This type of download might result in small performance penalties for Collections and other features.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5820">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5820">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5821">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5821">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5822">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5822">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5823">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5823">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5824">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5824">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5825">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5825">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5826">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5826">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5827">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5827">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5828">GP 고유 이름: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5828">GP unique name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5829">GP 이름: 서식 파일을 사용하는 컬렉션 및 기타 기능에 대해 사용 가능한 서식 파일 목록의 백그라운드 업데이트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5829">GP name: Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5830">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5830">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5831">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5831">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5832">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5832">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5833">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5833">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5834">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5834">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5835">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5835">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5836">값 이름: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5836">Value Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5837">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5837">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5838">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5838">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5839">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5839">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5840">기본 설정 키 이름: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5840">Preference Key Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5841">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5841">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5842">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5842">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5843">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5843">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5844">Bing 검색 결과에서 모든 광고 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5844">Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5845">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5845">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5846">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5846">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5847">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5847">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5848">Bing.com에서 광고 없는 검색 환경을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5848">Enables an ad-free search experience on Bing.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5849">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 Bing.com에서 검색하고 광고 없는 검색 환경을 이용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5849">If you enable this policy, then a user can search on bing.com and have an ad-free search experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5850">동시에 유해 정보 차단 설정은 '고급'으로 설정되고 사용자가 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5850">At the same time, the SafeSearch setting will be set to 'Strict' and can't be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5851">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본 환경은 Bing.com에서 검색 결과에 광고를 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5851">If you don't configure this policy, then the default experience will have ads in the search results on bing.com.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5852">유해 정보 차단 기능은 기본적으로 '보통'으로 설정되며 사용자가 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5852">SafeSearch will be set to 'Moderate' by default and can be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5853">해당 정책은 Microsoft에서 EDU 테넌트로 식별된 K-12 SKU에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5853">This policy is only available for K-12 SKUs that are identified as EDU tenants by Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5854">해당 정책에 대한 자세한 내용 또는 다음의 시나리오를 사용자에게 적용하려면 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5854">Please refer to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) to learn more about this policy or if the following scenarios apply to you:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5855">.EDU 테넌트가 있으면 해당 정책이 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5855">You have an EDU tenant, but the policy doesn't work.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5856">광고 무료 검색 환경을 위한 IP 허용 목록이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5856">You had your IP allowlisted for having an ad free search experience.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5857">Microsoft Edge 레거시에서 광고 없는 검색 환경을 사용하고 있으며 새 버전의 Microsoft Edge로 업그레이드해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5857">You were experiencing an ad-free search experience on Microsoft Edge Legacy and want to upgrade to the new version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5858">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5858">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5859">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5859">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5860">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5860">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5861">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5861">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5862">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5862">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5863">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5863">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5864">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5864">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5865">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5865">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5866">GP 고유 이름: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5866">GP unique name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5867">GP 이름: Bing 검색 결과에서 모든 광고 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5867">GP name: Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5868">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5868">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5869">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5869">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5870">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5870">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5871">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5871">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5872">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5872">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5873">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5873">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5874">값 이름: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5874">Value Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5875">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5875">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5876">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5876">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5877">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5877">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5878">기본 설정 키 이름: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5878">Preference Key Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5879">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5879">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5880">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5880">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5881">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5881">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5882">타사 쿠키 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5882">Block third party cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5883">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5883">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5884">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5884">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5885">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5885">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5886">주소 표시줄에 있는 도메인에서 나오지 않은 웹 페이지 요소를 차단하여 쿠키를 설정하지 않도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5886">Block web page elements that aren't from the domain that's in the address bar from setting cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5887">해당 정책을 사용하면 주소 표시줄에 있는 도메인에서 나오지 않은 웹 페이지 요소로 쿠키를 설정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5887">If you enable this policy, web page elements that are not from the domain that is in the address bar can't set cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5888">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 주소 표시줄에 있는 도메인 외에서 나온 웹 페이지 요소로 쿠키를 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5888">If you disable this policy, web page elements from domains other than in the address bar can set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5889">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 타사 쿠키를 사용할 수 있지만 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5889">If you don't configure this policy, third-party cookies are enabled but users can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5890">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5890">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5891">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5891">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5892">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5892">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5893">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5893">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5894">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5894">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5895">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5895">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5896">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5896">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5897">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5897">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5898">GP 고유 이름: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5898">GP unique name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5899">GP 이름: 타사 쿠키 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5899">GP name: Block third party cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5900">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5900">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5901">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5901">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5902">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5902">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5903">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5903">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5904">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5904">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5905">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5905">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5906">값 이름: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5906">Value Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5907">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5907">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5908">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5908">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5909">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5909">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5910">기본 설정 키 이름: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5910">Preference Key Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5911">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5911">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5912">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5912">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5913">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5913">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5914">ID 플라이아웃 메뉴 또는 설정 페이지에서 프로필 만들기 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5914">Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5915">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5915">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5916">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5916">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5917">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5917">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5918">사용자가 **프로필 추가** 옵션을 사용하여 새 프로필을 만들도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5918">Allows users to create new profiles, using the **Add profile** option.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5919">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용자가 ID 플라이 아웃 메뉴 또는 설정 페이지에서 **프로필 추가**를 사용하여 새 프로필을 만들 수 있도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5919">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge allows users to use **Add profile** on the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page to create new profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5920">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 ID 플라이 아웃 메뉴 또는 설정 페이지에서 새 프로필을 추가할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5920">If you disable this policy, users cannot add new profiles from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5921">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5921">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5922">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5922">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5923">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5923">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5924">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5924">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5925">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5925">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5926">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5926">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5927">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5927">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5928">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5928">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5929">GP 고유 이름: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5929">GP unique name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5930">GP 이름: ID 플라이아웃 메뉴 또는 설정 페이지에서 프로필 만들기 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5930">GP name: Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5931">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5931">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5932">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5932">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5933">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5933">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5934">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5934">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5935">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5935">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5936">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5936">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5937">값 이름: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5937">Value Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5938">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5938">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5939">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5939">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5940">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5940">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5941">기본 설정 키 이름: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5941">Preference Key Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5942">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5942">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5943">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5943">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5944">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5944">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5945">게스트 모드 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5945">Enable guest mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5946">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5946">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5947">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5947">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5948">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5948">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5949">Microsoft Edge에서 게스트 프로필을 사용할 수 있도록 옵션을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5949">Enable the option to allow the use of guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5950">게스트 프로필에서 브라우저는 기존 프로필에서 검색 데이터를 가져오지 않으며 모든 게스트 프로필이 닫히면 검색 데이터를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5950">In a guest profile, the browser doesn't import browsing data from existing profiles, and it deletes browsing data when all guest profiles are closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5951">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용자가 게스트 프로필을 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5951">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge lets users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5952">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용자가 게스트 프로필을 검색할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5952">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't let users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5953">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5953">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5954">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5954">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5955">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5955">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5956">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5956">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5957">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5957">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5958">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5958">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5959">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5959">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5960">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5960">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5961">GP 고유 이름: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5961">GP unique name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5962">GP 이름: 게스트 모드 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5962">GP name: Enable guest mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5963">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5963">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5964">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5964">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5965">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5965">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5966">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5966">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5967">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5967">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5968">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5968">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5969">값 이름: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5969">Value Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5970">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5970">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5971">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5971">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5972">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5972">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5973">기본 설정 키 이름: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5973">Preference Key Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5974">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5974">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5975">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5975">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5976">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5976">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5977">브라우저 네트워크 시간 서비스에 쿼리 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5977">Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5978">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5978">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5979">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5979">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5980">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5980">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5981">Microsoft Edge가 경우에 따라 브라우저 네트워크 시간 서비스에 쿼리를 전송하는 것을 방지하여 정확한 타임 스탬프를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5981">Prevents Microsoft Edge from occasionally sending queries to a browser network time service to retrieve an accurate timestamp.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5982">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge가 브라우저 네트워크 시간 서비스에 대한 쿼리 전송을 중지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5982">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will stop sending queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-5983">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 경우에 따라 브라우저 네트워크 시간 서비스에 쿼리를 전송합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5983">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will occasionally send queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5984">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5984">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5985">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5985">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5986">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5986">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5987">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5987">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5988">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5988">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5989">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5989">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5990">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5990">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5991">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5991">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5992">GP 고유 이름: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5992">GP unique name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5993">GP 이름: 브라우저 네트워크 시간 서비스에 쿼리 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5993">GP name: Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5994">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5994">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5995">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5995">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5996">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5996">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5997">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5997">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5998">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5998">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-5999">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-5999">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6000">값 이름: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6000">Value Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6001">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6001">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6002">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6002">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6003">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6003">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6004">기본 설정 키 이름: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6004">Preference Key Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6005">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6005">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6006">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6006">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6007">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6007">BrowserSignin</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6008">브라우저 로그인 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6008">Browser sign-in settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6009">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6009">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6010">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6010">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6011">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6011">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6012">사용자가 계정으로 Microsoft Edge에 로그인하고 동기화 및 SSO(Single Sign-On)과 같은 계정 관련 서비스를 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6012">Specify whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with their account and use account-related services like sync and single sign on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6013">동기화 가용성을 제어하려면 대신 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 정책을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6013">To control the availability of sync, use the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6014">해당 정책을 '사용 안 함'으로 설정하는 경우 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 정책은 브라우저 프로필에서 자동으로 로그인 생성을 하지 못하도록 설정하므로 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 정책도 사용하지 않도록 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6014">If you set this policy to 'Disable', make sure that you also set the [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) policy to disabled because [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disables the creation of an automatically signed in browser profile.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6015">두 정책 모두 설정된 경우 Microsoft Edge에서 [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) 정책이 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우처럼 '브라우저 로그인 사용 안 함' 정책을 사용하고 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6015">If both policies are set, Microsoft Edge will use the 'Disable browser sign-in' policy and behave as if [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) is set to disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6016">해당 정책을 '사용'으로 설정하면 사용자는 브라우저에 로그인할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6016">If you set this policy to 'Enable', users can sign into the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6017">브라우저에 로그인할 수 있다고 해서 기본적으로 동기화가 설정되어 있음을 의미하지는 않습니다. 사용자가 별도로 옵트인하여해당 기능을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6017">Signing into the browser doesn't mean that sync is turned on by default; the user must separately opt-in to use this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6018">해당 정책을 '강제'로 설정하는 경우 사용자는 브라우저를 사용하려면 프로필에 로그인해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6018">If you set this policy to 'Force', users must sign into a profile to use the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6019">기본적으로 해당 기능을 사용하면 도메인 관리자가 동기화를 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 정책을 사용하지 않는 한 사용자는 계정에 동기화할지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6019">By default, this will allow the user to choose whether they want to sync to their account, unless sync is disabled by the domain admin or with the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6020">[BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) 정책의 기본값은 False로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6020">The default value of [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) policy is set to false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6021">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 브라우저 로그인 옵션을 사용하도록 설정하고 해당 옵션을 사용할 것인지 여부를 결정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6021">If you don't configure this policy users can decide if they want to enable the browser sign-in option and use it as they see fit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6022">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6022">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6023">사용 안 함 (0) = 브라우저 로그인 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6023">Disable (0) = Disable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6024">사용 (1) = 브라우저 로그인 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6024">Enable (1) = Enable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6025">강제 (2) = 사용자가 브라우저를 사용하도록 강제 로그인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6025">Force (2) = Force users to sign-in to use the browser</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6026">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6026">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6027">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6027">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6028">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6028">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6029">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6029">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6030">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6030">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6031">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6031">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6032">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6032">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6033">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6033">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6034">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6034">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6035">GP 고유 이름: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6035">GP unique name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6036">GP 이름: 브라우저 로그인 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6036">GP name: Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6037">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6037">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6038">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6038">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6039">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6039">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6040">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6040">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6041">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6041">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6042">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6042">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6043">값 이름: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6043">Value Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6044">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6044">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6045">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6045">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6046">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6046">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6047">기본 설정 키 이름: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6047">Preference Key Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6048">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6048">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6049">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6049">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6050">BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6050">BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6051">데이터 수명 설정 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6051">Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6052">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6052">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6053">Windows 및 macOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6053">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6054">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6054">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6055">Microsoft Edge에 대한 검색 데이터 수명 설정을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6055">Configures browsing data lifetime settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6056">이 정책은 선택한 검색 데이터의 수명을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6056">This policy controls the lifetime of selected browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6057">동기화를 사용하도록 설정한 경우 해당 정책은 효과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6057">This policy has no effect if Sync is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6058">사용 가능한 데이터 형식은 'browsing_history', 'download_history', 'cookies_and_other_site_data', 'cached_images_and_files', 'password_signin', 'autofill', 'site_settings' 및 'hosted_app_data'입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6058">The available data types are the 'browsing_history', 'download_history', 'cookies_and_other_site_data', 'cached_images_and_files', 'password_signin', 'autofill', 'site_settings' and 'hosted_app_data'.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6059">Microsoft Edge는 'time_to_live_in_hours'보다 오래된 선택한 유형의 데이터를 정기적으로 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6059">Microsoft Edge will regularly remove data of selected types that is older than 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6060">데이터 삭제는 특정 간격을 두고 시행되므로 일부 데이터는 좀 더 오래 보관될 수 있지만 예상 ‘time_to_live_in_hours’보다 두 배 이상 오래 보관되지는 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6060">Because data deletion only happens at certain intervals, some data might be kept slightly longer but never more than twice its expected 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6061">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6061">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6062">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6062">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6063">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6063">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6064">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6064">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6065">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6065">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6066">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6066">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6067">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6067">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6068">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6068">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6069">GP 고유 이름: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6069">GP unique name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6070">GP 이름: 검색 데이터 수명 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6070">GP name: Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6071">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6071">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6072">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6072">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6073">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6073">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6074">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6074">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6075">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6075">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6076">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6076">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6077">값 이름: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6077">Value Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6078">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6078">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6079">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6079">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [
  {
    "data_types": [
      "browsing_history"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 24
  }, 
  {
    "data_types": [
      "password_signin", 
      "autofill"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 12
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6080">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6080">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [{"data_types": ["browsing_history"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 24}, {"data_types": ["password_signin", "autofill"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 12}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6081">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6081">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6082">기본 설정 키 이름: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6082">Preference Key Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6083">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6083">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>BrowsingDataLifetime</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>browsing_history</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>24</integer>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>password_signin</string>
      <string>autofill</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>12</integer>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6084">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6084">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6085">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6085">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6086">기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6086">Use built-in DNS client</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6087">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6087">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6088">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6088">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6089">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6089">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6090">기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트를 사용할지 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6090">Controls whether to use the built-in DNS client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6091">이 정책은 DNS 서버(운영 체제 DNS 클라이언트 또는 Microsoft Edge의 기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트)와 통신하는 데 사용되는 소프트웨어 스택을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6091">This policy controls which software stack is used to communicate with the DNS server: the operating system DNS client, or Microsoft Edge's built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6092">이 정책은 사용되는 DNS 서버에 영향을 주지 않습니다. 예를 들어 운영 체제가 엔터프라이즈 DNS 서버를 사용하도록 구성된 경우 기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트에서 동일한 서버를 사용하게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6092">This policy does not affect which DNS servers are used: if, for example, the operating system is configured to use an enterprise DNS server, that same server would be used by the built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6093">또한 DNS-over-HTTPS가 사용되는지도 제어하지 않습니다. Microsoft Edge는 항상 DNS-over-HTTPS 요청에 대해 기본 제공 확인자를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6093">It also does not control if DNS-over-HTTPS is used; Microsoft Edge always uses the built-in resolver for DNS-over-HTTPS requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6094">DNS-over-HTTPS 제어에 대한 자세한 내용은 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) 정책을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6094">Please see the [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) policy for information on controlling DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6095">해당 정책을 사용하면 기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트(사용 가능한 경우)가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6095">If you enable this policy, the built-in DNS client is used, if it's available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6096">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트는 DNS-over-HTTPS를 사용 중일 때만 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6096">If you disable this policy, the built-in DNS client is only used when DNS-over-HTTPS is in use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6097">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본값으로 기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트가 사용하도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6097">If you don't configure this policy, the built-in DNS client is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6098">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6098">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6099">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6099">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6100">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6100">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6101">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6101">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6102">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6102">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6103">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6103">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6104">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6104">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6105">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6105">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6106">GP 고유 이름: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6106">GP unique name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6107">GP 이름: 기본 제공 DNS 클라이언트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6107">GP name: Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6108">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6108">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6109">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6109">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6110">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6110">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6111">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6111">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6112">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6112">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6113">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6113">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6114">값 이름: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6114">Value Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6115">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6115">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6116">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6116">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6117">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6117">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6118">기본 설정 키 이름: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6118">Preference Key Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6119">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6119">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6120">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6120">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6121">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6121">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6122">서버 인증서를 확인하는 데 기본 제공 인증서 검증 도구를 사용할지 여부 결정(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6122">Determines whether the built-in certificate verifier will be used to verify server certificates (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-6123">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6123">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6124">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6124">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6125">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6125">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6126">MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6126">On macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6127">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6127">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6128">이 정책은 엔터프라이즈에 환경을 업데이트할 수 있는 더 많은 시간을 제공하고, 기본 제공 인증서 확인자와 호환되지 않는 경우 문제를 보고하는 단기 메커니즘으로만 제공되므로 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6128">This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments and report issues if they are found to be incompatible with the built-in certificate verifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6129">Mac OS X에서 레거시 인증서 검증 도구에 대한 지원을 제거할 예정인 경우 Microsoft Edge 버전 87에서는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6129">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 87, when support for the legacy certificate verifier on Mac OS X is planned to be removed.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6130">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6130">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6131">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6131">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6132">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6132">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6133">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6133">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6134">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6134">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6135">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6135">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6136">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6136">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6137">기본 설정 키 이름: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6137">Preference Key Name: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6138">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6138">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6139">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6139">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6140">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6140">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6141">subjectPublicKeyInfo 해시 목록에 대한 인증서 투명도 적용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6141">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6142">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6142">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6143">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6143">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6144">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6144">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6145">subjectPublicKeyInfo 해시 목록에 대한 인증서 투명도 요구 사항의 적용을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6145">Disables enforcement of Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6146">해당 정책을 사용하면 지정된 subjectPublicKeyInfo 해시 중 하나를 사용하는 인증서를 포함한 인증서 체인에 대해 인증서 투명성 공개 요구 사항을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6146">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6147">이 경우 인증서가 제대로 공개되지 않았으므로 신뢰할 수 없어도 엔터프라이즈 호스트에 계속 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6147">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed to still be used for Enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6148">해당 정책을 설정했을 때 인증서 투명성 적용을 사용하지 않으려면 다음 조건 중 하나를 충족해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6148">To disable Certificate Transparency enforcement when this policy is set, one of the following sets of conditions must be met:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6149">해시는 서버 인증서의 subjectPublicKeyInf에 대한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6149">The hash is of the server certificate's subjectPublicKeyInfo.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6150">해시는 인증서 체인의 CA 인증서에 표시되는 subjectPublicKeyInfo에 대한 것이며 CA 인증서는 X.509v3 nameConstraints 확장을 통해 제한되고 하나 이상의 directoryName nameConstraints는 permittedSubtrees에 존재하며 directoryName에 organizationName 특성이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6150">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, that CA certificate is constrained via the X.509v3 nameConstraints extension, one or more directoryName nameConstraints are present in the permittedSubtrees, and the directoryName contains an organizationName attribute.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6151">해시는 인증서 체인의 CA 인증서에 표시되는 subjectPublicKeyInfo에 대한 것이며 CA 인증서는 인증서 Subject의 organizationName 특성을 하나 이상 가지고 서버 인증서에는 동일한 수의 organizationName 특성이 동일한 순서로 포함되며 byte-for-byte의 동일한 값이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6151">The hash is of a subjectPublicKeyInfo that appears in a CA certificate in the certificate chain, the CA certificate has one or more organizationName attributes in the certificate Subject, and the server's certificate contains the same number of organizationName attributes, in the same order, and with byte-for-byte identical values.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6152">subjectPublicKeyInfo 해시는 해시 알고리즘 이름인 "/" 문자를 연결하여 지정되며 해시 알고리즘의 Base64 인코딩은 지정된 인증서의 DER 인코딩 subjectPublicKeyInfo에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6152">A subjectPublicKeyInfo hash is specified by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6153">해당 Base64 인코딩은 RFC 7469, 섹션 2.4에 정의된 대로 SPKI 지문과 같은 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6153">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6154">인식할 수 없는 해시 알고리즘은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6154">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6155">이번에 유일하게 지원된 해시 알고리즘은 "sha256"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6155">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6156">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 인증서 투명성을 통해 공개하도록 요구되는 모든 인증서가 인증서 투명성 정책에 따라 공개되지 않은 경우 신뢰할 수 없는 것으로 처리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6156">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6157">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6157">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6158">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6158">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6159">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6159">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6160">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6160">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6161">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6161">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6162">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6162">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6163">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6163">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6164">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6164">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6165">GP 고유 이름: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6165">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6166">GP 이름: subjectPublicKeyInfo 해시 목록에 대한 인증서 투명도 적용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6166">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6167">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6167">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6168">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6168">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6169">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6169">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6170">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6170">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6171">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6171">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6172">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6172">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6173">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6173">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6174">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6174">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6175">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6175">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6176">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6176">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6177">기본 설정 키 이름: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6177">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6178">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6178">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6179">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6179">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6180">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6180">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6181">레거시 인증 기관 목록에 대한 인증서 투명도 적용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6181">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6182">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6182">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6183">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6183">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6184">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6184">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6185">레거시 인증 기관(Cas) 목록에 대한 인증서 투명도 적용을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6185">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for a list of legacy certificate authorities (Cas).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6186">해당 정책을 사용하면 지정된 subjectPublicKeyInfo 해시 중 하나를 사용하는 인증서를 포함한 인증서 체인에 대해 인증서 투명성 공개 요구 사항을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6186">This policy lets you disable Certificate Transparency disclosure requirements for certificate chains that contain certificates with one of the specified subjectPublicKeyInfo hashes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6187">이 경우 인증서가 제대로 공개되지 않았으므로 신뢰할 수 없어도 엔터프라이즈 호스트에 계속 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6187">This allows certificates that would otherwise be untrusted because they were not properly publicly disclosed, continue to be used for enterprise hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6188">인증서 투명성 적용을 사용하지 않도록 설정하려면 레거시 인증 기관(CA)으로 인식되는 CA 인증서에 표시되는 subjectPublicKeyInfo에 해시를 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6188">In order for Certificate Transparency enforcement to be disabled, you must set the hash to a subjectPublicKeyInfo appearing in a CA certificate that is recognized as a legacy certificate authority (CA).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6189">레거시 CA는 Microsoft Edge에서 지원하는 하나 이상의 운영 체제에서 기본적으로 공개적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 CA입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6189">A legacy CA is a CA that has been publicly trusted by default by one or more operating systems supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6190">사용자는 해시 알고리즘 이름인 "/" 문자를 연결하여 지정되는 subjectPublicKeyInfo 해시를 지정하고 해시 알고리즘의 Base64 인코딩은 지정된 인증서의 DER 인코딩 subjectPublicKeyInfo에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6190">You specify a subjectPublicKeyInfo hash by concatenating the hash algorithm name, the "/" character, and the Base64 encoding of that hash algorithm applied to the DER-encoded subjectPublicKeyInfo of the specified certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6191">해당 Base64 인코딩은 RFC 7469, 섹션 2.4에 정의된 대로 SPKI 지문과 같은 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6191">This Base64 encoding is the same format as an SPKI Fingerprint, as defined in RFC 7469, Section 2.4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6192">인식할 수 없는 해시 알고리즘은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6192">Unrecognized hash algorithms are ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6193">이번에 유일하게 지원된 해시 알고리즘은 "sha256"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6193">The only supported hash algorithm at this time is "sha256".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6194">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 인증서 투명성을 통해 공개하도록 요구되는 모든 인증서가 인증서 투명성 정책에 따라 공개되지 않은 경우 신뢰할 수 없는 것으로 처리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6194">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that's required to be disclosed via Certificate Transparency will be treated as untrusted if it isn't disclosed according to the Certificate Transparency policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6195">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6195">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6196">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6196">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6197">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6197">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6198">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6198">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6199">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6199">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6200">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6200">List of strings</span></span>
