  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6201">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6201">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6202">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6202">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6203">GP 고유 이름: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6203">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6204">GP 이름: 레거시 인증 기관 목록에 대한 인증서 투명도 적용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6204">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for a list of legacy certificate authorities</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6205">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6205">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6206">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6206">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6207">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6207">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6208">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6208">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6209">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6209">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6210">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6210">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6211">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6211">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6212">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6212">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6213">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6213">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\1 = "sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas\2 = "sha256//////////////////////w=="

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6214">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6214">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6215">기본 설정 키 이름: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6215">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForLegacyCas</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6216">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6216">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>sha256/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==</string>
  <string>sha256//////////////////////w==</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6217">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6217">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6218">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6218">CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6219">특정 URL에 대한 인증서 투명도 적용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6219">Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6220">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6220">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6221">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6221">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6222">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6222">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6223">목록에 나열된 URL에 대해 인증서 투명성 요구 사항을 적용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6223">Disables enforcing Certificate Transparency requirements for the listed URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6224">해당 정책을 사용하면 인증서 투명도를 통해 지정된 URL의 호스트 이름에 대한 인증서를 공개할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6224">This policy lets you not disclose certificates for the hostnames in the specified URLs via Certificate Transparency.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6225">이 경우 인증서가 제대로 공개되지 않았으므로 신뢰할 수 없는 인증서를 사용할 수 있지만 해당 호스트에 대해 잘못 발급된 인증서를 검색하기 더 어려워질 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6225">This lets you use certificates that would otherwise be untrusted, because they weren't properly publicly disclosed, but it makes it harder to detect mis-issued certificates for those hosts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6226">[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)에 따라 URL 패턴을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6226">Form your URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6227">인증서는 구성표, 포트 또는 경로에 관계 없이 지정된 호스트 이름에 대해 유효하므로 URL의 호스트 이름 부분만 고려됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6227">Because certificates are valid for a given hostname, independent of the scheme, port, or path, only the hostname part of the URL is considered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6228">와일드카드 호스트는 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6228">Wildcard hosts are not supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6229">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 인증서 투명성을 통해 공개해야 하는 모든 인증서가 공개되지 않는 경우 신뢰할 수 없는 것으로 처리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6229">If you don't configure this policy, any certificate that should be disclosed via Certificate Transparency is treated as untrusted if it's not disclosed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6230">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6230">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6231">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6231">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6232">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6232">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6233">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6233">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6234">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6234">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6235">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6235">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6236">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6236">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6237">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6237">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6238">GP 고유 이름: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6238">GP unique name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6239">GP 이름: 특정 URL에 대한 인증서 투명도 적용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6239">GP name: Disable Certificate Transparency enforcement for specific URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6240">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6240">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6241">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6241">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6242">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6242">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6243">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6243">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6244">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6244">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6245">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6245">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6246">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6246">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6247">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6247">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6248">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6248">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls\2 = ".contoso.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6249">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6249">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6250">기본 설정 키 이름: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6250">Preference Key Name: CertificateTransparencyEnforcementDisabledForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6251">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6251">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6252">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6252">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6253">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6253">ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6254">Microsoft Edge 종료 시 데이터 검색 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6254">Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6255">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6255">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6256">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6256">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6257">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6257">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6258">Microsoft Edge 종료 시 Microsoft Edge는 기본적으로 데이터를 삭제하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6258">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear the browsing data by default when it closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6259">데이터 검색에는 양식, 암호 및 방문한 웹 사이트에서 입력한 정보가 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6259">Browsing data includes information entered in forms, passwords, and even the websites visited.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6260">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge를 종료할 때마다 모든 데이터 검색이 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6260">If you enable this policy, all browsing data is deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6261">해당 정책을 사용하면 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) 정책을 구성한 방식 보다 우선됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6261">Note that if you enable this policy, it takes precedence over how you configured [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6262">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 설정에서 데이터 검색 삭제 옵션을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6262">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can configure the Clear browsing data option in Settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6263">해당 정책을 사용하면 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 또는 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 정책을 구성하지 않아야 합니다. 두 정책 모두 데이터 검색을 삭제하는 정책이기 때문입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6263">If you enable this policy, don't configure the [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or the [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) policy, because they all deal with deleting browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6264">이전 정책과 해당 정책을 구성하는 경우 Microsoft Edge 종료 시 [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) 또는 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 정책을 구성한 방식에 상관 없이 모든 데이터 검색이 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6264">If you configure the preceding policies and this policy, all browsing data is deleted when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [AllowDeletingBrowserHistory](#allowdeletingbrowserhistory) or [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6265">끝낼 때 삭제할 수 없도록 쿠키를 제외하려면 [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) 정책을 구성 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6265">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6266">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6266">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6267">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6267">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6268">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6268">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6269">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6269">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6270">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6270">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6271">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6271">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6272">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6272">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6273">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6273">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6274">GP 고유 이름: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6274">GP unique name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6275">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge 종료 시 데이터 검색 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6275">GP name: Clear browsing data when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6276">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6276">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6277">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6277">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6278">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6278">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6279">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6279">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6280">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6280">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6281">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6281">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6282">값 이름: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6282">Value Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6283">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6283">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6284">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6284">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6285">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6285">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6286">기본 설정 키 이름: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6286">Preference Key Name: ClearBrowsingDataOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6287">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6287">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6288">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6288">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6289">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6289">ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6290">Microsoft Edge 종료 시 캐시된 이미지 및 파일 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6290">Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6291">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6291">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6292">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6292">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6293">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6293">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6294">Microsoft Edge 종료 시 Microsoft Edge는 기본적으로 캐시된 이미지를 삭제하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6294">Microsoft Edge doesn't clear cached images and files by default when it closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6295">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge를 종료할 때마다 캐시된 모든 이미지가 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6295">If you enable this policy, cached images and files will be deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6296">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose에서 캐시된 이미지 및 파일 옵션을 구성할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6296">If you disable this policy, users cannot configure the cached images and files option in edge://settings/clearBrowsingDataOnClose.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6297">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 종료 시 캐시된 이미지 및 파일의 삭제 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6297">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether cached images and files are cleared on exit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6298">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 정책을 사용하지 않아야 합니다. 두 정책 모두 데이터 삭제를 처리하기 때문입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6298">If you disable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6299">두 정책을 모두 사용하면 Microsoft Edge 종료 시 [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit) 정책을 구성하는 방법에 관계 없이 [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 정책이 우선되어 모든 데이터가 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6299">If you configure both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how you configured [ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit](#clearcachedimagesandfilesonexit).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6300">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6300">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6301">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6301">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6302">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6302">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6303">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6303">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6304">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6304">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6305">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6305">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6306">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6306">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6307">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6307">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6308">GP 고유 이름: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6308">GP unique name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6309">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge 종료 시 캐시된 이미지 및 파일 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6309">GP name: Clear cached images and files when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6310">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6310">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6311">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6311">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6312">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6312">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6313">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6313">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6314">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6314">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6315">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6315">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6316">값 이름: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6316">Value Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6317">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6317">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6318">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6318">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6319">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6319">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6320">기본 설정 키 이름: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6320">Preference Key Name: ClearCachedImagesAndFilesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6321">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6321">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6322">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6322">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6323">ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6323">ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6324">사용자가 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6324">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6325">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6325">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6326">Windows (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6326">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6327">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6327">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6328">사용자가 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6328">Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6329">ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하면 웹 사이트에서 사용자의 컴퓨터나 장치에 있는 ClickOnce 파일 처리기를 사용하여 특정 URL에서 브라우저가 파일을 열도록 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6329">The ClickOnce protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using the ClickOnce file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6330">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6330">If you enable this policy, users can open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6331">해당 정책은 edge://flags/page에서 사용자의 ClickOnce 설정을 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6331">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6332">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6332">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6333">대신 브라우저를 사용하여 파일 시스템에 파일을 저장합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6333">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system using the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6334">해당 정책은 edge://flags/page에서 사용자의 ClickOnce 설정을 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6334">This policy overrides the user's ClickOnce setting in the edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6335">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge 87 이전 버전의 사용자는 기본적으로 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6335">If you don't configure this policy, users with Microsoft Edge versions before Microsoft Edge 87 can't open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6336">그러나 사용자에게 edge://flags/page에서 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용할 수 있도록 설정하는 옵션이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6336">However, they have the option to enable the use of the ClickOnce protocol with the edge://flags/ page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6337">Microsoft Edge 버전 87 이상을 사용하는 사용자는 기본적으로 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있지만 edge://flags/page를 사용하여 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 옵션이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6337">Users with Microsoft Edge versions 87 and later can open files using the ClickOnce protocol by default but have the option to disable the ClickOnce protocol with edge://flags/ page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6338">ClickOnce를 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 ClickOnce 응용 프로그램(.application 파일)이 제대로 시작되지 않을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6338">Disabling ClickOnce may prevent ClickOnce applications (.application files) from launching properly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6339">ClickOnce에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 및 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880)를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6339">For more information about ClickOnce, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099880).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6340">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6340">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6341">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6341">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6342">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6342">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6343">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6343">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6344">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6344">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6345">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6345">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6346">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6346">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6347">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6347">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6348">GP 고유 이름: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6348">GP unique name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6349">GP 이름: 사용자가 ClickOnce 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6349">GP name: Allow users to open files using the ClickOnce protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6350">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6350">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6351">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6351">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6352">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6352">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6353">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6353">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6354">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6354">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6355">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6355">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6356">값 이름: ClickOnceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6356">Value Name: ClickOnceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6357">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6357">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6358">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6358">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6359">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6359">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6360">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6360">CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6361">지정된 서비스 목록에 대한 액세스를 차단하고 컬렉션에서 대상 내보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6361">Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6362">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6362">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6363">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6363">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6364">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6364">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6365">Microsoft Edge의 컬렉션 기능에서 사용자가 액세스할 수 없는 특정 서비스를 나열하고 대상을 내보냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6365">List specific services and export targets that users can't access in the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6366">여기에는 Bing에서 추가 데이터를 표시하고 Microsoft 제품 또는 외부 파트너에 컬렉션을 내보내는 작업이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6366">This includes displaying additional data from Bing and exporting collections to Microsoft products or external partners.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6367">이 정책을 사용하면 지정된 목록과 일치하는 서비스 및 내보내기 대상이 차단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6367">If you enable this policy, services and export targets that match the given list are blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6368">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 허용될 수 있는 서비스 및 내보내기 대상에 대한 제한 사항이 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6368">If you don't configure this policy, no restrictions on the acceptable services and export targets are enforced.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6369">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6369">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6370">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest 제안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6370">pinterest_suggestions (pinterest_suggestions) = Pinterest suggestions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6371">collections_share (collections_share) = 컬렉션 공유</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6371">collections_share (collections_share) = Sharing of Collections</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6372">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6372">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6373">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6373">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6374">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6374">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6375">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6375">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6376">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6376">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6377">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6377">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6378">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6378">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6379">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6379">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6380">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6380">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6381">GP 고유 이름: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6381">GP unique name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6382">GP 이름: 지정된 서비스 목록에 대한 액세스를 차단하고 컬렉션에서 대상 내보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6382">GP name: Block access to a specified list of services and export targets in Collections</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6383">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6383">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6384">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6384">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6385">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6385">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6386">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6386">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6387">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6387">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6388">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6388">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6389">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6389">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6390">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6390">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6391">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6391">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\1 = "pinterest_suggestions"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList\2 = "collections_share"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6392">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6392">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6393">기본 설정 키 이름: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6393">Preference Key Name: CollectionsServicesAndExportsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6394">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6394">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>pinterest_suggestions</string>
  <string>collections_share</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6395">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6395">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6396">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6396">CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6397">명령줄 플래그에 대한 보안 경고 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6397">Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6398">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6398">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6399">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6399">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6400">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6400">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6401">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 잠재적인 위험 가능성이 있는 명령줄 플래그를 사용하여 Microsoft Edge를 시작할 때 보안 경고가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6401">If disabled, this policy prevents security warnings from appearing when Microsoft Edge is launched with potentially dangerous command-line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6402">해당 정책을 사용하거나 설정하지 않은 경우 해당 명령줄 플래그를 사용하여 Microsoft Edge를 시작할 때 보안 경고가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6402">If enabled or unset, security warnings are displayed when these command-line flags are used to launch Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6403">예를 들어  --disable-gpu-sandbox 플래그는 다음의 경고를 생성합니다: 지원되지 않는 명령줄 플래그(disable-gpu-sandbox)를 사용하고 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6403">For example, the --disable-gpu-sandbox flag generates this warning:  You're using an unsupported command-line flag: --disable-gpu-sandbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6404">이는 안정성과 보안 위험을 야기합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6404">This poses stability and security risks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6405">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6405">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6406">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6406">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6407">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6407">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6408">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6408">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6409">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6409">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6410">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6410">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6411">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6411">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6412">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6412">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6413">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6413">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6414">GP 고유 이름: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6414">GP unique name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6415">GP 이름: 명령줄 플래그에 대한 보안 경고 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6415">GP name: Enable security warnings for command-line flags</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6416">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6416">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6417">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6417">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6418">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6418">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6419">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6419">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6420">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6420">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6421">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6421">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6422">값 이름: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6422">Value Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6423">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6423">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6424">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6424">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6425">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6425">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6426">기본 설정 키 이름: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6426">Preference Key Name: CommandLineFlagSecurityWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6427">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6427">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6428">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6428">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6429">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6429">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6430">Microsoft Edge에서 구성 요소 업데이트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6430">Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6431">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6431">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6432">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6432">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6433">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6433">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6434">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 구성 요소 업데이트를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6434">If you enable or don't configure this policy, component updates are enabled in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6435">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 False로 설정하면 Microsoft Edge의 모든 구성 요소에 대해 구성 요소 업데이트를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6435">If you disable this policy or set it to false, component updates are disabled for all components in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6436">하지만 일부 구성 요소는 해당 정책에서 제외됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6436">However, some components are exempt from this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6437">여기에는 브라우저 동작을 크게 변경하지 않거나 보안에 중요한 실행 코드를 포함하지 않는 모든 구성 요소가 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6437">This includes any component that doesn't contain executable code, that doesn't significantly alter the behavior of the browser, or that's critical for security.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6438">즉, 해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우에도 "보안상 중요" 라고 간주되는 업데이트는 계속 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6438">That is, updates that are deemed "critical for security" are still applied even if you disable this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6439">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6439">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6440">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6440">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6441">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6441">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6442">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6442">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6443">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6443">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6444">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6444">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6445">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6445">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6446">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6446">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6447">GP 고유 이름: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6447">GP unique name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6448">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 구성 요소 업데이트 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6448">GP name: Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6449">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6449">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6450">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6450">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6451">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6451">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6452">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6452">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6453">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6453">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6454">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6454">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6455">값 이름: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6455">Value Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6456">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6456">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6457">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6457">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6458">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6458">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6459">기본 설정 키 이름: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6459">Preference Key Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6460">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6460">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6461">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6461">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6462">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6462">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6463">Do Not Track 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6463">Configure Do Not Track</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6464">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6464">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6465">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6465">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6466">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6466">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6467">추적 정보를 요청하는 웹 사이트로 Do Not Track 요청의 전송 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6467">Specify whether to send Do Not Track requests to websites that ask for tracking info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6468">Do Not Track을 요청하면 방문한 웹 사이트에서 검색 작업을 추적 안 함으로 간주합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6468">Do Not Track requests let the websites you visit know that you don't want your browsing activity to be tracked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6469">기본적으로 Microsoft Edge에서는 Do Not Track 요청을 전송하지 않지만 사용자가 해당 기능을 설정하여 전송할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6469">By default, Microsoft Edge doesn't send Do Not Track requests, but users can turn on this feature to send them.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6470">해당 정책을 사용하면 Do Not Track 요청이 추적 정보를 요청하는 웹 사이트로 항상 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6470">If you enable this policy, Do Not Track requests are always sent to websites asking for tracking info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6471">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 요청이 전송되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6471">If you disable this policy, requests are never sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6472">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 해당 요청을 전송할지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6472">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to send these requests.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6473">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6473">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6474">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6474">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6475">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6475">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6476">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6476">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6477">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6477">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6478">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6478">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6479">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6479">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6480">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6480">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6481">GP 고유 이름: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6481">GP unique name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6482">GP 이름: Do Not Track 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6482">GP name: Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6483">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6483">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6484">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6484">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6485">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6485">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6486">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6486">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6487">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6487">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6488">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6488">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6489">값 이름: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6489">Value Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6490">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6490">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6491">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6491">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6492">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6492">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6493">기본 설정 키 이름: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6493">Preference Key Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6494">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6494">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6495">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6495">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6496">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6496">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6497">Microsoft Edge에서 복사된 URL의 기본 붙여넣기 서식을 구성하고 추가 형식이 사용자에게 제공되는지 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6497">Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6498">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6498">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6499">Windows (87 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6499">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6500">MacOS (88 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6500">On macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6501">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6501">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6502">FriendlyURLs를 사용하도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge에서 URL의 추가 표현을 계산하여 클립보드에 놓습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6502">If FriendlyURLs are enabled, Microsoft Edge will compute additional representations of the URL and place them on the clipboard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6503">이 정책은 사용자가 외부 응용 프로그램에 붙여 넣을 때 또는 '다른 이름으로 붙여넣기' 상황에 맞는 메뉴 항목이 없이 Microsoft Edge 내에서 붙여 넣을 때의 서식을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6503">This policy configures what format will be pasted when the user pastes in external applications, or inside Microsoft Edge without the 'Paste as' context menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6504">구성한 경우, 이 정책이 사용자를 대신하여 선택을 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6504">If configured, this policy makes a choice on behalf of the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6505">Edge://settings/shareCopyPaste의 옵션이 회색으로 표시되고 '다른 이름으로 붙여넣기' 상황에 맞는 메뉴의 옵션은 사용할 수 없게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6505">The options in edge://settings/shareCopyPaste will be grayed out, and the options in the 'Paste As' context menu will not be available.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6506">구성되지 않음 = 사용자가 원하는 붙여 넣기 서식을 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6506">Not configured = The user will be able to choose their preferred paste format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6507">기본적으로 이 설정은 간편 URL 형식으로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6507">By default, this is set to the friendly URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6508">Microsoft Edge에서 '다른 이름으로 붙여넣기' 메뉴를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6508">The 'Paste As' menu will be available in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6509">1 = 추가 서식이 클립보드에 저장되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6509">1 = No additional formats will be stored on the clipboard.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6510">Microsoft Edge에는 '다른 이름으로 붙여넣기' 상황에 맞는 메뉴 항목이 없으며, 붙여 넣을 수 있는 유일한 형식은 일반 텍스트 URL 형식이 있게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6510">There will be no 'Paste as' context menu item in Microsoft Edge and the only format available to paste will be the plain text URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6511">사실상 간편 URL 기능을 사용할 수 없게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6511">Effectively, the friendly URL feature will be disabled.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6512">3 = 사용자가 서식 있는 텍스트를 받아들이는 표면에 붙여 넣을 때마다 간편 URL을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6512">3 = The user will get a friendly URL whenever they paste into surfaces that accept rich text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6513">서식 있는 표면이 아닌 경우에도 일반 URL을 계속 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6513">The plain URL will still be available for non-rich surfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6514">Microsoft Edge에서 '다른 이름으로 붙여넣기' 메뉴가 없게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6514">There will be no 'Paste As' menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6515">4 = (현재 사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6515">4 = (Not currently used)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6516">일부 붙여넣기 대상 및/또는 웹 사이트에서 더 풍부한 형식이 제대로 지원되지 않을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6516">The richer formats may not be well-supported in some paste destinations and/or websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6517">따라서 이 정책을 구성하는 경우, 일반 URL 옵션을 사용하는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6517">As such, if this policy is to be configured, then the plain URL option is recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6518">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6518">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6519">일반 텍스트(1) = 페이지 제목과 같은 추가 정보가 없는 일반 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6519">PlainText (1) = The plain URL without any extra information, such as the page's title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6520">이 정책을 구성하는 경우 이 옵션을 선택하는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6520">This is the recommended option when this policy is configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6521">자세한 내용은 설명을 참조하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6521">For more information, see the description.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6522">TitledHyperlink(3) = 제목이 있는 하이퍼링크: 복사된 URL을 가리키는 하이퍼링크이지만 표시되는 텍스트는 대상 페이지의 제목입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6522">TitledHyperlink (3) = Titled Hyperlink: A hyperlink that points to the copied URL, but whose visible text is the title of the destination page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6523">이는 간편 URL 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6523">This is the Friendly URL format.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6524">WebPreview(4) = 출시 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6524">WebPreview (4) = Coming soon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6525">설정된 경우, '일반 URL'과 동일하게 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6525">If set, behaves the same as 'Plain URL'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6526">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6526">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6527">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6527">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6528">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6528">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6529">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6529">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6530">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6530">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6531">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6531">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6532">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6532">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6533">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6533">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6534">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6534">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6535">GP 고유 이름: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6535">GP unique name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6536">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 복사된 URL의 기본 붙여넣기 서식을 구성하고 추가 형식이 사용자에게 제공되는지 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6536">GP name: Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6537">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6537">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6538">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6538">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6539">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6539">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6540">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6540">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6541">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6541">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6542">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6542">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6543">값 이름: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6543">Value Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6544">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6544">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6545">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6545">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6546">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6546">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6547">기본 설정 키 이름: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6547">Preference Key Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6548">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6548">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>3</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6549">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6549">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6550">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6550">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6551">Azure AD 도메인 계정이 없는 경우 Active Directory 도메인 계정으로 자동 로그인 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6551">Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6552">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6552">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6553">Windows (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6553">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6554">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6554">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6555">사용자의 컴퓨터가 도메인에 가입되어 있고 해당 환경이 하이브리드에 가입되어 있지 않은 경우 Active Directory 계정을 사용하여 자동으로 로그인할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6555">Enable the use of Active Directory accounts for automatic sign in if your users' machines are Domain Joined and your environment is not hybrid joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6556">대신 사용자가 해당 Azure Active Directory 계정을 사용하여 자동으로 로그인하도록 하려면 Azure AD에 가입(자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) 참조)하거나 사용자의 환경이 하이브리드에 가입(자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) 참조)되도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6556">If you want users automatically signed in with their Azure Active Directory accounts instead, please Azure AD join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) for more information) or hybrid join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) for more information) your environment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6557">실행되는 첫 번째 프로필이 로그인되지 않거나 자동 로그인이 이전에 일어나지 않았다면 Microsoft Edge는 매 실행 시작 시 이 정책을 사용하여 로그인을 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6557">On every launch, Microsoft Edge will try to sign-in using this policy, as long as the first profile being launched isn't signed-in or an auto sign-in hasn't happened before.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6558">[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 정책을 사용하지 않도록 구성한 경우 해당 정책은 아무 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6558">If you have configured the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy to disabled, this policy will not take any effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6559">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하고 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable'로 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 해당 Active Directory 계정을 사용하여 도메인에 가입된 컴퓨터에 있는 사용자에게 자동으로 로그인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6559">If you enable this policy and set it to 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable', Microsoft Edge will automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines using their Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6560">해당 정책을 ‘사용 안 함’으로 설정하거나 해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 Active Directory 계정을 사용하여 도메인에 가입된 컴퓨터에 있는 사용자에게 자동으로 로그인하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6560">If you set this policy to 'Disabled' or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will not automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines with Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6561">Microsoft Edge 89 이후부터 동기화가 사용되지 않도록 설정되어 있는 기존 온-프레미스 프로필이 있고 컴퓨터가 이제 하이브리드 가입이 된 경우 예를 들어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6561">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is now hybrid joined i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6562">Azure AD 계정이 있는 경우, 전체 Azure AD 동기화 기능을 얻을 수 있도록 온-프레미스 프로필을 Azure AD 프로필로 자동 업그레이드합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6562">it has an Azure AD account, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile to get full Azure AD sync facilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6563">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6563">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6564">사용 안 함 (0) = 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6564">Disabled (0) = Disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6565">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = 로그인 및 제거할 수 없는 도메인 계정 생성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6565">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Sign in and make domain account non-removable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6566">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6566">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6567">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6567">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6568">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6568">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6569">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6569">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6570">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6570">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6571">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6571">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6572">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6572">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6573">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6573">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6574">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6574">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6575">GP 고유 이름: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6575">GP unique name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6576">GP 이름: Azure AD 도메인 계정이 없는 경우 Active Directory 도메인 계정으로 자동 로그인 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6576">GP name: Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6577">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6577">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6578">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6578">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6579">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6579">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6580">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6580">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6581">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6581">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6582">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6582">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6583">값 이름: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6583">Value Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6584">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6584">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6585">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6585">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6586">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6586">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6587">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6587">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6588">온라인 텍스트 음성 변환 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6588">Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6589">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6589">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6590">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6590">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6591">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6591">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6592">브라우저가 Azure 인지 서비스의 부분인 온라인 텍스트를 음성으로 변환하는 기능의 음성 글꼴을 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6592">Set whether the browser can leverage Online Text to Speech voice fonts, part of Azure Cognitive Services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6593">해당 음성 글꼴은 사전 설치된 시스템의 음성 글꼴 보다 품질이 높습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6593">These voice fonts are higher quality than the pre-installed system voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6594">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 SpeechSynthesis API를 사용하는 웹 기반 응용 프로그램에서 온라인 텍스트 음성 기능의 음성 글꼴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6594">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the SpeechSynthesis API can use Online Text to Speech voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6595">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 음성 글꼴을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6595">If you disable this policy, the voice fonts aren't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6596">해당 기능에 대한 자세한 내용은 다음을 참조하세요. SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) 인지 서비스: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6596">Read more about this feature here: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>
