  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6597">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6597">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6598">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6598">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6599">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6599">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6600">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6600">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6601">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6601">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6602">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6602">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6603">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6603">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6604">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6604">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6605">GP 고유 이름: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6605">GP unique name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6606">GP 이름: 온라인 텍스트 음성 변환 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6606">GP name: Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6607">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6607">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6608">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6608">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6609">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6609">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6610">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6610">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6611">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6611">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6612">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6612">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6613">값 이름: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6613">Value Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6614">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6614">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6615">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6615">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6616">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6616">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6617">기본 설정 키 이름: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6617">Preference Key Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6618">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6618">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6619">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6619">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6620">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6620">ConfigureShare</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6621">공유 환경 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6621">Configure the Share experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6622">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6622">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6623">Windows (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6623">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6624">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6624">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6625">해당 정책을 'ShareAllowed' (기본값)로 설정하면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge의 설정 및 추가 메뉴에서 Windows 10 공유 환경에 액세스하여 시스템에서 다른 앱을 공유할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6625">If you set this policy to 'ShareAllowed' (the default), users will be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience from the Settings and More Menu in Microsoft Edge to share with other apps on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6626">해당 정책을 'ShareDisallowed'로 설정하면 사용자는 Windows 10 공유 환경에 액세스할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6626">If you set this policy to 'ShareDisallowed', users won't be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6627">도구 모음에 공유 단추가 있는 경우 해당 단추를 숨깁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6627">If the Share button is on the toolbar, it will also be hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6628">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6628">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6629">ShareAllowed (0) = 공유 환경 사용 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6629">ShareAllowed (0) = Allow using the Share experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6630">ShareDisallowed (1) = 공유 환경 사용 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6630">ShareDisallowed (1) = Don't allow using the Share experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6631">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6631">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6632">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6632">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6633">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6633">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6634">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6634">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6635">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6635">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6636">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6636">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6637">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6637">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6638">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6638">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6639">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6639">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6640">GP 고유 이름: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6640">GP unique name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6641">GP 이름: 공유 환경 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6641">GP name: Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6642">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6642">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6643">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6643">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6644">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6644">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6645">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6645">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6646">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6646">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6647">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6647">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6648">값 이름: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6648">Value Name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6649">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6649">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6650">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6650">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6651">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6651">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6652">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6652">CustomHelpLink</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6653">사용자 지정 도움말 링크 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6653">Specify custom help link</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6654">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6654">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6655">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6655">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6656">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6656">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6657">도움말 메뉴 또는 F1 키에 대한 링크를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6657">Specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6658">해당 정책을 사용하면 관리자는 도움말 메뉴 또는 F1 키에 대한 링크를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6658">If you enable this policy, an admin can specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6659">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 도움말 메뉴 또는 F1 키에 대한 기본 링크가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6659">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default link for the Help menu or the F1 key is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6660">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6660">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6661">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6661">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6662">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6662">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6663">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6663">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6664">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6664">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6665">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6665">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6666">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6666">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6667">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6667">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6668">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6668">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6669">GP 고유 이름: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6669">GP unique name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6670">GP 이름: 사용자 지정 도움말 링크 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6670">GP name: Specify custom help link</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6671">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6671">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6672">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6672">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6673">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6673">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6674">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6674">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6675">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6675">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6676">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6676">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6677">값 이름: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6677">Value Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6678">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6678">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6679">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6679">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6680">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6680">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6681">기본 설정 키 이름: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6681">Preference Key Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6682">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6682">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6683">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6683">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6684">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6684">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6685">DNS 차단 검사 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6685">DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6686">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6686">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6687">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6687">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6688">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6688">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6689">해당 정책은 DNS 차단 검사를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 사용할 수 있는 로컬 스위치를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6689">This policy configures a local switch that can be used to disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6690">해당 검사에서는 브라우저가 알려지지 않은 호스트 이름을 리디렉션하는 프록시에 속하는지 여부를 검색하려고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6690">These checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6691">네트워크 구성이 알려진 엔터프라이즈 환경에서는 해당 검색이 필요하지 않을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6691">This detection might not be necessary in an enterprise environment where the network configuration is known.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6692">해당 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 시작 시 추가 DNS 및 HTTP 트래픽과 각 DNS 구성 변경을 방지할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6692">It can be disabled to avoid additional DNS and HTTP traffic on start-up and each DNS configuration change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6693">해당 정책을 사용하거나 설정하지 않으면 DNS 차단 검사가 수행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6693">If you enable or don't set this policy, the DNS interception checks are performed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6694">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 DNS 차단 검사가 수행되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6694">If you disable this policy, DNS interception checks aren't performed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6695">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6695">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6696">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6696">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6697">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6697">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6698">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6698">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6699">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6699">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6700">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6700">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6701">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6701">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6702">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6702">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6703">GP 고유 이름: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6703">GP unique name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6704">GP 이름: DNS 차단 검사 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6704">GP name: DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6705">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6705">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6706">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6706">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6707">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6707">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6708">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6708">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6709">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6709">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6710">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6710">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6711">값 이름: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6711">Value Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6712">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6712">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6713">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6713">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6714">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6714">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6715">기본 설정 키 이름: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6715">Preference Key Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6716">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6716">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6717">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6717">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6718">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6718">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6719">Microsoft Edge를 기본 브라우저로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6719">Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6720">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6720">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6721">Windows 7 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6721">On Windows 7 and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6722">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6722">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6723">이 정책을 True로 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 항상 시작 시 기본 브라우저인지 확인하고 가능하면 자동으로 등록합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6723">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge always checks whether it's the default browser on startup and, if possible, automatically registers itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6724">이 정책을 False로 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 이 정책이 기본값인지 확인하는 것이 중지되며 이 옵션에 대한 사용자 컨트롤을 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6724">If you set this policy to False, Microsoft Edge is stopped from ever checking if it's the default and turns user controls off for this option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6725">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용자가 기본값인지 여부를 제어하고, 기본값이 아닌 경우 사용자 알림을 표시할지 여부를 제어하도록 할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6725">If you don't set this policy, Microsoft Edge lets users control whether it's the default and, if not, whether user notifications should appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6726">Windows 관리자용 참고: 해당 정책은 Windows 7을 실행하는 PC에서만 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6726">Note for Windows administrators: This policy only works for PCs running Windows 7.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6727">이후 버전의 Windows에서는 Microsoft Edge를 https 및 http 프로토콜(선택적으로 ftp 프로토콜 및 .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp와 같은 파일 형식)에 대한 처리기로 설정하는 “기본 응용 프로그램 연결” 파일을 배포해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6727">For later versions of Windows, you have to deploy a "default application associations" file that makes Microsoft Edge the handler for the https and http protocols (and, optionally, the ftp protocol and file formats such as .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6728">자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6728">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) for more information.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6729">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6729">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6730">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6730">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6731">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6731">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6732">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6732">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6733">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6733">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6734">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6734">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6735">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6735">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6736">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6736">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6737">GP 고유 이름: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6737">GP unique name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6738">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge를 기본 브라우저로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6738">GP name: Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6739">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6739">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6740">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6740">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6741">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6741">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6742">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6742">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6743">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6743">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6744">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6744">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6745">값 이름: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6745">Value Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6746">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6746">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6747">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6747">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6748">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6748">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6749">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6749">Preference Key Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6750">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6750">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6751">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6751">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6752">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6752">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6753">기본 검색 공급자에 상황에 맞는 메뉴 검색 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6753">Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6754">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6754">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6755">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6755">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6756">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6756">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6757">상황에 맞는 메뉴에서 기본 검색 공급자를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6757">Enables the use of a default search provider on the context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6758">이 정책을 사용하지 않으면 기본 검색 공급자 및 사이드바 검색에 의존하는 검색 상황에 맞는 메뉴 항목을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6758">If you set this policy to disabled the search context menu item that relies on your default search provider and sidebar search will not be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6759">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하였거나 설정하지 않은 경우에는 기본 검색 공급자 및 사이드바 검색에 대한 상황에 맞는 메뉴 항목을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6759">If this policy is set to enabled or not set, the context menu item for your default search provider and sidebar search will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6760">정책 값은 [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) 정책을 사용하는 경우에만 적용되며, 그렇지 않은 경우에는 해당되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6760">The policy value is only appled when the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy is enabled, and is not applicable otherwise.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6761">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6761">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6762">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6762">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6763">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6763">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6764">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6764">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6765">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6765">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6766">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6766">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6767">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6767">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6768">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6768">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6769">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6769">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6770">GP 이름: 기본 검색 공급자에 상황에 맞는 메뉴 검색 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6770">GP name: Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6771">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6771">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6772">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6772">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6773">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6773">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6774">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6774">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6775">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6775">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6776">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6776">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6777">값 이름: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6777">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6778">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6778">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6779">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6779">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6780">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6780">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6781">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6781">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6782">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6782">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6783">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6783">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6784">DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6784">DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6785">기본 센서 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6785">Default sensors setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6786">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6786">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6787">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6787">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6788">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6788">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6789">웹 사이트에서 모션 및 광 센서와 같은 센서에 액세스하고 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6789">Set whether websites can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6790">웹 사이트에서 센서에 대한 액세스를 완전히 차단 또는 허용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6790">You can completely block or allow websites to get access to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6791">정책을 1로 설정하면 웹 사이트에서 센서에 액세스하여 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6791">Setting the policy to 1 lets websites access and use sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6792">정책을 2로 설정하면 센서에 대한 액세스가 거부됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6792">Setting the policy to 2 denies acess to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6793">[SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 및 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 정책을 사용하여 특정 URL 패턴에 대해 해당 정책을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6793">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6794">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 웹 사이트에서 센서에 액세스하여 사용할 수 있으며 사용자는 이 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6794">If you don't configure this policy, websites can access and use sensors, and users can change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6795">이는 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 및 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls)의 전역 기본값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6795">This is the global default for [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6796">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6796">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6797">AllowSensors (1) = 사이트에서 센서에 액세스하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6797">AllowSensors (1) = Allow sites to access sensors</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6798">BlockSensors (2) = 모든 사이트에서 센서에 액세스를 허용하지 않음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6798">BlockSensors (2) = Do not allow any site to access sensors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6799">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6799">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6800">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6800">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6801">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6801">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6802">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6802">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6803">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6803">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6804">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6804">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6805">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6805">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6806">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6806">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6807">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6807">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6808">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6808">GP unique name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6809">GP 이름: 기본 센서 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6809">GP name: Default sensors setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6810">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6810">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6811">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6811">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6812">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6812">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6813">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6813">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6814">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6814">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6815">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6815">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6816">값 이름: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6816">Value Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6817">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6817">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6818">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6818">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6819">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6819">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6820">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6820">Preference Key Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6821">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6821">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6822">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6822">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6823">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6823">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6824">직렬 API 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6824">Control use of the Serial API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6825">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6825">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6826">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6826">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6827">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6827">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6828">웹 사이트에서 직렬 포트에 액세스할 수 있는지를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6828">Set whether websites can access serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6829">액세스를 완벽하게 차단하거나 웹 사이트에서 직렬 포트에 액세스할 때마다 사용자에게 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6829">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6830">정책을 3으로 설정하면 웹 사이트에서 직렬 포트에 대한 액세스를 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6830">Setting the policy to 3 lets websites ask for access to serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6831">정책을 2로 설정하면 직렬 포트에 대한 액세스가 거부됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6831">Setting the policy to 2 denies access to serial ports.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6832">[SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 및 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 정책을 사용하여 특정 URL 패턴에 대해 해당 정책을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6832">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) and [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6833">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본적으로 웹 사이트에서 사용자에게 직렬 포트에 액세스할 수 있는지 여부를 요청할 수 있으며 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6833">If you don't configure this policy, by default, websites can ask users whether they can access a serial port, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6834">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6834">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6835">BlockSerial (2) = 사이트에서 직렬 API를 통해 직렬 포트에 대한 액세스 요청을 허용하지 않음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6835">BlockSerial (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to serial ports via the Serial API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6836">AskSerial (3) = 사이트에서 사용자에게 직렬 포트 액세스 권한 요청을 허용함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6836">AskSerial (3) = Allow sites to ask for user permission to access a serial port</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6837">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6837">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6838">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6838">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6839">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6839">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6840">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6840">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6841">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6841">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6842">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6842">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6843">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6843">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6844">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6844">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6845">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6845">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6846">GP 고유 이름: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6846">GP unique name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6847">GP 이름: 직렬 API의 사용 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6847">GP name: Control use of the Serial API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6848">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6848">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6849">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6849">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6850">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6850">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6851">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6851">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6852">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6852">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6853">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6853">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6854">값 이름: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6854">Value Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6855">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6855">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6856">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6856">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6857">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6857">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6858">기본 설정 키 이름: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6858">Preference Key Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6859">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6859">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6860">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6860">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6861">DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6861">DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6862">사이트에서 언어를 지원하는 경우 웹 사이트에서 표시할 기본 설정 언어 순서가 지정된 목록 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6862">Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6863">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6863">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6864">Windows 및 macOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6864">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6865">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6865">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6866">Microsoft Edge에서 웹 사이트로 보내는 언어 변형을 Accept-Language 요청 HTTP 헤더의 일부로 구성하고 사용자가 Microsoft Edge 설정에서 기본 설정 언어의 순서를 추가, 제거 또는 변경할 수 없게 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6866">Configures the language variants that Microsoft Edge sends to websites as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header and prevents users from adding, removing, or changing the order of preferred languages in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6867">Microsoft Edge에서 표시하거나 페이지를 번역하기 위해 제공하는 언어를 변경하려는 사용자는 이 정책에 구성된 언어만 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6867">Users who want to change the languages Microsoft Edge displays in or offers to translate pages to will be limited to the languages configured in this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6868">이 정책을 사용하면 해당 사이트에 특정된 다른 로직이 표시 언어를 결정하지 않는 한, 사이트가 지원하는 목록의 첫 번째 언어로 사이트가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6868">If you enable this policy, websites will appear in the first language in the list that they support unless other site-specific logic is used to determine the display language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6869">이 정책에 정의된 언어 변형은 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 정책의 일부로 구성된 언어를 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6869">The language variants defined in this policy override the languages configured as part of the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6870">이 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않을 경우 Microsoft Edge가 웹 사이트에 특정 사용자에 대한 기본 설정 언어를 Accept-Language request HTTP 헤더의 일부로 전송합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6870">If you don't configure or disable this policy, Microsoft Edge sends websites the user-specified preferred languages as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6871">유효한 언어 변형에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6871">For detailed information on valid language variants, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6872">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6872">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6873">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6873">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6874">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6874">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6875">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6875">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6876">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6876">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6877">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6877">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6878">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6878">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6879">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6879">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6880">GP 고유 이름: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6880">GP unique name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6881">GP 이름: 사이트에서 언어를 지원하는 경우 웹 사이트에서 표시할 기본 설정 언어의 순서가 정해진 목록 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6881">GP name: Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6882">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6882">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6883">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6883">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6884">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6884">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6885">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6885">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6886">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6886">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6887">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6887">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6888">값 이름: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6888">Value Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6889">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6889">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6890">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6890">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en-US,fr,es"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6891">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6891">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6892">기본 설정 키 이름: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6892">Preference Key Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6893">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6893">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>en-US,fr,es</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6894">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6894">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6895">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6895">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6896">탭 탐색 전에 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록을 사용하도록 요청</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6896">Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6897">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6897">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6898">Windows 84 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6898">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6899">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6899">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6900">브라우저가 초기 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록을 다운로드할 때까지 Microsoft Edge 탭의 탐색 대기 여부를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6900">Lets you specify whether Microsoft Edge tabs wait to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6901">이 설정은 브라우저 홈페이지가 Internet Explorer 모드로 로드되어야 하는 시나리오를 위한 것으로, IE 모드가 활성화된 후 브라우저를 먼저 실행하는 것이 중요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6901">This setting is intended for the scenario where the browser home page should load in Internet Explorer mode, and it is important that is does so on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6902">이 시나리오가 없는 경우 홈페이지를 로드하는 성능을 저하시킬 수 있기 때문에이 설정을 사용하지 않는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6902">If this scenario does not exist, we recommend not enabling this setting because it can negatively impact the performance of loading the home page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6903">이 설정은 IE 모드가 활성화된 후 브라우저에서 처음 실행되는 경우와 같이 Microsoft Edge에 캐시된 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록이 없는 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6903">The setting only applies when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached Enterprise Mode Site List, such as on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6904">해당 설정은 다음과 함께 작동됩니다. [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 정책은 'IEMode' 및 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 정책으로 설정합니다. 여기서 목록에는 하나 이상의 항목이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6904">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6905">이 정책의 시간 제한 동작은 [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) 정책을 사용하여 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6905">The timeout behavior of this policy can be configured with the [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6906">이 정책을 ‘모두’로 설정하면 Microsoft Edge에 캐시된 버전의 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록이 없는 경우 브라우저가 사이트 목록을 다운로드할 때까지 탭 탐색이 지연됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6906">If you set this policy to 'All', when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs delay navigating until the browser has downloaded the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6907">사이트 목록으로 Internet Explorer 모드에서 열리도록 구성한 사이트는 브라우저를 처음 탐색할 때에도 Internet Explorer 모드로 로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6907">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will load in Internet Explorer mode, even during the initial navigation of the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6908">Http:, https:, file:, ftp 외의 다른 체계가 있는 사이트와 같이 Internet Explorer에서 열리도록 구성할 수 없는 사이트는 Edge 모드에서 탐색이 지연되지 않으며 즉시 로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6908">Sites that cannot possibly be configured to open in Internet Explorer, such as any site with a scheme other than http:, https:, file:, or ftp: do not delay navigating and load immediately in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6909">이 정책을 ‘없음’으로 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에 캐시된 버전의 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록이 없으면 탭이 즉시 탐색되며 브라우저가 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록을 다운로드할 때까지 기다리지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6909">If you set this policy to 'None' or don't configure it, when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs will navigate immediately, and not wait for the browser to download the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6910">사이트 목록으로 Internet Explorer 모드에서 열도록 구성된 사이트는 브라우저가 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 다운로드를 완료할 때까지 Microsoft Edge 모드에서 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6910">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will open in Microsoft Edge mode until the browser has finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6911">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6911">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6912">없음 (0) = 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6912">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6913">모두 (1) = 모든 적합한 탐색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6913">All (1) = All eligible navigations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6914">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6914">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6915">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6915">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6916">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6916">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6917">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6917">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6918">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6918">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6919">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6919">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6920">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6920">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6921">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6921">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6922">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6922">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6923">GP 고유 이름: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6923">GP unique name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6924">GP 이름: 탭 탐색 전에 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록을 사용하도록 요청</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6924">GP name: Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6925">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6925">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6926">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6926">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6927">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6927">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6928">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6928">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6929">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6929">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6930">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6930">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6931">값 이름: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6931">Value Name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6932">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6932">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6933">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6933">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6934">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6934">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6935">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6935">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6936">마이그레이션 시 이전 브라우저 데이터 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6936">Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6937">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6937">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6938">Windows (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6938">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6939">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6939">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6940">해당 정책은 Microsoft Edge 버전 81 이상으로 마이그레이션한 후 Microsoft Edge 레거시에서 사용자 검색 데이터를 삭제할지 여부를 결정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6940">This policy determines whether user browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will be deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6941">해당 정책이 “사용”으로 설정된 경우 Microsoft Edge 버전 81 이상으로 마이그레이션한 후 Microsoft Edge 레거시에서 모든 검색 데이터를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6941">If you set this policy to "Enabled", all browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later will be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6942">기존 검색 데이터에도 영향을 주려면 Microsoft Edge 버전 81 이상으로 마이그레이션하기 전에 해당 정책을 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6942">This policy must be set before migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later to have any effect on existing browsing data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6943">해당 정책을 "사용 안 함"으로 설정하거나 정책을 구성하지 않은 경우 Microsoft Edge 버전 83 이상으로 마이그레이션한 후에 사용자 검색 데이터가 삭제되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6943">If you set this policy to "Disabled", or the policy is not configured, user browsing data isn't deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 83 or later.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6944">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6944">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6945">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6945">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6946">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6946">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6947">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6947">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6948">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6948">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6949">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6949">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6950">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6950">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6951">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6951">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6952">GP 고유 이름: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6952">GP unique name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6953">GP 이름: 마이그레이션 시 이전 브라우저 데이터 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6953">GP name: Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6954">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6954">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6955">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6955">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6956">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6956">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6957">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6957">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6958">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6958">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6959">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6959">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6960">값 이름: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6960">Value Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6961">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6961">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6962">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6962">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6963">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6963">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6964">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6964">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6965">개발자 도구를 사용할 수 있는 위치 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6965">Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6966">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6966">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6967">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6967">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6968">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6968">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6969">개발자 도구를 사용할 수 있는 위치를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6969">Control where developer tools can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6970">해당 정책을 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (기본값)으로 설정하면 사용자는 일반적으로 개발자 도구 및 JavaScript 콘솔에 액세스할 수 있지만 엔터프라이즈 정책으로 설치한 확장의 컨텍스트에서는 액세스할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6970">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (the default), users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in general, but not in the context of extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6971">해당 정책을 'DeveloperToolsAllowed'로 설정하면 사용자는 엔터프라이즈 정책으로 설치한 확장을 포함하여 모든 컨텍스트에서 개발자 도구 및 JavaScript 콘솔에 액세스할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6971">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsAllowed', users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in all contexts, including extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6972">해당 정책을 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed'로 설정하면 사용자는 개발자 도구에 액세스할 수 없거나 웹 사이트 요소를 검사할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6972">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed', users can't access the developer tools or inspect website elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6973">개발자 도구 또는 JavaScript 콘솔을 여는 바로 가기 키 및 메뉴 또는 상황에 맞는 메뉴 항목을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6973">Keyboard shortcuts and menu or context menu entries that open the developer tools or the JavaScript Console are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6974">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6974">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6975">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = 엔터프라이즈 정책으로 설치한 확장에서 개발자 도구를 차단하고 다른 컨텍스트 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6975">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Block the developer tools on extensions installed by enterprise policy, allow in other contexts</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6976">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = 개발자 도구 사용 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6976">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Allow using the developer tools</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6977">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = 개발자 도구 사용 허용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6977">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Don't allow using the developer tools</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-6978">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6978">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6979">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6979">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6980">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6980">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6981">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6981">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6982">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6982">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6983">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6983">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6984">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6984">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6985">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6985">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6986">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6986">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6987">GP 고유 이름: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6987">GP unique name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6988">GP 이름: 개발자 도구를 사용할 수 있는 위치 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6988">GP name: Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6989">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6989">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6990">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6990">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6991">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6991">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6992">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6992">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6993">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6993">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6994">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6994">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6995">값 이름: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6995">Value Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6996">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6996">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6997">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6997">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6998">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6998">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-6999">기본 설정 키 이름: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-6999">Preference Key Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7000">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7000">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7001">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7001">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7002">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7002">DiagnosticData</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7003">브라우저를 사용하는 데 필요한 선택적 진단 데이터 보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7003">Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7004">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7004">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7005">Windows 7 및 MacOS(86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7005">On Windows 7 and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7006">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7006">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7007">이 정책은 브라우저 사용에 대한 필수 및 선택적 진단 데이터를 Microsoft로 전송하는 것을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7007">This policy controls sending required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7008">필요한 진단 데이터가 수집되어 Microsoft Edge를 최신 상태로 유지하고 예상대로 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7008">Required diagnostic data is collected keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7009">옵션 진단 데이터에는 브라우저 사용 방법, 방문하는 웹 사이트 및 제품 및 서비스 개선을 위해 Microsoft에 보내는 충돌 보고서에 대한 데이터가 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7009">Optional diagnostic data includes data about how you use the browser, websites you visit and crash reports to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>
