<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7010">이 정책은 Windows 10 장치에서 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7010">This policy is not supported on Windows 10 devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7011">Windows 10에서 이 데이터 수집을 제어하려면 IT 관리자가 Windows 진단 데이터 그룹 정책을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7011">To control this data collection on Windows 10, IT admins must use the Windows diagnostic data group policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7012">이 정책은 Windows 버전에 따라 '원격 분석 허용' 또는 '진단 데이터 허용'으로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7012">This policy will either be 'Allow Telemetry' or 'Allow Diagnostic Data', depending on the version of Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7013">Windows 10 진단 데이터 컬렉션에 대해 자세히 알아보세요.[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7013">Learn more about Windows 10 diagnostic data collection: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7014">다음 설정 중 하나를 사용하여 이 정책을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7014">Use one of the following settings to configure this policy:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7015">'끔(Off)'은 필수 진단 데이터 수집과 옵션 진단 데이터 수집을 끕니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7015">'Off' turns off required and optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7016">이 옵션은 권장되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7016">This option is not recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7017">' RequiredData '는 필수 진단 데이터를 보내므로 선택적 진단 데이터 수집은 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7017">'RequiredData' sends required diagnostic data but turns off optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7018">Microsoft Edge는 Microsoft Edge의 보안을 최신 상태로 유지하고 예상대로 작동하는 데 필요한 진단 데이터를 전송합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7018">Microsoft Edge will send required diagnostic data to keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7019">'옵션 데이터'는 브라우저 사용량, 방문한 웹 사이트, 제품 및 서비스 개선을 위해 Microsoft로 전송된 충돌 보고서를 포함하는 선택적 진단 데이터를 전송합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7019">'OptionalData' sends optional diagnostic data includes data about browser usage, websites that are visited, crash reports sent to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7020">Windows 7/macOS에서 이 정책은 Microsoft로 필수 및 선택적 데이터 전송을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7020">On Windows 7/macOS, this policy controls sending required and optional data to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7021">해당 정책을 구성하거나 사용 해제하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 사용자의 기본 설정의 기본값이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7021">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7022">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7022">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7023">Off (0) = 꺼짐(권장하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7023">Off (0) = Off (Not recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7024">RequiredData (1) = 필수 데이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7024">RequiredData (1) = Required data</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7025">OptionalData (2) = 선택적 데이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7025">OptionalData (2) = Optional data</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7026">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7026">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7027">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7027">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7028">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7028">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7029">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7029">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7030">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7030">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7031">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7031">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7032">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7032">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7033">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7033">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7034">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7034">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7035">GP 고유 이름: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7035">GP unique name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7036">GP 이름: 브라우저를 사용하는 데 필요한 선택적 진단 데이터 보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7036">GP name: Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7037">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7037">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7038">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7038">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7039">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7039">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7040">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7040">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7041">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7041">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7042">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7042">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7043">값 이름: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7043">Value Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7044">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7044">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7045">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7045">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7046">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7046">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7047">기본 설정 키 이름: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7047">Preference Key Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7048">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7048">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7049">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7049">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7050">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7050">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7051">사용자가 DirectInvoke 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7051">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7052">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7052">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7053">Windows (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7053">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7054">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7054">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7055">사용자가 DirectInvoke 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7055">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7056">DirectInvoke 프로토콜을 사용하면 웹 사이트에서 사용자의 컴퓨터나 장치에 있는 특정 파일 처리기를 사용하여 특정 URL에서 브라우저가 파일을 열도록 요청할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7056">The DirectInvoke protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using a specific file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7057">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 DirectInvoke 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7057">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7058">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 DirectInvoke 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7058">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7059">대신 파일 시스템에 파일을 저장합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7059">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7060">참고: DirectInvoke를 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 특정 Microsoft SharePoint Online 기능이 예상대로 작동하지 않을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7060">Note: Disabling DirectInvoke may prevent certain Microsoft SharePoint Online features from working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7061">DirectInvoke에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) 및 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871)를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7061">For more information about DirectInvoke, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7062">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7062">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7063">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7063">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7064">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7064">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7065">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7065">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7066">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7066">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7067">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7067">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7068">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7068">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7069">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7069">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7070">GP 고유 이름: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7070">GP unique name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7071">GP 이름: 사용자가 DirectInvoke 프로토콜을 사용하여 파일을 열 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7071">GP name: Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7072">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7072">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7073">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7073">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7074">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7074">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7075">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7075">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7076">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7076">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7077">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7077">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7078">값 이름: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7078">Value Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7079">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7079">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7080">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7080">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7081">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7081">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7082">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7082">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7083">3D 그래픽 API에 대한 지원 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7083">Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7084">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7084">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7085">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7085">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7086">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7086">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7087">웹 페이지에서 GPU(그래픽 처리 장치)에 액세스하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7087">Prevent web pages from accessing the graphics processing unit (GPU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7088">특히 웹 페이지는 WebGL API에 액세스할 수 없으며 플러그 인은 Pepper 3D API를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7088">Specifically, web pages can't access the WebGL API and plug-ins can't use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7089">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 웹 페이지에서 WebGL API를 사용할 수 있고 플러그 인에서 Pepper 3D API를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7089">If you don't configure or disable this policy, it potentially allows web pages to use the WebGL API and plug-ins to use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7090">기본적으로 Microsoft Edge에서 해당 API를 사용하기 위해 명령줄 인수가 계속 전달될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7090">Microsoft Edge might, by default, still require command line arguments to be passed in order to use these APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7091">[HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) 정책을 False로 설정하는 경우 'Disable3DAPIs' 정책 설정은 무시됩니다. 'Disable3DAPIs' 정책을 True로 설정하는 것과 동일합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7091">If [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) policy is set to false, the setting for 'Disable3DAPIs' policy is ignored - it's the equivalent of setting 'Disable3DAPIs' policy to true.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7092">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7092">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7093">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7093">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7094">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7094">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7095">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7095">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7096">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7096">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7097">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7097">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7098">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7098">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7099">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7099">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7100">GP 고유 이름: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7100">GP unique name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7101">GP 이름: 3D 그래픽 API에 대한 지원 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7101">GP name: Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7102">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7102">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7103">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7103">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7104">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7104">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7105">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7105">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7106">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7106">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7107">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7107">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7108">값 이름: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7108">Value Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7109">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7109">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7110">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7110">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7111">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7111">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7112">기본 설정 키 이름: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7112">Preference Key Name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7113">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7113">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7114">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7114">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7115">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7115">DisableScreenshots</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7116">스크린샷 기능 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7116">Disable taking screenshots</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7117">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7117">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7118">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7118">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7119">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7119">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7120">사용자가 브라우저 페이지의 스크린샷을 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7120">Controls if users can take screenshots of the browser page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7121">해당 기능을 사용하는 경우 사용자는 바로 가기 키 또는 확장 API를 사용하여 스크린샷를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7121">If enabled, user can't take screenshots by using keyboard shortcuts or extension APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7122">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 스크린샷을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7122">If disabled or don't configure this policy, users can take screenshots.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7123">해당 정책은 브라우저 자체 내에서 사용하는 스크린샷을 제어한다는 점에에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7123">Please note this policy controls screenshots taken from within the browser itself.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7124">해당 정책을 사용하는 경우에도 사용자가 브라우저 외부의 일부 메서드를 사용하여(운영 체제 기능이나 다른 응용 프로그램을 사용하는 등) 스크린샷을 계속 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7124">Even if you enable this policy, users might still be able to take screenshots using some method outside of the browser (like using an operating system feature or another application).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7125">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7125">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7126">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7126">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7127">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7127">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7128">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7128">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7129">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7129">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7130">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7130">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7131">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7131">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7132">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7132">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7133">GP 고유 이름: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7133">GP unique name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7134">GP 이름: 스크린샷 기능 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7134">GP name: Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7135">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7135">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7136">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7136">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7137">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7137">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7138">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7138">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7139">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7139">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7140">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7140">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7141">값 이름: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7141">Value Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7142">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7142">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7143">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7143">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7144">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7144">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7145">기본 설정 키 이름: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7145">Preference Key Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7146">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7146">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7147">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7147">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7148">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7148">DiskCacheDir</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7149">디스크 캐시 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7149">Set disk cache directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7150">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7150">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7151">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7151">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7152">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7152">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7153">캐시된 파일을 저장하는 데 사용할 디렉터리를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7153">Configures the directory to use to store cached files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7154">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 '--disk-cache-dir' 플래그를 지정했는지 여부에 관계 없이 Microsoft Edge는 제공된 디렉터리를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7154">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7155">데이터 손실 또는 기타 예기치 않은 오류가 발생하지 않도록 하려면 Microsoft Edge에서 해당 콘텐츠를 관리하기 때문에 볼륨의 루트 디렉터리나 다른 목적에 사용되는 디렉터리로 해당 정책을 구성하지 마세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7155">To avoid data loss or other unexpected errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7156">디렉터리 및 경로 지정 시 사용할 수 있는 변수의 목록은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7156">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use when specifying directories and paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7157">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본 캐시 디렉터리가 사용되고 사용자는 '--disk-cache-dir' 명령줄 플래그로 해당 기본값을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7157">If you don't configure this policy, the default cache directory is used, and users can override that default with the '--disk-cache-dir' command line flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7158">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7158">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7159">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7159">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7160">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7160">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7161">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7161">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7162">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7162">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7163">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7163">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7164">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7164">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7165">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7165">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7166">GP 고유 이름: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7166">GP unique name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7167">GP 이름: 디스크 캐시 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7167">GP name: Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7168">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7168">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7169">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7169">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7170">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7170">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7171">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7171">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7172">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7172">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7173">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7173">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7174">값 이름: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7174">Value Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7175">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7175">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7176">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7176">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${user_home}/Edge_cache"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7177">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7177">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7178">기본 설정 키 이름: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7178">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7179">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7179">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7180">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7180">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7181">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7181">DiskCacheSize</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7182">디스크 캐시 크기를 바이트 단위로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7182">Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7183">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7183">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7184">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7184">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7185">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7185">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7186">디스크에 파일을 저장하는 데 사용되는 캐시 크기(바이트)를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7186">Configures the size of the cache, in bytes, used to store files on the disk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7187">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 '--disk-cache-size' 플래그를 지정했는지 여부에 관계 없이 Microsoft Edge는 제공된 캐시 크기를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7187">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided cache size regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7188">해당 정책에 지정된 값은 하드 경계가 아니라 캐싱 시스템에 대한 제안입니다. 일부 메가바이트 아래에 있는 값은 너무 작아서 적절한 최소값으로 반올림됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7188">The value specified in this policy isn't a hard boundary but rather a suggestion to the caching system; any value below a few megabytes is too small and will be rounded up to a reasonable minimum.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7189">해당 정책의 값을 0으로 설정하면 기본 캐시 크기가 사용되고 사용자는 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7189">If you set the value of this policy to 0, the default cache size is used, and users can't change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7190">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본 크기가 사용되지만 사용자는 '--disk-cache-size' 플래그로 크기를 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7190">If you don't configure this policy, the default size is used, but users can override it with the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7191">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7191">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7192">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7192">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7193">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7193">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7194">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7194">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7195">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7195">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7196">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7196">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7197">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7197">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7198">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7198">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7199">GP 고유 이름: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7199">GP unique name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7200">GP 이름: 디스크 캐시 크기를 바이트 단위로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7200">GP name: Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7201">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7201">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7202">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7202">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7203">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7203">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7204">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7204">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7205">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7205">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7206">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7206">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7207">값 이름: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7207">Value Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7208">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7208">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7209">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7209">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x06400000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7210">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7210">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7211">기본 설정 키 이름: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7211">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7212">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7212">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7213">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7213">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7214">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7214">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7215">DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 모드 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7215">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7216">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7216">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7217">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7217">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7218">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7218">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7219">DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 확인 프로그램 모드 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7219">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7220">해당 정책은 각 쿼리에 대해 기본 모드만 설정한다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7220">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7221">해당 모드는 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 서버 호스트 이름을 확인하는 요청과 같은 특별한 유형의 쿼리를 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7221">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7222">"해제" 모드는 DoH(DNS over HTTPS)를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7222">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7223">"자동" 모드는 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 서버를 사용할 수 있는 경우 먼저 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 쿼리를 전송하고 오류가 발생하는 경우 비보안 쿼리를 전송하는 것으로 대체할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7223">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7224">"보안" 모드는 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 쿼리만 전송하며 오류가 발생하는 경우 확인에 실패합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7224">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7225">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 브라우저에서 사용자가 구성한 시스템 확인 프로그램과 연결된 확인 프로그램에 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 요청을 전송할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7225">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7226">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7226">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7227">끄기 (off) = DoH(DNS over-HTTPS) 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7227">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7228">자동 (automatic) = 비보안 대체를 사용하여 DoH(DNS over-HTTPS) 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7228">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7229">보안 (secure) = 비보안 대체를 사용하지 않고 DoH(DNS over-HTTPS) 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7229">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7230">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7230">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7231">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7231">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7232">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7232">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7233">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7233">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7234">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7234">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7235">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7235">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7236">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7236">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7237">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7237">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7238">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7238">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7239">GP 고유 이름: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7239">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7240">GP 이름: DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 모드 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7240">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7241">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7241">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7242">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7242">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7243">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7243">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7244">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7244">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7245">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7245">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7246">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7246">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7247">값 이름: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7247">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7248">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7248">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7249">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7249">Example value:</span></span>

```
"off"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7250">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7250">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7251">기본 설정 키 이름: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7251">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7252">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7252">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7253">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7253">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7254">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7254">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7255">원하는 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 확인자의 URI 서식 파일 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7255">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7256">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7256">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7257">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7257">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7258">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7258">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7259">필요한 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 확인 프로그램의 URI 서식 파일을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7259">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7260">여러 DNS over-HTTPS 확인 프로그램을 지정하려면 해당 URI 서식 파일을 공백으로 구분합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7260">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7261">[DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode)를 "보안"으로 설정한 경우 해당 정책을 설정해야 하며 비워 둘 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7261">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7262">[DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode)를 "자동"으로 설정한 경우 해당 정책이 설정되고 지정된 URI 서식 파일이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7262">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7263">해당 정책을 설정하지 않은 경우 하드 코드된 매핑은 사용자의 현재 DNS 확인 프로그램을 동일한 공급자가 운영하는 DoH 확인 프로그램으로 업그레이드하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7263">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7264">URI 서식 파일에 DNS 변수가 포함된 경우 확인 프로그램에 대한 요청은 GET을 사용합니다. 그렇지 않으면 요청은 POST를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7264">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7265">서식이 올바르지 않은 서식 파일은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7265">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7266">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7266">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7267">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7267">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7268">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7268">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7269">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7269">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7270">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7270">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7271">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7271">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7272">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7272">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7273">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7273">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7274">GP 고유 이름: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7274">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7275">GP 이름: 필요한 DoH(DNS over HTTPS) 확인자의 URI 서식 파일 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7275">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7276">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7276">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7277">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7277">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7278">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7278">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7279">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7279">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7280">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7280">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7281">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7281">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7282">값 이름: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7282">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7283">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7283">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7284">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7284">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7285">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7285">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7286">기본 설정 키 이름: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7286">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7287">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7287">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7288">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7288">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7289">DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7289">DownloadDirectory</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7290">다운로드 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7290">Set download directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7291">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7291">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7292">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7292">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7293">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7293">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7294">파일 다운로드 시 사용할 디렉터리를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7294">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7295">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge는 사용자가 디렉터리를 지정했거나 다운로드할 때마다 다운로드 위치를 선택하라는 메시지가 나타나도록 선택했는지 여부와 관계 없이 제공된 디렉터리를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7295">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7296">사용할 수 있는 변수의 목록은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7296">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7297">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 기본 다운로드 디렉터리가 사용되므로 사용자는 이를 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7297">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7298">잘못된 경로를 설정하는 경우 Microsoft Edge는 기본적으로 사용자의 기본 다운로드 디렉터리를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7298">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7299">경로로 지정된 폴더가 없는 경우 다운로드는 사용자에게 다운로드를 저장할 위치를 묻는 메시지가 나타나도록 트리거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7299">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7300">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7300">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7301">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7301">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7302">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7302">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7303">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7303">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7304">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7304">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7305">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7305">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7306">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7306">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7307">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7307">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7308">GP 고유 이름: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7308">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7309">GP 이름: 다운로드 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7309">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7310">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7310">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7311">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7311">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7312">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7312">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7313">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7313">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7314">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7314">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7315">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7315">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7316">값 이름: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7316">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7317">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7317">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7318">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7318">Example value:</span></span>

```
"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7319">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7319">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7320">기본 설정 키 이름: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7320">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7321">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7321">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7322">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7322">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7323">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7323">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7324">다운로드 제한 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7324">Allow download restrictions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7325">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7325">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7326">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7326">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7327">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7327">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7328">사용자가 보안 결정을 재정의할 수 있도록 허용하지 않고 Microsoft Edge에서 완전히 차단하는 다운로드 유형을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7328">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7329">'BlockDangerousDownloads'를 설정하여 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 실행하는 경우를 제외하고 모든 다운로드를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7329">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7330">'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads'를 설정하여 잠재적으로 위험하거나 원치 않는 다운로드에 대해 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고를 실행하는 경우를 제외하고 모든 다운로드를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7330">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7331">'BlockAllDownloads'를 설정하여 모든 다운로드를 차단합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7331">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7332">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' 옵션을 설정하는 경우 다운로드는 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 분석 결과를 기반으로 하는 일반적인 보안 제한을 통해 진행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7332">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7333">해당 제한은 웹 페이지 콘텐츠의 다운로드 뿐만 아니라 '다운로드 링크...' 상황에 맞는 메뉴 옵션에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7333">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7334">해당 제한은 현재 표시되는 페이지를 저장하거나 다운로드하는 경우에만 적용됩니다. 인쇄 옵션의 PDF로 저장 옵션에는 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7334">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7335">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7335">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7336">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7336">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7337">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = 특별한 제한 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7337">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7338">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = 위험한 다운로드 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7338">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7339">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = 잠재적으로 위험하거나 사용자 동의 없는 다운로드 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7339">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7340">BlockAllDownloads (3) = 모든 다운로드 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7340">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7341">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7341">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7342">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7342">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7343">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7343">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7344">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7344">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7345">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7345">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7346">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7346">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7347">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7347">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7348">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7348">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7349">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7349">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7350">GP 고유 이름: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7350">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7351">GP 이름: 다운로드 제한 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7351">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7352">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7352">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7353">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7353">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7354">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7354">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7355">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7355">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7356">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7356">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7357">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7357">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7358">값 이름: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7358">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7359">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7359">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7360">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7360">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7361">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7361">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7362">기본 설정 키 이름: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7362">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7363">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7363">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7364">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7364">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7365">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7365">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7366">컬렉션 기능 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7366">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7367">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7367">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7368">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7368">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7369">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7369">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7370">사용자가 모음 기능에 액세스하도록 허용하여 Office 통합으로 콘텐츠를 더 효율적으로 수집, 구성, 공유 및 내보낼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7370">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7371">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 모음 기능에 액세스하고 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7371">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7372">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 모음에 액세스하고 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7372">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7373">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7373">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7374">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7374">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7375">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7375">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7376">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7376">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7377">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7377">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7378">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7378">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7379">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7379">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7380">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7380">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7381">GP 고유 이름: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7381">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7382">GP 이름: 컬렉션 기능 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7382">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7383">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7383">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7384">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7384">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7385">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7385">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7386">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7386">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7387">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7387">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7388">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7388">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7389">값 이름: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7389">Value Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7390">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7390">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7391">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7391">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7392">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7392">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7393">기본 설정 키 이름: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7393">Preference Key Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7394">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7394">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7395">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7395">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7396">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7396">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7397">Microsoft Edge에서 쇼핑 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7397">Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7398">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7398">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7399">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7399">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7400">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7400">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7401">이 정책을 사용해서 사용자는 쇼핑 중인 제품 가격을 비교하거나 사용 중인 웹사이트의 쿠폰을 받거나 체크 아웃 시 쿠폰을 자동 적용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7401">This policy lets users compare the prices of a product they are looking at, get coupons or rebates from the website they're on, or auto-apply coupons during checkout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7402">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않을 경우 소매 도메인에 가격 비교, 쿠폰, 리베이트와 같은 쇼핑 기능이 자동으로 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7402">If you enable or don't configure this policy, shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will be automatically applied for retail domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7403">현재 소매업체의 쿠폰과 다른 소매업체의 가격을 서버에서 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7403">Coupons for the current retailer and prices from other retailers will be fetched from a server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7404">이 정책 쇼핑 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 소매 도메인에 대한 가격 비교와 쿠폰, 리베이트가 자동으로 검색되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7404">If you disable this policy shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will not be automatically found for retail domains.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7405">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7405">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7406">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7406">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7407">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7407">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7408">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7408">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7409">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7409">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7410">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7410">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7411">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7411">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7412">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7412">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7413">GP 고유 이름: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7413">GP unique name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7414">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 쇼핑 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7414">GP name: Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7415">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7415">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7416">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7416">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7417">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7417">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7418">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7418">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7419">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7419">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7420">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7420">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7421">값 이름: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7421">Value Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7422">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7422">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7423">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7423">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7424">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7424">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7425">기본 설정 키 이름: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7425">Preference Key Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7426">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7426">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7427">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7427">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7428">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7428">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7429">사용자가 즐겨찾기를 편집할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7429">Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7430">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7430">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7431">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7431">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7432">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7432">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7433">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 즐겨찾기를 추가, 제거 및 수정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7433">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7434">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 해당 작업은 기본 동작이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7434">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>
