<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7435">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 즐겨찾기를 추가, 제거 또는 수정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7435">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7436">사용자는 기존 즐겨찾기를 계속 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7436">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7437">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7437">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7438">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7438">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7439">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7439">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7440">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7440">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7441">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7441">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7442">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7442">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7443">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7443">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7444">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7444">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7445">GP 고유 이름: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7445">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7446">GP 이름: 사용자가 즐겨찾기를 편집할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7446">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7447">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7447">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7448">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7448">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7449">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7449">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7450">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7450">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7451">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7451">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7452">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7452">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7453">값 이름: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7453">Value Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7454">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7454">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7455">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7455">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7456">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7456">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7457">기본 설정 키 이름: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7457">Preference Key Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7458">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7458">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7459">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7459">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7460">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7460">EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7461">제한된 시간 동안 사용되지 않는 웹 플랫폼 기능 다시 사용(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7461">Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-7462">OBSOLETE: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 86 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7462">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 86.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7463">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7463">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7464">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7464">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 86</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7465">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7465">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7466">이 정책은 개인 웹 플랫폼 기능 deprecations를 관리 하는 데 사용 되기 때문에 더 이상 사용 되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7466">This policy is obsolete because dedicated web platform policies are now used to manage individual web platform feature deprecations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7467">사용되지 않는 웹 플랫폼 기능 목록을 임시로 다시 사용할 수 있도록 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7467">Specify a list of deprecated web platform features to temporarily re-enable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7468">해당 정책을 사용하면 제한된 시간 동안 사용되지 않는 웹 플랫폼 기능을 다시 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7468">This policy lets you re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7469">기능은 문자열 태그로 식별됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7469">Features are identified by a string tag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7470">해당 정책을 구성하지 않고 목록이 비어 있거나 기능이 지원되는 문자열 태그 중 하나와 일치하지 않는 경우 사용되지 않는 모든 웹 플랫폼 기능은 계속 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7470">If you don't configure this policy, if the list is empty, or if a feature doesn't match one of the supported string tags, all deprecated web platform features remain disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7471">위의 플랫폼에서 정책 자체가 지원되는 동안 사용할 수 있는 기능은 모든 플랫폼에서 사용하지 못할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7471">While the policy itself is supported on the above platforms, the feature it's enabling might not be available on all of those platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7472">사용되지 않는 모든 웹 플랫폼 기능을 다시 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7472">Not all deprecated Web Platform features can be re-enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7473">아래에 명시적으로 나열된 기능만 제한된 기간 동안에만 다시 사용할 수 있으며 기능별로 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7473">Only those explicitly listed below can be re-enabled, and only for a limited period of time, which differs per feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7474"> https://bit.ly/blinkintents에서 웹 플랫폼 기능 변경 목적을 검토할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7474">You can review the intent behind the Web Platform feature changes at https://bit.ly/blinkintents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7475">문자열 태그의 일반적인 형식은 [DeprecatedFeatureName] _EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd]입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7475">The general format of the string tag is [DeprecatedFeatureName]_EffectiveUntil[yyyymmdd].</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7476">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7476">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7477">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = 2008년 9월 2일까지 ExampleDeprecatedFeature API 사용 가능</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7477">ExampleDeprecatedFeature (ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902) = Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7478">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7478">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7479">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7479">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7480">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7480">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7481">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7481">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7482">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7482">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7483">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7483">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7484">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7484">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7485">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7485">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7486">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7486">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7487">GP 고유 이름: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7487">GP unique name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7488">GP 이름: 제한된 시간 동안 사용되지 않는 웹 플랫폼 기능 다시 사용(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7488">GP name: Re-enable deprecated web platform features for a limited time (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7489">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7489">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7490">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7490">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7491">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7491">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7492">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7492">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7493">Path (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7493">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7494">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7494">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7495">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7495">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7496">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7496">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7497">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7497">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures\1 = "ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7498">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7498">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7499">기본 설정 키 이름: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7499">Preference Key Name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeatures</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7500">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7500">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7501">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7501">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7502">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7502">EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7503">Microsoft에서 도메인 작업 다운로드 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7503">Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-7504">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 84 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7504">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7505">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7505">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7506">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상, 84까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7506">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7507">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7507">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7508">충돌하는 상태를 방지하기 위해 이 정책이 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7508">This policy doesn't work because conflicting states should be avoided.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7509">해당 정책은 도메인 작업 목록의 다운로드를 사용하거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 데 사용되었지만 항상 필요한 상태를 만들지는 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7509">This policy was used to enable/disable download of the domain actions list, but it didn't always achieve the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7510">다운로드를 처리하는 실험 및 구성 서비스에는 서비스에서 다운로드할 내용을 구성하는 고유한 정책이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7510">The Experimentation and Configuration Service, which handles the download, has its own policy to configure what is downloaded from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7511">대신 [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) 정책을 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7511">Use the [ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl](#experimentationandconfigurationservicecontrol) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7512">Microsoft Edge에서 도메인 작업은 브라우저가 웹에서 제대로 작동하는 데 도움이 되는 일련의 호환성 기능을 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7512">In Microsoft Edge, Domain Actions represent a series of compatibility features that help the browser work correctly on the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7513">Microsoft는 호환성을 위해 특정 도메인에 대해 수행할 작업 목록을 유지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7513">Microsoft keeps a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7514">예를 들어 Microsoft Edge에서 새 사용자 에이전트 문자열로 인해 웹 사이트가 손상되면 브라우저는 웹 사이트의 사용자 에이전트 문자열을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7514">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7515">각 해당 작업은 일시적이며 Microsoft에서는 사이트 소유자와 관련된 문제를 해결하려고 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7515">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7516">브라우저 시작 후 주기적으로 수행되면 브라우저에서 수행할 호환성 작업의 최신 목록을 포함하는 실험 및 구성 서비스에 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7516">When the browser starts up and then periodically afterwards, the browser will contact the Experimentation and Configuration Service that contains the most up to date list of compatibility actions to perform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7517">해당 목록은 최초 검색된 이후 로컬에 저장되므로 이후의 요청은 서버 복사가 변경된 경우에만 목록을 업데이트합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7517">This list is saved locally after it is first retrieved so that subsequent requests will only update the list if the server's copy has changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7518">해당 정책을 사용하면 도메인 작업의 목록이 실험 및 구성 서비스에서 계속 다운로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7518">If you enable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7519">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 도메인 작업의 목록이 실험 및 구성 서비스에서 더 이상 다운로드되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7519">If you disable this policy, the list of Domain Actions will no longer be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7520">해당 정책을 구성하지 않은면 도메인 작업의 목록이 실험 및 구성 서비스에서 계속 다운로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7520">If you don't configure this policy, the list of Domain Actions will continue to be downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7521">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7521">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7522">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7522">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7523">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7523">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7524">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7524">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7525">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7525">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7526">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7526">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7527">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7527">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7528">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7528">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7529">GP 고유 이름: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7529">GP unique name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7530">GP 이름: Microsoft에서 도메인 작업 다운로드 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7530">GP name: Enable Domain Actions Download from Microsoft (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7531">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7531">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7532">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7532">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7533">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7533">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7534">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7534">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7535">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7535">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7536">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7536">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7537">값 이름: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7537">Value Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7538">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7538">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7539">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7539">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7540">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7540">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7541">기본 설정 키 이름: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7541">Preference Key Name: EnableDomainActionsDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7542">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7542">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7543">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7543">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7544">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7544">EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7545">온라인 OCSP/CRL 검사 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7545">Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7546">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7546">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7547">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7547">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7548">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7548">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7549">온라인 해지 검사는 상당한 보안 이점을 제공하지 못하며 기본적으로 사용하지 않도록 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7549">Online revocation checks don't provide a significant security benefit and are disabled by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7550">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge가 소프트 오류, 온라인 OCSP/CRL 검사를 수행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7550">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will perform soft-fail, online OCSP/CRL checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7551">"소프트 오류"는 해지 서버에 연결할 수 없는 경우 인증서가 유효한 것으로 간주되었음을 의미합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7551">"Soft fail" means that if the revocation server can't be reached, the certificate will be considered valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7552">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 온라인 해지 검사를 수행하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7552">If you disable the policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge won't perform online revocation checks.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7553">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7553">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7554">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7554">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7555">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7555">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7556">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7556">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7557">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7557">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7558">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7558">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7559">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7559">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7560">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7560">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7561">GP 고유 이름: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7561">GP unique name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7562">GP 이름: 온라인 OCSP/CRL 검사 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7562">GP name: Enable online OCSP/CRL checks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7563">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7563">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7564">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7564">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7565">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7565">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7566">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7566">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7567">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7567">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7568">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7568">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7569">값 이름: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7569">Value Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7570">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7570">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7571">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7571">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7572">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7572">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7573">기본 설정 키 이름: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7573">Preference Key Name: EnableOnlineRevocationChecks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7574">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7574">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7575">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7575">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7576">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7576">EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7577">로컬 트러스트 앵커에서 발급한 경우 SHA-1을 사용하여 서명한 인증서 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7577">Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-7578">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7578">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7579">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7579">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7580">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7580">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7581">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7581">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7582">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7582">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7583">이 설정을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge는 인증서 체인이 로컬에 설치된 루트 인증서에 연결되고 그 외에는 유효하지 않은 경우 SHA-1로 서명되어 보안된 연결을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7583">When this setting is enabled, Microsoft Edge allows connections secured by SHA-1 signed certificates so long as the the certificate chains to a locally-installed root certificate and is otherwise valid.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7584">이 정책은 SHA-1 서명을 허용하는 OS(운영 체제) 인증서 확인 스택에 따라 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7584">Note that this policy depends on the operating system (OS) certificate verification stack allowing SHA-1 signatures.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7585">OS 업데이트에서 SHA-1 인증서의 OS 처리를 변경하는 경우 이 정책의 효력이 더 이상 없을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7585">If an OS update changes the OS handling of SHA-1 certificates, this policy might no longer have effect.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7586">또한 이 정책은 엔터프라이즈에서 SHA-1을 제거하는 데 시간을 벌어주는 임시 해결 방법으로 고안되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7586">Further, this policy is intended as a temporary workaround to give enterprises more time to move away from SHA-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7587">이 정책은 2021년 중반에 릴리스될 Microsoft Edge 92 릴리스에서 제거될 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7587">This policy will be removed in Microsoft Edge 92 releasing in mid 2021.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7588">이 정책을 설정하지 않거나 False로 설정하거나 SHA-1 인증서 체인을 신뢰할 수 있는 인증서 루트로 설정하지 않는 경우 Microsoft Edge는 SHA-1로 서명된 인증서를 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7588">If you don't set this policy or set it to false, or the SHA-1 certificate chains to a publicly trusted certificate root, then Microsoft Edge won't allow certificates signed by SHA-1.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7589">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7589">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7590">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7590">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7591">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7591">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7592">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7592">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7593">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7593">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7594">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7594">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7595">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7595">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7596">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7596">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7597">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7597">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7598">GP 고유 이름: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7598">GP unique name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7599">GP 이름: 로컬 트러스트 앵커에서 발급한 경우 SHA-1을 사용하여 서명한 인증서 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7599">GP name: Allow certificates signed using SHA-1 when issued by local trust anchors (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7600">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7600">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7601">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7601">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7602">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7602">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7603">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7603">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7604">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7604">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7605">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7605">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7606">값 이름: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7606">Value Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7607">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7607">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7608">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7608">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7609">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7609">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7610">기본 설정 키 이름: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7610">Preference Key Name: EnableSha1ForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7611">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7611">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7612">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7612">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7613">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7613">EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7614">Managed Extensions에서 엔터프라이즈 하드웨어 플랫폼 API를 사용할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7614">Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7615">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7615">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7616">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7616">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7617">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7617">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7618">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 엔터프라이즈 정책에서 설치한 확장은 엔터프라이즈 하드웨어 플랫폼 API를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7618">When this policy is set to enabled, extensions installed by enterprise policy are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7619">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 설정하지 않으면 엔터프라이즈 하드웨어 플랫폼 API를 사용할 수 있는 확장은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7619">When this policy is set to disabled or isn't set, no extensions are allowed to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7620">해당 정책은 구성 요소 확장에도 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7620">This policy also applies to component extensions.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7621">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7621">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7622">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7622">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7623">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7623">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7624">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7624">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7625">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7625">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7626">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7626">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7627">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7627">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7628">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7628">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7629">GP 고유 이름: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7629">GP unique name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7630">GP 이름: 관리 확장에서 엔터프라이즈 하드웨어 플랫폼 API를 사용할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7630">GP name: Allow managed extensions to use the Enterprise Hardware Platform API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7631">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7631">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7632">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7632">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7633">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7633">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7634">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7634">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7635">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7635">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7636">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7636">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7637">값 이름: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7637">Value Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7638">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7638">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7639">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7639">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7640">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7640">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7641">기본 설정 키 이름: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7641">Preference Key Name: EnterpriseHardwarePlatformAPIEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7642">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7642">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7643">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7643">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7644">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7644">EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7645">엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 관리자 도구에 대한 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7645">Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7646">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7646">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7647">Windows 86 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7647">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7648">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7648">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7649">사용자가 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 관리자를 사용할 수 있는지 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7649">Allows you to set whether Enterprise Mode Site List Manager is available to users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7650">이 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 edge://compat 페이지에서 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 관리자 탐색 단추를 볼 수 있습니다. 그런 다음 도구를 탐색하여 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7650">If you enable this policy, users can see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button on edge://compat page, navigate to the tool and use it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7651">이 정책을 사용하지 않거나 구성하지 않는 경우 사용자에게 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 관리자 탐색 단추가 표시되지 않으며 사용자는 이를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7651">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users won't see the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager nav button and won't be able to use it.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7652">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7652">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7653">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7653">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7654">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7654">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7655">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7655">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7656">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7656">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7657">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7657">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7658">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7658">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7659">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7659">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7660">GP 고유 이름: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7660">GP unique name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7661">GP 이름: 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 관리자 도구에 대한 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7661">GP name: Allow access to the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager tool</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7662">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7662">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7663">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7663">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7664">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7664">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7665">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7665">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7666">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7666">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7667">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7667">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7668">값 이름: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7668">Value Name: EnterpriseModeSiteListManagerAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7669">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7669">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7670">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7670">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7671">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7671">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7672">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7672">ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7673">도메인에서 지정된 파일 형식에 대한 다운로드 파일 형식 확장자 기반 경고 비활성화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7673">Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7674">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7674">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7675">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7675">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7676">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7676">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7677">이 정책을 사용하면 파일 형식 확장명 기반 다운로드 경고에서 제외될 해당 도메인 목록으로 파일 형식 확장명 사전을 만들 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7677">You can enable this policy to create a dictionary of file type extensions with a corresponding list of domains that will be exempted from file type extension-based download warnings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7678">이렇게 하면 엔터프라이즈 관리자는 나열된 도메인과 연결된 파일에 대한 파일 형식 확장자 기반 다운로드 경고를 차단할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7678">This lets enterprise administrators block file type extension-based download warnings for files that are associated with a listed domain.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7679">예를 들어, "jnlp" 확장자가 "website1.com" 과 연결된 경우, 사용자는 "website1.com" 에서 "jnlp" 파일을 다운로드할 때 경고가 표시되지 않지만 "website2.com" 에서 "jnlp" 파일을 다운로드할 때 다운로드 경고가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7679">For example, if  the "jnlp" extension is associated with "website1.com", users would not see a warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website1.com", but see a download warning when downloading "jnlp" files from "website2.com".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7680">이 정책에서 식별된 도메인에 대해 지정된 파일 형식 확장자가 있는 파일은 여전히 혼합 콘텐츠 다운로드 경고 및 Microsoft Defender SmartScreen 경고와 같은 비파일 형식 확장자 기반 보안 경고가 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7680">Files with file type extensions specified for domains identified by this policy will still be subject to non-file type extension-based security warnings such as mixed-content download warnings and Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7681">이 정책을 사용하지 않거나 구성하지 않으면 확장 프로그램 기반 다운로드 경고를 트리거하는 파일 형식이 사용자에게 경고를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7681">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, file types that trigger extension-based download warnings will show warnings to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7682">이 정책을 활성화한 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7682">If you enable this policy:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7683">[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)에 따라 URL 패턴의 형식을 지정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7683">The URL pattern should be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>
* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7684">입력한 파일 형식 확장자는 소문자 ASCII여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7684">The file type extension entered must be in lower-cased ASCII.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7685">파일 형식 확장자를 나열할 때 줄 간격 구분 기호를 포함해서는 안 되므로 ".jnlp" 대신 "jnlp" 를 나열해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7685">The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type extension, so list "jnlp" should be used instead of ".jnlp".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7686">예제:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7686">Example:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7687">다음 예제 값은 \*.contoso.com 도메인에 대한 swf, exe 및 jnlp 확장자에 대한 파일 형식 확장자 기반 다운로드 경고를 방지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7687">The following example value would prevent file type extension-based download warnings on swf, exe, and jnlp extensions for \*.contoso.com domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7688">사용자에게 exe 및 jnlp 파일에 대한 다른 도메인의 파일 형식 확장자 기반 다운로드 경고가 표시되지만 swf 파일에는 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7688">It will show the user a file type extension-based download warning on any other domain for exe and jnlp files, but not for swf files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7689">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7689">[ { "file_extension": "jnlp", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "exe", "domains": ["contoso.com"] }, { "file_extension": "swf", "domains": ["\*"] } ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7690">앞의 예는 모든 도메인에 대해 "swf" 파일에 대한 파일 형식 확장자 기반 다운로드 경고를 비표시하는 것을 보여주지만 보안 문제로 인해 위험한 파일 형식 확장자에 대한 모든 도메인에 대해 이러한 경고를 비표시하는 것은 권장되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7690">Note that while the preceding example shows the suppression of file type extension-based download warnings for "swf" files for all domains, applying suppression of such warnings for all domains for any dangerous file type extension is not recommended due to security concerns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7691">이 예제에서는 단지 이 작업을 수행하는 기능을 보여줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7691">It is shown in the example merely to demonstrate the ability to do so.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7692">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7692">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7693">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7693">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7694">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7694">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7695">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7695">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7696">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7696">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7697">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7697">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7698">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7698">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7699">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7699">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7700">GP 고유 이름: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7700">GP unique name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7701">GP 이름: 도메인에서 지정된 파일 형식에 대한 다운로드 파일 형식 확장자 기반 경고 비활성화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7701">GP name: Disable download file type extension-based warnings for specified file types on domains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7702">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7702">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7703">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7703">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7704">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7704">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7705">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7705">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7706">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7706">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7707">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7707">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7708">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7708">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7709">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7709">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7710">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7710">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\1 = {"domains": ["https://contoso.com", "contoso2.com"], "file_extension": "jnlp"}
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings\2 = {"domains": ["*"], "file_extension": "swf"}

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7711">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7711">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7712">기본 설정 키 이름: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7712">Preference Key Name: ExemptDomainFileTypePairsFromFileTypeDownloadWarnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7713">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7713">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{'domains': ['https://contoso.com', 'contoso2.com'], 'file_extension': 'jnlp'}</string>
  <string>{'domains': ['*'], 'file_extension': 'swf'}</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7714">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7714">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7715">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7715">ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7716">실험 및 구성 서비스와의 통신 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7716">Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7717">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7717">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7718">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7718">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7719">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7719">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7720">Microsoft Edge에서 실험 및 구성 서비스는 실험 및 구성 페이로드를 배포하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7720">In Microsoft Edge, the Experimentation and Configuration Service is used to deploy Experimentation and Configuration payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7721">실험 페이로드는 Microsoft에서 테스트 및 피드백을 위해 사용하는 개발 기능 중 초기의 목록으로 구성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7721">Experimentation payload consists of a list of early in development features that Microsoft is enabling for testing and feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7722">구성 페이로드는 Microsoft가 사용자 환경을 최적화하기 위해 Microsoft Edge를 배포하려고 하는 설정 목록으로 구성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7722">Configuration payload consists of a list of settings that Microsoft wants to deploy to Microsoft Edge to optimize user experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7723">예를 들어 구성 페이로드는 Microsoft Edge가 실험 및 구성 서비스에 대한 요청을 전송하는 빈도를 지정하여 최신 페이로드를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7723">For example, configuration payload may specify how often Microsoft Edge sends requests to the Experimentation and Configuration Service to retrieve the newest payload.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7724">뿐만 아니라 구성 페이로드에는 호환성을 위해 특정 도메인을 실행할 수 있는 작업 목록이 포함될 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7724">Additionaly, configuration payload may also contain a list of actions to take on certain domains for compatibility reasons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7725">예를 들어 Microsoft Edge에서 새 사용자 에이전트 문자열로 인해 웹 사이트가 손상되면 브라우저는 웹 사이트의 사용자 에이전트 문자열을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7725">For example, the browser may override the User Agent string on a website if that website is broken due to the new User Agent string on Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7726">각 해당 작업은 일시적이며 Microsoft에서는 사이트 소유자와 관련된 문제를 해결하려고 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7726">Each of these actions is intended to be temporary while Microsoft tries to resolve the issue with the site owner.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7727">해당 정책을 'FullMode' 모드로 설정하면 전체 페이로드는 실험 및 구성 서비스에서 다운로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7727">If you set this policy to 'FullMode', the full payload is downloaded from the Experimentation and Configuration Service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7728">여기에는 실험 및 구성 페이로드가 모두 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7728">This includes both the experimentation and configuration payloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7729">해당 정책을 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode' 모드로 설정하면 구성 페이로드만 전달됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7729">If you set this policy to 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode', only the configuration payload is delivered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7730">해당 정책을 'RestrictedMode'로 설정하면 실험 및 구성 서비스와의 통신이 완전히 중지됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7730">If you set this policy to 'RestrictedMode', the communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service is stopped completely.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7731">해당 정책을 구성하지 않은 경우 안정된 베타 채널의 관리 장치에서 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode’와 동일하게 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7731">If you don't configure this policy, on a managed device on Stable and Beta channels the behavior is the same as the 'ConfigurationsOnlyMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7732">해당 정책을 구성하지 않은 경우 관리되지 않은 장치에서 'FullMode'와 동일하게 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7732">If you don't configure this policy, on an unmanaged device the behavior is the same as the 'FullMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7733">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7733">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7734">FullMode (2) = 구성 및 실험 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7734">FullMode (2) = Retrieve configurations and experiments</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7735">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = 구성만 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7735">ConfigurationsOnlyMode (1) = Retrieve configurations only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7736">RestrictedMode (0) = 실험 및 구성 서비스와 통신 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7736">RestrictedMode (0) = Disable communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7737">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7737">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7738">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7738">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7739">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7739">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7740">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7740">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7741">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7741">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7742">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7742">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7743">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7743">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7744">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7744">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7745">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7745">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7746">GP 고유 이름: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7746">GP unique name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7747">GP 이름: 실험 및 구성 서비스와의 통신 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7747">GP name: Control communication with the Experimentation and Configuration Service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7748">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7748">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7749">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7749">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7750">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7750">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7751">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7751">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7752">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7752">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7753">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7753">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7754">값 이름: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7754">Value Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7755">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7755">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7756">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7756">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7757">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7757">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7758">기본 설정 키 이름: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7758">Preference Key Name: ExperimentationAndConfigurationServiceControl</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7759">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7759">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7760">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7760">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7761">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7761">ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7762">외부 프로토콜 대화 상자에서 "항상 열기" 확인란 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7762">Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7763">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7763">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7764">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7764">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7765">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7765">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7766">해당 정책은 외부 프로토콜 시작 확인 프롬프트에서 "해당 사이트에서 해당 유형의 링크를 항상 열 수 있도록 허용" 확인란의 표시 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7766">This policy controls whether the "Always allow this site to open links of this type" checkbox is shown on external protocol launch confirmation prompts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7767">이 정책은 https:// 링크에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7767">This policy only applies to https:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7768">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하는 경우 외부 프로토콜 확인 메시지가 표시되면 사용자는 "항상 허용"을 선택하여 해당 사이트의 프로토콜에 대한 이후의 모든 확인 메시지를 건너뛸 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7768">If you enable this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7769">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 "항상 허용" 확인란이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7769">If you disable this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7770">외부 프로토콜이 호출될 때마다 사용자에게 확인 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7770">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7771">Microsoft Edge 83 이전에는 이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 "항상 허용" 확인란이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7771">Prior to Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the "Always allow" checkbox isn't displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7772">외부 프로토콜이 호출될 때마다 사용자에게 확인 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7772">The user will be prompted for confirmation every time an external protocol is invoked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7773">Microsoft Edge 83에서 이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 edge://flags에서 "프로토콜 시작 프롬프트 기본 설정 기억 사용” 플래그로 확인란 표시가 제어됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7773">On Microsoft Edge 83, if you don't configure this policy, the checkbox visibility is controlled by the "Enable remembering protocol launch prompting preferences" flag in edge://flags</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7774">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 외부 프로토콜 확인 메시지가 표시될 때 사용자는 "항상 허용"을 선택하여 해당 사이트의 프로토콜에 대한 이후의 모든 확인 메시지를 건너뛸 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7774">As of Microsoft Edge 84, if you don't configure this policy, when an external protocol confirmation prompt is shown, the user can select "Always allow" to skip all future confirmation prompts for the protocol on this site.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7775">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7775">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7776">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7776">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7777">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7777">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7778">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7778">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7779">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7779">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7780">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7780">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7781">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7781">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7782">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7782">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7783">GP 고유 이름: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7783">GP unique name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7784">GP 이름: 외부 프로토콜 대화 상자에서 "항상 열기" 확인란 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7784">GP name: Show an "Always open" checkbox in external protocol dialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7785">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7785">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7786">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7786">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7787">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7787">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7788">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7788">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7789">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7789">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7790">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7790">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7791">값 이름: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7791">Value Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7792">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7792">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7793">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7793">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7794">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7794">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7795">기본 설정 키 이름: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7795">Preference Key Name: ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7796">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7796">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7797">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7797">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7798">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7798">FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7799">사용자가 가족 보호를 구성할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7799">Allow users to configure Family safety</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7800">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7800">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7801">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7801">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7802">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7802">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7803">해당 정책은 설정의 가족 보호 페이지를 비활성화하고 완전히 숨깁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7803">This policy disables and completely hides the Family safety page in Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7804">edge://settings/familysafety로의 탐색도 차단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7804">Navigation to edge://settings/familysafety will also be blocked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7805">가족 보호 페이지에서는 가족 그룹에 대해 사용할 수 있는 기능과 가족 그룹에 가입하는 방법에 대해 설명합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7805">The Family safety page describes what features are available for family groups and how to join a family group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7806">가족 보호에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7806">Learn more about family safety here: ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2098432)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7807">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 가족 보호 페이지에 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7807">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Family safety page will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7808">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 가족 호보 페이지가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7808">If you disable this policy, the Family safety page will not be shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7809">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7809">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7810">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7810">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7811">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7811">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7812">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7812">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7813">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7813">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7814">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7814">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7815">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7815">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7816">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7816">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7817">GP 고유 이름: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7817">GP unique name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7818">GP 이름: 사용자가 가족 보호를 구성할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7818">GP name: Allow users to configure Family safety</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7819">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7819">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7820">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7820">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7821">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7821">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7822">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7822">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7823">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7823">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7824">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7824">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7825">값 이름: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7825">Value Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7826">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7826">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7827">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7827">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7828">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7828">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7829">기본 설정 키 이름: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7829">Preference Key Name: FamilySafetySettingsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7830">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7830">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7831">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7831">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7832">FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7832">FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7833">즐겨찾기 모음 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7833">Enable favorites bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7834">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7834">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7835">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7835">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7836">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7836">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7837">즐겨찾기 모음을 사용하거나 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7837">Enables or disables the favorites bar.</span></span>
