<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7838">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자에게 즐겨찾기 모음이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7838">If you enable this policy, users will see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7839">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 사용자에게 즐겨찾기 모음이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7839">If you disable this policy, users won't see the favorites bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7840">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 즐겨찾기 모음 사용 여부를 결정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7840">If this policy is not configured, then the user can decide to use the favorites bar or not.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7841">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7841">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7842">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7842">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7843">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7843">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7844">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7844">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7845">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7845">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7846">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7846">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7847">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7847">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7848">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7848">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7849">GP 고유 이름: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7849">GP unique name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7850">GP 이름: 즐겨찾기 모음 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7850">GP name: Enable favorites bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7851">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7851">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7852">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7852">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7853">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7853">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7854">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7854">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7855">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7855">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7856">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7856">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7857">값 이름: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7857">Value Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7858">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7858">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7859">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7859">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7860">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7860">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7861">기본 설정 키 이름: FavoritesBarEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7861">Preference Key Name: FavoritesBarEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7862">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7862">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7863">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7863">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7864">ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7864">ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7865">Bing 유해 정보 차단 적용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7865">Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7866">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7866">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7867">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7867">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7868">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7868">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7869">Bing 웹 검색의 쿼리가 지정된 값으로 설정된 유해 정보 차단 기능으로 수행되는지 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7869">Ensure that queries in Bing web search are done with SafeSearch set to the value specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7870">사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7870">Users can't change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7871">해당 정책을 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode’로 구성하면 Bing 검색의 유해 정보 차단 기능은 bing.com 값으로 돌아갑니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7871">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode', SafeSearch in Bing search falls back to the bing.com value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7872">해당 정책을 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode'로 구성하면 유해 정보 차단 기능에서 보통 설정이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7872">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode', the moderate setting is used in SafeSearch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7873">보통 설정은 성인용 비디오와 이미지를 필터링하지만 검색 결과에서 텍스트를 필터링하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7873">The moderate setting filters adult videos and images but not text from search results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7874">해당 정책을 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode'로 구성하면 유해 정보 차단 기능에서 고급 설정이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7874">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode', the strict setting in SafeSearch is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7875">고급 설정은 성인용 텍스트, 이미지 및 비디오를 필터링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7875">The strict setting filters adult text, images, and videos.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7876">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Bing 검색에서 유해 정보 차단 기능이 적용되지 않으므로 사용자는 bing.com에서 원하는 값을 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7876">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Bing search isn't enforced, and users can set the value they want on bing.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7877">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7877">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7878">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Bing에서 검색 제한 구성 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7878">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Don't configure search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7879">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Bing에서 보통 검색 제한 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7879">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configure moderate search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7880">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Bing에서 고급 검색 제한 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7880">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configure strict search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7881">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7881">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7882">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7882">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7883">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7883">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7884">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7884">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7885">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7885">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7886">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7886">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7887">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7887">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7888">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7888">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7889">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7889">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7890">GP 고유 이름: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7890">GP unique name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7891">GP 이름: Bing 유해 정보 차단 적용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7891">GP name: Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7892">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7892">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7893">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7893">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7894">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7894">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7895">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7895">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7896">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7896">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7897">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7897">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7898">값 이름: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7898">Value Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7899">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7899">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7900">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7900">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7901">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7901">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7902">기본 설정 키 이름: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7902">Preference Key Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7903">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7903">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7904">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7904">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7905">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7905">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7906">"AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"를 사용하여 구성한 사이트에 대해 일치하는 인증서가 여러 개인 경우 Microsoft Edge에서 자동으로 인증서를 선택할 것인지 여부 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7906">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7907">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7907">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7908">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7908">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7909">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7909">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7910">사용할 수 있는 인증서가 여러 개 있고 사이트가 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 정책으로 구성된 경우 사용자에게 인증서를 선택하라는 메시지의 표시 여부를 토글합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7910">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7911">사이트에 대해 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자에게 항상 인증서를 선택하라는 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7911">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7912">해당 정책을 True로 설정하면 두 개 이상의 인증서가 있는 경우 Microsoft Edge에서 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 정책에 정의된 목록에서 사이트에 대한 인증서를 선택하라는 메시지를 사용자에게 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7912">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7913">해당 정책을 False로 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 인증서와 일치하는 항목이 여러 개 있는 경우에도 Microsoft Edge에서 인증서를 자동으로 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7913">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7914">사용자에게 [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) 정책에 정의된 목록에서 사이트에 대한 인증서를 선택하라는 메시지가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7914">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7915">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7915">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7916">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7916">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7917">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7917">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7918">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7918">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7919">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7919">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7920">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7920">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7921">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7921">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7922">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7922">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7923">GP 고유 이름: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7923">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7924">GP 이름: "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"를 사용하여 구성한 사이트에 대해 일치하는 인증서가 여러 개인 경우 Microsoft Edge에서 자동으로 인증서를 선택할 것인지 여부 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7924">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7925">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7925">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7926">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7926">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7927">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7927">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7928">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7928">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7929">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7929">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7930">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7930">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7931">값 이름: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7931">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7932">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7932">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7933">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7933">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7934">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7934">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7935">기본 설정 키 이름: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7935">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7936">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7936">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7937">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7937">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7938">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7938">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7939">임시 프로필 사용 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7939">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7940">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7940">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7941">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7941">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7942">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7942">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7943">사용자 프로필의 임시 모드 전환 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7943">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7944">세션이 시작되면 임시 프로필이 생성되고 세션이 종료되면 삭제되며 사용자의 원본 프로필과 연결됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7944">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7945">해당 정책을 사용하면 프로필이 임시 모드로 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7945">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7946">이로 인해 사용자는 해당 장치에 검색 데이터를 저장하지 않고도 자신의 장치에서 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7946">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7947">예를 들어 OS 정책으로 해당 정책을 사용하면(예: Windows에서 GPO를 사용하여) 시스템의 모든 프로필에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7947">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7948">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 브라우저에 로그인할 때 일반 프로필을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7948">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7949">임시 모드에서 프로필 데이터는 사용자 세션의 기간 동안만 디스크에 저장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7949">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7950">브라우저가 닫힌 후에는 브라우저 기록, 확장 및 해당 데이터와 같은 기능, 쿠키와 같은 웹 데이터, 웹 데이터베이스를 저장하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7950">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7951">따라서 사용자는 수동으로 디스크에 데이터를 다운로드하거나 페이지를 저장하거나 인쇄할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7951">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7952">사용자가 동기화를 사용하도록 설정한 경우 모든 데이터가 일반 프로필과 마찬가지로 동기화 계정에서 보존됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7952">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7953">명시적으로 해당 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정하지 않는 한 사용자는 임시 모드에서 InPrivate 검색을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7953">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7954">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7954">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7955">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7955">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7956">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7956">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7957">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7957">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7958">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7958">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7959">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7959">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7960">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7960">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7961">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7961">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7962">GP 고유 이름: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7962">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7963">GP 이름: 임시 프로필 사용 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7963">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7964">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7964">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7965">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7965">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7966">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7966">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7967">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7967">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7968">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7968">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7969">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7969">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7970">값 이름: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7970">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7971">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7971">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7972">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7972">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7973">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7973">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7974">기본 설정 키 이름: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7974">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7975">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7975">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7976">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7976">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7977">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7977">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7978">Google 유해 정보 차단 적용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7978">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7979">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7979">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7980">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7980">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7981">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7981">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7982">유해 정보 차단 기능을 활성으로 설정한 상태에서 Google 웹 검색의 쿼리를 실행하도록 하고 사용자가 해당 설정을 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7982">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7983">해당 정책을 사용하면 Google 검색의 유해 정보 차단 기능이 항상 활성 상태가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7983">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-7984">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Google 검색의 유해 정보 차단 기능이 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7984">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7985">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7985">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7986">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7986">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7987">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7987">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7988">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7988">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7989">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7989">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7990">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7990">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7991">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7991">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7992">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7992">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7993">GP 고유 이름: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7993">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7994">GP 이름: Google 유해 정보 차단 적용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7994">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7995">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7995">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7996">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7996">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7997">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7997">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7998">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7998">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-7999">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-7999">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8000">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8000">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8001">값 이름: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8001">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8002">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8002">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8003">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8003">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8004">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8004">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8005">기본 설정 키 이름: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8005">Preference Key Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8006">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8006">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8007">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8007">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8008">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8008">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8009">no-referrer-when-downgrade의 기본 참조자 정책 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8009">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-8010">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 88 이후로는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8010">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8011">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8011">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8012">Windows 및 macOS(81부터 88까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8012">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 88</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8013">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8013">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8014">이 정책은 엔터프라이즈에서 새 기본 참조자 정책과 호환되지 않는 것으로 확인된 경우 웹 콘텐츠를 업데이트할 시간을 더 주기 위한 단기적 메커니즘일 뿐이기 때문에 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8014">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with the new default referrer policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8015">Microsoft Edge의 기본 참조자 정책은 no-referrer-when-downgrade의 값에서 보다 안전한 strict-origin-when-cross-origin으로 강화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8015">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy was strengthened from the value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8016">이 엔터프라이즈 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge의 기본 참조자 정책이 no-referrer-when-downgrade의 이전 값으로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8016">When this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8017">이 엔터프라이즈 정책은 기본적으로 사용하지 않도록 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8017">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8018">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8018">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8019">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8019">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8020">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8020">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8021">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8021">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8022">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8022">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8023">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8023">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8024">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8024">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8025">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8025">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8026">GP 고유 이름: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8026">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8027">GP 이름: no-referrer-when-downgrade의 기본 참조자 정책 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8027">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8028">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8028">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8029">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8029">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8030">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8030">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8031">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8031">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8032">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8032">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8033">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8033">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8034">값 이름: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8034">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8035">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8035">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8036">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8036">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8037">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8037">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8038">기본 설정 키 이름: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8038">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8039">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8039">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8040">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8040">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8041">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8041">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8042">브라우저 프로세스에서 네트워킹 코드 실행 강제(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8042">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-8043">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 83 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8043">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8044">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8044">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8045">Windows 78~83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8045">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8046">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8046">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8047">이 정책은 엔터프라이즈에 네트워킹 API 연결에 의존하지 않는 타사 소프트웨어로 마이그레이션할 수 있는 시간을 더 주기 위한 목적만을 가진 단기 메커니즘으로서 더 이상 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8047">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8048">프록시 서버는 LSP 및 Win32 API 패치 보다 권장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8048">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8049">해당 정책은 브라우저 프로세스에서 네트워킹 코드를 강제로 실행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8049">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8050">해당 정책은 기본적으로 사용하지 않도록 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8050">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8051">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 사용자는 네트워킹 프로세스가 샌드 박싱될 때 보안 문제에 노출될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8051">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8052">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8052">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8053">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8053">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8054">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8054">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8055">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8055">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8056">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8056">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8057">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8057">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8058">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8058">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8059">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8059">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8060">GP 고유 이름: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8060">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8061">GP 이름: 브라우저 프로세스에서 네트워킹 코드 실행 강제(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8061">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8062">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8062">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8063">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8063">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8064">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8064">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8065">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8065">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8066">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8066">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8067">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8067">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8068">값 이름: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8068">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8069">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8069">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8070">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8070">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8071">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8071">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8072">ForceSync.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8072">ForceSync</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8073">브라우저 데이터를 강제로 동기화하고 동기화 동의 프롬프트를 표시 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8073">Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8074">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8074">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8075">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8075">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8076">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8076">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8077">Microsoft Edge에서 데이터 동기화를 강제적으로 하게 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8077">Forces data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8078">또한 이 정책은 사용자가 동기화를 끌 수 없게 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8078">This policy also prevents the user from turning sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8079">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자가 동기화를 켜거나 끌 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8079">If you don't configure this policy, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8080">이 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 동기화를 끌 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8080">If you enable this policy, users will not be able to turn sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8081">이 정책이 의도한 대로 작동하려면 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 정책을 구성하지 않거나 또는 사용함으로 설정해야합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8081">For this policy to work as intended, [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy must not be configured, or must be set to enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8082">[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)이 사용하지 않도록 설정되어 있으면 [ForceSync](#forcesync)가 영향을 받지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8082">If [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) is set to disabled, then [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8083">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)를 구성하지 않거나 False로 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8083">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) must not be configured or must be set to False.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8084">True로 설정하면 [ForceSync](#forcesync)에 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8084">If this is set to True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8085">0 = 동기화를 자동으로 시작하지 않고 동기화 동의 표시(기본값) 1 = Azure AD/Azure AD- 사용자 프로필이 저하되고 동기화 동의 프롬프트가 표시되지 않음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8085">0 = Do not automatically start sync and show the sync consent (default) 1 = Force sync to be turned on for Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded user profile and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8086">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8086">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8087">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8087">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8088">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8088">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8089">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8089">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8090">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8090">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8091">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8091">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8092">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8092">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8093">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8093">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8094">GP 고유 이름: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8094">GP unique name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8095">GP 이름: 브라우저 데이터를 강제로 동기화하고 동기화 동의 프롬프트를 표시 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8095">GP name: Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8096">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8096">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8097">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8097">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8098">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8098">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8099">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8099">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8100">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8100">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8101">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8101">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8102">값 이름: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8102">Value Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8103">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8103">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8104">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8104">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8105">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8105">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8106">기본 설정 키 이름: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8106">Preference Key Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8107">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8107">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8108">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8108">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8109">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8109">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8110">최소 YouTube 제한 모드 강제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8110">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8111">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8111">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8112">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8112">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8113">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8113">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8114">YouTube에서 최소 제한 모드를 적용하고 사용자가 덜 제한된 모드를 선택하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8114">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8115">‘고급’으로 설정하여 YouTube에 고급 제한 모드를 적용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8115">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8116">‘보통’으로 설정하여 사용자가 YouTube에서 보통 제한 모드 및 고급 제한 모드만 사용하도록 적용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8116">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8117">제한 모드를 사용하지 않도록 설정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8117">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8118">‘해제’로 설정하거나 해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 YouTube에 제한 모드를 적용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8118">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8119">YouTube 정책과 같은 외부 정책으로 제한 모드를 계속 적용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8119">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8120">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8120">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8121">해제 (0) = YouTube에서 제한 모드 적용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8121">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8122">보통 (1) = YouTube에서 보통 제한 모드 이상 적용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8122">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8123">고급 (2) = YouTube에 고급 제한 모드 적용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8123">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8124">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8124">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8125">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8125">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8126">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8126">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8127">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8127">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8128">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8128">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8129">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8129">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8130">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8130">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8131">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8131">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8132">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8132">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8133">GP 고유 이름: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8133">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8134">GP 이름: 최소 YouTube 제한 모드 강제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8134">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8135">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8135">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8136">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8136">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8137">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8137">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8138">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8138">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8139">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8139">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8140">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8140">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8141">값 이름: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8141">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8142">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8142">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8143">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8143">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8144">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8144">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8145">기본 설정 키 이름: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8145">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8146">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8146">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8147">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8147">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8148">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8148">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8149">전체 화면 모드 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8149">Allow full screen mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8150">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8150">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8151">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8151">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8152">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8152">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8153">전체 화면 모드의 가용성 설정 - 모든 Microsoft Edge UI가 숨겨지고 웹 콘텐츠만 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8153">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8154">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 적절한 사용 권한이 있는 사용자, 앱 및 확장이 전체 화면 모드를 입력할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8154">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8155">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자, 앱 및 확장이 전체 화면 모드를 입력할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8155">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8156">전체 화면 모드가 비활성화된 경우 명령줄을 사용하여 키오스크 모드에서 Microsoft Edge를 열 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8156">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8157">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8157">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8158">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8158">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8159">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8159">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8160">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8160">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8161">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8161">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8162">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8162">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8163">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8163">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8164">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8164">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8165">GP 고유 이름: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8165">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8166">GP 이름: 전체 화면 모드 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8166">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8167">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8167">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8168">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8168">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8169">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8169">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8170">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8170">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8171">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8171">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8172">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8172">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8173">값 이름: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8173">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8174">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8174">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8175">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8175">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8176">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8176">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8177">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8177">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8178">전역 범위 HTTP 인증 캐시 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8178">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8179">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8179">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8180">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8180">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8181">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8181">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8182">해당 정책은 HTTP 서버 인증 자격 증명을 사용하여 프로필 캐시당 단일 전역을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8182">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8183">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 설정하지 않으면 브라우저에서는 상위 사이트에 따라 HTTP 서버 인증 자격 증명의 범위를 지정하는 80 버전 기준의 사이트 간 인증을 기본 동작으로 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8183">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8184">따라서 두 사이트에서 동일한 인증 도메인의 리소스를 사용하는 경우 두 사이트의 컨텍스트에 관계 없이 각각의 자격 증명을 제공해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8184">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8185">캐시된 프록시 자격 증명은 사이트 간에 다시 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8185">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8186">해당 정책을 사용하면 한 사이트의 컨텍스트에 입력한 HTTP 인증 자격 증명이 다른 사이트의 컨텍스트에서 자동으로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8186">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8187">해당 정책을 사용하면 사이트는 일부 유형의 사이트 간 공격에 노출될 수 있으며 사용자는 URL에 포함된 자격 증명을 사용하여 HTTP 인증 캐시에 엔트리를 추가함으로써 쿠키 없이도 사이트 간에 추적할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8187">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8188">해당 정책은 기업에게 레거시 동작에 따라 로그인 프로시저를 업데이트하는 기회를 제공하기 위한 것이며 추후 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8188">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8189">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8189">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8190">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8190">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8191">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8191">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8192">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8192">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8193">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8193">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8194">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8194">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8195">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8195">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8196">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8196">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8197">GP 고유 이름: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8197">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8198">GP 이름: 전역 범위 HTTP 인증 캐시 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8198">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8199">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8199">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8200">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8200">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8201">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8201">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8202">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8202">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8203">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8203">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8204">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8204">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8205">값 이름: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8205">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8206">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8206">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8207">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8207">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8208">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8208">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8209">기본 설정 키 이름: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8209">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8210">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8210">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8211">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8211">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8212">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8212">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8213">주소 표시줄에서 단일 단어 항목을 검색하는 대신 직접 인트라넷 사이트 탐색 강제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8213">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8214">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8214">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8215">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8215">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8216">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8216">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8217">해당 정책을 사용하면 주소 표시줄에 입력한 텍스트가 문장 부호 없는 단일 단어인 경우 주소 표시줄 제안 목록의 상위 자동 제안 결과가 인트라넷 사이트를 탐색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8217">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8218">문장 부호 없는 단일 단어 입력 시 기본 탐색은 입력된 텍스트와 일치하는 인트라넷 사이트 탐색을 수행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8218">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8219">해당 정책을 사용하면 텍스트가 문장 부호 없는 단일 단어인 경우 주소 표시줄 제안 목록의 두 번째 자동 제안 결과가 입력된 대로 웹 검색을 정확하게 수행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8219">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8220">웹 검색을 방지하는 정책이 설정되지 않은 경우 기본 검색 공급자가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8220">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8221">해당 정책을 사용하면 다음과 같은 두 가지 영향을 미칠 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8221">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8222">일반적으로 기록 항목으로 확인되는 단일 단어 쿼리에 대한 응답으로 사이트에 대한 탐색은 더 이상 일어나지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8222">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8223">대신 브라우저에서 조직 인트라넷에 존재하지 않을 수 있는 내부 사이트로 탐색을 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8223">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8224">이 경우 404 오류가 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8224">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8225">자주 사용하는 단일 단어 검색 용어로 검색을 올바르게 수행하려면 검색 제안을 수동으로 선택해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8225">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8226">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8226">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8227">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8227">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8228">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8228">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8229">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8229">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8230">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8230">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8231">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8231">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8232">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8232">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8233">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8233">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8234">GP 고유 이름: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8234">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8235">GP 이름: 주소 표시줄에서 단일 단어 항목을 검색하는 대신 직접 인트라넷 사이트 탐색 강제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8235">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8236">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8236">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8237">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8237">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8238">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8238">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8239">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8239">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8240">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8240">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8241">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8241">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8242">값 이름: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8242">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8243">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8243">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8244">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8244">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8245">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8245">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8246">기본 설정 키 이름: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8246">Preference Key Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8247">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8247">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8248">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8248">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8249">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8249">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8250">HSTS 정책 확인을 무시하는 이름 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8250">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8251">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8251">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8252">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8252">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8253">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8253">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8254">해당 목록에 지정된 호스트 이름은 잠재적으로 "http://"에서 "https://"로 요청을 업그레이드할 수 있는 HSTS 정책 검사에서 제외됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8254">Hostnames specified in this list will be exempt from the HSTS policy check that could potentially upgrade requests from "http://" to "https://".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8255">해당 정책에는 단일 레이블 호스트 이름만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8255">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8256">호스트 이름을 정식화해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8256">Hostnames must be canonicalized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8257">모든 IDN을 해당 A-레이블 서식으로 변환해야 하며 모든 ASCII 문자는 소문자여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8257">Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8258">해당 정책은 지정된 특정 호스트 이름에만 적용됩니다. 목록에 있는 이름의 하위 도메인에는 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8258">This policy only applies to the specific hostnames specified; it doesn't apply to subdomains of the names in the list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8259">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8259">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8260">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8260">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8261">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8261">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8262">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8262">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8263">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8263">Data Type:</span></span>
