  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8264">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8264">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8265">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8265">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8266">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8266">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8267">GP 고유 이름: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8267">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8268">GP 이름: HSTS 정책 확인을 무시하는 이름 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8268">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8269">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8269">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8270">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8270">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8271">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8271">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8272">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8272">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8273">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8273">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8274">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8274">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8275">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8275">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8276">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8276">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8277">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8277">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = "meet"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8278">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8278">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8279">기본 설정 키 이름: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8279">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8280">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8280">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8281">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8281">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8282">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8282">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8283">가능한 경우 하드웨어 가속 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8283">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8284">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8284">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8285">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8285">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8286">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8286">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8287">사용할 수 있는 경우 하드웨어 가속을 사용하도록 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8287">Specify to use hardware acceleration, if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8288">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 GPU 기능이 명시적으로 차단된 경우가 아니면 하드웨어 가속을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8288">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8289">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 하드웨어 가속을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8289">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8290">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8290">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8291">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8291">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8292">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8292">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8293">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8293">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8294">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8294">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8295">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8295">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8296">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8296">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8297">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8297">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8298">GP 고유 이름: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8298">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8299">GP 이름: 가능한 경우 하드웨어 가속 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8299">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8300">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8300">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8301">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8301">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8302">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8302">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8303">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8303">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8304">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8304">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8305">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8305">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8306">값 이름: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8306">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8307">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8307">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8308">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8308">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8309">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8309">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8310">기본 설정 키 이름: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8310">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8311">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8311">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8312">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8312">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8313">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8313">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8314">첫 실행 환경 및 시작 화면 숨김</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8314">Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8315">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8315">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8316">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8316">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8317">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8317">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8318">해당 정책을 사용하면 처음 실행 환경과 시작 화면이 사용자가 처음으로 Microsoft Edge를 실행할 때 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8318">If you enable this policy, the First-run experience and the splash screen will not be shown to users when they run Microsoft Edge for the first time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8319">처음 실행 환경에 표시되는 구성 옵션의 경우 브라우저에서 기본적으로 다음과 같이 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8319">For the configuration options shown in the First Run Experience, the browser will default to the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8320">-새 탭 페이지에서 피드 유형은 MSN News로 레이아웃은 Inspirational로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8320">-On the New Tab Page, the feed type will be set to MSN News and the layout to Inspirational.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8321">-Windows 계정이 Azure AD 또는 MSA 유형인 경우 사용자는 계속 Microsoft Edge에 자동으로 로그인됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8321">-The user will still be automatically signed into Microsoft Edge if the Windows account is of Azure AD or MSA type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8322">- 동기화는 기본적으로 사용하지 않도록 설정되고 사용자에게 브라우저 시작 시 동기화할 것인지 선택하라는 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8322">-Sync will not be enabled by default and users will be prompted to choose whether they'd like to sync on browser startup.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8323">[ForceSync](#forcesync) 또는 [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) 정책을 사용하여 동기화 및 동기화 동의 확인 프롬프트를 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8323">You can use the [ForceSync](#forcesync) or the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy to configure sync and the sync consent prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8324">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 환경 및 시작 화면이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8324">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the First-run experience and the Splash screen will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8325">참고: 처음 실행 환경에서 사용자에게 표시되는 특정 구성 옵션은 다른 특정 정책을 사용하여 관리할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8325">Note: The specific configuration options shown to the user in the First Run Experience, can also be managed by using other specific policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8326">해당 정책과 함께 HideFirstRunExperience 정책을 사용하여 관리된 장치에 대한 특정 브라우저 환경을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8326">You can use the HideFirstRunExperience policy in combination with these policies to configure a specific browser experience on your managed devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8327">일부 다른 정책은 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8327">Some of these other policies are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8328">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8328">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8329">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8329">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8330">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8330">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8331">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8331">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8332">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8332">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8333">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8333">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8334">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8334">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8335">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8335">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8336">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8336">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8337">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8337">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8338">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8338">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8339">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8339">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8340">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8340">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8341">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8341">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8342">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8342">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8343">GP 고유 이름: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8343">GP unique name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8344">GP 이름: 처음 실행 환경 및 시작 화면 숨김</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8344">GP name: Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8345">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8345">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8346">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8346">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8347">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8347">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8348">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8348">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8349">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8349">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8350">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8350">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8351">값 이름: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8351">Value Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8352">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8352">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8353">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8353">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8354">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8354">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8355">기본 설정 키 이름: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8355">Preference Key Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8356">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8356">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8357">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8357">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8358">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8358">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8359">Microsoft Edge에서 일회성 리디렉션 대화 상자 및 배너 숨기기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8359">Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8360">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8360">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8361">Windows (87 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8361">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8362">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8362">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8363">이 정책은 일회성 리디렉션 대화 상자와 배너를 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 옵션을 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8363">This policy gives an option to disable one-time redirection dialog and the banner.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8364">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 사용자는 일회성 대화 상자와 배너를 모두 볼 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8364">When this policy is enabled, users will not see both the one-time dialog and the banner.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8365">사용자가 Internet Explorer에서 호환되지 않는 웹 사이트를 접할 때 계속 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션되지만 해당 검색 데이터는 가져오지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8365">Users will continue to be redirected to Microsoft Edge when they encounter an incompatible website on Internet Explorer, but their browsing data will not be imported.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8366">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 사용자에게 일회성 리디렉션 대화 상자와 배너가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8366">If you enable this policy the one-time redirection dialog and banner will never be shown to users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8367">리디렉션이 발생하는 경우 사용자의 검색 데이터를 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8367">Users' browsing data will not be imported when a redirection happens.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8368">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 최초 리디렉션 시 리디렉션 대화 상자가 표시되고 리디렉션으로 시작하는 세션에서 영구적 리디렉션 배너가 사용자에게 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8368">If you disable or don't set this policy, the redirection dialog will be shown on the first redirection and the persistent redirection banner will be shown to users on sessions that begin with a redirection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8369">사용자의 검색 데이터는 사용자가 그러한 리디렉션(사용자가 일회성 대화 상자에서 동의하는 경우에만 해당)을 접할 때마다 가져오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8369">Users' browsing data will be imported every time user encounters such redirection (ONLY IF user consents to it on the one-time dialog).</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8370">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8370">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8371">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8371">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8372">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8372">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8373">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8373">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8374">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8374">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8375">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8375">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8376">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8376">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8377">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8377">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8378">GP 고유 이름: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8378">GP unique name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8379">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 일회성 리디렉션 대화 상자 및 배너 숨기기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8379">GP name: Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8380">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8380">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8381">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8381">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8382">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8382">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8383">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8383">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8384">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8384">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8385">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8385">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8386">값 이름: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8386">Value Name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8387">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8387">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8388">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8388">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8389">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8389">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8390">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8390">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8391">자동 채우기 양식 데이터 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8391">Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8392">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8392">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8393">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8393">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8394">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8394">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8395">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 자동 채우기 양식 데이터를 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8395">Allows users to import autofill form data from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8396">해당 정책을 사용하면 자동 채우기 데이터를 수동으로 가져오는 옵션이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8396">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import autofill data is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8397">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 양식 데이터 자동 채우기를 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8397">If you disable this policy, autofill form data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8398">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 데이터 자동 채우기를 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 데이터를 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8398">If you don't configure this policy, autofill data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8399">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8399">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8400">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 자동 채우기 데이터를 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **데이터 자동 채우기** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8400">This means that Microsoft Edge will import autofill data on first run, but users can select or clear **autofill data** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8401">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 및 Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서)에서 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8401">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8402">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8402">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8403">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8403">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8404">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8404">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8405">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8405">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8406">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8406">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8407">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8407">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8408">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8408">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8409">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8409">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8410">GP 고유 이름: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8410">GP unique name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8411">GP 이름: 자동 채우기 양식 데이터 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8411">GP name: Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8412">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8412">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8413">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8413">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8414">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8414">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8415">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8415">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8416">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8416">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8417">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8417">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8418">값 이름: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8418">Value Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8419">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8419">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8420">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8420">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8421">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8421">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8422">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8422">Preference Key Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8423">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8423">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8424">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8424">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8425">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8425">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8426">브라우저 설정 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8426">Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8427">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8427">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8428">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8428">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8429">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8429">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8430">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 브라우저 설정을 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8430">Allows users to import browser settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8431">해당 정책을 사용하면 **브라우저 데이터 가져오기** 대화 상자에서 **브라우저 설정** 확인란이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8431">If you enable this policy, the **Browser settings** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8432">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 브라우저 설정을 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8432">If you disable this policy, browser settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8433">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 브라우저 설정을 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 설정을 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8433">If you don't configure this policy, browser settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8434">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8434">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8435">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 설정을 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **브라우저 설정** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8435">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8436">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8436">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8437">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8437">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8438">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8438">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8439">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8439">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8440">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8440">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8441">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8441">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8442">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8442">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8443">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8443">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8444">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8444">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8445">GP 고유 이름: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8445">GP unique name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8446">GP 이름: 브라우저 설정 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8446">GP name: Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8447">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8447">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8448">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8448">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8449">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8449">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8450">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8450">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8451">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8451">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8452">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8452">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8453">값 이름: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8453">Value Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8454">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8454">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8455">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8455">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8456">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8456">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8457">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8457">Preference Key Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8458">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8458">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8459">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8459">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8460">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8460">ImportCookies</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8461">쿠키 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8461">Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8462">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8462">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8463">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8463">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8464">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8464">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8465">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 쿠키를 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8465">Allows users to import Cookies from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8466">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 쿠키를 가져오지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8466">If you disable this policy, Cookies aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8467">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 쿠키를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8467">If you don't configure this policy, Cookies are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8468">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8468">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8469">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 쿠키를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8469">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Cookies on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8470">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8470">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8471">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8471">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8472">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8472">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8473">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8473">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8474">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8474">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8475">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8475">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8476">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8476">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8477">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8477">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8478">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8478">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8479">GP 고유 이름: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8479">GP unique name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8480">GP 이름: 쿠키 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8480">GP name: Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8481">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8481">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8482">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8482">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8483">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8483">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8484">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8484">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8485">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8485">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8486">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8486">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8487">값 이름: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8487">Value Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8488">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8488">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8489">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8489">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8490">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8490">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8491">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8491">Preference Key Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8492">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8492">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8493">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8493">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8494">ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8494">ImportExtensions</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8495">확장 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8495">Allow importing of extensions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8496">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8496">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8497">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8497">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8498">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8498">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8499">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 확장을 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8499">Allows users to import extensions from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8500">해당 정책을 사용하면 **브라우저 데이터 가져오기** 대화 상자에서 **확장** 확인란이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8500">If you enable this policy, the **Extensions** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8501">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 확장을 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8501">If you disable this policy, extensions aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8502">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 확장을 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 확장을 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8502">If you don't configure this policy, extensions are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8503">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8503">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8504">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 확장을 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **즐겨찾기** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8504">This means that Microsoft Edge imports extensions on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8505">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 가져오기를 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8505">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8506">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8506">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8507">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8507">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8508">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8508">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8509">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8509">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8510">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8510">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8511">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8511">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8512">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8512">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8513">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8513">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8514">GP 고유 이름: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8514">GP unique name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8515">GP 이름: 확장 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8515">GP name: Allow importing of extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8516">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8516">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8517">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8517">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8518">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8518">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8519">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8519">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8520">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8520">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8521">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8521">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8522">값 이름: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8522">Value Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8523">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8523">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8524">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8524">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8525">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8525">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8526">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8526">Preference Key Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8527">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8527">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8528">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8528">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8529">ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8529">ImportFavorites</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8530">즐겨찾기 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8530">Allow importing of favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8531">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8531">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8532">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8532">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8533">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8533">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8534">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 즐겨찾기를 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8534">Allows users to import favorites from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8535">해당 정책을 사용하면 **브라우저 데이터 가져오기** 대화 상자에서 **즐겨찾기** 확인란이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8535">If you enable this policy, the **Favorites** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8536">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 즐겨찾기를 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8536">If you disable this policy, favorites aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8537">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 즐겨찾기를 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 즐겨찾기를 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8537">If you don't configure this policy, favorites are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8538">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8538">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8539">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 즐겨찾기를 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **즐겨찾기** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8539">This means that Microsoft Edge imports favorites on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8540">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Internet Explorer (Windows 7, 8, 10에서), Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서), Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 및 Apple Safari (MacOS에서) 브라우저에서 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8540">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8541">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8541">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8542">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8542">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8543">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8543">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8544">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8544">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8545">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8545">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8546">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8546">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8547">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8547">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8548">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8548">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8549">GP 고유 이름: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8549">GP unique name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8550">GP 이름: 즐겨찾기 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8550">GP name: Allow importing of favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8551">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8551">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8552">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8552">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8553">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8553">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8554">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8554">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8555">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8555">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8556">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8556">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8557">값 이름: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8557">Value Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8558">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8558">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8559">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8559">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8560">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8560">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8561">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8561">Preference Key Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8562">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8562">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8563">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8563">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8564">ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8564">ImportHistory</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8565">검색 기록 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8565">Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8566">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8566">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8567">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8567">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8568">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8568">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8569">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 검색 기록을 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8569">Allows users to import their browsing history from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8570">해당 정책을 사용하면 **브라우저 데이터 가져오기** 대화 상자에서 **검색 기록** 확인란이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8570">If you enable this policy, the **Browsing history** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8571">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 검색 기록 데이터를 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8571">If you disable this policy, browsing history data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import this data manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8572">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 검색 기록 데이터를 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 데이터를 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8572">If you don't configure this policy, browsing history data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8573">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8573">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8574">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 검색 기록을 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **기록** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8574">This means that Microsoft Edge imports browsing history on first run, but users can select or clear the **history** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8575">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Internet Explorer (Windows 7, 8, 10에서), Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서), Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 및 Apple Safari (MacOS에서) 브라우저에서 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8575">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8576">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8576">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8577">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8577">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8578">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8578">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8579">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8579">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8580">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8580">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8581">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8581">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8582">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8582">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8583">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8583">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8584">GP 고유 이름: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8584">GP unique name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8585">GP 이름: 검색 기록 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8585">GP name: Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8586">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8586">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8587">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8587">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8588">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8588">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8589">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8589">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8590">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8590">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8591">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8591">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8592">값 이름: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8592">Value Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8593">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8593">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8594">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8594">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8595">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8595">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8596">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8596">Preference Key Name: ImportHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8597">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8597">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8598">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8598">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8599">ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8599">ImportHomepage</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8600">홈페이지 설정 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8600">Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8601">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8601">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8602">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8602">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8603">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8603">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8604">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 홈페이지 설정을 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8604">Allows users to import their home page setting from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8605">해당 정책을 사용하면 홈페이지 설정을 수동으로 가져오는 옵션이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8605">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import the home page setting is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8606">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 홈페이지 설정을 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8606">If you disable this policy, the home page setting isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8607">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 홈페이지 설정을 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 데이터를 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8607">If you don't configure this policy, the home page setting is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8608">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8608">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8609">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 홈페이지 설정을 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **홈페이지** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8609">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the home page setting on first run, but users can select or clear the **home page** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8610">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Internet Explorer (Windows 7, 8, 10에서) 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8610">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8611">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8611">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8612">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8612">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8613">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8613">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8614">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8614">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8615">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8615">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8616">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8616">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8617">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8617">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8618">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8618">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8619">GP 고유 이름: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8619">GP unique name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8620">GP 이름: 홈페이지 설정 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8620">GP name: Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8621">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8621">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8622">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8622">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8623">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8623">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8624">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8624">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8625">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8625">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8626">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8626">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8627">값 이름: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8627">Value Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8628">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8628">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8629">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8629">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8630">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8630">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8631">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8631">Preference Key Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8632">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8632">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8633">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8633">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8634">ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8634">ImportOpenTabs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8635">열린 탭 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8635">Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8636">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8636">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8637">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8637">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8638">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8638">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8639">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 열린 고정 탭을 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8639">Allows users to import open and pinned tabs from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8640">해당 정책을 사용하면 **브라우저 데이터 가져오기** 대화 상자에서 **열린 탭** 확인란이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8640">If you enable this policy, the **Open tabs** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8641">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 열린 탭을 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8641">If you disable this policy, open tabs aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8642">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 열린 탭을 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 탭을 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8642">If you don't configure this policy, open tabs are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8643">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8643">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8644">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 열린 탭을 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **열린 탭** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8644">This means that Microsoft Edge imports open tabs on first run, but users can select or clear the **Open tabs** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8645">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 가져오기를 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8645">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8646">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8646">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8647">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8647">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8648">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8648">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8649">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8649">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8650">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8650">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8651">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8651">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8652">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8652">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8653">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8653">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8654">GP 고유 이름: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8654">GP unique name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8655">GP 이름: 열린 탭 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8655">GP name: Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8656">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8656">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8657">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8657">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8658">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8658">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8659">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8659">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8660">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8660">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8661">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8661">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8662">값 이름: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8662">Value Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8663">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8663">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8664">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8664">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8665">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8665">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8666">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8666">Preference Key Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8667">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8667">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8668">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8668">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8669">ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8669">ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8670">결제 정보 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8670">Allow importing of payment info</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8671">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8671">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8672">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8672">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8673">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8673">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8674">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 결제 정보를 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8674">Allows users to import payment info from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8675">해당 정책을 사용하면 **브라우저 데이터 가져오기** 대화 상자에서 **결제 정보** 확인란이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8675">If you enable this policy, the **payment info** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8676">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 결제 정보를 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8676">If you disable this policy, payment info isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8677">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 결제 정보를 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 정보를 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8677">If you don't configure this policy, payment info is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8678">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8678">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8679">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 결제 정보를 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **결제 정보** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8679">This means that Microsoft Edge imports payment info on first run, but users can select or clear the **payment info** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8680">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8680">**Note:** This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8681">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8681">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8682">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8682">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8683">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8683">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8684">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8684">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>
