  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8685">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8685">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8686">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8686">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8687">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8687">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8688">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8688">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8689">GP 고유 이름: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8689">GP unique name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8690">GP 이름: 결제 정보 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8690">GP name: Allow importing of payment info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8691">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8691">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8692">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8692">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8693">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8693">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8694">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8694">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8695">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8695">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8696">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8696">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8697">값 이름: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8697">Value Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8698">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8698">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8699">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8699">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8700">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8700">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8701">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8701">Preference Key Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8702">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8702">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8703">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8703">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8704">ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8704">ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8705">저장된 암호 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8705">Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8706">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8706">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8707">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8707">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8708">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8708">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8709">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 저장된 암호를 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8709">Allows users to import saved passwords from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8710">해당 정책을 사용하면 저장된 암호를 수동으로 가져오는 옵션이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8710">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import saved passwords is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8711">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 저장된 암호를 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8711">If you disable this policy, saved passwords aren't imported on first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8712">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 저장된 암호를 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 암호를 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8712">If you don't configure this policy, passwords are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8713">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8713">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8714">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 암호를 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **암호** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8714">This means that Microsoft Edge imports passwords on first run, but users can select or clear the **passwords** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8715">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Internet Explorer (Windows 7, 8, 10에서), Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 및 Mozilla Firefox (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 브라우저에서 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8715">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8716">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8716">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8717">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8717">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8718">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8718">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8719">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8719">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8720">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8720">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8721">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8721">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8722">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8722">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8723">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8723">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8724">GP 고유 이름: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8724">GP unique name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8725">GP 이름: 저장된 암호 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8725">GP name: Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8726">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8726">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8727">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8727">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8728">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8728">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8729">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8729">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8730">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8730">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8731">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8731">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8732">값 이름: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8732">Value Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8733">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8733">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8734">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8734">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8735">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8735">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8736">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8736">Preference Key Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8737">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8737">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8738">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8738">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8739">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8739">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8740">검색 엔진 설정 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8740">Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8741">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8741">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8742">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8742">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8743">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8743">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8744">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 검색 엔진 설정을 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8744">Allows users to import search engine settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8745">해당 정책을 사용하면 검색 엔진 설정을 가져오는 옵션이 자동으로 선택됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8745">If you enable, this policy, the option to import search engine settings is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8746">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 처음 실행 시 검색 엔진 설정을 가져오지 않으며 사용자가 수동으로 가져올 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8746">If you disable this policy, search engine settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8747">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 검색 엔진 설정을 가져오며 사용자가 추후에 세션을 검색하는 동안 해당 데이터를 수동으로 가져올지 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8747">If you don't configure this policy, search engine settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8748">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8748">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8749">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 검색 엔진 설정을 가져오지만 사용자가 수동으로 가져오는 동안 **검색 엔진** 옵션을 선택하거나 선택 취소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8749">This means that Microsoft Edge imports search engine settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **search engine** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8750">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Internet Explorer (Windows 7, 8, 10에서) 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8750">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8751">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8751">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8752">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8752">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8753">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8753">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8754">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8754">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8755">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8755">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8756">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8756">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8757">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8757">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8758">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8758">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8759">GP 고유 이름: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8759">GP unique name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8760">GP 이름: 검색 엔진 설정 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8760">GP name: Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8761">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8761">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8762">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8762">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8763">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8763">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8764">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8764">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8765">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8765">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8766">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8766">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8767">값 이름: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8767">Value Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8768">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8768">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8769">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8769">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8770">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8770">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8771">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8771">Preference Key Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8772">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8772">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8773">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8773">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8774">ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8774">ImportShortcuts</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8775">바로 가기 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8775">Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8776">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8776">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8777">Windows 및 MacOS (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8777">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8778">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8778">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8779">사용자가 다른 브라우저에서 Microsoft Edge로 바로가기를 가져올 수 있도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8779">Allows users to import Shortcuts from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8780">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 바로가기를 가져오지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8780">If you disable this policy, Shortcuts aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8781">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 처음 실행 시 바로가기를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8781">If you don't configure this policy, Shortcuts are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8782">해당 정책을 권장 사항으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8782">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8783">즉, Microsoft Edge가 처음 실행 시 바로가기를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8783">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Shortcuts on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8784">**참고**: 해당 정책은 현재 Google Chrome (Windows 7, 8, 10 및 MacOS에서) 가져오기를 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8784">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8785">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8785">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8786">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8786">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8787">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8787">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8788">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8788">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8789">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8789">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8790">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8790">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8791">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8791">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8792">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8792">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8793">GP 고유 이름: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8793">GP unique name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8794">GP 이름: 바로 가기 가져오기 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8794">GP name: Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8795">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8795">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8796">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8796">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8797">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8797">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8798">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8798">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8799">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8799">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8800">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8800">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8801">값 이름: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8801">Value Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8802">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8802">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8803">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8803">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8804">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8804">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8805">기본 설정 키 이름: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8805">Preference Key Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8806">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8806">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8807">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8807">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8808">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8808">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8809">InPrivate 모드 가용성 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8809">Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8810">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8810">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8811">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8811">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8812">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8812">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8813">사용자가 Microsoft Edge에서 InPrivate 모드로 페이지를 열 수 있는지 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8813">Specifies whether the user can open pages in InPrivate mode in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8814">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 '사용'으로 설정하면 사용자는 InPrivate 모드로 페이지를 열 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8814">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Enabled', users can open pages in InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8815">해당 정책을 ‘사용 안 함’으로 설정하면 사용자는 InPrivate 모드를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8815">Set this policy to 'Disabled' to stop users from using InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8816">해당 정책을 ‘강제’로 설정하면 InPrivate 모드를 항상 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8816">Set this policy to 'Forced' to always use InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8817">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8817">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8818">사용 (0) = InPrivate 모드 사용 가능</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8818">Enabled (0) = InPrivate mode available</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8819">사용 안 함 (1) = InPrivate 모드 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8819">Disabled (1) = InPrivate mode disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8820">강제 (2) = InPrivate 모드 사용 강제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8820">Forced (2) = InPrivate mode forced</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8821">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8821">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8822">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8822">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8823">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8823">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8824">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8824">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8825">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8825">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8826">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8826">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8827">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8827">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8828">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8828">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8829">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8829">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8830">GP 고유 이름: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8830">GP unique name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8831">GP 이름: InPrivate 모드 가용성 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8831">GP name: Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8832">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8832">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8833">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8833">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8834">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8834">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8835">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8835">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8836">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8836">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8837">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8837">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8838">값 이름: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8838">Value Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8839">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8839">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8840">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8840">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8841">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8841">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8842">기본 설정 키 이름: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8842">Preference Key Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8843">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8843">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8844">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8844">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8845">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8845">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8846">안전하지 않은 양식에 대한 경고 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8846">Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8847">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8847">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8848">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8848">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8849">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8849">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8850">이 정책은 브라우저의 보안(HTTPS) 사이트에 포함된 안전하지 않은 양식(HTTP를 통해 전송되는 양식)의 처리를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8850">This policy controls the handling of insecure forms (forms submitted over HTTP) embedded in secure (HTTPS) sites in the browser.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8851">이 정책을 사용하거나 설정하지 않으면 안전하지 않은 양식이 제출될 때 전체 페이지 경고가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8851">If you enable this policy or don't set it, a full page warning will be shown when an insecure form is submitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8852">또한, 포커스를 받을 때 양식 필드 옆에 경고 풍선이 표시되며 해당 양식에 대해 자동 채우기를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8852">Additionally, a warning bubble will be shown next to the form fields when they are focused, and autofill will be disabled for those forms.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8853">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 안전하지 않은 양식에 대한 경고가 표시되지 않으며 자동 채우기가 정상적으로 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8853">If you disable this policy, warnings will not be shown for insecure forms, and autofill will work normally.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8854">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8854">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8855">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8855">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8856">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8856">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8857">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8857">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8858">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8858">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8859">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8859">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8860">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8860">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8861">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8861">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8862">GP 고유 이름: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8862">GP unique name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8863">GP 이름: 안전하지 않은 양식에 대한 경고 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8863">GP name: Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8864">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8864">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8865">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8865">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8866">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8866">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8867">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8867">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8868">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8868">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8869">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8869">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8870">값 이름: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8870">Value Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8871">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8871">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8872">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8872">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8873">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8873">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8874">기본 설정 키 이름: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8874">Preference Key Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8875">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8875">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8876">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8876">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8877">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8877">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8878">IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 기능 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8878">Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8879">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8879">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8880">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8880">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8881">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8881">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8882">IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 기능을 사용하면 배경 탭의 Javascript 타이머가 공격적으로 스로틀링되고 결합되며, 페이지가 5분 이상 배경에 머문 후 분당 1회 이하로 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8882">When enabled the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature causes Javascript timers in background tabs to be aggressively throttled and coalesced, running no more than once per minute after a page has been backgrounded for 5 minutes or more.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8883">이는 웹 표준을 준수하는 기능이지만 특정 작업을 1분까지 지연시킴으로써 일부 웹사이트의 기능을 손상시킬 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8883">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8884">그러나 이 기능을 사용하면 상당한 CPU와 배터리 절감 효과가 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8884">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8885">자세한 내용은 https://bit.ly/30b1XR4을 참조하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8885">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8886">이 정책을 사용하면 기능이 강제로 활성화되며 사용자는 이 설정을 무시할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8886">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8887">이 정책을 사용하지 않으면 기능이 강제로 비활성화되며 사용자는 이 설정을 무시할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8887">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8888">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 해당 기능은 자체 내부 로직으로 제어됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8888">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8889">사용자가 수동으로 이 설정을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8889">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8890">렌더러 프로세스당 정책이 적용되며, 렌더러 프로세스가 시작될 때 정책 설정의 가장 최근의 값이 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8890">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8891">로드된 모든 탭이 일관된 정책 설정을 받도록 하려면 전체 재시작이 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8891">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8892">프로세스가 이 정책의 다른 값으로 실행되는 것은 영향을 주지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8892">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8893">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8893">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8894">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8894">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8895">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8895">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8896">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8896">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8897">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8897">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8898">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8898">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8899">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8899">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8900">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8900">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8901">GP 고유 이름: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8901">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8902">GP 이름: IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 기능 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8902">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8903">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8903">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8904">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8904">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8905">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8905">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8906">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8906">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8907">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8907">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8908">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8908">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8909">값 이름: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8909">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8910">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8910">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8911">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8911">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8912">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8912">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8913">기본 설정 키 이름: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8913">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8914">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8914">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8915">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8915">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8916">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8916">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8917">Internet Explorer 모드에 대한 향상된 중지 검색 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8917">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8918">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8918">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8919">Windows 84 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8919">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8920">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8920">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8921">향상된 중지 검색은 독립실행형 Internet Explorer에서 사용하는 것보다 Internet Explorer 모드에서 중지된 웹페이지를 탐지하는 더 세분화된 방법입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8921">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8922">웹페이지가 멈춘 경우 브라우저에서 완화 조치를 적용하여 브라우저가 나머지 부분에서 중지되는 것을 방지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8922">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8923">이 설정을 활성화하면 웹사이트와 호환되지 않는 문제가 발생할 경우 향상된 중지 검색 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8923">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8924">독립실행형 Internet Explorer가 아닌 Internet Explorer 모드에서 "(웹 사이트)가 응답 하지 않음"과 같은 알림이 표시되는 경우에만 이 정책을 비활성화하는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8924">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8925">해당 설정은 다음과 함께 작동됩니다. [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 정책은 'IEMode' 및 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 정책으로 설정합니다. 여기서 목록에는 하나 이상의 항목이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8925">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8926">이 정책을 '사용'으로 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Internet Explorer 모드에서 실행 중인 웹 사이트에서 향상된 중지 검색을 사용하게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8926">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8927">이 정책을 '사용 안 함'으로 설정하면 향상된 중지 검색이 비활성화되고 사용자는 기본 Internet Explorer 중지 검색 동작을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8927">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8928">Internet Explorer 모드에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8928">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8929">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8929">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8930">사용 안 함 (0) = 향상된 중지 검색 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8930">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8931">사용 (1) = 향상된 중지 검색 사용함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8931">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8932">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8932">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8933">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8933">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8934">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8934">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8935">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8935">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8936">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8936">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8937">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8937">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8938">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8938">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8939">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8939">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8940">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8940">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8941">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8941">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8942">GP 이름: Internet Explorer 모드에 대한 향상된 중지 검색 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8942">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8943">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8943">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8944">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8944">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8945">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8945">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8946">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8946">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8947">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8947">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8948">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8948">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8949">값 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8949">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8950">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8950">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8951">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8951">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8952">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8952">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8953">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8953">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8954">Internet Explorer 통합 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8954">Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8955">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8955">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8956">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8956">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8957">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8957">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8958">Internet Explorer 모드에 대해 최적의 환경을 구성하는 방법에 대한 지침은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8958">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8959">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8959">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8960">없음 (0) = 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8960">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8961">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer 모드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8961">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8962">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8962">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8963">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8963">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8964">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8964">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8965">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8965">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8966">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8966">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8967">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8967">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8968">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8968">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8969">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8969">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8970">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8970">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8971">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8971">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8972">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8972">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8973">GP 이름: Internet Explorer 통합 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8973">GP name: Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8974">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8974">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8975">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8975">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8976">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8976">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8977">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8977">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8978">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8978">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8979">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8979">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8980">값 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8980">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8981">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8981">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8982">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8982">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8983">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8983">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8984">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8984">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8985">Internet Explorer 모드에서 로컬 파일 시작 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8985">Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8986">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8986">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8987">Windows (88 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8987">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8988">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8988">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8989">이 정책은 명령줄에 지정된 로컬 파일을 사용하여 Microsoft Edge를 Internet Explorer 모드로 시작하는 데 사용되는(예:mode-file-url) 명령줄 인수의 가용성을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8989">This policy controls the availability of the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument which is used to launch Microsoft Edge with a local file specified on the command line into Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8990">이 설정은 [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel)이 'IEMode'로 설정되어 있는 경우와 함께 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8990">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8991">이 정책을 true로 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자가 Internet Explorer 모드에서 로컬 파일을 시작하는 데(예: mode-file-url) 명령줄 인수를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8991">If you set this policy to true, or don't configure it, the user is allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8992">이 정책을 false로 설정하면 사용자는 Internet Explorer 모드에서 로컬 파일을 시작하는 데(예: mode-file-url) 명령줄 인수를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8992">If you set this policy to false, the user isn't allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-8993">Internet Explorer 모드에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8993">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8994">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8994">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8995">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8995">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8996">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8996">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8997">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8997">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8998">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8998">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-8999">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-8999">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9000">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9000">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9001">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9001">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9002">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9002">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9003">GP 이름: Internet Explorer 모드에서 로컬 파일 시작 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9003">GP name: Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9004">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9004">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9005">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9005">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9006">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9006">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9007">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9007">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9008">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9008">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9009">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9009">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9010">값 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9010">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9011">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9011">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9012">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9012">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9013">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9013">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9014">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9014">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9015">Internet Explorer 모드 파일 확장명 허용 목록에서 로컬 파일 열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9015">Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9016">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9016">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9017">Windows (88 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9017">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9018">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9018">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9019">이 정책은 파일 확장명에 따라 Internet Explorer 모드로 시작할 수 있는 file:// URL을 제한합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9019">This policy limits which file:// URLs are allowed to be launched into Internet Explorer mode based on file extension.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9020">이 설정은 [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel)이 'IEMode'로 설정되어 있는 경우와 함께 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9020">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9021">file:/// URL을 Internet Explorer 모드에서 실행하도록 요청하면 URL이 Internet Explorer 모드에서 실행되도록 하려면 URL의 파일 확장명이 이 목록에 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9021">When a file:// URL is requested to launch in Internet Explorer mode, the file extension of the URL must be present in this list in order for the URL to be allowed to launch in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9022">Internet Explorer 모드에서 열리지 못하도록 차단된 URL이 대신 Edge 모드에서 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9022">A URL which is blocked from opening in Internet Explorer mode will instead open in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9023">이 정책을 특수 값 "\*"로 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 모든 파일 확장명이 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9023">If you set this policy to the special value "\*" or don't configure it, all file extensions are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9024">Internet Explorer 모드에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9024">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9025">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9025">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9026">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9026">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9027">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9027">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9028">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9028">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9029">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9029">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9030">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9030">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9031">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9031">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9032">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9032">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9033">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9033">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9034">GP 이름: Internet Explorer 모드 파일 확장명 허용 목록에서 로컬 파일 열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9034">GP name: Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9035">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9035">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9036">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9036">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9037">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9037">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9038">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9038">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9039">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9039">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9040">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9040">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9041">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9041">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9042">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9042">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9043">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9043">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\1 = ".mht"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\2 = ".pdf"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\3 = ".vsdx"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9044">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9044">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9045">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9045">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9046">Internet Explorer 모드에서 링크를 여는 상황에 맞는 메뉴 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9046">Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9047">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9047">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9048">Windows (88 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9048">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9049">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9049">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9050">이 정책은 file:// 링크의 상황에 맞는 메뉴에서 '새 Internet Explorer 모드에서 링크 열기' 옵션의 표시 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9050">This policy controls the visibility of the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' option on the context menu for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9051">이 설정은 [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel)이 'IEMode'로 설정되어 있는 경우와 함께 작동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9051">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9052">이 정책을 true로 설정하면 '새 Internet Explorer 모드 탭에서 링크 열기' 상황에 맞는 메뉴 항목을 file:// 링크에 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9052">If you set this policy to true, the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' context menu item will be available for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9053">이 정책을 false로 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 상황에 맞는 메뉴 항목이 추가되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9053">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the context menu item will not be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9054">Internet Explorer 모드에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9054">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9055">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9055">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9056">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9056">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9057">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9057">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9058">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9058">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9059">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9059">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9060">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9060">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9061">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9061">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9062">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9062">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9063">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9063">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9064">GP 이름: Internet Explorer 모드에서 링크를 여는 상황에 맞는 메뉴 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9064">GP name: Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9065">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9065">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9066">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9066">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9067">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9067">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9068">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9068">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9069">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9069">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9070">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9070">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9071">값 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9071">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9072">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9072">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9073">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9073">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9074">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9074">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9075">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9075">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9076">엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9076">Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9077">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9077">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9078">Windows (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9078">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9079">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9079">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9080">Internet Explorer 모드에 대해 최적의 환경을 구성하는 방법에 대한 지침은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9080">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9081">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9081">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9082">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9082">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9083">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9083">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9084">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9084">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9085">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9085">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9086">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9086">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9087">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9087">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9088">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9088">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9089">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9089">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9090">GP 이름: 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9090">GP name: Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9091">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9091">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9092">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9092">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9093">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9093">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9094">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9094">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9095">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9095">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9096">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9096">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9097">값 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9097">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9098">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9098">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9099">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9099">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://internal.contoso.com/sitelist.xml"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9100">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9100">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9101">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9101">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9102">Internet Explorer 모드 페이지에서 시작 시 구성되지 않은 사이트에 대한 "페이지 내" 탐색 동작 방법 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9102">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9103">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9103">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9104">Windows (81 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9104">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9105">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9105">Description</span></span>
