  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9106">“페이지 내” 탐색은 현재 페이지의 링크, 스크립트 또는 양식에서 시작됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9106">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9107">이전의 “페이지 내” 탐색 시도가 서버측으로 리디렉션될 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9107">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9108">반대로 사용자는 브라우저 컨트롤을 사용하여 여러 방법으로 현재 페이지와 독립적인 “페이지 내”가 아닌 탐색을 시작할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9108">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9109">예를 들어 주소 표시줄, 뒤로 단추 또는 즐겨찾기 링크를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9109">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9110">해당 설정을 사용하면 Internet Explorer 모드에서 로드된 페이지에서 구성되지 않은 사이트로의 탐색(엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록에서 구성되지 않음)을 Microsoft Edge로 다시 전환하거나 Internet Explorer 모드에 유지할 것인지를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9110">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9111">해당 설정은 다음과 함께 작동됩니다. [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 정책은 'IEMode' 및 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 정책으로 설정합니다. 여기서 목록에는 하나 이상의 항목이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9111">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9112">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Internet Explorer 모드에서 열리도록 구성된 사이트만 해당 모드에서 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9112">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9113">Internet Explorer 모드에서 열리도록 구성되지 않은 사이트는 Microsoft Edge로 다시 리디렉션됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9113">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9114">해당 정책을 ‘기본값’으로 설정하면 Internet Explorer 모드에서 열리도록 구성된 사이트만 해당 모드에서 열립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9114">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9115">Internet Explorer 모드에서 열리도록 구성되지 않은 사이트는 Microsoft Edge로 다시 리디렉션됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9115">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9116">해당 정책을 ‘AutomaticNavigationsOnly’로 설정하면 구성되지 않은 사이트에 대한 모든 자동 탐색(예: 302 리디렉션)이 Internet Explorer 모드로 유지되는 것을 제외하고 기본 환경을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9116">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9117">해당 정책을 ‘AllInPageNavigations’로 설정하면 IE 모드로 로드된 페이지에서 구성되지 않은 사이트로의 모든 탐색은 Internet Explorer 모드(최소 권장)로 유지됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9117">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9118">Internet Explorer 모드에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9118">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9119">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9119">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9120">기본값 (0) = 기본값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9120">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9121">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Internet Explorer 모드에서 자동 탐색만 유지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9121">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9122">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Internet Explorer 모드에서 모든 페이지 내 탐색 유지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9122">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9123">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9123">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9124">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9124">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9125">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9125">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9126">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9126">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9127">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9127">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9128">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9128">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9129">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9129">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9130">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9130">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9131">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9131">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9132">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9132">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9133">GP 이름: Internet Explorer 모드 페이지에서 시작 시 구성되지 않은 사이트에 대한 "페이지 내" 탐색 동작 방법 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9133">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9134">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9134">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9135">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9135">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9136">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9136">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9137">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9137">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9138">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9138">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9139">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9139">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9140">값 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9140">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9141">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9141">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9142">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9142">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9143">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9143">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9144">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9144">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9145">Internet Explorer 모드 테스트 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9145">Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9146">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9146">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9147">Windows 86 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9147">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9148">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9148">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9149">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 Internet Explorer 모드 탭을 열어 Internet Explorer 모드의 응용 프로그램을 테스트할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9149">This policy allows users to test applications in Internet Explorer mode by opening an Internet Explorer mode tab in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9150">사용자는 'Internet Explorer 모드에서 사이트 열기'를 선택하여 “추가 도구” 메뉴 내에서 해당 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9150">Users can do so from within the "More tools" menu by selecting 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9151">또한 사용자는 'Edge 모드로 사이트 열기' 옵션을 사용하여 사이트 목록에서 응용 프로그램을 제거할 필요 없이 최신 브라우저에서 응용 프로그램을 테스트할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9151">Additionally, users can test their applications in a modern browser without removing applications from the site list using the option 'Open sites in Edge mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9152">해당 설정은 다음과 함께 작동됩니다. [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) 정책은 'IEMode' 및 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 정책으로 설정합니다. 여기서 목록에는 하나 이상의 항목이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9152">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9153">해당 정책을 사용하면 'Internet Explorer 모드에서 사이트 열기' 옵션이 “추가 도구” 아래에 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9153">If you enable this policy, the option to 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode' will be visible under "More tools".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9154">사용자는 이 탭에서 Internet Explorer 모드의 해당 사이트를 볼 수 있습니다. ‘Edge 모드에서 사이트 열기’의 다른 옵션도 “추가 도구” 아래에 표시되며 사이트 목록에서 제거하지 않고 최신 브라우저에서 사이트를 테스트하는 데 도움이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9154">Users can view their sites in Internet Explorer mode on this tab. Another option to 'Open sites in Edge mode' will also be visible under "More tools" to help testing sites in a modern browser without removing them from the site list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9155">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 “추가 도구” 메뉴 아래의 'Internet Explorer 모드로 열기' 및 'Edge 모드 에서 열기' 옵션을 볼 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9155">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can't see the options 'Open in Internet Explorer mode' and 'Open in Edge mode' under "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9156">그러나 사용자는 --ie-모드-테스트 플래그를 사용하여 이러한 옵션을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9156">However, users can configure these options with the --ie-mode-test flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9157">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9157">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9158">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9158">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9159">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9159">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9160">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9160">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9161">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9161">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9162">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9162">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9163">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9163">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9164">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9164">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9165">GP 고유 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9165">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9166">GP 이름: Internet Explorer 모드 테스트 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9166">GP name: Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9167">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9167">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9168">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9168">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9169">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9169">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9170">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9170">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9171">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9171">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9172">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9172">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9173">값 이름: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9173">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9174">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9174">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9175">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9175">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9176">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9176">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9177">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9177">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9178">인트라넷 리디렉션 동작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9178">Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9179">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9179">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9180">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9180">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9181">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9181">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9182">이 정책은 DNS 차단 검사를 통해 인트라넷 리디렉션 동작을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9182">This policy configures behavior for intranet redirection via DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9183">해당 검사에서는 브라우저가 알려지지 않은 호스트 이름을 리디렉션하는 프록시에 속하는지 여부를 검색하려고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9183">The checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9184">이 정책이 구성되어 있지 않으면 브라우저에서 DNS 가로채기 확인 및 인트라넷 리디렉션 제안의 기본 동작을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9184">If this policy isn't configured, the browser will use the default behavior of DNS interception checks and intranet redirect suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9185">M88에서는 기본적으로 활성화되지만 이후 릴리스에서는 기본적으로 비활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9185">In M88, they are enabled by default but will be disabled by default in the future release.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9186">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled)는 DNS 차단 검사를 사용하지 않도록 설정할 수 있는 관련 정책입니다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9186">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) is a related policy that might also disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9187">그러나 이 정책은 인트라넷 리디렉션 인포바를 별도로 제어하고 나중에 확장될 수 있는 보다 유연한 버전입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9187">However, this policy is a more flexible version which might separately control intranet redirection infobars and might be expanded in the future.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9188">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) 또는 이 정책에서 차단 검사를 비활성화하도록 요청합니다. 그러면 검사가 비활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9188">If either [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) or this policy make a request to disable interception checks, the checks will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9189">이 정책에서 DNS 가로채기를 사용하지 않도록 설정했지만 [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar)가 사용하도록 설정된 경우 단일 단어 쿼리로 인해 인트라넷이 계속 탐색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9189">If DNS interception checks are disabled by this policy but [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) is enabled, single word queries will still result in intranet navigations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9190">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9190">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9191">Default (0) = 기본 브라우저 동작을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9191">Default (0) = Use default browser behavior.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9192">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = DNS 차단 검사 및 did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" 인포바를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9192">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = Disable DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9193">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = DNS 차단 검사를 사용하지 않도록 설정하고 did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" 인포바를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9193">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = Disable DNS interception checks; allow did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9194">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = DNS 차단 검사 및 did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" 인포바를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9194">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = Allow DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9195">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9195">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9196">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9196">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9197">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9197">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9198">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9198">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9199">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9199">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9200">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9200">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9201">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9201">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9202">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9202">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9203">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9203">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9204">GP 고유 이름: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9204">GP unique name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9205">GP 이름: 인트라넷 리디렉션 동작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9205">GP name: Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9206">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9206">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9207">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9207">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9208">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9208">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9209">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9209">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9210">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9210">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9211">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9211">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9212">값 이름: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9212">Value Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9213">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9213">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9214">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9214">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9215">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9215">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9216">기본 설정 키 이름: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9216">Preference Key Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9217">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9217">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9218">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9218">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9219">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9219">IsolateOrigins</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9220">특정 원본에 대해 사이트 격리 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9220">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9221">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9221">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9222">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9222">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9223">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9223">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9224">원본 자체 프로세스에서 원본을 격리 상태로 실행하도록 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9224">Specify origins to run in isolation, in their own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9225">해당 정책은 하위 도메인의 이름을 따서 명명된 원본을 격리합니다. 예를 들어 https://contoso.com/을(를) 지정하면 https://foo.contoso.com/이(가) https://contoso.com/ 사이트의 일부로 격리될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9225">This policy also isolates origins named by subdomains - for example, specifying https://contoso.com/ will cause https://foo.contoso.com/ to be isolated as part of the https://contoso.com/ site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9226">해당 정책을 사용하면 쉼표로 구분된 목록에 있는 각 명명된 원본은 자체 프로세스에서 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9226">If the policy is enabled, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9227">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 'IsolateOrigins' 및 'SitePerProcess' 기능을 모두 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9227">If you disable this policy, then both the 'IsolateOrigins' and 'SitePerProcess' features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9228">사용자는 계속 'IsolateOrigins' 정책을 사용하도록 명령줄 플래그를 통해 직접 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9228">Users can still enable 'IsolateOrigins' policy manually, via command line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9229">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9229">If you don't configure the policy, the user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9230">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9230">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9231">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9231">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9232">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9232">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9233">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9233">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9234">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9234">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9235">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9235">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9236">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9236">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9237">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9237">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9238">GP 고유 이름: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9238">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9239">GP 이름: 특정 원본에 대해 사이트 격리 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9239">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9240">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9240">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9241">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9241">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9242">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9242">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9243">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9243">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9244">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9244">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9245">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9245">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9246">값 이름: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9246">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9247">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9247">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9248">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9248">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9249">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9249">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9250">기본 설정 키 이름: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9250">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9251">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9251">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9252">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9252">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9253">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9253">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9254">로컬 공급자의 제안 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9254">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9255">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9255">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9256">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9256">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9257">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9257">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9258">Microsoft Edge의 주소 표시줄 및 자동 제안 목록에서 장치(로컬 공급자)에 대한 제안 공급자로부터 제안을 허용합니다. (예: 즐겨찾기 및 검색 기록)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9258">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9259">해당 정책을 사용하면 로컬 공급자의 제안이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9259">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9260">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 로컬 공급자의 제안이 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9260">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9261">로컬 기록 및 로컬 즐겨찾기 제안이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9261">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9262">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 로컬 공급자의 제안이 허용되지만 사용자가 설정 토글 키를 사용하여 해당 사항을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9262">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9263">해당 기능을 사용하지 않도록 정책이 적용된 경우 일부 기능을 사용할 수 없다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9263">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9264">예를 들어 [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우에는 검색 기록 제안을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9264">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9265">해당 정책을 적용하려면 브라우저를 다시 시작해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9265">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9266">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9266">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9267">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9267">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9268">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9268">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9269">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9269">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9270">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9270">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9271">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9271">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9272">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9272">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9273">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9273">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9274">GP 고유 이름: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9274">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9275">GP 이름: 로컬 공급자의 제안 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9275">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9276">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9276">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9277">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9277">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9278">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9278">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9279">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9279">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9280">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9280">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9281">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9281">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9282">값 이름: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9282">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9283">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9283">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9284">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9284">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9285">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9285">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9286">기본 설정 키 이름: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9286">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9287">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9287">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9288">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9288">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9289">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9289">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9290">웹 사이트의 관리되는 구성 값을 특정 원본으로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9290">Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9291">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9291">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9292">Windows 및 macOS 버전 90 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9292">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9293">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9293">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9294">이 정책을 설정하면 주어진 원본에 대한 관리되는 구성 API의 반환 값이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9294">Setting this policy defines the return value of Managed Configuration API for given origin.</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9295">관리되는 구성 API는 navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration() javascript 호출을 통해 액세스할 수 있는 키-값 구성입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9295">Managed Configuration API is a key-value configuration that can be accessed via navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration() javascript call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9296">이 API는 [WebAppInstallForceList를](#webappinstallforcelist) 통해 강제로 설치된 웹 응용 프로그램에 해당하는 원본에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9296">This API is only available to origins which correspond to force-installed web applications via [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist).</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9297">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9297">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9298">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9298">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9299">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9299">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9300">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9300">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9301">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9301">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9302">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9302">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9303">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9303">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9304">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9304">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9305">GP 고유 이름: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9305">GP unique name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9306">GP 이름: 웹 사이트에 대한 관리되는 구성 값을 특정 원본으로 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9306">GP name: Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9307">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9307">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9308">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9308">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9309">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9309">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9310">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9310">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9311">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9311">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9312">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9312">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9313">값 이름: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9313">Value Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9314">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9314">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9315">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9315">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.example.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9316">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9316">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [{"managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"}, {"managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", "origin": "https://www.example.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9317">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9317">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9318">기본 설정 키 이름: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9318">Preference Key Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9319">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9319">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>asd891jedasd12ue9h</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>djio12easd89u12aws</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9320">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9320">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9321">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9321">ManagedFavorites</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9322">즐겨찾기 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9322">Configure favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9323">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9323">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9324">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9324">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9325">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9325">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9326">관리된 즐겨찾기 목록을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9326">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9327">해당 정책에서 즐겨찾기 목록을 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9327">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9328">각 즐겨찾기에는 즐겨찾기의 이름 및 대상이 포함된 "이름" 및 "URL" 키가 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9328">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9329">"URL" 키 없이 즐겨찾기를 정의하여 하위 폴더를 구성할 수 있지만 위에 정의된 대로 즐겨찾기 목록을 포함하는 추가 "하위" 키를 사용하여서도 하위 폴더를 구성할 수 있습니다. (일부는 다시 폴더가 될 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9329">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9330">Microsoft Edge는 주소 표시줄을 통해 제출된 것처럼 불완전한 URL을 수정합니다. (예: "microsoft.com"이 "https://microsoft.com/"이 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9330">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9331">해당 즐겨찾기는 사용자가 수정할 수 없는 폴더에 배치됩니다. (하지만 사용자가 즐겨찾기 모음에서 해당 폴더를 숨기도록 선택할 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9331">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9332">기본적으로 폴더 이름은 "관리된 즐겨찾기"이지만 원하는 폴더 이름을 값으로 하는 “toplevel_name” 키를 포함하는 사전을 즐겨찾기 목록에 추가하여 이름을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9332">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9333">관리된 즐겨찾기는 사용자 계정에 동기화되지 않으므로 확장을 사용하여 수정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9333">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9334">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9334">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9335">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9335">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9336">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9336">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9337">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9337">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9338">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9338">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9339">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9339">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9340">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9340">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9341">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9341">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9342">GP 고유 이름: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9342">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9343">GP 이름: 즐겨찾기 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9343">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9344">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9344">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9345">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9345">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9346">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9346">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9347">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9347">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9348">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9348">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9349">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9349">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9350">값 이름: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9350">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9351">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9351">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9352">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9352">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9353">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9353">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [{"toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"}, {"name": "Microsoft", "url": "microsoft.com"}, {"name": "Bing", "url": "bing.com"}, {"children": [{"name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"}, {"name": "Microsoft Edge", "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"}], "name": "Microsoft Edge links"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9354">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9354">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9355">기본 설정 키 이름: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9355">Preference Key Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9356">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9356">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9357">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9357">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9358">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9358">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9359">검색 엔진 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9359">Manage Search Engines</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9360">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9360">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9361">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9361">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9362">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9362">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9363">최대 10 개의 검색 엔진 목록을 구성할 수 있습니다. 이 중 하나는 기본 검색 엔진으로 표시되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9363">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9364">인코딩을 지정하지 않아도 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9364">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9365">Microsoft Edge 80에서 시작하는 suggest_url 매개 변수 및 image_search_url 매개 변수는 선택 사항입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9365">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9366">선택적 매개 변수인 image_search_post_params (쉼표로 구분된 이름/값 쌍으로 구성됨)는 Microsoft Edge 80에서 시작하여 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9366">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9367">Microsoft Edge 83에서 시작하는 allow_search_engine_discovery 선택적 매개 변수를 사용하여 검색 엔진을 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9367">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9368">해당 매개 변수는 목록의 첫 번째 항목이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9368">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9369">allow_search_engine_discovery를 지정하지 않은 경우 기본적으로 검색 엔진을 검색할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9369">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9370">Microsoft Edge 84부터 이 정책을 권장 정책으로 설정하여 검색 공급자 검색을 허용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9370">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9371">Allow_search_engine_discovery 선택적 매개 변수는 추가할 필요가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9371">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9372">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 목록에서 모든 검색 엔진을 추가, 제거 또는 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9372">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9373">사용자는 기본 검색 엔진을 목록의 모든 검색 엔진으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9373">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9374">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 검색 엔진 목록을 원하는 대로 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9374">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9375">[DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) 정책이 설정된 경우 해당 정책(ManagedSearchEngines)은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9375">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9376">해당 정책의 적용을 마치려면 사용자는 브라우저를 다시 시작해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9376">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9377">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9377">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9378">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9378">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9379">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9379">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9380">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9380">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9381">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9381">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9382">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9382">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9383">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9383">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9384">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9384">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9385">GP 고유 이름: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9385">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9386">GP 이름: 검색 엔진 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9386">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9387">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9387">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9388">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9388">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9389">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9389">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9390">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9390">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9391">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9391">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9392">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9392">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9393">값 이름: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9393">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9394">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9394">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9395">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9395">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example2.com", 
    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example3.com", 
    "name": "Example3", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9396">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9396">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [{"allow_search_engine_discovery": true}, {"is_default": true, "keyword": "example1.com", "name": "Example1", "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", "keyword": "example2.com", "name": "Example2", "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"encoding": "UTF-8", "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", "keyword": "example3.com", "name": "Example3", "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"keyword": "example4.com", "name": "Example4", "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9397">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9397">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9398">기본 설정 키 이름: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9398">Preference Key Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9399">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9399">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedSearchEngines</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allow_search_engine_discovery</key>
    <true/>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>is_default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example1.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example1</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>image_search_post_params</key>
    <string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
    <key>image_search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload</string>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example2.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example2</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>encoding</key>
    <string>UTF-8</string>
    <key>image_search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload</string>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example3.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example3</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example4.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example4</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9400">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9400">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9401">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9401">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9402">프록시 서버에 대한 최대 동시 연결 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9402">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9403">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9403">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9404">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9404">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9405">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9405">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9406">프록시 서버에 대한 최대 동시 연결 수를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9406">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9407">일부 프록시 서버는 클라이언트 당 많은 수의 동시 연결을 처리할 수 없습니다. 해당 정책을 더 낮은 값으로 설정하면 이를 해결할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9407">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9408">해당 정책의 값은 100 보다 낮고 6 보다 커야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9408">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9409">기본값은 32입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9409">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9410">일부 웹 앱은 한 번에 여러 연결을 사용하는 것으로 알려져 있습니다. 32 아래로 최대 연결 수를 낮추면 해당 웹 앱 중 많은 앱이 열려있는 경우 브라우저 네트워킹 중단으로 이어질 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9410">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9411">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본값(32)이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9411">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9412">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9412">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9413">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9413">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9414">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9414">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9415">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9415">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9416">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9416">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9417">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9417">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9418">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9418">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9419">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9419">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9420">GP 고유 이름: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9420">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9421">GP 이름: 프록시 서버에 대한 최대 동시 연결 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9421">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9422">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9422">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9423">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9423">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9424">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9424">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9425">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9425">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9426">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9426">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9427">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9427">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9428">값 이름: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9428">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9429">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9429">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9430">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9430">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000020
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9431">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9431">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9432">기본 설정 키 이름: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9432">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9433">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9433">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9434">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9434">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9435">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9435">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9436">모든 IP 주소의 캐스트 장치에 Google Cast 연결 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9436">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9437">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9437">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9438">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9438">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9439">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9439">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9440">해당 정책을 사용하면 Google Cast는 RFC1918/RFC4193 비공개 주소 뿐만 아니라 모든 IP 주소의 캐스트 장치에 연결할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9440">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9441">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 Google Cast는 RFC1918/RFC4193 비공개 주소의 캐스트 장치에 연결이 제한됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9441">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9442">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Google Cast는 CastAllowAllIPs 기능을 사용하도록 설정하지 않은 경우 RFC1918/RFC4193 비공개 주소의 캐스트 장치에만 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9442">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9443">[EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) 정책을 사용하지 않으면 해당 정책은 효과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9443">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9444">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9444">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9445">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9445">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9446">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9446">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9447">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9447">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9448">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9448">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9449">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9449">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9450">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9450">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9451">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9451">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9452">GP 고유 이름: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9452">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9453">GP 이름: 모든 IP 주소의 캐스트 장치에 Google Cast 연결 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9453">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9454">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9454">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9455">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9455">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9456">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9456">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9457">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9457">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9458">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9458">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9459">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9459">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9460">값 이름: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9460">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9461">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9461">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9462">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9462">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9463">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9463">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9464">기본 설정 키 이름: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9464">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9465">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9465">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9466">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9466">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9467">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9467">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9468">사용 현황 및 크래시 관련 데이터 보고 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9468">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-9469">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 88 이후로는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9469">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9470">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9470">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9471">Windows 및 macOS(77부터 88까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9471">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9472">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9472">Description</span></span>
