  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9473">해당 정책은 더 이상 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9473">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9474">이는 [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)(Windows 7, Windows 8 및 macOS) 및 Win 10에서 원격 분석 허용([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569))으로 대체됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9474">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9475">이 정책은 Microsoft Edge에서 Microsoft로의 사용 현황 및 크래시 관련 데이터 보고를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9475">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9476">사용 현황 및 충돌 관련 데이터 보고를 Microsoft에 보내려면 이 정책을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9476">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9477">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하여 데이터를 Microsoft에 보내지 않도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9477">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9478">두 경우 모두 사용자가 정책 설정을 변경하거나 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9478">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9479">Windows 10에서 해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 Windows 진단 데이터 설정의 기본값이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9479">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9480">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge는 Windows 진단 데이터 설정이 고급 또는 전체로 설정된 경우에만 사용 현황 데이터를 전송합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9480">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9481">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 사용 현황 데이터를 전송하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9481">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9482">크래시 관련 데이터는 Windows 진단 데이터 설정에 따라 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9482">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9483">Windows 진단 데이터 설정에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9483">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9484">Windows 7, Windows 8 및 MacOS에서 해당 정책이 사용 현황 및 크래시 관련 데이터 전송을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9484">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9485">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 사용자의 기본 설정의 기본값이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9485">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9486">이 정책을 사용하려면[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 을 사용으로 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9486">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9487">[MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) 또는 [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices)가 구성되지 않았거나 사용하지 않도록 설정된 경우 이 데이터는 Microsoft로 보내지지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9487">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9488">이 정책은 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인에 가입된 윈도우즈 인스턴스, 장치 관리를 위해 등록된 윈도우즈 10 Pro 또는 Enterprise 인스턴스 또는 MDM을 통해 관리되거나 MCX를 통해 도메인에 가입된 MacOS 인스턴스에서만 사용할 수 있습니다..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9488">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9489">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9489">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9490">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9490">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9491">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9491">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9492">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9492">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9493">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9493">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9494">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9494">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9495">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9495">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9496">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9496">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9497">GP 고유 이름: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9497">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9498">GP 이름: 사용 현황 및 크래시 관련 데이터 보고 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9498">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9499">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9499">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9500">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9500">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9501">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9501">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9502">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9502">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9503">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9503">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9504">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9504">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9505">값 이름: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9505">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9506">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9506">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9507">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9507">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9508">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9508">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9509">기본 설정 키 이름: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9509">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9510">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9510">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9511">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9511">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9512">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9512">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9513">기본 창 오클루전 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9513">Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9514">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9514">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9515">Windows 84 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9515">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9516">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9516">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9517">Microsoft Edge에서 기본 창 오클루전을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9517">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9518">해당 설정을 사용하면 CPU 및 전원 소비량을 줄일 수 있고 Microsoft Edge는 창이 다른 창에 포함된 경우 이를 감지하고 작업 페인팅 픽셀을 일시 중단합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9518">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9519">해당 설정을 사용하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 창이 다른 창에 포함된 경우 이를 감지하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9519">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9520">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 창 숨기기 감지가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9520">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9521">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9521">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9522">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9522">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9523">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9523">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9524">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9524">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9525">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9525">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9526">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9526">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9527">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9527">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9528">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9528">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9529">GP 고유 이름: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9529">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9530">GP 이름: 기본 창 오클루전 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9530">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9531">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9531">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9532">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9532">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9533">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9533">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9534">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9534">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9535">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9535">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9536">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9536">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9537">값 이름: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9537">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9538">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9538">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9539">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9539">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9540">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9540">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9541">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9541">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9542">엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록에 대한 탭 탐색 지연 시간 제한 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9542">Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9543">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9543">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9544">Windows 84 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9544">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9545">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9545">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9546">브라우저가 초기 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록을 다운로드할 때까지 탐색을 기다리는 Microsoft Edge 탭의 시간 제한을 몇 초 단위로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9546">Allows you to set a timeout, in seconds, for Microsoft Edge tabs waiting to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9547">이 설정은 다음과 함께 작동합니다. [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel)은 'IEMode' 및 [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) 정책으로 설정되어 있으며, 이 정책은 목록에 하나 이상의 항목이 있으며 [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload)는 "모든 적합한 탐색" (1)으로 설정되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9547">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry and [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) is set to "All eligible navigations" (1).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9548">탭은 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록이 다운로드될 때까지 이 시간 제한보다 오래 기다리지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9548">Tabs will not wait longer than this timeout for the Enterprise Mode Site List to download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9549">시간 제한이 만료되면 브라우저가 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록을 다운로드하지 않은 경우 Microsoft Edge 탭은 계속 탐색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9549">If the browser has not finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List when the timeout expires, Microsoft Edge tabs will continue navigating anyway.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9550">시간 제한 값은 1초~20초 사이입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9550">The value of the timeout should be no greater than 20 seconds and no fewer than 1 second.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9551">이 정책의 시간 제한을 기본값 2초보다 큰 값으로 설정하면 2초 후에 정보 표시줄이 사용자에게 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9551">If you set the timeout in this policy to a value greater than the default of 2 seconds, an information bar is shown to the user after 2 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9552">정보 표시줄에는 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록 다운로드가 완료될 때까지 기다리는 것을 그만둘 수 있는 버튼이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9552">The information bar contains a button that allows the user to quit waiting for the Enterprise Mode Site List download to complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9553">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 2초의 시간 제한 기본값이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9553">If you don't configure this policy, the default timeout of 2 seconds is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9554">이 기본값은 차후에 변경될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9554">This default is subject to change in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9555">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9555">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9556">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9556">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9557">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9557">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9558">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9558">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9559">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9559">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9560">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9560">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9561">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9561">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9562">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9562">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9563">GP 고유 이름: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9563">GP unique name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9564">GP 이름: 엔터프라이즈 모드 사이트 목록에 대한 탭 탐색 지연 시간 제한 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9564">GP name: Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9565">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9565">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9566">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9566">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9567">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9567">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9568">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9568">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9569">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9569">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9570">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9570">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9571">값 이름: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9571">Value Name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9572">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9572">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9573">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9573">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x0000000a
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9574">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9574">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9575">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9575">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9576">네트워크 예측 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9576">Enable network prediction</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9577">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9577">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9578">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9578">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9579">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9579">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9580">네트워크 예측을 사용하도록 설정하고 사용자가 해당 설정을 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9580">Enables network prediction and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9581">이를 통해 DNS 프리페치, TCP 및 SSL 사전 연결 및 웹 페이지의 미리 렌더링을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9581">This controls DNS prefetching, TCP and SSL preconnection, and prerendering of web pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9582">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 네트워크 예측이 사용되지만 사용자가 이를 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9582">If you don't configure this policy, network prediction is enabled but the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9583">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9583">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9584">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = 모든 네트워크 연결에 대한 네트워크 작업 예측</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9584">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9585">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = 지원되지 않음. 이 값을 사용하는 경우 '모든 네트워크 연결에 대한 네트워크 작업을 예측’(0)이 설정된 것처럼 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9585">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Not supported, if this value is used it will be treated as if 'Predict network actions on any network connection' (0) was set</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9586">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = 모든 네트워크 연결에 대한 네트워크 작업 예측 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9586">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Don't predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9587">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9587">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9588">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9588">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9589">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9589">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9590">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9590">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9591">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9591">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9592">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9592">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9593">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9593">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9594">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9594">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9595">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9595">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9596">GP 고유 이름: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9596">GP unique name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9597">GP 이름: 네트워크 예측 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9597">GP name: Enable network prediction</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9598">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9598">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9599">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9599">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9600">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9600">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9601">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9601">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9602">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9602">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9603">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9603">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9604">값 이름: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9604">Value Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9605">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9605">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9606">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9606">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9607">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9607">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9608">기본 설정 키 이름: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9608">Preference Key Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9609">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9609">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9610">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9610">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9611">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9611">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9612">사용자에게 항상 회사 또는 학교 계정으로 자동 로그인되는 기본 프로필이 있는지 여부 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9612">Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9613">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9613">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9614">Windows (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9614">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9615">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9615">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9616">해당 정책은 사용자가 사용자의 회사 또는 학교 계정으로 자동 로그인되는 Microsoft Edge 프로필을 제거할 수 있는지 여부를 결정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9616">This policy determines if a user can remove the Microsoft Edge profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9617">해당 정책을 사용하면 Windows에서 사용자의 회사 또는 학교 계정으로 제거할 수 없는 프로필이 생성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9617">If you enable this policy, a non-removable profile will be created with the user's work or school account on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9618">해당 프로필은 로그아웃하거나 제거할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9618">This profile can't be signed out or removed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9619">프로필이 온-프레미스 계정 또는 OS 로그인 계정과 일치하는 Azure AD 계정으로 로그인한 경우에만 프로필이 제거될 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9619">The profile will be non-removable only if profile is signed-in with either on-premises account or Azure AD account that matches OS sign-in account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9620">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Windows에서 사용자의 회사 또는 학교 계정으로 자동 로그인되는 프로필을 로그아웃하거나 제거할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9620">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account on Windows can be signed out or removed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9621">브라우저 로그인을 구성하려면 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 정책을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9621">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9622">해당 정책은 장치 관리에 등록된 Microsoft Active Directory 도메인, Windows 10 Pro나 엔터프라이즈 인스턴스에 가입한 Windows 인스턴스에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9622">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9623">Microsoft Edge 89 이후부터는 동기화가 사용하지 않도록 설정되어 있는 기존 온-프레미스 프로필이 있고 컴퓨터가 하이브리드 가입된 경우, 온-프레미스 프로필을 Azure AD 프로필에 자동 업그레이드하고, 새로운 제거 불가능한 Azure AD 프로필을 만드는 대신 해당 프로필을 제거 불가능하도록 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9623">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is hybrid joined, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile and make it non-removable instead of creating a new non-removable Azure AD profile.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9624">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9624">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9625">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9625">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9626">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9626">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9627">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9627">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9628">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9628">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9629">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9629">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9630">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9630">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9631">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9631">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9632">GP 고유 이름: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9632">GP unique name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9633">GP 이름: 사용자에게 항상 회사 또는 학교 계정으로 자동 로그인되는 기본 프로필이 있는지 여부 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9633">GP name: Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9634">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9634">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9635">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9635">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9636">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9636">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9637">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9637">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9638">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9638">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9639">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9639">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9640">값 이름: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9640">Value Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9641">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9641">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9642">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9642">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9643">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9643">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9644">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9644">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9645">비보안 원본에 대해 보안 제한이 적용되는 위치 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9645">Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9646">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9646">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9647">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9647">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9648">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9648">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9649">비보안 원본에 대해 보안 제한이 적용되지 않는 원본(URL) 또는 호스트 이름 패턴(예: "\*.contoso.com") 목록을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9649">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "\*.contoso.com") for which security restrictions on insecure origins don't apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9650">해당 정책을 사용하면 TLS를 배포할 수 없는 레거시 응용 프로그램에 대해 허용된 출처를 지정하거나 내부 웹 개발용 스테이징 서버를 설정하여 개발자가 스테이징 서버에 TLS를 배포할 필요 없이 안전한 컨텍스트를 필요로 하는 기능을 테스트할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9650">This policy lets you specify allowed origins for legacy applications that can't deploy TLS or set up a staging server for internal web development so that developers can test out features requiring secure contexts without having to deploy TLS on the staging server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9651">해당 정책은 또한 원본이 Omnibox에서 "보안되지 않음" 레이블이 지정되지 않도록 방지할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9651">This policy also prevents the origin from being labeled "Not Secure" in the omnibox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9652">해당 정책에서 URL 목록을 설정하는 것은 같은 URL의 쉼표로 구분된 목록에서 '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' 명령줄 플래그를 설정하는 것과 동일한 효과를 갖습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9652">Setting a list of URLs in this policy has the same effect as setting the command-line flag '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' to a comma-separated list of the same URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9653">해당 정책을 사용하면 명령줄 플래그를 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9653">If you enable this policy, it overrides the command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9654">보안 컨텍스트에 대한 자세한 내용은 https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9654">For more information on secure contexts, see https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9655">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9655">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9656">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9656">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9657">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9657">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9658">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9658">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9659">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9659">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9660">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9660">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9661">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9661">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9662">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9662">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9663">GP 고유 이름: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9663">GP unique name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9664">GP 이름: 비보안 원본에 대해 보안 제한이 적용되는 위치 제어</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9664">GP name: Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9665">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9665">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9666">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9666">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9667">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9667">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9668">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9668">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9669">Path (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9669">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9670">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9670">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9671">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9671">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9672">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9672">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9673">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9673">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = "http://testserver.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = "*.contoso.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9674">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9674">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9675">기본 설정 키 이름: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9675">Preference Key Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9676">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9676">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9677">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9677">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9678">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9678">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9679">웹 사이트에서 사용 가능한 결제 방법을 쿼리하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9679">Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9680">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9680">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9681">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9681">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9682">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9682">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9683">웹 사이트에서 사용자가 결제 방법을 저장했는지에 대해 확인 여부를 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9683">Allows you to set whether websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9684">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 PaymentRequest.canMakePayment 또는 PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API를 사용하는 웹 사이트에서 사용 가능한 결제 방법이 없다는 알림이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9684">If you disable this policy, websites that use PaymentRequest.canMakePayment or PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API will be informed that no payment methods are available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9685">해당 정책을 사용하거나 설정하지 않으면 웹 사이트에서 사용자가 결제 방법을 저장했는지 여부를 확인할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9685">If you enable this policy or don't set this policy, websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9686">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9686">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9687">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9687">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9688">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9688">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9689">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9689">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9690">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9690">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9691">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9691">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9692">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9692">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9693">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9693">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9694">GP 고유 이름: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9694">GP unique name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9695">GP 이름: 웹 사이트에서 사용 가능한 결제 방법을 쿼리하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9695">GP name: Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9696">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9696">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9697">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9697">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9698">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9698">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9699">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9699">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9700">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9700">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9701">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9701">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9702">값 이름: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9702">Value Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9703">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9703">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9704">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9704">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9705">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9705">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9706">기본 설정 키 이름: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9706">Preference Key Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9707">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9707">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9708">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9708">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9709">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9709">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9710">Microsoft에 검색 기록을 보내어 광고, 검색, 뉴스를 개인 설정하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9710">Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9711">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9711">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9712">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9712">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9713">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9713">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9714">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft에서 광고, 검색, 뉴스 및 기타 Microsoft 서비스를 개인 설정하는 데 사용되는 사용자의 Microsoft Edge 검색 기록을 모으지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9714">This policy prevents Microsoft from collecting a user's Microsoft Edge browsing history to be used for personalizing advertising, search, news and other Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9715">해당 설정은 Microsoft 계정을 가진 사용자만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9715">This setting is only available for users with a Microsoft account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9716">해당 설정은 하위 계정 또는 엔터프라이즈 계정에는 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9716">This setting is not available for child accounts or enterprise accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9717">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경하거나 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9717">If you disable this policy, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9718">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 사용자의 기본 설정의 기본값이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9718">If this policy is enabled or not configured, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9719">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9719">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9720">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9720">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9721">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9721">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9722">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9722">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9723">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9723">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9724">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9724">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9725">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9725">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9726">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9726">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9727">GP 고유 이름: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9727">GP unique name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9728">GP 이름: Microsoft에 검색 기록을 보내어 광고, 검색, 뉴스를 개인 설정하도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9728">GP name: Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9729">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9729">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9730">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9730">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9731">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9731">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9732">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9732">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9733">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9733">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9734">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9734">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9735">값 이름: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9735">Value Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9736">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9736">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9737">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9737">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9738">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9738">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9739">기본 설정 키 이름: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9739">Preference Key Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9740">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9740">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9741">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9741">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9742">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9742">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9743">작업 표시줄에 고정 마법사 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9743">Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9744">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9744">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9745">Windows (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9745">On Windows since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9746">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9746">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9747">Microsoft Edge는 작업 표시줄에 고정 마법사를 사용하여 사용자가 추천 사이트를 작업 표시줄에 고정할 수 있도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9747">Microsoft Edge uses the Pin to taskbar wizard to help users pin suggested sites to the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9748">작업 표시줄에 고정 마법사 기능은 기본적으로 사용하도록 설정되어 있으며 설정 및 기타 메뉴를 통해 사용자가 액세스할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9748">The Pin to taskbar wizard feature is enabled by default and accessible to the user through the Settings and more menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9749">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 설정 및 기타 메뉴에서 작업 표시줄에 고정 마법사를 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9749">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can call the Pin to taskbar wizard from the Settings and More menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9750">마법사는 프로토콜 시작을 통해서도 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9750">The wizard can also be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9751">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 메뉴에서 작업 표시줄에 고정 마법사를 사용할 수 없으며 프로토콜 시작을 통해 호출할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9751">If you disable this policy, the Pin to taskbar wizard is disabled in the menu and cannot be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9752">작업 표시줄에 고정 마법사를 사용하거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 사용자 설정을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9752">User settings to enable or disable the Pin to taskbar wizard aren't available.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9753">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9753">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9754">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9754">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9755">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9755">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9756">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9756">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9757">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9757">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9758">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9758">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9759">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9759">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9760">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9760">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9761">GP 고유 이름: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9761">GP unique name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9762">GP 이름: 작업 표시줄에 고정 마법사 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9762">GP name: Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9763">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9763">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9764">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9764">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9765">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9765">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9766">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9766">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9767">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9767">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9768">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9768">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9769">값 이름: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9769">Value Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9770">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9770">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9771">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9771">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9772">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9772">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9773">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9773">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9774">자동 관리 인증 사용(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9774">Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-9775">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9775">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9776">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9776">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9777">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9777">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9778">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9778">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9779">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9779">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9780">이 정책은 브라우저 로그인과는 독립적으로 작동하지 않기 때문에 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9780">This policy is deprecated because it does not work independently of browser sign in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9781">Microsoft Edge 버전 91에서 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9781">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9782">브라우저 로그인을 구성하려면 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) 정책을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9782">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9783">Microsoft Edge에서 자동 관리 인증 설정 여부를 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9783">Lets you configure whether to turn on Proactive Authentication in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9784">이 정책을 실행하면 Microsoft Edge는 브라우저에 로그인된 계정을 사용하여 웹 사이트 및 서비스에 대해 원활하게 인증하려고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9784">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to seamlessly authenticate to websites and services using the account which is signed-in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9785">이 정책을 실행 중지하면 Microsoft Edge는 SSO(Single Sign-On)를 사용하여 웹 사이트 또는 서비스로 인증하려고 시도하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9785">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge does not try to authenticate with websites or services using single sign-on (SSO).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9786">엔터프라이즈 새 탭 페이지와 같은 인증된 환경은 작동하지 않습니다(예: 최근 및 권장 Office 문서를 사용할 수 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9786">Authenticated experiences like the Enterprise New Tab Page will not work (e.g. recent and recommended Office documents will not be available).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9787">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 자동 관리 인증이 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9787">If you don't configure this policy, Proactive Authentication is turned on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9788">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9788">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9789">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9789">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9790">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9790">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9791">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9791">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9792">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9792">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9793">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9793">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9794">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9794">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9795">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9795">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9796">GP 고유 이름: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9796">GP unique name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9797">GP 이름: 자동 인증 사용(사용하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9797">GP name: Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9798">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9798">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9799">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9799">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9800">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9800">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9801">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9801">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9802">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9802">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9803">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9803">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9804">값 이름: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9804">Value Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9805">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9805">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9806">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9806">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9807">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9807">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9808">기본 설정 키 이름: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9808">Preference Key Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9809">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9809">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9810">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9810">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9811">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9811">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9812">전체 탭 프로모션 콘텐츠 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9812">Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9813">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9813">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9814">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9814">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9815">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9815">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9816">전체 탭 프로모션 또는 교육용 콘텐츠의 프레젠테이션을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9816">Control the presentation of full-tab promotional or educational content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9817">해당 설정은 사용자가 Microsoft Edge에 로그인하는 데 도움이 되는 시작 페이지의 프레젠테이션을 제어하고 기본 브라우저를 선택하거나 제품 기능에 대해 알아봅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9817">This setting controls the presentation of welcome pages that help users sign into Microsoft Edge, choose their default browser, or learn about product features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9818">해당 정책을 사용하거나(True로 설정) 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 사용자에게 제품 정보를 제공하는 전체 탭 콘텐츠를 표시할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9818">If you enable this policy (set it true) or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge can show full-tab content to users to provide product information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9819">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면(False로 설정) Microsoft Edge에서 사용자에게 전체 탭 콘텐츠를 표시할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9819">If you disable (set to false) this policy, Microsoft Edge can't show full-tab content to users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9820">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9820">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9821">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9821">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9822">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9822">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9823">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9823">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9824">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9824">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9825">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9825">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9826">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9826">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9827">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9827">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9828">GP 고유 이름: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9828">GP unique name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9829">GP 이름: 전체 탭 프로모션 콘텐츠 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9829">GP name: Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9830">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9830">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9831">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9831">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9832">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9832">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9833">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9833">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9834">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9834">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9835">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9835">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9836">값 이름: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9836">Value Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9837">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9837">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9838">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9838">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9839">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9839">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9840">기본 설정 키 이름: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9840">Preference Key Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9841">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9841">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9842">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9842">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9843">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9843">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9844">다운로드한 파일을 저장할 위치 묻기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9844">Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9845">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9845">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9846">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9846">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9847">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9847">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9848">다운로드하기 전에 파일을 저장할 위치에 대한 요청 여부를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9848">Set whether to ask where to save a file before downloading it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9849">해당 정책을 사용하면 다운로드하기 전에 각 파일을 저장할 위치를 묻는 메시지가 사용자에게 표시됩니다. 구성하지 않으면 위치를 묻지 않고 파일은 자동으로 기본 위치에 저장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9849">If you enable this policy, the user is asked where to save each file before downloading; if you don't configure it, files are saved automatically to the default location, without asking the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9850">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 해당 설정을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9850">If you don't configure this policy, the user will be able to change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9851">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9851">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9852">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9852">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9853">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9853">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9854">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9854">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9855">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9855">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9856">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9856">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9857">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9857">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9858">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9858">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9859">GP 고유 이름: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9859">GP unique name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9860">GP 이름: 다운로드한 파일을 저장할 위치 묻기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9860">GP name: Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9861">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9861">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9862">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9862">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9863">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9863">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9864">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9864">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9865">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9865">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9866">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9866">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9867">값 이름: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9867">Value Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9868">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9868">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9869">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9869">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9870">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9870">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9871">기본 설정 키 이름: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9871">Preference Key Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9872">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9872">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9873">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9873">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9874">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9874">QuicAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9875">QUIC 프로토콜 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9875">Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9876">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9876">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9877">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9877">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9878">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9878">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9879">Microsoft Edge에서 QUIC 프로토콜을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9879">Allows use of the QUIC protocol in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9880">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 QUIC 프로토콜을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9880">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the QUIC protocol is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9881">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 QUIC 프로토콜은 차단됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9881">If you disable this policy, the QUIC protocol is blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9882">QUIC는 현재 TCP를 사용하는 웹 응용 프로그램의 성능을 개선할 수 있는 전송 계층 네트워크 프로토콜입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9882">QUIC is a transport layer network protocol that can improve performance of web applications that currently use TCP.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9883">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9883">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9884">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9884">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9885">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9885">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9886">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9886">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9887">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9887">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9888">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9888">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9889">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9889">Windows information and settings</span></span>
