  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9890">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9890">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9891">GP 고유 이름: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9891">GP unique name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9892">GP 이름: QUIC 프로토콜 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9892">GP name: Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9893">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9893">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9894">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9894">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9895">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9895">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9896">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9896">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9897">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9897">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9898">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9898">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9899">값 이름: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9899">Value Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9900">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9900">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9901">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9901">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9902">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9902">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9903">기본 설정 키 이름: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9903">Preference Key Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9904">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9904">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9905">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9905">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9906">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9906">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9907">Microsoft Edge에서 QuickView Office 파일 기능 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9907">Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9908">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9908">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9909">Windows 및 macOS 버전 90 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9909">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9910">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9910">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9911">사용자가 OneDrive 또는 SharePoint에 없는 Office 파일을 웹에서 볼 수 있는지 여부를 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9911">Allows you to set whether users can view Office files on the web that aren't on OneDrive or SharePoint.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9912">(예: Word 문서, PowerPoint 프레젠테이션 및 Excel 스프레드시트)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9912">(For example: Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, and Excel spreadsheets)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9913">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우 파일을 다운로드하는 대신 Office Viewer를 사용하여 Microsoft Edge에서 이러한 파일을 볼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9913">If you enable or don't configure this policy, these files can be viewed in Microsoft Edge using Office Viewer instead of downloading the files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9914">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 이러한 파일이 다운로드되어 볼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9914">If you disable this policy, these files will be downloaded to be viewed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9915">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9915">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9916">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9916">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9917">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9917">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9918">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9918">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9919">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9919">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9920">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9920">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9921">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9921">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9922">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9922">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9923">GP 고유 이름: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9923">GP unique name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9924">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 QuickView Office 파일 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9924">GP name: Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9925">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9925">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9926">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9926">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9927">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9927">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9928">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9928">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9929">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9929">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9930">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9930">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9931">값 이름: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9931">Value Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9932">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9932">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9933">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9933">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9934">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9934">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9935">기본 설정 키 이름: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9935">Preference Key Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9936">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9936">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9937">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9937">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9938">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9938">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9939">호환되지 않는 사이트를 Internet Explorer에서 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션하는 BHO 설치 방지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9939">Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9940">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9940">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9941">Windows (87 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9941">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9942">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9942">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9943">이 설정을 사용하여 최신 브라우저가 필요한 사이트에 대해 호환되지 않는 사이트를 Internet Explorer에서 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션하는 BHO(브라우저 도우미 개체) 설치를 차단할지 여부를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9943">This setting lets you specify whether to block the install of the Browser Helper Object (BHO) that enables redirecting incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge for sites that require a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9944">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 BHO가 설치되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9944">If you enable this policy, the BHO will not be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9945">이미 설치되어 있는 경우, 다음 Microsoft Edge 업데이트에서 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9945">If it is already installed it will be uninstalled on the next Microsoft Edge update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9946">이 정책이 구성되지 않았거나 사용하지 않도록 설정된 경우 BHO가 설치됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9946">If this policy is not configured or is disabled, the BHO will be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9947">BHO는 호환되지 않는 사이트의 리디렉션을 수행하는 데 필요하지만, 리디렉션의 발생 여부는 또한 [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode)가 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9947">The BHO is required for incompatible site redirection to occur, however whether redirection occurs or not is also controlled by [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9948">이 정책에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)을 참조</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9948">For more information about this policy see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9949">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9949">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9950">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9950">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9951">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9951">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9952">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9952">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9953">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9953">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9954">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9954">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9955">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9955">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9956">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9956">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9957">GP 고유 이름: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9957">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9958">GP 이름: 호환되지 않는 사이트를 Internet Explorer에서 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션하는 BHO 설치 방지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9958">GP name: Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9959">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9959">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9960">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9960">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9961">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9961">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9962">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9962">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9963">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9963">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9964">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9964">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9965">값 이름: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9965">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9966">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9966">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9967">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9967">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9968">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9968">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9969">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9969">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9970">호환되지 않는 사이트를 Internet Explorer에서 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9970">Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9971">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9971">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9972">Windows (87 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9972">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9973">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9973">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9974">이 설정을 사용하면 Internet Explorer가 최신 브라우저를 필요로 하는 사이트로의 탐색을 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션할지를 지정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9974">This setting lets you specify whether Internet Explorer will redirect navigations to sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9975">이 정책을 구성하지 않거나 "Sitelist"로 설정하면 M87부터는 Internet Explorer에서 최신 브라우저를 필요로 하는 사이트를 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9975">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Sitelist', beginning in M87, Internet Explorer will redirect sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9976">사이트가 Internet Explorer에서 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션되는 경우, 이전 콘텐츠가 없는 경우에 해당 사이트를 로드하기 시작한 Internet Explorer 탭은 닫힙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9976">When a site is redirected from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge, the Internet Explorer tab that began loading that site is closed if it had no prior content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9977">그렇지 않은 경우, 사이트를 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션한 이유를 설명하는 Microsoft 도움말 페이지로 이동됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9977">Otherwise, it is navigated to a Microsoft help page explaining why the site was redirected to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9978">IE에서 사이트를 로드하기 위해 Microsoft Edge가 시작되는 경우, 해당 사이트는 최신 브라우저에서 가장 효과적으로 작동한다고 설명하는 정보 표시줄이 사용자에게 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9978">When Microsoft Edge is launched to load a site from IE, an information bar is shown to the user explaining that the site works best in a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9979">이 정책을 '사용 안 함'으로 설정하면 Internet Explorer에서 Microsoft Edge로 어떠한 트래픽도 리디렉션하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9979">If you set this policy to 'Disable', Internet Explorer will not redirect any traffic to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9980">이 정책에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)을 참조</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9980">For more information about this policy see  [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9981">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9981">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9982">Disable(0) = 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9982">Disable (0) = Disable</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9983">Sitelist(1) = 호환되지 않는 사이트의 목록을 기준으로 사이트를 리디렉션</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9983">Sitelist (1) = Redirect sites based on the incompatible sites sitelist</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-9984">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9984">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9985">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9985">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9986">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9986">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9987">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9987">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9988">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9988">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9989">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9989">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9990">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9990">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9991">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9991">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9992">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9992">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9993">GP 고유 이름: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9993">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9994">GP이름: 호환되지 않는 사이트를 Internet Explorer에서 Microsoft Edge로 리디렉션</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9994">GP name: Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9995">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9995">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9996">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9996">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9997">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9997">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9998">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9998">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-9999">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-9999">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10000">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10000">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10001">값 이름: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10001">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10002">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10002">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10003">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10003">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10004">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10004">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10005">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10005">RelaunchNotification</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10006">사용자에게 보류 중인 업데이트에 대해 브라우저의 재시작을 권장하거나 필요함을 알림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10006">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10007">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10007">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10008">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10008">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10009">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10009">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10010">보류 중인 업데이트를 적용하려면 Microsoft Edge를 재시작해야 함을 사용자에게 알립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10010">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10011">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 상단 메뉴 모음의 오른쪽 끝에 휴지통 아이콘을 추가하고 사용자에게 브라우저를 재시작하여 업데이트를 적용하라는 메시지를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10011">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10012">해당 정책을 사용하고 '권장'으로 설정하면 사용자에게 재시작을 권장하는 경고 메시지가 반복적으로 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10012">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10013">사용자는 해당 경고를 해제하고 재시작을 연기할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10013">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10014">해당 정책을 '필수'로 설정하면 알림 기간이 지나자마자 브라우저를 자동으로 재시작하라는 경고 메시지가 반복적으로 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10014">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10015">기본 기간은 7일입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10015">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10016">[RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) 정책을 사용하여 해당 기간을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10016">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10017">브라우저가 다시 시작되면 사용자의 세션이 복원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10017">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10018">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10018">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10019">권장 (1) = 권장 - 재시작을 권장하는 반복적인 메시지를 사용자에게 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10019">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10020">필수 (2) = 필수 - 재시작을 요구하는 반복적인 메시지를 사용자에게 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10020">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10021">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10021">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10022">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10022">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10023">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10023">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10024">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10024">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10025">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10025">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10026">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10026">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10027">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10027">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10028">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10028">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10029">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10029">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10030">GP 고유 이름: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10030">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10031">GP 이름: 사용자에게 보류 중인 업데이트에 대해 브라우저의 재시작을 권장하거나 필요함을 알림</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10031">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10032">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10032">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10033">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10033">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10034">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10034">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10035">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10035">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10036">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10036">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10037">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10037">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10038">값 이름: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10038">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10039">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10039">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10040">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10040">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10041">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10041">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10042">기본 설정 키 이름: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10042">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10043">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10043">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10044">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10044">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10045">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10045">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10046">업데이트 알림 기간 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10046">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10047">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10047">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10048">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10048">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10049">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10049">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10050">사용자에게 보류 중인 업데이트를 적용하기 위해 Microsoft Edge OS 장치를 재시작해야 한다는 알림을 받는 기간을 ms 단위로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10050">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10051">해당 기간을 초과하면 사용자에게 업데이트가 필요하다는 알림을 반복적으로 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10051">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10052">Microsoft Edge의 경우 앱 메뉴가 변경되어 알림 기간의 1/3이 경과하면 재시작이 필요하다는 알림을 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10052">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10053">해당 알림은 알림 기간의 2/3가 경과하면 색이 변경되고 전체 알림 기간이 경과하면 다시 색이 변경됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10053">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10054">[RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 추가 알림은 해당 일정과 동일합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10054">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10055">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 기본 기간은 6억 480만ms (1주)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10055">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10056">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10056">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10057">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10057">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10058">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10058">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10059">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10059">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10060">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10060">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10061">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10061">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10062">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10062">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10063">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10063">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10064">GP 고유 이름: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10064">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10065">GP 이름: 업데이트 알림 기간 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10065">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10066">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10066">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10067">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10067">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10068">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10068">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10069">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10069">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10070">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10070">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10071">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10071">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10072">값 이름: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10072">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10073">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10073">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10074">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10074">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x240c8400
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10075">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10075">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10076">기본 설정 키 이름: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10076">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10077">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10077">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10078">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10078">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10079">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10079">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10080">렌더러 코드 무결성 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10080">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10081">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10081">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10082">Windows (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10082">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10083">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10083">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10084">정책을 사용으로 설정하거나 설정하지 않은 채로 두면 렌더러 코드 무결성이 켜집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10084">Setting the policy to Enabled or leaving it unset turns Renderer Code Integrity on.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10085">정책을 사용 안함으로 설정하면, 알 수 없는 잠재적으로 적대적인 코드가 Microsoft Edge의 렌더러 프로세스 내에서 로드될 수 있어 Microsoft Edge의 보안 및 안정성에 치명적인 영향을 미치게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10085">Setting the policy to Disabled has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability as unknown and potentially hostile code can load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10086">Microsoft Edge의 렌더러 프로세스 내에서 반드시 실행해야 하는 타사 소프트웨어와의 호환성 문제가 있는 경우에만 정책을 끕니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10086">Only turn off the policy if there are compatibility issues with third-party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10087">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10087">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10088">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10088">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10089">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10089">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10090">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10090">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10091">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10091">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10092">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10092">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10093">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10093">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10094">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10094">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10095">GP 고유 이름: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10095">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10096">GP 이름: 렌더러 코드 무결성 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10096">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10097">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10097">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10098">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10098">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10099">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10099">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10100">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10100">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10101">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10101">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10102">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10102">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10103">값 이름: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10103">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10104">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10104">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10105">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10105">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10106">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10106">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10107">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10107">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10108">로컬 트러스트 앵커에 대한 온라인 OCSP/CRL 검사 필요 여부 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10108">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10109">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10109">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10110">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10110">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10111">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10111">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10112">온라인 해지 검사(OCSP/CRL 검사)의 필요 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10112">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10113">Microsoft Edge에서 해지 상태 정보를 가져올 수 없는 경우 해당 인증서는 해지된 것으로("하드 오류") 처리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10113">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10114">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge에서 유효성 검사에 성공하고 로컬로 설치된 CA 인증서로 서명된 서버 인증서에 대해 해지 검사를 항상 수행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10114">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10115">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 기존 온라인 해지 검사 설정을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10115">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10116">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10116">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10117">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10117">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10118">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10118">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10119">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10119">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10120">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10120">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10121">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10121">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10122">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10122">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10123">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10123">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10124">GP 고유 이름: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10124">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10125">GP 이름: 로컬 트러스트 앵커에 대한 온라인 OCSP/CRL 검사 필요 여부 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10125">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10126">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10126">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10127">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10127">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10128">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10128">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10129">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10129">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10130">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10130">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10131">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10131">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10132">값 이름: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10132">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10133">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10133">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10134">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10134">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10135">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10135">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10136">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10136">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10137">웹 서비스를 사용하여 탐색 오류 해결 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10137">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10138">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10138">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10139">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10139">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10140">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10140">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10141">Microsoft Edge에서 호텔 및 공항 Wi-fi와 같은 경우 네트워크 연결을 위해 웹 서비스에 데이터 없는 연결을 실행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10141">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10142">해당 정책을 사용하면 웹 서비스를 사용하여 네트워크 연결을 테스트합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10142">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10143">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 기본 API를 사용하여 네트워크 연결 및 탐색 문제의 해결을 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10143">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10144">**참고**: Windows 8 이상 버전의 Windows를 제외하고 Microsoft Edge는 *항상* 기본 API를 사용하여 연결 문제를 해결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10144">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10145">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서는 edge://settings/privacy의 서비스에 설정된 사용자 선호도를 고려합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10145">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10146">특히 사용자가 설정하거나 해제할 수 있는 **탐색 오류를 해결하는 데 도움이 되는 웹 서비스 사용** 토글이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10146">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10147">해당 정책(ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService)을 사용하도록 설정한 경우 **탐색 오류를 해결하는 데 도움이 되는 웹 서비스 사용** 설정이 켜져 있지만 사용자는 토글을 사용하여 해당 설정을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10147">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10148">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우 **탐색 오류를 해결하는 데 도움이 되는 웹 서비스 사용** 설정이 꺼져 있고 사용자는 토글을 사용하여 해당 설정을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10148">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10149">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10149">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10150">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10150">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10151">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10151">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10152">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10152">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10153">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10153">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10154">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10154">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10155">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10155">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10156">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10156">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10157">GP 고유 이름: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10157">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10158">GP 이름: 웹 서비스를 사용하여 탐색 오류 해결 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10158">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10159">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10159">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10160">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10160">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10161">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10161">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10162">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10162">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10163">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10163">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10164">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10164">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10165">값 이름: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10165">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10166">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10166">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10167">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10167">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10168">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10168">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10169">기본 설정 키 이름: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10169">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10170">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10170">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10171">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10171">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10172">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10172">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10173">Microsoft Edge 기본 계정으로 사용할 수 있는 계정 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10173">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10174">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10174">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10175">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10175">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10176">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10176">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10177">Microsoft Edge에서 브라우저 기본 계정으로 설정할 수 있는 계정을 결정합니다. (동기화 옵트인 흐름 중에 선택한 계정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10177">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10178">사용자가 해당 패턴과 일치하지 않는 사용자 이름을 사용하여 브라우저 기본 계정을 구성하려고 하면 해당 계정이 차단되고 해당 오류 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10178">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10179">패턴에 대한 Perl 스타일 정규식을 사용하여 여러 계정과 일치하도록 이 정책을 구성할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10179">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10180">패턴 일치는 대/소문자를 구분합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10180">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10181">사용되는 정규식 규칙에 대한 자세한 내용은 https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10181">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10182">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 공백으로 두면 사용자는 모든 계정을 Microsoft Edge의 브라우저 기본 계정으로 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10182">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10183">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10183">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10184">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10184">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10185">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10185">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10186">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10186">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10187">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10187">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10188">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10188">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10189">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10189">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10190">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10190">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10191">GP 고유 이름: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10191">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10192">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge 기본 계정으로 사용할 수 있는 계정 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10192">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10193">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10193">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10194">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10194">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10195">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10195">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10196">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10196">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10197">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10197">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10198">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10198">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10199">값 이름: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10199">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10200">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10200">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10201">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10201">Example value:</span></span>

```
".*@contoso.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10202">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10202">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10203">기본 설정 키 이름: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10203">Preference Key Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10204">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10204">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10205">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10205">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10206">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10206">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10207">로밍 프로필 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10207">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10208">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10208">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10209">Windows 85 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10209">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10210">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10210">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10211">프로필의 로밍 복사본을 저장하는 데 사용할 디렉터리를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10211">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10212">이 정책을 활성화하고 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 정책을 사용하도록 설정한 경우 Microsoft Edge는 제공된 디렉터리를 사용하여 프로필의 로밍 복사본을 저장합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10212">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10213">[RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 이 정책에 저장된 값이 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10213">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10214">사용할 수 있는 변수의 목록은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10214">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10215">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 기본 로밍 프로필 경로가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10215">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10216">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10216">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10217">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10217">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10218">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10218">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10219">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10219">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10220">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10220">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10221">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10221">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10222">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10222">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10223">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10223">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10224">GP 고유 이름: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10224">GP unique name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10225">GP 이름: 로밍 프로필 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10225">GP name: Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10226">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10226">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10227">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10227">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10228">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10228">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10229">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10229">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10230">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10230">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10231">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10231">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10232">값 이름: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10232">Value Name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10233">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10233">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10234">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10234">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${roaming_app_data}\\edge-profile"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10235">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10235">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10236">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10236">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10237">Microsoft Edge 프로필 데이터에 대한 로밍 복사본을 사용할 수 있도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10237">Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10238">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10238">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10239">Windows 85 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10239">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10240">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10240">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10241">Windows에서 로밍 프로필을 사용하려면 이 정책을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10241">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10242">Microsoft Edge 프로필(즐겨찾기 및 기본 설정)에 저장된 설정은 로밍 사용자 프로필 폴더(또는 [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) 정책을 통해 관리자가 지정한 위치)에 저장된 파일에도 저장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10242">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10243">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 정규 로컬 프로필만 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10243">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10244">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)는 클라우드 동기화만 사용하지 않도록 설정하며 이 정책에 영향을 끼치지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10244">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) only disables cloud synchronization and has no impact on this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10245">로밍 사용자 프로필 사용에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10245">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10246">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10246">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10247">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10247">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10248">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10248">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10249">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10249">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10250">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10250">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10251">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10251">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10252">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10252">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10253">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10253">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10254">GP 고유 이름: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10254">GP unique name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10255">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge 프로필 데이터에 대한 로밍 복사본을 사용할 수 있도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10255">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10256">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10256">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10257">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10257">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10258">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10258">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10259">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10259">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10260">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10260">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10261">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10261">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10262">값 이름: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10262">Value Name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10263">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10263">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10264">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10264">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10265">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10265">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10266">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10266">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10267">Adobe Flash 콘텐츠 설정을 모든 콘텐츠로 확장(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10267">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-10268">OBSOLETE: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 87 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10268">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10269">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10269">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10270">Windows 및 macOS(77부터 87까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10270">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10271">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10271">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10272">Flash가 Microsoft Edge에서 더 이상 지원되지 않으므로 이 정책이 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10272">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10273">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자 또는 엔터프라이즈 정책에 따라 콘텐츠 설정에서 Adobe Flash를 허용하도록 설정된 웹 사이트에 포함된 모든 Adobe Flash 콘텐츠가 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10273">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10274">여기에는 다른 원본 및/또는 작은 콘텐츠의 콘텐츠가 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10274">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10275">Adobe Flash를 실행할 수 있는 웹 사이트를 제어하려면 [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) 및 [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) 정책의 사양을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10275">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10276">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 다른 원본 (바로 위에 언급 된 세 가지 정책에 지정되지 않은 사이트) 또는 작은 콘텐츠에 있는 Adobe Flash 콘텐츠가 차단될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10276">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10277">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10277">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10278">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10278">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10279">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10279">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10280">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10280">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10281">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10281">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10282">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10282">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10283">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10283">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10284">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10284">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10285">GP 고유 이름: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10285">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10286">GP 이름: Adobe Flash 콘텐츠 설정을 모든 콘텐츠로 확장(obsolete)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10286">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10287">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10287">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10288">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10288">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10289">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10289">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10290">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10290">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10291">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10291">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10292">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10292">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10293">값 이름: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10293">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10294">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10294">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10295">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10295">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10296">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10296">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10297">기본 설정 키 이름: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10297">Preference Key Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10298">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10298">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10299">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10299">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10300">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10300">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10301">HTTPS 경고 페이지에서 사용자가 계속할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10301">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10302">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10302">Supported versions:</span></span>
