  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10303">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10303">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10304">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10304">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10305">Microsoft Edge에서 사용자가 SSL 오류가 있는 사이트를 방문할 때 경고 페이지를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10305">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10306">해당 정책을 사용하거나 구성하지 않으면(기본값) 사용자는 해당 경고 페이지를 클릭할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10306">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10307">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 사용자는 경고 페이지를 클릭할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10307">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10308">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10308">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10309">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10309">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10310">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10310">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10311">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10311">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10312">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10312">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10313">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10313">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10314">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10314">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10315">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10315">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10316">GP 고유 이름: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10316">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10317">GP 이름: HTTPS 경고 페이지에서 사용자가 계속할 수 있도록 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10317">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10318">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10318">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10319">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10319">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10320">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10320">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10321">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10321">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10322">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10322">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10323">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10323">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10324">값 이름: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10324">Value Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10325">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10325">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10326">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10326">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10327">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10327">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10328">기본 설정 키 이름: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10328">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10329">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10329">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10330">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10330">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10331">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10331">SSLVersionMin</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10332">최소 TLS 버전 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10332">Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10333">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10333">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10334">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10334">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10335">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10335">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10336">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10336">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10337">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 TLS 1.0 및 TLS 1.1에 대한 오류를 표시하지만 사용자는 무시할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10337">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show an error for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1, but the user will be able to bypass it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10338">이 정책을 사용하는 경우 Microsoft Edge는 지정한 버전보다 낮은 SSL/TLS 버전을 사용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10338">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10339">인식할 수 없는 모든 값은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10339">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10340">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10340">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10341">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10341">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10342">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10342">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10343">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10343">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10344">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10344">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10345">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10345">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10346">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10346">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10347">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10347">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10348">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10348">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10349">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10349">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10350">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10350">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10351">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10351">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10352">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10352">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10353">GP 고유 이름: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10353">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10354">GP 이름: 최소 TLS 버전 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10354">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10355">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10355">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10356">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10356">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10357">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10357">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10358">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10358">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10359">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10359">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10360">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10360">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10361">값 이름: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10361">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10362">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10362">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10363">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10363">Example value:</span></span>

```
"tls1"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10364">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10364">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10365">기본 설정 키 이름: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10365">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10366">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10366">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10367">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10367">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10368">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10368">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10369">Microsoft Edge가 닫힐 때 쿠키 저장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10369">Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10370">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10370">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10371">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10371">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10372">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10372">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10373">이 정책을 사용하면 브라우저를 닫을 때 지정된 쿠키 집합이 삭제되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10373">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10374">이 정책은 다음 경우에만 유효합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10374">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10375">'쿠키 및 기타 사이트 데이터' 토글은 설정/개인 정보 및 서비스/닫기 또는 가까운 곳에서 검색 데이터 지우기에서 구성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10375">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10376">[ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) 정책을 사용하고 있거나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10376">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10377">정책 [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)은 '세션 기간 동안 쿠키 유지'로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10377">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10378">모든 세션에서 쿠키가 보존되는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10378">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10379">참고: 사용자가 계속해서 쿠키 사이트 목록을 편집하여 Url을 추가하거나 제거할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10379">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10380">그러나 관리자가 추가한 Url은 제거할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10380">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10381">이 정책을 사용하면 브라우저를 닫을 때 쿠키 목록이 지워지지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10381">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10382">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자의 개인 구성이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10382">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10383">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10383">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10384">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10384">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10385">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10385">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10386">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10386">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10387">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10387">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10388">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10388">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10389">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10389">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10390">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10390">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10391">GP 고유 이름: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10391">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10392">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge가 닫힐 때 쿠키 저장</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10392">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10393">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10393">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10394">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10394">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10395">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10395">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10396">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10396">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10397">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10397">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10398">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10398">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10399">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10399">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10400">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10400">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10401">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10401">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10402">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10402">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10403">기본 설정 키 이름: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10403">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10404">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10404">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10405">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10405">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10406">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10406">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10407">브라우저 기록 저장 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10407">Disable saving browser history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10408">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10408">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10409">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10409">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10410">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10410">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10411">브라우저 기록 저장을 사용하지 않도록 설정하고 사용자가 해당 설정을 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10411">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10412">해당 정책을 사용하면 검색 기록은 저장되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10412">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10413">또한 탭 동기화를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10413">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10414">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 검색 기록이 저장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10414">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10415">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10415">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10416">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10416">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10417">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10417">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10418">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10418">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10419">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10419">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10420">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10420">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10421">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10421">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10422">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10422">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10423">GP 고유 이름: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10423">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10424">GP 이름: 브라우저 기록 저장 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10424">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10425">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10425">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10426">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10426">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10427">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10427">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10428">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10428">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10429">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10429">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10430">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10430">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10431">값 이름: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10431">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10432">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10432">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10433">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10433">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10434">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10434">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10435">기본 설정 키 이름: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10435">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10436">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10436">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10437">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10437">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10438">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10438">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10439">화면 캡처 허용 또는 거부</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10439">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10440">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10440">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10441">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10441">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10442">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10442">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10443">해당 정책을 사용하거나 구성하지 않은 경우 웹 페이지에서 화면 캡처를 위한 화면 공유 API(예: getDisplayMedia() 또는 데스크톱 캡처 확장 API)를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10443">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10444">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 화면 공유 API가 호출되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10444">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10445">예를 들어 웹 기반 온라인 모임을 사용하는 경우 비디오나 화면 공유가 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10445">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10446">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10446">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10447">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10447">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10448">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10448">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10449">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10449">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10450">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10450">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10451">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10451">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10452">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10452">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10453">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10453">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10454">GP 고유 이름: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10454">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10455">GP 이름: 화면 캡처 허용 또는 거부</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10455">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10456">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10456">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10457">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10457">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10458">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10458">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10459">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10459">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10460">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10460">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10461">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10461">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10462">값 이름: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10462">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10463">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10463">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10464">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10464">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10465">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10465">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10466">기본 설정 키 이름: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10466">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10467">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10467">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10468">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10468">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10469">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10469">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10470">URL 조각에 지정된 텍스트로 스크롤 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10470">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10471">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10471">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10472">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10472">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10473">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10473">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10474">해당 기능을 사용하면 하이퍼링크 및 주소 표시줄 URL 탐색은 웹 페이지의 특정 텍스트를 대상으로 하고 웹 페이지 로드가 완료된 이후까지 스크롤됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10474">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10475">해당 정책을 사용하거나 구성하지 않으면 URL을 통한 특정 텍스트 조각에 대해 웹 페이지 스크롤이 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10475">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10476">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 URL을 통한 특정 텍스트 조각에 대해 웹 페이지 스크롤이 설정되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10476">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10477">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10477">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10478">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10478">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10479">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10479">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10480">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10480">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10481">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10481">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10482">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10482">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10483">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10483">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10484">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10484">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10485">GP 고유 이름: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10485">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10486">GP 이름: URL 조각에 지정된 텍스트로 스크롤 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10486">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10487">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10487">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10488">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10488">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10489">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10489">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10490">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10490">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10491">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10491">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10492">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10492">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10493">값 이름: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10493">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10494">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10494">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10495">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10495">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10496">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10496">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10497">기본 설정 키 이름: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10497">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10498">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10498">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10499">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10499">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10500">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10500">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10501">검색 제안 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10501">Enable search suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10502">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10502">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10503">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10503">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10504">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10504">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10505">Microsoft Edge의 주소 표시줄 및 자동 제안 목록에서 웹 검색 제안을 사용하도록 설정하고 사용자가 해당 정책을 변경하지 못하도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10505">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10506">해당 정책을 사용하면 웹 검색 제안이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10506">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10507">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 웹 검색 제안이 사용되지 않지만 로컬 기록 및 로컬 즐겨찾기 제안이 계속 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10507">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10508">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 입력한 문자나 방문한 URL 모두 Microsoft에 대한 원격 분석에 포함되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10508">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10509">해당 정책이 설정되지 않으면 검색 제안이 사용하도록 설정되어 있지만 사용자가 이를 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10509">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10510">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10510">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10511">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10511">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10512">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10512">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10513">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10513">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10514">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10514">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10515">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10515">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10516">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10516">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10517">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10517">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10518">GP 고유 이름: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10518">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10519">GP 이름: 검색 제안 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10519">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10520">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10520">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10521">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10521">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10522">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10522">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10523">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10523">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10524">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10524">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10525">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10525">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10526">값 이름: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10526">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10527">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10527">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10528">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10528">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10529">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10529">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10530">기본 설정 키 이름: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10530">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10531">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10531">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10532">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10532">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10533">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10533">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10534">직접 보안 키 증명을 사용하기 위한 권한이 필요 없는 웹 사이트 또는 도메인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10534">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10535">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10535">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10536">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10536">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10537">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10537">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10538">보안 키의 증명 인증서 요청 시 명시적인 사용자 권한이 필요하지 않은 웹 사이트 및 도메인을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10538">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10539">또한 개인 증명을 사용할 수 있음을 나타내는 보안 키로 신호가 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10539">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10540">이를 제외하고 사이트에서 보안 키 증명을 요청할 때마다 사용자에게 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10540">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10541"> https://contoso.com/some/path)과 같은 사이트는 오직 U2F appID로 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10541">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10542">contoso.com과 같은 도메인은 오직 webauthn RP ID로 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10542">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10543">지정된 사이트에 대한 U2F 및 webauthn API를 모두 처리하려면 appID URL과 도메인을 모두 포함해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10543">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10544">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10544">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10545">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10545">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10546">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10546">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10547">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10547">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10548">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10548">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10549">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10549">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10550">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10550">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10551">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10551">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10552">GP 고유 이름: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10552">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10553">GP 이름: 직접 보안 키 증명을 사용하기 위한 권한이 필요 없는 웹 사이트 또는 도메인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10553">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10554">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10554">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10555">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10555">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10556">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10556">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10557">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10557">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10558">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10558">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10559">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10559">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10560">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10560">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10561">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10561">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10562">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10562">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10563">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10563">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10564">기본 설정 키 이름: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10564">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10565">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10565">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10566">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10566">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10567">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10567">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10568">Internet Explorer에 모든 인트라넷 사이트 보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10568">Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10569">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10569">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10570">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10570">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10571">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10571">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10572">Internet Explorer 모드에 대해 최적의 환경을 구성하는 방법에 대한 지침은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10572">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10573">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10573">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10574">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10574">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10575">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10575">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10576">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10576">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10577">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10577">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10578">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10578">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10579">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10579">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10580">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10580">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10581">GP 고유 이름: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10581">GP unique name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10582">GP 이름: Internet Explorer에 모든 인트라넷 사이트 보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10582">GP name: Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10583">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10583">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10584">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10584">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10585">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10585">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10586">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10586">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10587">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10587">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10588">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10588">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10589">값 이름: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10589">Value Name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10590">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10590">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10591">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10591">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10592">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10592">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10593">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10593">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10594">Microsoft 서비스를 개선하기 위해 사이트 정보 전송(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10594">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-10595">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 88 이후로는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10595">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10596">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10596">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10597">Windows 및 macOS(77부터 88까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10597">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10598">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10598">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10599">해당 정책은 더 이상 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10599">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10600">이는 [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata)(Windows 7, Windows 8 및 macOS) 및 Win 10에서 원격 분석 허용([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569))으로 대체됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10600">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10601">해당 정책은 Microsoft Edge에서 방문한 웹 사이트에 대한 정보를 Microsoft에 전송하여 검색과 같은 서비스를 개선하도록 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10601">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10602">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge에서 방문하는 웹 사이트에 대한 정보를 Microsoft로 보낼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10602">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10603">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 방문하는 웹 사이트에 대한 정보를 Microsoft로 보낼 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10603">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10604">두 경우 모두 사용자가 정책 설정을 변경하거나 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10604">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10605">Windows 10에서 해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 Windows 진단 데이터 설정의 기본값이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10605">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10606">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 Windows 진단 데이터 설정이 전체로 설정된 경우에만 방문하는 웹 사이트에 대한 정보를 보냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10606">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10607">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 방문하는 웹 사이트에 대한 정보를 보내지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10607">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10608">Windows 진단 데이터 설정에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10608">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10609">Windows 7, Windows8 및 macOS에서 해당 정책은 방문한 웹 사이트에 대한 정보 전송을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10609">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10610">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge는 사용자의 기본 설정의 기본값이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10610">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10611">이 정책을 사용 하려면 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled)을 사용으로 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10611">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10612">[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) 또는 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled)가 구성되지 않았거나 사용하지 않도록 설정된 경우 이 데이터는 Microsoft로 보내지지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10612">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10613">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10613">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10614">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10614">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10615">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10615">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10616">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10616">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10617">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10617">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10618">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10618">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10619">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10619">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10620">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10620">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10621">GP 고유 이름: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10621">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10622">GP 이름: Microsoft 서비스를 개선하기 위해 사이트 정보 보내기(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10622">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10623">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10623">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10624">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10624">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10625">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10625">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10626">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10626">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10627">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10627">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10628">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10628">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10629">값 이름: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10629">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10630">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10630">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10631">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10631">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10632">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10632">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10633">기본 설정 키 이름: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10633">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10634">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10634">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10635">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10635">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10636">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10636">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10637">특정 사이트의 센서에 대한 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10637">Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10638">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10638">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10639">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10639">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10640">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10640">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10641">URL 패턴을 기반으로 동작 및 광 센서와 같은 센서에 액세스하고 사용할 수 있는 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10641">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10642">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10642">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10643">이 정책과 일치하지 않는 URL 패턴의 경우 다음 우선 순위가 사용됩니다. [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 정책(일치하는 경우), [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 정책(설정된 경우), 또는 사용자 개인 설정.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10643">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10644">이 정책에 정의된 URL 패턴은 [WebUsbAskForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) 정책에서 구성한 패턴과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10644">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10645">URL을 허용하거나 차단할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10645">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10646">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10646">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10647">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10647">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10648">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10648">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10649">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10649">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10650">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10650">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10651">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10651">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10652">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10652">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10653">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10653">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10654">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10654">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10655">GP 고유 이름: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10655">GP unique name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10656">GP 이름: 특정 사이트의 센서에 대한 액세스 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10656">GP name: Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10657">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10657">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10658">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10658">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10659">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10659">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10660">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10660">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10661">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10661">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10662">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10662">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10663">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10663">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10664">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10664">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10665">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10665">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10666">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10666">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10667">기본 설정 키 이름: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10667">Preference Key Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10668">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10668">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10669">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10669">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10670">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10670">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10671">특정 사이트의 센서에 대한 액세스 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10671">Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10672">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10672">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10673">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10673">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10674">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10674">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10675">URL 패턴을 기반으로 동작 및 광 센서와 같은 센서에 액세스할 수 없는 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10675">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't access sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10676">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10676">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10677">이 정책과 일치하지 않는 URL 패턴의 경우 다음 우선 순위가 사용됩니다. [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 정책(일치하는 경우), [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) 정책(설정된 경우), 또는 사용자 개인 설정.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10677">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10678">이 정책에 정의된 URL 패턴은 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) 정책에서 구성한 패턴과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10678">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10679">URL을 허용하거나 차단할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10679">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10680">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10680">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10681">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10681">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10682">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10682">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10683">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10683">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10684">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10684">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10685">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10685">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10686">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10686">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10687">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10687">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10688">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10688">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10689">GP 고유 이름: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10689">GP unique name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10690">GP 이름: 특정 사이트의 센서에 대한 액세스 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10690">GP name: Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10691">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10691">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10692">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10692">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10693">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10693">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10694">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10694">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10695">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10695">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10696">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10696">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10697">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10697">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10698">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10698">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10699">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10699">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10700">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10700">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10701">기본 설정 키 이름: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10701">Preference Key Name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10702">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10702">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10703">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10703">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10704">SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10704">SerialAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10705">특정 사이트에서 직렬 API 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10705">Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10706">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10706">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10707">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10707">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10708">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10708">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10709">사용자에게 직렬 포트에 대한 액세스를 요청할 수 있는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10709">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10710">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10710">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10711">이 정책과 일치하지 않는 URL 패턴의 경우 다음 우선 순위가 사용됩니다. [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 정책(일치하는 경우), [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 정책(설정된 경우), 또는 사용자 개인 설정.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10711">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10712">이 정책에 정의된 URL 패턴은 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) 정책에서 구성한 패턴과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10712">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10713">URL을 허용하거나 차단할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10713">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10714">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10714">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10715">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10715">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10716">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10716">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10717">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10717">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10718">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10718">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10719">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10719">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10720">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10720">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10721">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10721">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10722">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10722">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10723">GP 고유 이름: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10723">GP unique name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
