  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10724">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 직렬 API 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10724">GP name: Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10725">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10725">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10726">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10726">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10727">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10727">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10728">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10728">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10729">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10729">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10730">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10730">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10731">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10731">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10732">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10732">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10733">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10733">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10734">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10734">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10735">기본 설정 키 이름: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10735">Preference Key Name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10736">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10736">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10737">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10737">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10738">SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10738">SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10739">특정 사이트에서 직렬 API 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10739">Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10740">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10740">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10741">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10741">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10742">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10742">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10743">사용자에게 직렬 포트에 대한 액세스를 요청할 수 없는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10743">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10744">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 정책(설정된 경우) 또는 사용자의 개인 구성의 전역 기본 값이 모든 사이트에 대해 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10744">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10745">이 정책과 일치하지 않는 URL 패턴의 경우 다음 우선 순위가 사용됩니다. [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 정책(일치하는 경우), [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) 정책(설정된 경우), 또는 사용자 개인 설정.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10745">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10746">이 정책의 URL 패턴은 [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) 정책에서 구성한 패턴과 충돌할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10746">The URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10747">URL을 허용하거나 차단할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10747">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10748">유효한 URL 패턴에 대한 자세한 내용은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10748">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10749">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10749">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10750">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10750">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10751">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10751">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10752">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10752">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10753">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10753">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10754">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10754">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10755">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10755">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10756">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10756">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10757">GP 고유 이름: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10757">GP unique name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10758">GP 이름: 특정 사이트에서 직렬 API 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10758">GP name: Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10759">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10759">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10760">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10760">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10761">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10761">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10762">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10762">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10763">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10763">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10764">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10764">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10765">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10765">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10766">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10766">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10767">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10767">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10768">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10768">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10769">기본 설정 키 이름: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10769">Preference Key Name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10770">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10770">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10771">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10771">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10772">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10772">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10773">Microsoft Rewards 환경 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10773">Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10774">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10774">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10775">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10775">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10776">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10776">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10777">Microsoft Rewards 환경 및 알림을 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10777">Show Microsoft Rewards experience and notifications.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10778">이 정책을 활성화한 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10778">If you enable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10779">검색에서 Microsoft 계정 사용자(Azure AD 계정 제외)는 Microsoft Edge 사용자 프로필에서 Microsoft Rewards 경험을 볼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10779">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10780">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 Microsoft Rewards를 사용하도록 설정하는 설정이 활성화되고 켜집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10780">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10781">이 정책을 비활성화하는 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10781">If you disable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10782">검색에서 Microsoft 계정 사용자(Azure AD 계정 제외)는 Microsoft Edge 사용자 프로필에서 Microsoft Rewards 경험을 볼 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10782">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will not see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10783">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 Microsoft Rewards를 사용하지 않도록 설정되고 꺼집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10783">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be disabled and toggled off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10784">이 정책을 구성하지 않은 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10784">If you don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10785">검색에서 Microsoft 계정 사용자(Azure AD 계정 제외)는 Microsoft Edge 사용자 프로필에서 Microsoft Rewards 경험을 볼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10785">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10786">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 Microsoft Rewards를 사용하도록 설정하는 설정이 활성화되고 켜집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10786">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10787">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10787">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10788">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10788">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10789">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10789">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10790">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10790">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10791">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10791">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10792">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10792">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10793">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10793">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10794">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10794">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10795">GP 고유 이름: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10795">GP unique name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10796">GP 이름: Microsoft Rewards 환경 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10796">GP name: Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10797">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10797">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10798">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10798">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10799">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10799">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10800">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10800">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10801">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10801">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10802">경로(권장): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10802">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10803">값 이름: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10803">Value Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10804">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10804">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10805">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10805">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10806">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10806">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10807">기본 설정 키 이름: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10807">Preference Key Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10808">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10808">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10809">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10809">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10810">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10810">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10811">즐겨 찾기 모음에 Microsoft Office 바로 가기 표시(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10811">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-10812">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10812">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10813">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10813">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10814">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10814">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10815">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10815">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10816">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10816">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10817">이 정책은 운영 요구 사항의 변경 때문에 예상대로 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10817">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10818">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10818">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10819">즐겨찾기 모음에서 Office.com에 대한 바로 가기 포함 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10819">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10820">Microsoft Edge에 로그인한 사용자의 경우 바로 가기는 사용자를 Microsoft Office 앱과 문서로 이동시킵니다. 해당 정책을 사용하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 즐겨찾기 모음 상황에 맞는 메뉴에서 토글을 변경하여 바로 가기 표시 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10820">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs. If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10821">이 정책을 사용하지 않으면 바로 가기가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10821">If you disable this policy, the shortcut isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10822">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10822">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10823">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10823">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10824">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10824">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10825">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10825">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10826">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10826">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10827">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10827">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10828">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10828">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10829">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10829">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10830">GP 고유 이름: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10830">GP unique name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10831">GP 이름: 즐겨찾기 모음에 Microsoft Office 바로 가기 표시(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10831">GP name: Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10832">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10832">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10833">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10833">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10834">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10834">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10835">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10835">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10836">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10836">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10837">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10837">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10838">값 이름: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10838">Value Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10839">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10839">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10840">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10840">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10841">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10841">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10842">기본 설정 키 이름: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10842">Preference Key Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10843">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10843">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10844">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10844">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10845">ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10845">ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10846">Microsoft Edge의 추천 및 홍보 알림 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10846">Allow recommendations and promotional notifications from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10847">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10847">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10848">Windows 및 macOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10848">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10849">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10849">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10850">이 정책 설정을 통해 직원이 Microsoft Edge에서 권장 사항 및 제품 지원 알림을 받을지 여부를 결정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10850">This policy setting lets you decide whether employees should receive recommendations and in-product assistance notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10851">이 설정을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우 직원은 Microsoft Edge에서 추천/알림을 받게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10851">If you enable or don't configure this setting, employees receive recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10852">이 설정을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 직원은 Microsoft Edge에서 추천/알림을 받지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10852">If you disable this setting, employees will not receive any recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10853">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10853">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10854">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10854">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10855">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10855">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10856">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10856">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10857">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10857">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10858">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10858">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10859">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10859">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10860">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10860">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10861">GP 고유 이름: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10861">GP unique name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10862">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge의 권장 사항 및 홍보 알림 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10862">GP name: Allow recommendations and promotional notifications from Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10863">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10863">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10864">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10864">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10865">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10865">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10866">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10866">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10867">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10867">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10868">경로(권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10868">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10869">값 이름: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10869">Value Name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10870">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10870">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10871">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10871">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10872">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10872">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10873">기본 설정 키 이름: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10873">Preference Key Name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10874">값 예시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10874">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10875">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10875">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10876">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10876">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10877">SXG(Signed HTTP Exchange) 지원 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10877">Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10878">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10878">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10879">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10879">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10880">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10880">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10881">SXG(Signed HTTP Exchange) 지원을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10881">Enable support for Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10882">해당 정책을 설정하지 않거나 사용하면 Microsoft Edge에서 SXG(Signed HTTP Exchange)로 서비스된 웹 콘텐츠를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10882">If this policy isn't set or enabled, Microsoft Edge will accept web contents served as Signed HTTP Exchanges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10883">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 SXG(Signed HTTP Exchange)를 로드할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10883">If this policy is set to disabled, Signed HTTP Exchanges can't be loaded.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10884">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10884">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10885">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10885">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10886">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10886">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10887">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10887">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10888">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10888">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10889">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10889">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10890">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10890">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10891">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10891">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10892">GP 고유 이름: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10892">GP unique name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10893">GP 이름: SXG(Signed HTTP Exchange) 지원 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10893">GP name: Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10894">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10894">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10895">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10895">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10896">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10896">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10897">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10897">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10898">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10898">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10899">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10899">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10900">값 이름: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10900">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10901">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10901">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10902">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10902">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10903">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10903">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10904">기본 설정 키 이름: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10904">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10905">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10905">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10906">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10906">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10907">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10907">SitePerProcess</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10908">모든 사이트에 대해 사이트 격리 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10908">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10909">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10909">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10910">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10910">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10911">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10911">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10912">'SitePerProcess' 정책은 사용자가 모든 사이트를 격리하는 기본 동작을 옵트아웃하는 것을 차단하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10912">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10913">[IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 정책을 사용하여 세분화된 원본을 추가로 격리할 수도 있다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10913">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10914">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자는 각 사이트가 자체 프로세스에서 실행하는 기본 동작을 옵트아웃할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10914">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10915">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 사이트 격리를 옵트아웃할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10915">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10916">정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면(예: edge://flags에서 "사이트 격리 사용 안함" 항목을 사용하여) 사이트 격리가 해제되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10916">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10917">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10917">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10918">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10918">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10919">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10919">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10920">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10920">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10921">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10921">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10922">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10922">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10923">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10923">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10924">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10924">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10925">GP 고유 이름: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10925">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10926">GP 이름: 모든 사이트에 대해 사이트 격리 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10926">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10927">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10927">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10928">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10928">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10929">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10929">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10930">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10930">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10931">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10931">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10932">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10932">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10933">값 이름: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10933">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10934">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10934">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10935">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10935">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10936">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10936">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10937">기본 설정 키 이름: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10937">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10938">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10938">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10939">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10939">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10940">SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10940">SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10941">서비스 목록에 대한 스마트 동작 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10941">Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10942">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10942">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10943">Windows 및 macOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10943">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10944">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10944">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10945">스마트 작업을 표시하지 않는 특정 서비스(예: PDF)를 나열합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10945">List specific services, such as PDFs, that don't show smart actions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10946">(스마트 작업은 Microsoft Edge의 전체 및 미니 상황에 맞는 메뉴에서 사용할 수 있는 "정의"와 같은 작업입니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10946">(Smart actions are actions like "define" which are available in full and mini context menus in Microsoft Edge.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10947">정책을 사용하도록 설정하는 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10947">If you enable the policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10948">미니 및 전체 상황에 맞는 메뉴의 스마트 작업은 해당 목록과 일치하는 서비스의 모든 프로필에 대해 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10948">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for all profiles for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10949">사용자는 주어진 목록과 일치하는 서비스에 대한 텍스트 선택에서 미니 및 전체 상황에 맞는 메뉴에 스마트 작업이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10949">Users will not see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10950">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 미니 및 전체 상황에 맞는 메뉴의 스마트 작업은 해당 목록과 일치하는 서비스에 대해 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10950">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for services that match the given list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10951">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10951">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10952">미니 및 전체 상황에 맞는 메뉴의 스마트 작업은 모든 프로필에 대해 사용하도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10952">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10953">사용자는 텍스트 선택 시 최소 및 전체 컨텍스트 메뉴에서 스마트 작업을 볼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10953">Users will see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10954">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 미니 및 전체 상황에 맞는 메뉴의 스마트 작업이 활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10954">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10955">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10955">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10956">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = PDF의 스마트 작업</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10956">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = Smart actions in PDF</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10957">이 정책을 구성할 때 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10957">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10958">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10958">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10959">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10959">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10960">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10960">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10961">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10961">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10962">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10962">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10963">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10963">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10964">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10964">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10965">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10965">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10966">GP 고유 이름: SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10966">GP unique name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10967">GP 이름: 서비스 목록에 대한 스마트 동작 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10967">GP name: Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10968">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10968">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10969">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10969">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10970">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10970">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10971">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10971">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10972">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10972">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10973">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10973">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10974">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10974">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10975">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10975">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10976">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10976">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList\1 = "smart_actions_pdf"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10977">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10977">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10978">기본 설정 키 이름: SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10978">Preference Key Name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10979">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10979">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>smart_actions_pdf</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10980">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10980">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10981">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10981">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10982">Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10982">Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10983">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10983">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10984">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10984">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10985">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10985">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10986">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10986">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10987">The Microsoft Edge implementation of the Web Speech API uses Azure Cognitive Services, so voice data will leave the machine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10987">The Microsoft Edge implementation of the Web Speech API uses Azure Cognitive Services, so voice data will leave the machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10988">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10988">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10989">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10989">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-10990">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10990">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10991">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10991">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10992">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10992">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10993">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10993">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10994">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10994">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10995">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10995">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10996">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10996">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10997">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10997">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10998">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10998">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-10999">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-10999">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11000">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11000">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11001">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11001">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11002">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11002">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11003">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11003">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11004">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11004">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11005">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11005">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11006">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11006">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11007">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11007">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11008">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11008">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11009">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11009">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11010">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11010">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11011">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11011">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11012">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11012">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11013">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11013">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11014">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11014">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11015">맞춤법 검사 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11015">Enable spellcheck</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11016">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11016">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11017">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11017">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11018">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11018">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11019">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 맞춤법 검사를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11019">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11020">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 사용자는 맞춤법 검사를 사용할 수 없으며 [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 및 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 정책도 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11020">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11021">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11021">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11022">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11022">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11023">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11023">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11024">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11024">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11025">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11025">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11026">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11026">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11027">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11027">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11028">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11028">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11029">GP 고유 이름: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11029">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11030">GP 이름: 맞춤법 검사 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11030">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11031">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11031">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11032">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11032">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11033">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11033">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11034">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11034">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11035">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11035">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11036">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11036">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11037">값 이름: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11037">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11038">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11038">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11039">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11039">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11040">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11040">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11041">기본 설정 키 이름: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11041">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11042">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11042">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11043">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11043">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11044">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11044">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11045">특정 맞춤법 검사 언어 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11045">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11046">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11046">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11047">Windows (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11047">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11048">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11048">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11049">맞춤법 검사에 여러 언어를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11049">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11050">인식할 수 없는 사용자 지정 언어는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11050">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11051">해당 정책을 사용하면 지정된 언어 뿐만 아니라 사용자가 사용할 수 있는 모든 언어에 대해 맞춤법 검사를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11051">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11052">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자의 맞춤법 검사 기본 설정이 변경되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11052">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11053">[SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 해당 정책은 효과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11053">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11054">'SpellcheckLanguage’ 및 [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) 정책 모두에 언어를 포함하는 경우 맞춤법 검사 언어를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11054">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11055">지원 언어: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11055">The supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11056">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11056">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11057">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11057">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11058">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11058">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11059">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11059">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11060">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11060">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11061">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11061">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11062">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11062">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11063">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11063">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11064">GP 고유 이름: SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11064">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11065">GP 이름: 특정 맞춤법 검사 언어 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11065">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11066">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11066">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11067">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11067">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11068">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11068">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11069">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11069">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11070">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11070">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11071">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11071">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11072">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11072">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11073">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11073">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11074">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11074">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11075">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11075">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11076">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11076">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11077">맞춤법 검사 언어 강제 사용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11077">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11078">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11078">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11079">Windows (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11079">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11080">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11080">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11081">맞춤법 검사 언어를 강제로 사용 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11081">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11082">해당 목록에서 인식할 수 없는 언어는 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11082">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11083">해당 정책을 사용하면 지정된 언어에 대해 맞춤법 검사가 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11083">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11084">사용자는 계속 목록에 없는 언어에 대해 맞춤법 검사를 사용하거나 사용하지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11084">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11085">해당 정책을 설정하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자의 맞춤법 검사 기본 설정이 변경되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11085">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11086">[SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 해당 정책은 효과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11086">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11087">[SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) 및 ‘SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist’ 정책 모두에 언어를 포함하는 경우 맞춤법 검사 언어를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11087">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11088">현재 지원 언어: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11088">The currently supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11089">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11089">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11090">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11090">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11091">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11091">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11092">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11092">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11093">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11093">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11094">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11094">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11095">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11095">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11096">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11096">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11097">GP 고유 이름: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11097">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11098">GP 이름: 맞춤법 검사 언어 강제 사용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11098">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11099">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11099">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11100">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11100">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11101">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11101">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11102">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11102">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11103">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11103">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11104">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11104">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11105">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11105">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11106">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11106">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11107">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11107">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11108">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11108">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11109">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11109">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11110">혼합 콘텐츠에 대해 더 엄격한 처리 사용(구식)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11110">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-11111">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 84 이상에서는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11111">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11112">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11112">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11113">Windows 및 macOS(81부터 84까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11113">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11114">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11114">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11115">이 정책은 웹 콘텐츠가 더욱 엄격한 혼합 콘텐츠 처리와 호환되지 않는 것으로 확인된 경우, 엔터프라이즈에 웹 콘텐츠를 업데이트하기 위한 더 많은 시간을 주기 위한 단기 매커니즘이므로 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11115">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11116">해당 정책은 브라우저에서 혼합 콘텐츠(HTTPS 사이트의 HTTP 콘텐츠)에 대한 처리를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11116">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11117">해당 정책을 True로 설정하거나 설정하지 않으면 오디오 및 비디오 혼합 콘텐츠는 자동으로 HTTPS(즉, 리소스를 HTTPS를 통해 사용할 수 없는 경우 대체 없이 URL이 HTTPS로 다시 작성됨)로 업그레이드되고 이미지 혼합 콘텐츠의 경우 URL 표시줄에 '안전하지 않음' 경고가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11117">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11118">해당 정책을 False로 설정하면 오디오 및 비디오에 대한 자동 업그레이드를 사용할 수 없으며 이미지에 대해 경고가 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11118">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11119">해당 정책은 오디오, 비디오, 이미지 외에 다른 유형의 혼합 콘텐츠에는 효과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11119">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11120">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11120">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11121">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11121">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11122">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11122">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11123">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11123">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11124">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11124">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11125">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11125">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11126">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11126">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11127">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11127">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11128">GP 고유 이름: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11128">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11129">GP 이름: 혼합 콘텐츠에 대해 더 엄격한 처리 사용(구식)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11129">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11130">GP 경로(필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11130">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11131">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11131">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11132">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11132">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11133">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11133">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11134">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11134">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11135">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11135">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11136">값 이름: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11136">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11137">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11137">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11138">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11138">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11139">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11139">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11140">기본 설정 키 이름: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11140">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
