  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11141">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11141">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11142">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11142">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11143">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11143">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11144">지원되지 않는 OS 경고 표시 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11144">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11145">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11145">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11146">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11146">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11147">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11147">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11148">더 이상 지원되지 않는 컴퓨터 또는 운영 체제에서 Microsoft Edge 실행 시 나타나는 경고를 표시하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11148">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11149">해당 정책이 False이거나 설정되지 않은 경우 지원되지 않는 컴퓨터 또는 운영 체제에 경고가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11149">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11150">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11150">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11151">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11151">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11152">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11152">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11153">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11153">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11154">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11154">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11155">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11155">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11156">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11156">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11157">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11157">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11158">GP 고유 이름: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11158">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11159">GP 이름: 지원되지 않는 OS 경고 표시 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11159">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11160">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11160">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11161">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11161">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11162">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11162">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11163">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11163">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11164">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11164">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11165">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11165">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11166">값 이름: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11166">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11167">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11167">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11168">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11168">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11169">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11169">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11170">기본 설정 키 이름: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11170">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11171">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11171">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11172">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11172">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11173">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11173">SyncDisabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11174">Microsoft 동기화 서비스를 사용하여 데이터 동기화 사용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11174">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11175">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11175">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11176">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11176">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11177">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11177">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11178">Microsoft Edge에서 데이터 동기화를 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11178">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11179">해당 정책은 또한 동기화 동의 확인 프롬프트가 나타나지 않도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11179">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11180">이 정책은 클라우드 동기화만 사용하지 않도록 설정하며 [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) 정책에 영향을 미치지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11180">This policy disables cloud synchronization only and has no impact on the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11181">해당 정책을 설정하지 않거나 권장대로 적용하면 사용자는 동기화를 설정하거나 해제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11181">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11182">해당 정책을 필수로 적용하면 사용자는 동기화를 설정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11182">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11183">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11183">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11184">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11184">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11185">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11185">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11186">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11186">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11187">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11187">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11188">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11188">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11189">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11189">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11190">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11190">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11191">GP 고유 이름: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11191">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11192">GP 이름: Microsoft 동기화 서비스를 사용하여 데이터 동기화 사용 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11192">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11193">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11193">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11194">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11194">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11195">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11195">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11196">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11196">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11197">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11197">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11198">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11198">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11199">값 이름: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11199">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11200">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11200">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11201">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11201">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11202">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11202">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11203">기본 설정 키 이름: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11203">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11204">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11204">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11205">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11205">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11206">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11206">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11207">동기화에서 제외되는 유형의 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11207">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11208">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11208">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11209">Windows 및 MacOS (83 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11209">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11210">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11210">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11211">해당 정책을 사용하면 지정된 모든 데이터 형식이 동기화에서 제외됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11211">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11212">해당 정책을 사용하여 Microsoft Edge 동기화 서비스로 업로드되는 데이터 형식을 제한할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11212">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11213">해당 정책에 대한 다음 데이터 형식 중 하나를 제공할 수 있습니다. "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs" 및 “collections”</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11213">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11214">해당 데이터 형식 이름은 대/소문자를 구분해야 한다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11214">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11215">사용자는 사용하지 않도록 설정된 데이터 형식을 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11215">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11216">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11216">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11217">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11217">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11218">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11218">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11219">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11219">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11220">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11220">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11221">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11221">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11222">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11222">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11223">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11223">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11224">GP 고유 이름: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11224">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11225">GP 이름: 동기화에서 제외되는 유형의 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11225">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11226">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11226">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11227">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11227">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11228">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11228">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11229">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11229">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11230">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11230">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11231">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11231">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11232">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11232">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11233">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11233">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11234">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11234">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11235">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11235">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11236">기본 설정 키 이름: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11236">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11237">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11237">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11238">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11238">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11239">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11239">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11240">로컬 트러스트 앵커에 대한 TLS 1.3 보안 기능 사용(구식)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11240">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-11241">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 85 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11241">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11242">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11242">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11243">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상, 85까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11243">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11244">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11244">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11245">이 정책은 영향을 받는 프록시를 업그레이드할 수 있는 시간을 더 많이 주기 위한 단기 메커니즘으로만 의도되었기 때문에 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11245">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11246">해당 정책은 다운그레이드 공격에 대한 연결을 보호하는 TLS 1.3의 보안 기능을 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11246">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11247">해당 기능은 이전 버전과 호환이 가능하며 호환되는 TLS 1.2 서버 또는 프록시에 대한 연결에는 효과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11247">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11248">그러나 일부 TLS-차단 프록시의 이전 버전은 구현 결함 때문에 호환되지 않는 문제가 발생할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11248">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11249">해당 정책을 사용하거나 설정하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge에서 모든 연결에 대해 해당 보안 보호를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11249">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11250">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 Microsoft Edge는 로컬로 설치된 CA 인증서를 사용하여 인증된 연결에 대해 해당 보안 보호를 사용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11250">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11251">해당 보호 기능은 공개적으로 신뢰할 수 있는 CA 인증서를 사용하여 인증된 연결에 대해 항상 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11251">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11252">해당 정책은 영향을 받는 프록시를 테스트하고 업그레이드하는 데 사용될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11252">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11253">영향을 받는 프록시는 ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED 오류 코드와 함께 연결에 실패할 것으로 예상됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11253">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11254">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11254">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11255">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11255">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11256">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11256">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11257">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11257">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11258">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11258">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11259">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11259">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11260">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11260">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11261">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11261">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11262">GP 고유 이름: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11262">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11263">GP 이름: 로컬 트러스트 앵커에 대한 TLS 1.3 보안 기능 사용(구식)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11263">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11264">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11264">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11265">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11265">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11266">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11266">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11267">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11267">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11268">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11268">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11269">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11269">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11270">값 이름: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11270">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11271">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11271">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11272">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11272">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11273">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11273">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11274">기본 설정 키 이름: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11274">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11275">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11275">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11276">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11276">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11277">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11277">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11278">비활성화할 TLS 암호화 그룹 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11278">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11279">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11279">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11280">Windows 및 MacOS(85 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11280">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11281">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11281">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11282">TLS 연결이 비활성화된 암호화 그룹 목록을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11282">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11283">이 정책을 구성하면 TLS 연결을 설정할 때 구성된 암호화 그룹 목록이 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11283">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11284">이 정책을 구성하지 않으면 브라우저가 사용할 TLS 암호화 그룹을 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11284">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11285">비활성화할 설정할 암호화 그룹 값은 16비트 16진수 값으로 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11285">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11286">값은 IANA(Internet Assigned Numbers Authority) 레지스트리에 의해 할당됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11286">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11287">TLS 1.3 암호화 그룹 TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256(0x1301)은 TLS 1.3에 필요하며이 정책으로 비활성화할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11287">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11288">이 정책은 QUIC 기반 연결에는 영향을 미치지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11288">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11289">QUIC는 [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) 정책을 통해 끌 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11289">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11290">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11290">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11291">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11291">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11292">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11292">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11293">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11293">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11294">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11294">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11295">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11295">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11296">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11296">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11297">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11297">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11298">GP 고유 이름: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11298">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11299">GP 이름: 비활성화할 TLS 암호 제품군 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11299">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11300">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11300">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11301">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11301">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11302">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11302">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11303">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11303">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11304">경로(필수): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11304">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11305">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11305">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11306">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11306">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11307">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11307">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11308">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11308">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11309">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11309">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11310">기본 설정 키 이름: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11310">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11311">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11311">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11312">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11312">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11313">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11313">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11314">배경 탭 고정 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11314">Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11315">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11315">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11316">Windows 및 MacOS (79 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11316">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11317">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11317">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11318">Microsoft Edge에서 최소 5분 간 백그라운드에 있는 탭의 고정 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11318">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11319">탭을 고정하면 CPU, 배터리 및 메모리 사용이 감소합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11319">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11320">Microsoft Edge에서는 화면 표시, 소리 재생, 스트림 비디오 등과 같이 백그라운드에서 유용하게 사용할 수 있는 탭이 고정되지 않도록 경험적 접근을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11320">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11321">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 최소 5분 이상 백그라운드에 있는 탭이 고정될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11321">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11322">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 탭이 고정되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11322">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11323">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11323">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11324">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11324">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11325">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11325">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11326">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11326">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11327">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11327">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11328">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11328">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11329">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11329">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11330">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11330">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11331">GP 고유 이름: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11331">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11332">GP 이름: 배경 탭 고정 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11332">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11333">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11333">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11334">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11334">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11335">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11335">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11336">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11336">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11337">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11337">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11338">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11338">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11339">값 이름: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11339">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11340">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11340">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11341">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11341">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11342">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11342">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11343">기본 설정 키 이름: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11343">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11344">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11344">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11345">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11345">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11346">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11346">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11347">_blank를 대상으로 하는 링크에 대해 window.opener를 설정하지 마세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11347">Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11348">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11348">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11349">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11349">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11350">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11350">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11351">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 설정하지 않은 경우 앵커에서 rel="opener"를 지정하지 않은 이상 window.opener 속성이 null로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11351">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, the window.opener property is set to null unless the anchor specifies rel="opener".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11352">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면, _blank를 대상으로 하는 팝업이 팝업을 열기로 요청한 페이지(JavaScript를 통해)에 액세스할 수 있도록 허용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11352">If you disable this policy, popups that target _blank are permitted to access (via JavaScript) the page that requested to open the popup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11353">이 정책은 Microsoft Edge 버전 95에서 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11353">This policy will be obsoleted in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11354">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11354">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11355">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11355">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11356">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11356">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11357">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11357">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11358">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11358">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11359">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11359">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11360">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11360">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11361">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11361">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11362">GP 고유 이름: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11362">GP unique name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11363">GP 이름: _blank를 대상으로 하는 링크에 대해 window.opener를 설정하지 마세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11363">GP name: Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11364">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11364">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11365">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11365">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11366">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11366">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11367">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11367">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11368">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11368">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11369">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11369">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11370">값 이름: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11370">Value Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11371">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11371">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11372">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11372">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11373">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11373">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11374">기본 설정 키 이름: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11374">Preference Key Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11375">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11375">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11376">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11376">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11377">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11377">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11378">브라우저 작업 관리자에서 프로세스 종료 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11378">Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11379">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11379">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11380">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11380">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11381">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11381">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11382">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 브라우저의 작업 관리자에서 프로세스를 끝낼 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11382">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11383">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 프로세스를 끝낼 수 없으며 브라우저의 작업 관리자에서 프로세스 종료 단추가 비활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11383">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11384">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11384">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11385">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11385">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11386">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11386">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11387">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11387">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11388">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11388">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11389">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11389">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11390">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11390">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11391">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11391">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11392">GP 고유 이름: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11392">GP unique name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11393">GP 이름: 브라우저 작업 관리자에서 프로세스 종료 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11393">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11394">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11394">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11395">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11395">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11396">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11396">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11397">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11397">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11398">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11398">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11399">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11399">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11400">값 이름: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11400">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11401">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11401">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11402">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11402">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11403">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11403">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11404">기본 설정 키 이름: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11404">Preference Key Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11405">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11405">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11406">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11406">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11407">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11407">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11408">단일 Microsoft Edge 인스턴스에서 사용할 수 있는 메모리 용량(MB) 제한 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11408">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11409">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11409">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11410">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11410">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11411">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11411">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11412">메모리를 절약하기 위해 탭이 삭제되기 전에 단일 Microsoft Edge 인스턴스가 사용할 수 잇는 메모리 용량을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11412">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11413">탭에서 사용하는 메모리는 해제되고 전환 시 탭이 다시 로드됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11413">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11414">해당 정책을 사용하면 브라우저에서 제한을 초과한 경우 탭을 삭제하기 시작하여 메모리를 절약할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11414">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11415">하지만 브라우저가 항상 제한 내에서 실행하는 것은 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11415">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11416">1024 아래의 값은 모두 1024로 반올림됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11416">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11417">해당 정책을 설정하지 않으면 브라우저는 컴퓨터에서 실제 메모리 용량이 낮은 경우를 감지했을 때만 메모리 저장을 시도합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11417">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11418">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11418">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11419">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11419">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11420">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11420">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11421">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11421">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11422">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11422">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11423">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11423">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11424">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11424">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11425">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11425">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11426">GP 고유 이름: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11426">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11427">GP 이름: 단일 Microsoft Edge 인스턴스에서 사용할 수 있는 메모리 용량(MB) 제한 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11427">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11428">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11428">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11429">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11429">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11430">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11430">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11431">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11431">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11432">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11432">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11433">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11433">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11434">값 이름: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11434">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11435">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11435">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11436">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11436">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000800
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11437">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11437">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11438">기본 설정 키 이름: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11438">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11439">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11439">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11440">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11440">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11441">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11441">TrackingPrevention</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11442">사용자의 웹 검색 활동 추적 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11442">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11443">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11443">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11444">Windows 및 MacOS (78 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11444">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11445">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11445">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11446">웹 사이트에서 사용자의 웹 검색 활동을 추적하지 못하도록 차단 여부를 결정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11446">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11447">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 추적 방지 수준을 직접 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11447">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11448">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11448">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11449">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = 꺼짐(추적 방지 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11449">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11450">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = 기본 (유해한 추적기를 차단, 콘텐츠 및 광고의 개인화)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11450">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11451">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = 균형 (유해한 추적기 및 사용자가 방문하지 않은 사이트의 추적기를 차단, 콘텐츠 및 광고의 개인화 감소)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11451">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11452">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = 고급 (유해한 추적기 및 모든 사이트의 대부분의 추적기를 차단, 콘텐츠 및 광고의 개인화 최소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11452">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11453">사이트의 일부 기능 작동 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11453">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11454">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11454">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11455">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11455">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11456">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11456">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11457">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11457">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11458">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11458">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11459">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11459">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11460">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11460">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11461">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11461">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11462">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11462">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11463">GP 고유 이름: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11463">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11464">GP 이름: 사용자의 웹 검색 활동 추적 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11464">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11465">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11465">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11466">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11466">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11467">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11467">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11468">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11468">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11469">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11469">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11470">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11470">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11471">값 이름: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11471">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11472">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11472">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11473">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11473">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11474">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11474">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11475">기본 설정 키 이름: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11475">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11476">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11476">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11477">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11477">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11478">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11478">TranslateEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11479">번역 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11479">Enable Translate</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11480">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11480">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11481">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11481">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11482">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11482">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11483">Microsoft Edge에서 통합 Microsoft 번역 서비스를 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11483">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11484">해당 정책을 사용하면 Microsoft Edge는 적절한 경우 통합 번역 플라이 아웃을 표시하고 상황에 맞는 메뉴를 마우스 오른쪽 단추로 클릭하고 번역 옵션을 표시하여 사용자에게 번역 기능을 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11484">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11485">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 기본 제공되는 모든 번역 기능을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11485">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11486">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 번역 기능의 사용 여부를 선택할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11486">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11487">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11487">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11488">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11488">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11489">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11489">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11490">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11490">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11491">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11491">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11492">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11492">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11493">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11493">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11494">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11494">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11495">GP 고유 이름: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11495">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11496">GP 이름: 번역 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11496">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11497">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11497">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11498">GP 경로 (권장): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge - 기본 설정(사용자 재정의 가능)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11498">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11499">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11499">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11500">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11500">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11501">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11501">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11502">경로 (권장): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11502">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11503">값 이름: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11503">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11504">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11504">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11505">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11505">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11506">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11506">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11507">기본 설정 키 이름: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11507">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11508">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11508">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11509">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11509">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11510">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11510">URLAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11511">허용되는 URL 목록 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11511">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11512">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11512">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11513">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11513">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11514">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11514">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11515">이 정책을 설정하면 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist)를 예외로 하고, 나열된 URL에 대한 액세스를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11515">Setting the policy provides access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11516">[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)에 따라 URL 패턴의 형식을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11516">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11517">해당 정책을 사용하여 제한적인 차단 목록에 대한 예외를 열 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11517">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11518">예를 들어 차단 목록에 '\*'를 포함하여 모든 요청을 차단한 다음, 이 정책을 사용하여 제한된 URL 목록의 액세스를 허용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11518">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11519">해당 정책을 사용하여 특정 구성표, 다른 도메인의 하위 도메인, 포트 또는 특정 경로에 대한 예외를 열 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11519">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11520">특정 필터는 URL을 차단할지 또는 허용할지 여부를 결정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11520">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11521">허용 목록은 차단 목록 보다 우선합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11521">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11522">해당 정책은 1000개의 항목으로 제한됩니다. 이후의 항목은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11522">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11523">이 정책을 사용하면 브라우저가 "전화:" 또는 "ssh:"와 같은 프로토콜의 프로토콜 처리기로 등록된 외부 응용 프로그램을 자동으로 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11523">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11524">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) 정책의 차단 목록에 대한 예외는 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11524">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11525">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11525">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11526">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11526">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11527">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11527">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11528">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11528">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11529">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11529">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11530">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11530">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11531">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11531">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11532">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11532">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11533">GP 고유 이름: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11533">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11534">GP 이름: 허용되는 URL 목록 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11534">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11535">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11535">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11536">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11536">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11537">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11537">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11538">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11538">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11539">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11539">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11540">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11540">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11541">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11541">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11542">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11542">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11543">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11543">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11544">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11544">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11545">기본 설정 키 이름: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11545">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11546">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11546">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11547">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11547">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11548">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11548">URLBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11549">URL 목록에 대한 액세스 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11549">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11550">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11550">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11551">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11551">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11552">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11552">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11553">차단된 URL 패턴(사용자가 로드할 수 없음)을 기반으로 사이트 목록을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11553">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11554">[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)에 따라 URL 패턴의 형식을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11554">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11555">[URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) 정책에서 예외를 정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11555">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11556">해당 정책은 1000개의 항목으로 제한됩니다. 이후의 항목은 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11556">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11557">내부 'edge://\*' URL을 차단하지 않는 것이 좋습니다. 이 경우 예기치 않은 오류가 발생할 수 있다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11557">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11558">해당 정책은 페이지가 JavaScript를 통해 동적으로 업데이트되는 것을 방지하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11558">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11559">예를 들어 'contoso.com/abc'를 차단하는 경우 사용자는 'contoso.com'을 방문하고 링크를 클릭하여 페이지가 새로고침되지 않는 한 'contoso.com/abc'를 계속 방문할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11559">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11560">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 URL은 차단되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11560">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11561">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11561">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11562">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11562">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11563">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11563">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11564">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11564">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11565">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11565">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11566">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11566">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11567">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11567">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11568">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11568">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11569">GP 고유 이름: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11569">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
