  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11570">GP 이름: URL 목록에 대한 액세스 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11570">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11571">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11571">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11572">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11572">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11573">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11573">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11574">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11574">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11575">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11575">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11576">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11576">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11577">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11577">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11578">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11578">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11579">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11579">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11580">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11580">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11581">기본 설정 키 이름: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11581">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11582">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11582">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11583">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11583">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11584">UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11584">UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11585">Microsoft Edge 업데이트가 Microsoft Edge에서 사용 가능한 업데이트를 처리하는 방법을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11585">Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11586">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11586">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11587">MacOS(89 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11587">On macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11588">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11588">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11589">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하면 다음 중 구성된 옵션에 따라 Microsoft Edge 업데이트가 Microsoft Edge에 대한 업데이트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11589">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11590">자동 업데이트만: 업데이트는 정기 업데이트 확인에서 검색된 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11590">Automatic silent updates only: Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11591">수동 업데이트만: 업데이트는 사용자가 수동 업데이트 확인을 실행하는 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11591">Manual updates only: Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11592">(일부 앱은 이 옵션에 대한 인터페이스를 제공하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11592">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11593">수동 업데이트를 선택하는 경우 Microsoft 자동 업데이트를 사용하여 정기적으로 업데이트를 확인해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11593">If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using Microsoft Autoupdate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11594">이 정책을 실행하고 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge Update가 자동으로 업데이트를 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11594">If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update automatically checks for updates.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11595">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11595">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11596">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = 업데이트는 정기적인 업데이트 확인에 의해 발견된 경우에만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11596">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11597">manual-only (manual-only) = 업데이트는 사용자가 수동 업데이트 검사를 실행할 때만 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11597">manual-only (manual-only) = Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11598">(일부 앱은 이 옵션에 대한 인터페이스를 제공하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11598">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11599">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11599">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11600">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11600">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11601">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11601">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11602">권장 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11602">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11603">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11603">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11604">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11604">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11605">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11605">String</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11606">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11606">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11607">기본 설정 키 이름: UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11607">Preference Key Name: UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11608">예제 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11608">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>automatic-silent-only</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11609">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11609">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11610">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11610">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11611">사용자 에이전트 클라이언트 힌트 기능 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11611">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-11612">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11612">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11613">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11613">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11614">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11614">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11615">Windows 및 MacOS (86 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11615">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11616">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11616">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11617">이 정책은 사용자-에이전트 클라이언트 힌트 기능과 호환되지 않는 경우 기업이 웹 콘텐츠를 업데이트할 수 있는 시간을 더 많이 주기 위한 단기 메커니즘이기 때문에 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11617">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11618">Microsoft Edge 버전 89에서는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11618">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 89.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11619">사용자 에이전트 힌트 기능을 사용하면 사용자 브라우저(예: 브라우저 버전) 및 환경(예: 시스템 아키텍처)에 대한 정보를 제공하는 세분화된 요청 헤더가 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11619">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11620">이는 추가 기능이지만, 새 헤더로 인해 요청에 포함될 수 있는 문자를 제한하는 일부 웹사이트가 중단될 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11620">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11621">이 정책을 사용하거나 이 정책을 구성하지 않는 경우 사용자 에이전트 클라이언트 힌트 기능을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11621">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11622">이 정책을 사용하지 않는 경우 이 기능을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11622">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11623">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11623">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11624">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11624">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11625">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11625">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11626">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11626">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11627">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11627">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11628">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11628">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11629">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11629">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11630">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11630">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11631">GP 고유 이름: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11631">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11632">GP 이름: 사용자 에이전트 클라이언트 힌트 기능 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11632">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11633">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11633">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11634">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11634">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11635">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11635">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11636">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11636">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11637">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11637">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11638">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11638">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11639">값 이름: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11639">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11640">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11640">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11641">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11641">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11642">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11642">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11643">기본 설정 키 이름: Useragentclienthsenabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11643">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11644">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11644">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11645">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11645">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11646">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11646">UserDataDir</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11647">사용자 데이터 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11647">Set the user data directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11648">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11648">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11649">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11649">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11650">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11650">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11651">사용자 데이터를 저장하는 데 사용할 디렉터리를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11651">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11652">해당 정책을 사용하면 사용자가 '--user-data-dir' 플래그를 설정했는지 여부에 관계 없이 Microsoft Edge는 지정된 디렉터리를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11652">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11653">해당 정책을 사용하지 않으면 기본 프로필 경로가 사용되지만 사용자가 '--user-data-dir' 플래그를 사용하여 경로를 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11653">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11654">사용자는 프로필 경로의 edge://version/에서 프로필에 대한 디렉터리를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11654">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11655">데이터 손실 또는 기타 예기치 않은 오류가 발생하지 않도록 하려면 Microsoft Edge에서 해당 콘텐츠를 관리하기 때문에 볼륨의 루트 디렉터리나 다른 목적에 사용되는 디렉터리로 해당 정책을 구성하지 마세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11655">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11656">사용할 수 있는 변수의 목록은 [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11656">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11657">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11657">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11658">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11658">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11659">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11659">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11660">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11660">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11661">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11661">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11662">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11662">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11663">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11663">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11664">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11664">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11665">GP 고유 이름: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11665">GP unique name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11666">GP 이름: 사용자 데이터 디렉터리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11666">GP name: Set the user data directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11667">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11667">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11668">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11668">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11669">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11669">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11670">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11670">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11671">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11671">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11672">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11672">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11673">값 이름: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11673">Value Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11674">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11674">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11675">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11675">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${users}/${user_name}/Edge"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11676">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11676">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11677">기본 설정 키 이름: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11677">Preference Key Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11678">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11678">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${users}/${user_name}/Edge</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11679">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11679">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11680">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11680">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11681">긴급 롤백이 있을 경우 사용하기 위해 보관된 사용자 데이터 스냅샷 수를 제한합니다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11681">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11682">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11682">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11683">Windows 86 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11683">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11684">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11684">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11685">각 주요 버전 업데이트 후 Microsoft Edge는 임시 버전 롤백이 필요한 이후 긴급한 상황에 사용할 사용자의 검색 데이터 일부에 대한 스냅샷을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11685">Following each major version update, Microsoft Edge will create a snapshot of parts of the user's browsing data to use in case of a later emergency that requires a temporary version rollback.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11686">사용자에게 해당 스냅샷이 있는 버전에 임시 롤백이 수행되면 스냅샷의 데이터가 복원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11686">If a temporary rollback is performed to a version for which a user has a corresponding snapshot, the data in the snapshot is restored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11687">이렇게 하면 사용자가 책갈피와 자동 채우기 데이터 같은 설정을 유지할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11687">This lets users keep settings such as bookmarks and autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11688">이 정책을 설정하지 않으면 3개 스냅샷의 기본값이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11688">If you don't set this policy, the default value of 3 snapshots is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11689">이 정책을 설정하면 사용자가 설정한 제한을 준수하기 위해 필요에 따라 이전 스냅샷이 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11689">If you set this policy, old snapshots are deleted as needed to respect the limit you set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11690">이 정책을 0으로 설정하면 스냅샷이 만들어지지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11690">If you set this policy to 0, no snapshots are taken.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11691">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11691">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11692">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11692">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11693">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11693">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11694">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11694">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11695">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11695">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11696">정수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11696">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11697">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11697">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11698">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11698">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11699">GP 고유 이름: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11699">GP unique name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11700">GP 이름: 긴급 롤백이 있을 경우 사용하기 위해 보관된 사용자 데이터 스냅샷 수를 제한합니다</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11700">GP name: Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11701">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11701">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11702">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11702">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11703">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11703">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11704">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11704">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11705">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11705">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11706">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11706">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11707">값 이름: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11707">Value Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11708">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11708">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11709">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11709">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11710">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11710">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11711">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11711">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11712">사용자 피드백 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11712">Allow user feedback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11713">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11713">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11714">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11714">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11715">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11715">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11716">Microsoft Edge는 Edge 피드백 기능(기본적으로 사용)을 사용하여 사용자가 피드백, 제안 또는 고객 조사를 전송하고 브라우저와 관련된 문제를 보고할 수 있도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11716">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11717">또한 기본적으로 사용자는 Edge 피드백 기능을 사용하지 않도록 설정(해제) 할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11717">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11718">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 사용자는 Edge 피드백을 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11718">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11719">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 Edge 피드백을 호출할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11719">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11720">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11720">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11721">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11721">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11722">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11722">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11723">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11723">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11724">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11724">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11725">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11725">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11726">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11726">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11727">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11727">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11728">GP 고유 이름: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11728">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11729">GP 이름: 사용자 피드백 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11729">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11730">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11730">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11731">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11731">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11732">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11732">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11733">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11733">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11734">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11734">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11735">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11735">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11736">값 이름: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11736">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11737">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11737">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11738">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11738">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11739">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11739">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11740">기본 설정 키 이름: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11740">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11741">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11741">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11742">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11742">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11743">VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11743">VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11744">브라우저 측면의 탭에 대한 수직 레이아웃의 가용성 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11744">Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11745">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11745">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11746">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11746">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11747">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11747">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11748">탭이 상단 대신 브라우저 측면에 수직으로 정렬된 대체 레이아웃에 사용자가 액세스할 수 있는지 여부를 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11748">Configures whether a user can access an alternative layout where tabs are vertically aligned on the side of the browser instead of at the top.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11749">탭이 여러 개 열려 있는 경우 이 레이아웃을 통해 탭을 보다 효율적으로 보고 관리할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11749">When there are several tabs open, this layout provides better tab viewing and management.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11750">사이트 제목을 더 잘 볼 수 있고 정렬된 아이콘을 더 쉽게 검색할 수 있으며 탭을 관리하고 닫을 수 있는 공간이 더 넓습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11750">There's better visibility of the site titles, it's easier to scan aligned icons, and there's more space to manage and close tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11751">이 정책을 실행 중지하면 수직 탭 레이아웃을 사용자의 옵션으로 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11751">If you disable this policy, then the vertical tab layout will not be available as an option for users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11752">이 정책을 실행하거나 구성하지 않으면 탭 레이아웃은 여전히 맨 위에 있지만 사용자는 측면의 수직 탭을 켤 수 있는 옵션을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11752">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the tab layout will still be at the top, but a user has the option to turn on vertical tabs on the side.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11753">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11753">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11754">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11754">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11755">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11755">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11756">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11756">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11757">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11757">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11758">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11758">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11759">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11759">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11760">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11760">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11761">GP 고유 이름: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11761">GP unique name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11762">GP 이름: 브라우저 측면의 탭에 대해 수직 레이아웃의 가용성 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11762">GP name: Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11763">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11763">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11764">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11764">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11765">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11765">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11766">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11766">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11767">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11767">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11768">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11768">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11769">값 이름: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11769">Value Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11770">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11770">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11771">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11771">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11772">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11772">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11773">기본 설정 키 이름: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11773">Preference Key Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11774">예제 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11774">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11775">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11775">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11776">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11776">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11777">비디오 캡처 허용 또는 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11777">Allow or block video capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11778">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11778">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11779">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11779">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11780">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11780">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11781">사이트에서 비디오를 캡처할 수 있는지 여부를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11781">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11782">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않은 경우(기본값) 사용자에게 묻지 않고 액세스 권한이 부여되는 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 정책 목록에서 구성한 URL을 제외한 모든 사이트에 대해 비디오 캡처 액세스 관련 메시지가 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11782">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11783">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 사용자에게 메시지가 표시되지 않고 [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) 정책에서 구성된 URL로만 비디오 캡처를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11783">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11784">해당 정책은 내장형 카메라 뿐만 아니라 모든 유형의 비디오 입력에 영향을 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11784">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11785">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11785">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11786">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11786">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11787">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11787">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11788">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11788">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11789">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11789">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11790">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11790">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11791">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11791">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11792">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11792">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11793">GP 고유 이름: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11793">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11794">GP 이름: 비디오 캡처 허용 또는 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11794">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11795">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11795">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11796">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11796">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11797">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11797">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11798">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11798">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11799">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11799">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11800">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11800">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11801">값 이름: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11801">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11802">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11802">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11803">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11803">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11804">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11804">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11805">기본 설정 키 이름: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11805">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11806">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11806">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11807">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11807">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11808">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11808">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11809">권한 요청 없이 비디오 캡처 장치에 액세스할 수 있는 사이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11809">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11810">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11810">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11811">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11811">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11812">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11812">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11813">사용자에게 사용 권한을 묻지 않고 비디오 캡처 장치를 사용할 수 있는 URL 패턴을 기반으로 웹 사이트를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11813">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11814">해당 목록의 패턴은 요청 URL의 보안 원본과 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11814">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11815">일치하는 경우 자동으로 비디오 캡처 장치에 대한 액세스 권한이 부여됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11815">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11816">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11816">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11817">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11817">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11818">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11818">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11819">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11819">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11820">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11820">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11821">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11821">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11822">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11822">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11823">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11823">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11824">GP 고유 이름: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11824">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11825">GP 이름: 권한 요청 없이 비디오 캡처 장치에 액세스할 수 있는 사이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11825">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11826">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11826">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11827">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11827">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11828">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11828">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11829">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11829">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11830">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11830">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11831">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11831">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11832">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11832">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11833">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11833">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11834">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11834">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11835">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11835">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11836">기본 설정 키 이름: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11836">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11837">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11837">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11838">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11838">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11839">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11839">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11840">WPAD 최적화 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11840">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11841">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11841">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11842">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11842">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11843">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11843">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11844">Microsoft Edge에서 WPAD(웹 프록시 자동 검색) 최적화를 해제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11844">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11845">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 WPAD 최적화가 해제되어 DNS 기반 WPAD 서버에 대해 브라우저가 더 오래 대기합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11845">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11846">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 WPAD 최적화를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11846">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11847">해당 정책의 사용 설정 여부나 방식에 관계 없이 사용자는 WPAD 최적화 설정을 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11847">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11848">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11848">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11849">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11849">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11850">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11850">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11851">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11851">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11852">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11852">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11853">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11853">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11854">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11854">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11855">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11855">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11856">GP 고유 이름: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11856">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11857">GP 이름: WPAD 최적화 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11857">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11858">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11858">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11859">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11859">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11860">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11860">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11861">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11861">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11862">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11862">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11863">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11863">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11864">값 이름: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11864">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11865">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11865">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11866">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11866">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11867">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11867">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11868">기본 설정 키 이름: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11868">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11869">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11869">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11870">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11870">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11871">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11871">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11872">강제 설치된 웹 앱 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11872">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11873">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11873">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11874">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11874">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11875">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11875">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11876">사용자의 상호 작용이 없이 자동으로 설치되는 웹 앱의 목록 그리고 제거 또는 해제할 수 없는 사용자를 지정하려면 이 정책을 구성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11876">Configure this policy to specify a list of web apps that install silently, without user interaction, and which users can't uninstall or turn off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11877">정책의 각 목록 항목은 필수 구성원이 있는 개체입니다. URL(설치할 웹 앱의 URL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11877">Each list item of the policy is an object with a mandatory member: url (the URL of the web app to install)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11878">및 3개 선택적 구성원:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11878">and 3 optional members:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11879">default_launch_container(웹 앱이 새 탭과 함께 여는 창 모드를 기본으로 지정합니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11879">default_launch_container (specifies the window mode that the web app opens with-a new tab is the default.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11880">create_desktop_shortcut(Linux 및 Windows 데스크톱 바로 가기를 만들기 원한다면 True입니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11880">create_desktop_shortcut (True if you want to create Linux and Windows desktop shortcuts.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11881">override_app_name(Microsoft Edge 89부터는 PWA(점진적 웹 앱)가 아닌 경우, 혹은 PWA이지만 설치가 완료되기 전에 인증이 필요하여 임시적으로 설치된 앱 이름인 경우, 앱 이름을 재정의할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11881">override_app_name (Starting with Microsoft Edge 89, allows you to override the app name if it is not a Progressive Web App (PWA), or the app name that is temporarily installed if it is a PWA but authentication is required before the installation can be completed.)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11882">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11882">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11883">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11883">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11884">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11884">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11885">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11885">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11886">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11886">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11887">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11887">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11888">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11888">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11889">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11889">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11890">GP 고유 이름: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11890">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11891">GP 이름: 강제 설치된 웹 앱 목록 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11891">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11892">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11892">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11893">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11893">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11894">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11894">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11895">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11895">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11896">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11896">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11897">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11897">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11898">값 이름: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11898">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11899">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11899">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11900">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11900">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "override_app_name": "Editor", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11901">예제 값 압축:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11901">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [{"create_desktop_shortcut": true, "default_launch_container": "window", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"}, {"default_launch_container": "tab", "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"}, {"default_launch_container": "window", "override_app_name": "Editor", "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11902">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11902">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11903">기본 설정 키 이름: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11903">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11904">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11904">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>override_app_name</key>
    <string>Editor</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.com/editor</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11905">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11905">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11906">WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11906">WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11907">Microsoft Edge에서 웹 캡처 기능을 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11907">Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11908">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11908">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11909">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11909">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11910">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11910">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11911">사용자가 수동 입력 도구를 사용하여 웹 콘텐츠를 캡처하고 캡처에 주석을 달 수 있게 해주는 Microsoft Edge의 웹 캡처 기능을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11911">Enables the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge that allows users to capture web content and annotate the capture using inking tools.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11912">이 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 상황에 맞는 메뉴, 설정 및 기타 메뉴에 웹 캡처 옵션이 표시되고, 바로 가기 키(CTRL+SHIFT+S)를 사용하여 웹 캡처 옵션이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11912">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Web capture option shows up in the context menu, Settings and more menu, and by using the keyboard shortcut, CTRL+SHIFT+S.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11913">이 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하면 사용자는 Microsoft Edge에서 웹 캡처 기능에 액세스할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11913">If you disable this policy, users can't access the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11914">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11914">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11915">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11915">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11916">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11916">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11917">동적 정책 새로 고침: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11917">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11918">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11918">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11919">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11919">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11920">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11920">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11921">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11921">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11922">GP 고유 이름: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11922">GP unique name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11923">GP 이름: Microsoft Edge에서 웹 캡처 기능을 사용하도록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11923">GP name: Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11924">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11924">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11925">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11925">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11926">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11926">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11927">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11927">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11928">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11928">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11929">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11929">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11930">값 이름: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11930">Value Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11931">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11931">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11932">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11932">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11933">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11933">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11934">기본 설정 키 이름: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11934">Preference Key Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11935">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11935">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11936">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11936">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11937">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11937">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11938">M84까지 웹 구성 요소 v0 API 다시 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11938">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-11939">사용되지 않음: 이 정책은 더 이상 사용되지 않으며 Microsoft Edge 84 이후에는 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11939">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11940">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11940">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11941">Windows 및 MacOS 80~84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11941">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11942">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11942">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11943">이 정책은 Microsoft Edge 버전 85까지 이러한 기능을 선택적으로 다시 사용하도록 허용했기 때문에 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11943">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11944">웹 구성 요소 v0 API(쉐도우 DOM v0, 사용자 지정 요소 v0 및 HTML 가져오기)는 2018년에 사용되지 않았습니다. 기본적으로 Microsoft Edge 버전 80부터 비활성화되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11944">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11945">해당 정책을 True로 설정하면 모든 사이트에 대해 웹 구성 요소 v0 기능을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11945">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11946">해당 정책을 False로 설정하거나 설정하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge 버전 80부터 시작하여 웹 구성 요소 v0 기능을 기본적으로 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11946">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11947">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11947">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11948">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11948">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11949">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11949">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11950">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11950">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11951">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11951">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11952">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11952">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11953">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11953">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11954">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11954">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11955">GP 고유 이름: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11955">GP unique name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11956">GP 이름: M84까지 웹 구성 요소 v0 API 다시 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11956">GP name: Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11957">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11957">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11958">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11958">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11959">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11959">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11960">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11960">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11961">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11961">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11962">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11962">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11963">값 이름: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11963">Value Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11964">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11964">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11965">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11965">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11966">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11966">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11967">기본 설정 키 이름: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11967">Preference Key Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11968">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11968">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11969">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11969">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11970">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11970">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11971">WebDriver가 호환되지 않는 정책을 재정의하도록 허용 (사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11971">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-11972">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11972">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11973">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11973">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11974">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11974">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11975">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상, 84까지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11975">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11976">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11976">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11977">WebDriver가 이제 모든 기존 정책과 호환되므로 이 정책이 작동하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11977">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11978">해당 정책을 사용하면 WebDriver 기능 사용자는 작업을 방해할 수 있는 정책을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11978">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11979">현재 해당 정책은 [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) 및 [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11979">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11980">해당 정책을 사용하면 WebDriver는 호환되지 않는 정책을 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11980">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-11981">해당 정책을 사용하지 않거나 구성하지 않으면 WebDriver는 호환되지 않는 정책을 재정의할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11981">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11982">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11982">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11983">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11983">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11984">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11984">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11985">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11985">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11986">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11986">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11987">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11987">Boolean</span></span>
