  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11988">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11988">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11989">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11989">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11990">GP 고유 이름: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11990">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11991">GP 이름: WebDriver가 호환되지 않는 정책을 재정의하도록 허용 (사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11991">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11992">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11992">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11993">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11993">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11994">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11994">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11995">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11995">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11996">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11996">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11997">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11997">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11998">값 이름: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11998">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-11999">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-11999">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12000">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12000">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12001">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12001">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12002">기본 설정 키 이름: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12002">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12003">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12003">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12004">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12004">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12005">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12005">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12006">WebRTC에서 레거시 TLS/DTLS 다운그레이드 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12006">Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-12007">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12007">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12008">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12008">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12009">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12009">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12010">Windows 및 MacOS 88 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12010">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12011">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12011">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12012">이 정책을 사용하면 WebRTC 피어 연결이 오래된 버전의 TLS/DTLS(DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 및 TLS 1.1) 프로토콜로 다운그레이드할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12012">If you enable this policy, WebRTC peer connections can downgrade to obsolete versions of the TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1) protocols.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12013">이 정책을 실행 중지하거나 설정하지 않으면 이러한 TLS/DTLS 버전이 실행 중지됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12013">If you disable or don't set this policy, these TLS/DTLS versions are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12014">이 정책은 임시 정책이며 이후 버전의 Microsoft Edge에서 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12014">This policy is temporary and will be removed in a future version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12015">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12015">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12016">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12016">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12017">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12017">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12018">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12018">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12019">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12019">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12020">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12020">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12021">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12021">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12022">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12022">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12023">GP 고유 이름: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12023">GP unique name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12024">GP 이름: WebRTC에서 레거시 TLS/DTLS 다운그레이드 허용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12024">GP name: Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12025">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12025">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12026">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12026">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12027">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12027">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12028">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12028">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12029">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12029">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12030">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12030">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12031">값 이름: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12031">Value Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12032">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12032">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12033">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12033">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12034">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12034">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12035">기본 설정 키 이름: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12035">Preference Key Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12036">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12036">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12037">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12037">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12038">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12038">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12039">WebRTC로 로컬 IP 주소 노출 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12039">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12040">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12040">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12041">Windows 및 MacOS (80 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12041">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12042">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12042">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12043">로컬 IP 주소가 WebRTC로 노출되는 원본(URL) 또는 호스트 이름 패턴(예: "*contoso.com*") 목록을 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12043">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12044">해당 정책을 사용하고 원본(URL) 또는 호스트 이름 패턴 목록을 설정하는 경우 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns를 사용하도록 설정할 때 WebRTC에서 목록에 있는 패턴과 일치하는 케이스에 대해 로컬 IP 주소를 노출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12044">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12045">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않고 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns를 사용하도록 설정한 경우 WebRTC는 로컬 IP 주소를 노출하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12045">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12046">로컬 IP 주소는 mDNS 호스트 이름으로 숨겨집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12046">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12047">해당 정책을 사용 또는 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않고 edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns를 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우 WebRTC는 로컬 IP 주소를 노출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12047">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12048">해당 정책은 관리자가 필요로 할 수 있는 로컬 IP 주소의 보호를 약화시킬 수 있다는 점에 유의하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12048">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12049">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12049">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12050">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12050">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12051">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12051">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12052">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12052">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12053">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12053">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12054">문자열 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12054">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12055">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12055">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12056">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12056">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12057">GP 고유 이름: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12057">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12058">GP 이름: WebRTC로 로컬 IP 주소 노출 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12058">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12059">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12059">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12060">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12060">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12061">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12061">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12062">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12062">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12063">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12063">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12064">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12064">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12065">값 이름: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12065">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12066">값 형식: REG_SZ 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12066">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12067">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12067">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12068">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12068">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12069">기본 설정 키 이름: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12069">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12070">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12070">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12071">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12071">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12072">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12072">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12073">WebRTC로 로컬 IP 주소 노출 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12073">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12074">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12074">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12075">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12075">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12076">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12076">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12077">WebRTC가 사용자의 로컬 IP 주소를 노출하는지 여부를 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12077">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12078">해당 정책을 ‘AllowAllInterfaces’ 또는 ‘AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces’로 설정한 경우 WebRTC는 로컬 IP 주소를 노출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12078">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12079">해당 정책을 ‘AllowPublicInterfaceOnly’ 또는 ‘DisableNonProxiedUdp’로 설정한 경우 WebRTC는 로컬 IP 주소를 노출하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12079">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12080">해당 정책을 설정하지 않거나 사용하지 않도록 설정한 경우 WebRTC는 로컬 IP 주소를 노출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12080">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12081">정책 옵션 매핑:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12081">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12082">AllowAllInterfaces (기본값) = 모든 인터페이스를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12082">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12083">로컬 IP 주소를 노출함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12083">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12084">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = http 기본 경로를 통해 공개 및 개인 인터페이스를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12084">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12085">로컬 IP 주소를 노출함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12085">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12086">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = http 기본 경로를 통해 공개 인터페이스를 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12086">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12087">로컬 IP 주소를 노출 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12087">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12088">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = 프록시 서버가 UDP를 지원하지 않으면 TCP를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12088">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12089">로컬 IP 주소를 노출 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12089">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12090">이 정책을 구성할 시 위의 정보를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12090">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12091">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12091">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12092">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12092">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12093">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12093">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12094">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12094">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12095">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12095">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12096">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12096">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12097">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12097">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12098">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12098">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12099">GP 고유 이름: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12099">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12100">GP 이름: WebRTC로 로컬 IP 주소 노출 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12100">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12101">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12101">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12102">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12102">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12103">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12103">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12104">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12104">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12105">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12105">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12106">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12106">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12107">값 이름: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12107">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12108">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12108">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12109">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12109">Example value:</span></span>

```
"default"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12110">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12110">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12111">기본 설정 키 이름: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12111">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12112">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12112">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12113">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12113">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12114">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12114">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12115">WebRTC로 로컬 UDP 포트 범위 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12115">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12116">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12116">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12117">Windows 및 MacOS (77 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12117">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12118">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12118">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12119">WebRTC에서 사용하는 UDP 포트 범위를 지정된 포트 간격(끝점 포함)으로 제한합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12119">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12120">해당 정책을 구성하여 WebRTC에서 사용할 수 있는 로컬 UDP 포트 범위를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12120">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12121">해당 정책을 구성하지 않거나 빈 문자열 또는 잘못된 포트 범위로 설정하는 경우 WebRTC는 제공된 모든 로컬 UDP 포트를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12121">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12122">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12122">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12123">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12123">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12124">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12124">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12125">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12125">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12126">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12126">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12127">문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12127">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12128">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12128">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12129">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12129">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12130">GP 고유 이름: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12130">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12131">GP 이름: WebRTC로 로컬 UDP 포트 범위 제한</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12131">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12132">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12132">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12133">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12133">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12134">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12134">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12135">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12135">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12136">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12136">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12137">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12137">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12138">값 이름: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12138">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12139">값 형식: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12139">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12140">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12140">Example value:</span></span>

```
"10000-11999"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12141">Mac 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12141">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12142">기본 설정 키 이름: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12142">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12143">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12143">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12144">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12144">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12145">WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12145">WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12146">웹 위젯 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12146">Enable the Web widget</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12147">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12147">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12148">Windows (88 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12148">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12149">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12149">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12150">웹 위젯을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12150">Enables the Web widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12151">해당 설정을 사용하면 사용자는 위젯을 사용하여 바탕 화면 또는 응용 프로그램에서 웹을 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12151">When enabled, users can use the widget to search the web from their desktop or from an application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12152">위젯은 웹 제안을 표시하고 Microsoft Edge에서 모든 웹 검색을 여는 검색 상자를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12152">The widget provides a search box that shows web suggestions and opens all web searches in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12153">검색 상자는 검색(Bing에서 제공) 및 URL 제안을 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12153">The search box provides search (powered by Bing) and URL suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12154">위젯에는 사용자가 새 Microsoft Edge 브라우저 탭 또는 창에서 msn.com에 대한 자세한 정보를 보기 위해 클릭할 수 있는 피드 타일도 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12154">The widget also includes feed tiles that users can click to see more information on msn.com in a new Microsoft Edge browser tab or window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12155">피드 타일에 광고가 포함될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12155">The feed tiles may include ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12156">위젯은 Microsoft Edge 설정 또는 Microsoft Edge의 “추가 도구” 메뉴에서 실행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12156">The widget can be launched from the Microsoft Edge settings or from the "More tools" menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12157">해당 정책을 사용하도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 웹 위젯이 모든 프로필에 대해 자동으로 활성화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12157">If you enable or don't configure this policy: The Web widget will be automatically enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12158">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 사용자에게 위젯을 실행하는 옵션이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12158">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see option to launch the widget.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12159">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 사용자에게 Windows 시작 시(자동 시작) 위젯을 실행하는 메뉴 항목이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12159">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see the menu item to run the widget at Windows startup (auto-start).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12160">[WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) 정책을 사용하는 경우 시작 시 위젯을 활성화하는 옵션이 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12160">The option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled on if the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) policy is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12161">[WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하거나 구성하지 않으면 시작 시 위젯을 활성화하는 옵션이 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12161">If the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) is disabled or not configured, the option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled off.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12162">사용자에게 Microsoft Edge "추가 도구" 메뉴에서 위젯을 실행하는 메뉴 항목이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12162">Users will see the menu item to launch the widget from the Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12163">사용자는 "추가 도구"에서 위젯을 실행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12163">Users can launch the widget from "More tools".</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12164">시스템 트레이의 "종료" 옵션을 사용하거나 작업 표시줄에서 직접 종료하여 위젯을 해제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12164">The widget can be turned off by the "Quit" option in the System tray or by closing the widget from the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12165">자동 시작 옵션이 활성화된 경우 시스템 재부팅 시 위젯이 다시 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12165">The widget will be restarted on system reboot if auto-start is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12166">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 모든 프로필에 대해 웹 위젯을 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12166">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will be disabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12167">Microsoft Edge 설정에서 위젯을 실행하는 옵션이 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12167">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge Settings will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12168">Windows 시작 시(자동 시작) 위젯을 실행하는 옵션이 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12168">The option to launch start the widget at Windows startup (auto-start) will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12169">Microsoft Edge “추가 도구” 메뉴에서 위젯을 실행하는 옵션이 사용하지 않도록 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12169">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12170">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12170">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12171">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12171">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12172">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12172">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12173">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12173">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12174">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12174">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12175">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12175">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12176">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12176">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12177">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12177">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12178">GP 고유 이름: WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12178">GP unique name: WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12179">GP 이름: 웹 위젯 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12179">GP name: Enable the Web widget</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12180">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12180">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12181">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12181">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12182">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12182">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12183">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12183">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12184">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12184">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12185">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12185">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12186">값 이름: WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12186">Value Name: WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12187">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12187">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12188">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12188">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12189">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12189">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12190">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12190">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12191">Windows 시작 시 웹 위젯 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12191">Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12192">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12192">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12193">Windows (88 이상)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12193">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12194">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12194">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12195">Windows 시작 시 웹 위젯을 실행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12195">Allows the Web widget to start running at Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12196">활성화된 경우 Windows 시작 시 기본적으로 웹 위젯 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12196">If you enable: The Web widget will start running at Windows startup by default.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12197">[WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) 정책을 통해 위젯을 사용하지 않도록 설정된 경우 해당 정책은 Windows 시작 시 위젯을 실행하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12197">If the widget is disabled via [WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) policy, this policy will not start the widget on Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12198">해당 정책을 사용하지 않도록 설정하는 경우 Windows 시작 시 모든 프로필에 대해 웹 위젯을 실행하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12198">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12199">Windows 시작 시 웹 위젯을 실행하는 옵션은 Microsoft Edge 설정에서 사용하지 않도록 설정되고 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12199">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be disabled and toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12200">해당 정책을 구성하지 않으면 Windows 시작 시 모든 프로필에 대해 웹 위젯을 실행하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12200">If you don't configure the policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12201">Windows 시작 시 웹 위젯을 실행하는 옵션은 Microsoft Edge 설정에서 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12201">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12202">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12202">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12203">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12203">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12204">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12204">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12205">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12205">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12206">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12206">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12207">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12207">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12208">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12208">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12209">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12209">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12210">GP 고유 이름: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12210">GP unique name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12211">GP 이름: Windows 시작 시 웹 위젯 허용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12211">GP name: Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12212">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12212">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12213">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12213">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12214">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12214">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12215">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12215">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12216">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12216">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12217">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12217">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12218">값 이름: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12218">Value Name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12219">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12219">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12220">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12220">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12221">맨 위로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12221">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12222">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12222">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12223">Windows 프록시 해결 프로그램 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12223">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="62b65-12224">DEPRECATED: 해당 정책은 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12224">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12225">현재 지원되고 있지만 이후 릴리스에서는 더 이상 사용되지 않을 예정입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12225">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12226">지원 버전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12226">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12227">Windows 84 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12227">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12228">설명</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12228">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12229">이 정책은 향후 릴리스에서 유사한 기능으로 대체될 예정이므로 더 이상 사용되지 않습니다. https://crbug.com/1032820을(를) 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12229">This policy is deprecated because it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12230">Windows를 사용하여 Microsoft Edge에 내장된 프록시 확인자 대신 모든 브라우저 네트워킹에 대한 프록시를 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12230">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12231">Windows 프록시 확인자는 DirectAccess/NRPT와 같은 Windows 프록시 기능을 활성화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12231">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12232">이 정책은 https://crbug.com/644030에서 설명하는 문제와 함께 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12232">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12233">[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) 정책을 통해 설정된 PAC 파일을 포함하여 Windows 코드에서 PAC 파일을 가져오고 실행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12233">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12234">PAC 파일에 대한 네트워크 가져오기는 Microsoft Edge 코드 대신 Windows를 통해 수행되므로 [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode)와 같은 네트워크 정책은 PAC 파일에 대한 네트워크 가져오기에 적용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12234">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12235">이 정책을 사용하면 Windows 프록시 확인자가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12235">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62b65-12236">이 정책을 사용하지 않거나 구성하지 않으면 Microsoft Edge 프록시 확인자가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12236">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12237">지원 기능:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12237">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12238">필수 사항: 예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12238">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12239">권장 사항: 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12239">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12240">동적 정책 새로 고침: 아니요 - 브라우저 재시작 필요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12240">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12241">데이터 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12241">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12242">부울</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12242">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12243">Windows 정보 및 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12243">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12244">그룹 정책(ADMX) 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12244">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12245">GP 고유 이름: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12245">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12246">GP 이름: Windows 프록시 해결 프로그램 사용(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12246">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12247">GP 경로 (필수): 관리 템플릿/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12247">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12248">GP 경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12248">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12249">GP ADMX 파일 이름: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12249">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12250">Windows 레지스트리 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12250">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12251">경로 (필수): SOFTWARE\정책\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12251">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12252">경로 (권장): 해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12252">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12253">값 이름: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12253">Value Name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12254">값 형식: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12254">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="62b65-12255">예를 들어 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62b65-12255">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
